item.text: @#/ /dkon brtsegs nga pa bzhugs so/ /
rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya many+dzu shrI bud+d+ha k+She tra gu Na byU ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/
'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag
gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong
stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang /
ngan song sel dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'
brgyad khri bzhi stong la 'di lta ste/ thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
ldog pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ lha bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis thams cad kyang byang chub sems
dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po
tshangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i tshangs pa bzhi khri nyis stong dang yang thabs
cig go /'di lta ste/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzang ris dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs can dang / lha ma
yin gyi dbang po phrag rtsub dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab dga' dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi po thams cad kyang
g.yog lha ma yin brgya stong phrag du ma yod pa dang thabs cig go /klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / klu'i
rgyal po chu lha dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang / klu'i rgyal po gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / klu'i
rgyal po sa 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang / klu'i rgyal po bdud las rgyal ba dang / klu'i rgyal
po zla ba'i bla ma la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'di lta ste/ rgyal po chen po yul
'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang / rgyal po chen po rnam
thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi po thams cad kyang g.yog brgya stong du ma dang bcas pa dag dang / gnod sbyin kum
bi ra dang / 'brog gnas dang / khab spu dang / yid bzang dang / blo gros bzang po dang / dbyibs bzang dang / kun
nas kha dog dang / gnod sbyin mi 'khrugs pa dang / de dag dang / gnod sbyin gzhan brgya stong dang yang thabs cig go /
yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por nye bar gnas shing bzhugs te lha dang / klu dang / gnod
sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'i lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dag dang / 'khor bzhi rnams kyis bsti stang du byas/
bla mar byas/ rim gror byas nas mchod cing gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba dang / na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi gsos sman
dang / yo byad bzang po mang po brnyes so/ /yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs dang / chos gos gsol/ lhung bzed bsnams te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen
po dang thabs cig tu lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen po dang / sangs
rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen pos me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po'i char chen po ni/ mngon par 'bebs/ sil snyan brgya stong ni/
bkrol nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khyim du bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs te/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yang rab tu phyung ngo / /de nas
de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas zhabs gang dang gang du bzhag pa'i zhabs bzhag pa de dang der pad+ma shing rta'i 'phang lo
tsam| 'dab ma ni/ gser/ chu ba ni/ dngul/ ze ba ni/ bai DUR+Ya/ snying po ni/ nor bu bzang po dang ldan pa rnams byung ste/ pad+ma de dag gi dbus
kyi snying po la byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug pa dag 'byung ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub
sems dpa'i gzugs de dag pad+ma de dag dang bcas te rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po la lan bdun du bskor ba byed cing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /skye bo rnams
la phan mdzad ded dpon gang / /yon gyi gnas gang dge ba rnams mdzad pa/ /shAkya khyu mchog blo zhi bdag nyid che/ /'jig rten mgon po de ni grong du gshegs/ /lha yi
gnas su gang rnams rtsen pa dang / de bzhin rga dang 'chi las thar 'dod dang / /bdud kyi sde rnams pham par gang 'dod pa/ /des ni shAkya seng+ge mchod par gyis/ /'gro ba
rnams la phan zhing thugs brtse'i phyir/ /bskal pa bye bar spyad pa rnam spyod pa/ /thub pa rnams kyi sgra yang rnyed par dka'/ /thub pa de ring rgyal po'i khab gshegs bzhed/ /
zas skom de bzhin gos dang bzhon pa dang / /bu dang bu mo chung ma rnams dang ni/ /sbyin pa dpag med bsam yas gang btang ba/ /kun mkhyen de ni rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs/ /
lag pa rkang pa mig dang rna ba dang / /sna dang yan lag dam pa mgo btang ste/ /kun btang yon tan ldan pa gtong phod pa/ /des ni kun mkhyen ye shes mchog brnyes so/ /sbyin dang
dul dang sdom la gang bslab cing / /skyes bu dam pa tshul khrims ma nyams pa/ /bzod pa'i bdag nyid yon tan mchog ldan pa/ /zhi ba'i thugs de grong du deng gshegs so/ /sdug
bsngal bying pa'i 'jig rten rab gzigs nas/ /brtson mchog bskal pa bye bar gang spyod cing / /bsam gtan mtha' yas mnyam pa med dang ldan/ /tshangs dbyangs de ni de ring
grong khyer gshegs/ /drang srong chen po de yi shes rab ni/ /mtshungs med nam mkha'i khams ltar dpag tu med/ /bde gshegs de yi yon tan gzhan dag kyang / /spyod pa dang ni rnam
par smin pas sbyangs/ /blo ldan gang gis bdud kyi sde bcom zhing / /mi g.yo go 'phang mya ngan med pa brnyes/ /chos kyi 'khor lo tshul bzhin rab bskor te/ /chos kyi dbang phyug de ni
grong khyer gshegs/ /mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis brgyan pa'i sku/ /bde gshegs 'gyur bar su dag 'dod pa ni/ /snying la rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bzhag ste/ /mchod pa'i phyir ni
de yi thad du song / /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug spang ba dang / /de bzhin nyon mongs gzhan las rgyal 'dod pa/ /de ni ston pa'i thad du nyer song la/ /mchod pa rnam mang mtha' yas
myur du gyis/ /tshangs pa dang ni lha yi dbang phyug dang / /brgya byin nyid ni thob par su 'dod cing / /lha yi bde bas rtag tu rtse dga' ba/ /de ni thub pa
mchod phyir nye bar song / /gling bzhi'i bdag po rgyal por 'gyur bya zhing / /rin chen mchog bdun rang gis thob pa dang / /bu mchog stong rnams kyang ni gang 'dod pa/ /sems
can mchog la des myur mchod par gyis/ /khyim bdag tshong dpon khams kyi rgyal po dang / /mdzes pa'i gzugs dang g.yog 'khor dam pa dang / /longs spyod 'phel
ba'i mchog rnams gang 'dod pa/ /de ni deng song thub la mchod pa gyis/ /gang su rnam par grol dang 'grol ba kun/ /thub pa rnams kyi chos mchog thos nas te/ /'dren
pa rnams kyi sgra yang 'dir dkon gyi/ /de phyir chos nyan du ni deng myur dengs/ /de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po
dag tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis bskul nas skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams me tog dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang
phye ma'i phur ma thogs/ gser dang / dngul gyi me tog gi phur ma thogs/ /gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thogs/ rnga bo che dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / 'khar
rnga dang / pi wang rgyud gcig pa dang / sgra snyan dang / gling bu dang / 'khar dkrol dang / kim pa la dang / na gu la dang / pi wang thogs te de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed
cing / de bzhin gshegs pa la sems te sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob cing 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs g.yas pa sgo'i them pa la bzhag ma thag tu de nas grong khyer thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ lha
dang mi'i sil snyan brgya stong yang ma dkrol bar sgra byung / lha'i me tog gi char yang rab tu bab ste/ sems can long ba rnams ni/ mig gis gzugs rnams mthong / sems
can 'on pa rnams ni/ rna bas sgra thos/ sems can smyon pa rnams ni/ dran pa thob/ sems can yid brel ba rnams ni/ rtse gcig pa thob/ sems can gcer bu rnams
ni| gos rnyed/ sems can bkres pa rnams ni/ zas rnyed/ sems can dbul po rnams ni/ nor rnyed do/ /de'i tshe na sems can gang yang 'dod chags kyis gzir ba
med de| zhe sdang gis ma yin/ gti mug gis ma yin/ phrag dog gis ma yin/ ser snas ma yin/ khro bas ma yin/ da rgyal gyis ma yin no/ /de'i tshe na sems can
thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang ldan zhing / phan tshun du pha mar 'du shes par gyur to/ /de la 'di skad ces
bya ste| sangs rgyas skyes bu seng+ge che/ /stobs bcu grong khyer nam gshegs tshe/ /de yi mod la skye bo rnams/ /bde ba rgya cher dri med thob/ /long bas mig rnams mthong bar
gyur| |'on ba thos pa'i mthu yang skyes/ /myos pa dag ni dran pa rnyed/ /yid brel rtse gcig de bzhin no/ /gcer bu dag ni gos rnyed do/ /bkres pa dag gis zas thob bo/ /
skyes bu gang su dbul po yang / /dga' bar nor rnams rnyed par gyur/ /lha rnams bye ba mang po yang / /mkha' la gnas shing stobs rab mchod/ /smra ba'i seng+ge mchod pa'i
phyir| |me tog char kyang rab tu 'bebs/ /rnga dang rdza rnga sil snyan dung / /nyams dga' byed pa dpag med pa/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni bsod nams kyis/ /grong khyer 'jug tshe sgra yang
'byung / /grong khyer kun tu rab g.yos te/ /de tshe nyams dga' mnyam par gnas/ /skye bos ngo mtshar 'di mthong nas/ /dga' ba shin tu rgya chen thob/ /'dod chags kyis ni
mi gzir zhing / /de tshe khro blun ser sna med/ /nga rgyal la sogs nyes pas kyang / /gzir ba de tshe ma lus med/ /dga' bas khyab cing dang ba ste/ /mi rnams pha mar 'du shes gyur//
gang tshe sangs rgyas stobs bcu po/ /skye bo bde phyir grong gshegs tshe/ /mi yi ma yin sil snyan rnams/ /ma dkrol bar ni sgra yang 'byung / /'jig rten lha min lha mir bcas/ /bde
gshegs 'od kyis rgyas par gang / /de ltar gang tshe sangs rgyas ni/ /'gro la phan phyir grong gshegs pa/ /de tshe ngo mtshar rmad byung ba/ /rnam pa mang po rab tu gda'/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs pa dang / tshong dpon shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu sdig bcom zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' khyim par gyur pa grong bar
zhig na 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom gyis bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa/ dga' bar 'gyur ba/ dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ dul ba dang zhi gnas mchog
brnyes pa/ dul ba dang zhi gnas mchog gi pha rol tu byon pa/ bsdams pa/ glang po ltar dbang po thul ba/ mtsho ltar dang ste rnyog pa med cing gsal ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku legs par brgyan pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa rgyang ring po nas gshegs pa mthong ngo / /mthong
nas kyang de bcom ldan 'das la sems shin tu dad par gyur to/ /de sems shin tu dad nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub
sems dpa' sdig bcom gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / sangs rgyas
kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyong / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'tshal ba de lta bu yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
chub sems dpa' sdig bcom la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir grong bar gyi phyogs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /phyogs gcig tu
bzhugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das mthong nas srog chags brgya stong mang po dag kyang lhags par gyur to/ /bar snang las kyang lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag
gus pa dang bcas/ zhe sa dang bcas par thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po sdig bcom la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyong la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yang yongs su 'dzin
to| |chos gcig po gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la snying rje che zhing lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o/ /de la lhag pa'i bsam pa khong du chud par bya ba gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya ba ni /
gang byang chub kyi phyir sems bskyed nas mi dge ba'i las gang yang mi spyod pa'o/ /ci mi spyod ce na/ 'dod chags mi spyod/ zhe sdang mi spyod/ gti mug mi spyod/ khyim pa'i rtags
la sred pa mi spyod de/ rab tu byung nas kyang rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa mi 'dod cing / gang rab tu byung ba'i sgrub pa de la gnas pa yin no/ /de la rab tu
byung ba'i sgrub pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa'o/ /chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa gang
zhe na| rigs kyi bu/ chos thams cad ces bya ba ni/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams
so| |phung po lnga rab tu rtags pa ji ltar rab tu rtogs she na/ phung po lnga rnams sgyu ma lta bu dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang /
ma 'gag par rab tu rtogs pa ste/ ji ltar rab tu rtogs pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar rab tu rtogs pa'o/ /gang gi tshe yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / mi
shes| rlom sems su mi byed/ mi rtogs/ rnam par mi rtogs pa de'i tshe rtog pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba ni/ phung po rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya'o/ /gang phung po rab tu rtogs pa
de| chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ rab tu byung ba'i sgrub pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
sems can rnams yongs su mi gtong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des ji ltar bdag gis chos de dag yongs su shes par gyur pa de ltar sems can thams cad la ston kyang
sems can dang / chos kyang mi dmigs te/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig po 'di dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyong / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yang
yongs su 'dzin to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su sgrub pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom mi skye
ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/ de dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba des shing ta la bdun srid du bar snang la mngon par 'phags so/ /'khor de'i nang nas srog
chags nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye rgu'i srog chags khri bzhi stong ni/ chos rnams la
chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang
gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas kha dog du ma dang / kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro ba 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang /
dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu rnams byung ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par
byas nas slar log ste bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan
pa kun dga' bo stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /chos rnams kun la mnga' dbang pha rol phyin/ /'dren pa khyod ni rgyal ba'i stobs la
mnga'| |khyod ni thams cad mkhyen par 'jig rten grags/ /ci yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di bstan gsung / /thub pa chen po 'das pa ma lus mkhyen/ /de bzhin ma 'ongs ma
lus rnams kyang mkhyen/ /da ltar dag kyang mkhyen pa ma smad pa/ /ci slad khyod kyis 'dzum pa 'di mdzad gsung / /rab 'bring tha ma'i sems dang ldan pa yi/ /sems can
thams cad kyi ni spyod pa mkhyen/ /chags grol srid pa'i 'du shes pha rol phyin/ /mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba lung bstan gsol/ /lha rnams bye ba khrag khrig kun lhags
te| |skyon ma mchis la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal zhing / /skye bo chos spyod 'di dag kun sdod kyi/ /thub pa chen po mtshungs med gsung dbyung gsol/ /khyod ni ye shes pha
rol phyin/ /khyod la 'khrul pa yong mi mnga'/ /spyod pa'i bye brag kun mkhyen pa/ /ci zhig slad du 'dzum pa bstan/ /bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong lha 'di dag /chos rnams 'tshal
ba'i slad du 'dir lhags te/ /de bzhin dge slong tshogs kyang mang po dag /dam pa'i chos rnams nyan par 'tshal ba mchis/ /khyod la mchod pa'i phyir ni sil snyan rnams/ /rab
tu bzang zhing mang ba brdung bar bgyid/ /skye bo mang po the tshom 'tshal ba kun/ /thub pa der 'dir the tshom myur gcad gsol/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom 'di shing ta la bdun srid du steng gi
bar snang la 'dug pa mthong ngam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom 'di bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis na bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bskal pa rims nad med pa la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug ces bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ste /
kun dga' bo/ dper na/ da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / nyan
thos phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rab tu zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na yang de las mi lhag mi thu bar 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das phyogs
de nas gshegs te mthar gyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs nas byon pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /dge slong gi dge
'dun rnams kyang stan ci 'os pa dag la 'khod do/ /de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhugs par rig nas bdag nyid lag
bdar te bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba dang / myang ba bzang po mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la bstabs te tshim par byas so/ /bstabs
te tshim par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa bshos gsol ba dang / lhung bzed bzhag cing phyag bcabs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la ras bcos bu zung rin thang
med pa sku la gsol to/ /sku la gsol nas kyang bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal te stan ran pa zhig blangs nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs
gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / zhe sdang dang / 'chab pa gang
nas 'byung ba lags/ mi shes pa ci las skye ba lags/ mi shes pa ji ltar 'gag pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di
skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa yod pa las/ gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / zhe sdang dang / 'chab pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ngar
'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pas yon tan dang / nyes pa mi shes te/ de bas na/ mi shes pa zhes bya'o/ /gang ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa de yang dag pa ji
lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa de la ni/ shes pa'am/ mi shes pa zhes gdags par mi nus so/ /de bas na/ rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyis 'du byed thams cad la gar yang 'gro
ba dang / gang nas kyang 'ong bar mi gdags pa de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ gang gar yang mi 'gro /gang nas kyang mi 'ong ba de
la chos gang yang 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba med do/ /gang la 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba med pa de la skye ba med 'gag pa med de/ gang mi skye mi 'gag pa de shes pa'o/ /shes pa
de ji lta bar mi shes pa'ang de bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nges par 'byung ba'am/ nges par mi 'byung ba'i chos de gang yang mi shes pa'i phyir ro/ /gang gi tshe nges par
'byung ba'am/ nges par mi 'byung ba'i chos gang yang mi shes pa de'i tshe ye shes can zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol
to| |bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs par gsungs pa ngo mtshar
to| |bcom ldan 'das/ gal te bdag par skabs 'di kho nar 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par gyur na ni/ bdag nyid mtshams sbyor bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar
mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe yang chos kyi sbyin pa la 'du bar 'gyur ba mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das zas phyis len pa spangs te
lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag nas zhabs bkrus te nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i phyir gnas khang du gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag
'jog pa las bzhengs nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas 'di lta ste/ chos yang dag pa rab tu bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das gdan
bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / nyan thos chen po gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po
ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod
do| |'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang nang du yang dag 'jog las langs te lha'i bu bzhi khri nyis stong thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag
gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig
tu 'khod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang byang chub sems dpa' stong tsam gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du
bdar nas lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra yang byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan
cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /rgyal po ma skyes dgra yang dpung
gi tshogs yan lag bzhis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste
phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas kyang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig
brgya stong du ma ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa
la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal po'i khab
kyi grong khyer chen po'i grong bar du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom gyis gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sangs rgyas
kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa las brtsams te yongs su zhus pa de'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo tsam zhig bka' stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da yang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su 'grub pa de las brtsams te/ ji ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi sde rnams pham par bgyid pa
dang / gzhan mu stegs can rnams tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa zil gyis non par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su sbyong
bar 'gyur ba dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa la
'jug par 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod par 'gyur ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
thob ste byang chub sems dpar gyur bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa'i don bgyid par 'gyur
ba de ltar chos legs par rab tu bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'khor 'di na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo byang chub don du gnyer pa 'dus shing mchis pa rnams
bcom ldan 'das las chos mngon sum du thos nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob par 'gyur te/ de dag dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob nas ji ltar
thos pa bzhin du nan tan gyis bsgrub par 'gyur ba dag mchis so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ 'di lta bu'i chos bstan par byas na 'khor 'di lta bu ni/ mi
mdzes kyi/ ngas ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas pas phyogs bcu kun tu phyogs re rer yang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po bkye la/ 'od zer re

res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po snang bas khyab par byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od kyang mi snang zhing / de dag 'od zer de dag
gis zil gyis mnan nas phyir mig gi dbang po la snang bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams kyi 'od kyang mi mngon/ klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / nor bu dang / glog dang / me dang / skar ma'i
gzugs dang / sems can gzhan gang gi 'od kyang mi mngon par 'gyur ba dang / gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa'i khor yug gang / khor yug chen
po dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / de ma yin pa gzhan ri'i rgyal po nag po dag dang / de ma yin pa gzhan ri nag po dag dang / rtsig pa
dang / shing dang / nags tshal de dag thams cad 'od zer de dag gis thal byung du snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du bya'o/ /snyam du dgongs
so| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu'i 'od zer bkye nas gsung bsal ba'i sgra mdzad pa dang / gsung bsal ba'i sgra des phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams
mtha' yas mu med pa dag sgras go bar gyur to/ /yang de'i tshe na shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pa
na 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas 'od ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal brtsegs
rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ming yang mi grag ste /
sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig gis yongs su gang ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs re
re la yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa bye ba phrag brgya brgya yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po chos 'phags zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de chos 'phags zhes bya zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bcom ldan 'das dpal
brtsegs rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing chos ston pa'i spyan snga na shing ta la bdun srid tsam du bar snang
la 'phags te lus mi snang bar gang 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs kyi chos ston to/ /de nas byang chub
sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ chos 'di dag thams cad ni/ sgra tsam mo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di'i lus mi snang mod kyi/ bshad
pa yang grag la sgra yang 'byin te/ gzugs yongs su grub pa yang mi snang ngo / /sgra ji lta bar gzugs kyang de bzhin no/ /gzugs ji lta bar chos thams cad kyang de bzhin
no| |snyam mo/ /de ltar rab tu shes pas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa rnams bzod pa thob ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de chos 'phags zhes bya'o/ /byang
chub sems dpa' chos 'phags des snang ba chen po de yang mthong / gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas bcom ldan 'das dpal brtsegs rgyal po
de bzhin gshegs pa de ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du
byung zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po yang gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags /rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das /snang ba 'di lta bu ni/ sngon chad ma mthong ngo / /de
skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal brtsegs
rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs su
sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / 'di lta ste/ chos bsgrag par bya ba'i phyir ba spu'i khung bu thams cad
nas 'od zer 'di dag btang ste gsung bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs rgyal po de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun de dag la yang
blta ba dang / chos de yang nyan du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po chos 'phags byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag drug khri sum stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu stobs po ches lag
pa bskum pa las brkyang ba dang / brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis skad cig thang gcig yud tsam de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi
mjed 'dir gnas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par
zhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de nyid la stong gsum gyi stong chen
po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog gi tshogs chen pos pus mo nub tsam du gang bar gyur to/ /sil snyan brgya stong gi sgra yang byung ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams 'di gdugs
dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng bas kyang legs par brgyan par gyur to/ /spos mchog gis kyang yang dag par bdugs te/ gzhan 'phrul
dbang byed kyi lha'i longs spyod dang khyad par med par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa de lta bu
bstan nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad+ma dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod
do| |yang de'i tshe lho phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i klung dgu cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rdul med
pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng+ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
la byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pas yongs su bskor cing chos ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams med do/ /yang sangs rgyas
kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de ci'i phyir lag na rin po che zhes bya zhe na/ yang
rigs kyi bu de nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du sems can rnams la chos ston par 'dod pa de'i tshe lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed du 'dod pa sangs
rgyas kyi zhing de snyed lag gis byugs nas lag pa de las sangs rgyas rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo / /chos rin po che'i sgra dang / dge 'dun rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo / /sbyin pa
dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo / /byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang /
btang snyoms rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo / /de dag dang / gzhan yang chos rin po che'i sgra sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'byung ste/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu de lag na
rin po che zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches snang ba chen po de yang mthong / gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas kyang bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i rtsal gyi bsgyings pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu
'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa seng+ge'i rtsal gyi bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po yang
gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs
rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i klung dgu cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'di phyogs
bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos bsgrag pa'i phyir ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'di ltar
dag rab tu bkye zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo / /yang rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi
rnam grangs bshad par bzhed de/ der byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das seng+ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag 'jig rten
gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen
bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de la yang blta ba dang / chos bstan pa de yang nyan du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu /
khyod der song ste ci rung / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis khebs pa'i sems can rnams dang phrad pas na/ 'jig rten gyi khams de ni/ sdug
bsngal ba'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i rtsal gyis
bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa des don gyi dbang ci zhig
gzigs na/ bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan dag kyang mchis bzhin du de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngan pa yongs
su 'dzin/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des nga ci nas kyang sems
can ngan pa rnams kyi nang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos bstan par bya'o/ /zhes yun ring po nas smon lam
btab par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni/ de ltar thugs rje chen po dang ldan no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
seng+ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten gyi khams
mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thugs
rje chen po bskyed de/ de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngan pa yongs su bzung ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dka' ba mdzad pa ste/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di lta bu ni/ 'byung bar dka'o/ /de mthong ba yang rnyed par dka'o/ /bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/
rigs kyi bu/ khyod de'i dus la bab par shes na song la/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing der rab tu sgrim par gyis shig /rmas par gyur ta re/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang
sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni/ bsnyen par dka'o/ /de na sems can gzhan de dag kyang gtum zhing khro ba dag go /de skad ces bka' stsal pa
dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ gang rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro bar 'gyur ba de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der rmas par 'gyur gyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la ni/ rjes su chags pa'ang ma
mchis| khong khro ba yang ma mchis na/ bdag ci'i slad du rmas par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la sems can thams cad kyis phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal bar gshe zhing
spyo ste brdegs shing btsogs nas bong ba dang / mtshon gyis btab kyang bzod par spro ste/ sems can gang la'ang gnod par bgyi ba'i sems mi bskyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa des rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /khyed las gang byang
chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che ltar bzod pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin par spro ba de rigs kyi bu 'di dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der dengs shig /
bcom ldan 'das des tshig de skad gsungs ma thag tu de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong gis dbyangs gcig tu
bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che ltar bzod pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin par spro ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der
mchi'o| |zhes gsol to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun
du bdar te lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gnas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ji lta bus bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i thad du 'gro zhing / sems can tshad
med pa la ji ltar bde bar bya snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches de'i tshe ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lag pa g.yas
pas bkab nas lag pa de las bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la bza' ba byung ba dang / btung ba 'dod pa rnams la btung ba dang / de bzhin du bzhon pa dang / gos dang / gser dang / dngul dang / bai
DUR+Ya dang / mu tig dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / su dag ci 'dod par gyur pa thams cad de las byung bar gyur pa dang / sems can gang chos don du gnyer zhing chos
'dod pa de dag gis kyang lag pa de las chos thos par gyur pa dang / de na sems can dpag tu med pa dag gis kyang chos mngon par rtogs par gyur pa dang / sems can gang
nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis btab cing sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par
byas so| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa de lta bu 'di bstan nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lhan
cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la
lan gsum bskor ba byas nas smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad+ma de dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /yang de'i tshe
nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i
snying po zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni/ bai DUR+Ya bzang po 'ba' zhig las mngon par grub pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnam par gzhag
pa med de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gis yongs su gang ngo / /yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' gang rnams 'gro yang
rung / 'ong yang rung / 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / ldang yang rung / 'chag kyang rung ste/ de dag gis bai DUR+Ya'i sa chen po de las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de mthong ngo / /'di lta ste/ dper na/ shin tu phyis pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor la bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba de bzhin du
byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bai DUR+Ya'i sa chen po de las de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ngo / /mthong nas chos kun 'dri ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yang de dag la lung ston to/ /
de dag kyang chos thos nas bzod pa thob bo/ /'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bcom ldan 'das de'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i dbus su yang nor
bu rin po che chen po mngon par grub ste/ nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad snang bar byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na me tog kha zum pa dang / me tog
kha bye ba las nyin mtshan bgrang ba ma gtogs par nyi ma dang / zla bar mngon par yang med/ nyin mtshan du mngon pa yang med do/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i
rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis snang ba chen po de yang mthong / gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu
brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de la 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po yang gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang+gA'i klung dgu cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig
rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
gzhes la chos ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig tshad med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang /
'di lta ste/ chos bsgrag pa'i phyir ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer 'di dag rab tu bkye zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo / /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems
dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa
de yang blta ba dang / chos bstan pa de yang nyan du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig /de nas byang chub sems
dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa
gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gnas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros 'di snyam
du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ji lta bus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i thad du
'gro bar bya snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis de'i tshe ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang dag sems
can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur ba'i sems can de dag thams cad mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa dang / sems
can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba'i me yang rab tu zhi bar gyur pa dang / sems can gang dag bkres pa dang skom pas
nyen pa yi dwags dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can de dag dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa de dag thams cad bkres pa dang skom pa dang bral zhing / bde ba
mchog dang ldan par gyur pa 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dge slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba bzhin te/ skad cig de nyid la sems can de dag bde
ba rnam pa 'di lta bu skyes nas skad cig de nyid la sems can gang yang 'dod chags sam/ zhe sdang ngam/ gti mug gam/ khro ba'am/ nga rgyal lam/ 'chab pa'am/
'tshig pa'am/ phrag dog gam/ ser sna'am/ g.yo ba'am/ tha ba'am/ gnod sems kyis gzir ba med pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad
kyang skad cig de nyid la byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang ldan zhing / phan tshun pha mar 'du shes par gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par
'du byas te/ de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di
bstan nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas smon lam ji lta ba
bzhin du byung ba'i pad+ma de dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /bam po gnyis pa/ /yang de'i tshe byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i
klung stong phrag drug cu rtsa gsum gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na khyim pa gos dkar po gyon
pa med de/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gos ngur smrig 'chang ba sha stag go /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med kyi ming yang med cing mngal gyi gnas kyang mi shes so/ /
byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gos ngur smrig gyon zhing skyil mo krung bcas par brdzus te 'byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das de yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la sangs
rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de la sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ gang 'di
byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed de/ de ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la 'jug pa
gzungs kyi rtsa ba'i gnas/ sems mi g.yeng ba/ gtong ba rjes su gtong ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rjes su 'jug pa/ mtshan ma med pa la yang dag par sgrub pa/ smon pa med pa tshol
ba| rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rab tu rtogs pa/ 'dun pa'i bya ba rgyun chags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pa de la
mngon par dad pa/ chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa de dag la yongs su rtog pa med pa/ rtog pa yang dag par chad pa de yang mi mthong ba 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi
phyag rgya zhes bya'o/ /yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ rigs
kyi bu de'i smon lam gyi khyad par ni/ 'di lta ste/ sems can ji snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthong ba na de dag thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan par 'gyur pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos snang ba chen po de yang mthong / /gsung bsal ba'i
sgra de yang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas bcom ldan 'das sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo
bos phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das| snang ba chen po 'di dang gsung gsal ba'i sgra chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba des rigs kyi bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung drug khri sum stong gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub
sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / 'di lta ste/ chos bsgrag pa'i phyir ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer 'di dag rab tu bkye zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo / /gsol
pa| bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams de mi mjed ces bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi
khams de na sems can 'dod chags la mi mjed/ zhe sdang la mi mjed/ gti mug la mi mjed/ sdug bsngal la mi mjed de/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams
de mi mjed ces bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can de dag las la la spyos pa dang / mi snyan par brjod pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / brdegs pa
bzod cing dang du len par bgyid pa ma mchis sam/ 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa sel tam/ de bzhin du zhe sdang gi sems dang / gti mug gi sems sel ba mchis
sam| bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can de dag las gang yon tan 'di dag dang ldan pa ni/ nyung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ sems can de
dag las/ phal cher ni/ gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / zhe sdang mang ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis kun tu dkris so/ /gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das/ mi mjed ces bgyi ba'i ming 'di thog tu ma bab bo/ /gal te sems can de dag bzod par 'gyur na ni/ de yang rung na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar
mi bzod pas na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das/ mi mjed ces bgyi ba'i ming 'di thog tu ma bab bo/ /bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rigs
kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la bsnyen
bkur byas pa/ bzod pa dang / dul ba dang / nges pa dang ldan pa dag yod de/ de dag ni/ sems can thams cad kyis spyos/ bsdigs/ mtshon gyis btab kyang ji snyam mi
mjed de/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyis mi 'phrog go /rigs kyi bu/ skyes bu dam pa de dag gi ming gis 'jig rten gyi khams de mi mjed ces
brjod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de yang de na sems can kha cig sdig pa'i chos dang ldan pa/ mu cor smra ba/ khro
pa| gtum pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gzhol ba/ ngan 'gro'i spyod yul ba/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mi gus pa/
phrag dog la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can ngan pa de dag gis de tsam du spyos shing smad de gnod par byas shing skur kyang bcom ldan 'das/ de snying rje che bas bzod cing
dang du len te/ sa dang mnyam pa'i sems rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba med pas de bsti stang du byas kyang khengs par mi byed/ bsti stang du ma byas kyang 'dud
par mi byed de/ de spyos shing brgyad kyang mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ mi 'phrog/ mi chags/ mi skyo ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams
de mi mjed ces bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan
gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar bdag 'jig rten gyi khams der de tsam du smad pa'i sems
ngan rnams kyi nang du ma skyes pa ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod de skad ma zer cig /de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang dang shar gyi mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams stong gis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang phyug chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na
sems can rnams rab tu bde ba dang ldan no/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong gi bde ba bzhin te/ sems can rnams kyang
bde ba de lta bu dang ldan no/ /yang rigs kyi bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams stong gis brgyan pa der lo bye ba brgya stong du tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa bas ni/ gang 'jig rten gyi
khams mi mjed du tha na se gol gtogs pa tsam du sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems bskyed na/ de bas 'di bsod nams ches mang du bskyed na/ gang nyin
mtshan du yongs su dag par gnas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de la byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi
ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de yang blta ba dang / chos bstan pa de yang nyan du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das des bka'
stsal pa| rigs kyi bu/ khyod de'i dus la dbab par shes na song zhig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po byang chub
sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcus yongs su bskor cing lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi
mjed 'dir gnas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul
ji lta bus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'i thad du 'gro snyam nas de de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas stong
gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis khebs par gyur pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs de las kyang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs
kyi char rab tu 'bab/ sil snyan brgya stong yang 'khrol/ mu tig gi rgyan phreng brgya stong yang mngon par 'phyang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan brgya stong
mngon par 'phyang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma
dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa
ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par shes pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par
byas so| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di bstan nas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor
ba byas nas smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad+ma dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te phyogs bcu kun gyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi
khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa rnams kyis snang ba chen po de yang
mthong / gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos nas rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhus te 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags nas de dag thams
cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom
ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod
sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po 'jig rten
skyong ba dang / de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad kyis 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po de yang mthong / gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po de yang thos nas bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa ji snyed pa de dag nas byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi
khams mi mjed 'di rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag ji 'dra ba de 'dra bar lhag chad med cing khyad ma zhugs par mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi
zhing de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i kha dog dang / mchu zheng ci 'dra bar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku'i yongs su grub pa yang de 'dra bar byang chub
sems dpa' de dag gis so so nas mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / nyan thos chen po phun
sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / longs spyod dang kun spyod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'dir yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis so so nas
shes pa dang / bdag nyid kyang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug pa snyam du shes pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do/ /de nas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya mtsho chen po de mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
gsol to/ /phyogs bcu rnams su grags pa mtha' yas blo/ /'jig rten lhar bcas 'dir ni lam me ste/ /thub pa'i thugs ni sems can thams cad kyis/ /tshad
gzung mi nus de phyir khyod bsam yas/ /phyogs bcu dag nas rgyal sras dpag med pa/ /chos tshol slad du de ring 'dir lhags nas/ /bcom ldan 'das la kun
kyang gus bcas gnas/ /smra ba'i mchog gis chos rnams rab tu gsungs/ /phyogs rnams ma lus par ni brjod grags pa/ /tshul khrims brtson 'grus ting 'dzin
blo rnams kyis/ /seng+ge ltar ni 'jigs med khyod mdzes pa/ /nam mkha' dag la nyi ma bzhin du gsal/ /lha dang klu dang lha min gsang ba pa/ /dge bsnyen pho mo dge slong dge
slong ma| |thams cad gus bcas thal mo sbyar gnas kyi/ /bcom ldan phan bzhed chos ni bshad du gsol/ /khyod ni 'das mkhyen de bzhin ma 'ongs dang / /da ltar yang
ni shin tu nges par mkhyen/ /lus can mos pa ji bzhin khyod gzigs la/ /the tshom chen po sel ba'i chos bshad gsol/ /thub pa rgyal sras ji ltar spyad pas na/ /zhing
rnams dag pa rdul med 'thob par 'gyur/ /ji ltar smon lam 'grub pa 'thob 'gyur ba/ /de ni 'dren pas bdag la myur bshad gsol/ /ji ltar ser sna'i dri mas mi
gos shing / /ji ltar tshul khrims ma nyams 'gyur ba dang / /bsdigs pa dang ni de bzhin skur pa dang / /brnyas pa dag kyang thub pa ji ltar bzod/ /sdug bsngal du mas
rab tu gzir ba yi/ /'jig rten dag gi sdug bsngal bzlog slad du/ /bskal pa bye ba mang por rgyal sras rnams/ /ji ltar brtson 'grus rtsom zhing spyod par 'gyur/ /
rtag tu sems ni rtse gcig mnyam gzhag cing / /bsam gtan gnas pa spyod yul rnam dag ste/ /pad+ma chu yi nyes pas mi gos ltar/ /ji ltar 'dod pa dag gis gos
mi 'gyur/ /thub pa ji ltar zab mo'i chos smra zhing / /mkhas pa 'jig rten 'das pa'i blo ldan 'gyur/ /brtan pa ji ltar bdud sde bcas
bcom nas/ /byang chub rdul bral bla med reg par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to/ /byams pa/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan shoms shig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gdan de la bzhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
gi yon tan bkod pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par 'jug pa'i tshul la mkhas pa sgrub pa dang por bsam zhing nan tan bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad do/ /de nas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang ci zhig gzigs na bdag gdan bting du
bcug ste/ gnas brtan kun dga' bo dang / maud+gal gyi bu chen po la bka' ma stsal/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams gdan 'ding
du bcug pa las na/ gtam 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gi phyir brtsams nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs su spangs pa'i
gtam zhig 'byung ba ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni/ chos bstan pa 'di'i snod ma yin pa lta zhig snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po byams pas de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng+ge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad bzhi 'bum pa/ rin
po che du mas spras pa/ lha'i ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba/ shing bal 'jam zhing reg na bde ba bshams nas khri de'i 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas so/ |de nas bcom ldan 'das khri snga ma las bzhengs nas seng+ge'i khri de la bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das seng+ge'i khri de
la bzhugs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi ston chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la
bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/
'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi bsam pas yang dag par zhugs pa dang / sems can la snying rje ba dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brtan pa ste/
shA ri'i bu/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i
bu| gzhan yang chos gcig dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yongs
su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ /chos gcig po gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la
slob cing 'dod pa dang / 'dun pa bskyed pa ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na tshig 'di skad ces/ gal te
bdag skye ba thams cad du rab tu ma byung na/ sangs rgyas thams cad bslus par gyur cig ces smras te/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas de bzhin
gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' de ltar slob pa ni/ skye ba thams cad
du rab tu 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung gdon mi za bar khyim gyi gnas nas 'byung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di
lta ste| khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par 'byung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnyed pa'i mchog yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ rab tu 'byung ba la mngon par dga'
ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan bcu yongs su 'dzin to/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa la chags par mi 'gyur ba dang / dgon pa'i gnas la dga' ba
rnyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul yang 'thob pa dang / de chung ma dang / bu pho dang / bu mo la sred par mi 'gyur ba dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i chos rnam par spong ba dang /
bde 'gror 'gro ba'i chos la brten pa dang / sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su mi nyams pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa 'thob pa dang / de la lha rnams
dga' ba dang / de la mi ma yin pa rnams kyis bsrung bar 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu/ rab tu 'byung ba la mngon par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan bcu po de
dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang / sems can thams
cad dgrol bar 'dod pas rgyun du rab tu 'byung ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba la shin tu dga' bar bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ chos gcig po de dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang chos gnyis
dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ gnyis
gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi theg pa mi 'dod/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam la mi dga'/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang mi bsten/
nyan thos kyi bslab pa la mi slob/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos mi ston/ gzhan yang nyan thos kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug cing / rang sangs
rgyas kyi theg pa yang de bzhin pa dang / gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du
'jug pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de la gzhan dag sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gnas bcu yongs su 'dzin to/ /bcu
gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gi dge 'dun rab tu rnyed pa
dang / de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de'i tshul yongs su sgrog cing chos ston pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de brgya
byin nyid dam/ tshangs pa nyid kyi phyir sems dang sems las byung ba rgya chen po bskyed pa dang / mir gyur na yang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas mthong
ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha dang mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / g.yog 'khor mi phyed par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med grangs med pa yongs su
'dzin pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu
mngon sum du bya ba la bkod pa dang / rang sang rgyas kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba la bkod pa bas/ gang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gcig yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/ de ni/ de bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas skyes pas ni/
sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad par mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba med na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi/ shA ri'i bu/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba
yod na| sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa yang yod par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan
yang byang chub kyi sems la rab tu 'god pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gnas bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin to/ /shA ri'i bu/ chos gnyis po de dag dang ldan na/ byang
chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang chos
gsum dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin te/ gsum
gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa dang / zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi sdom
pa la gnas par 'gyur ba'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa bcu 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang
'di mi 'jigs par grong du 'jug pa dang / mi 'jigs par 'khor la chos ston pa dang / mi 'jigs par kha zas za ba dang / mi 'jigs par gtsug lag khang du 'jug
pa dang / mi 'jigs par dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug pa dang / mi 'jigs par lung 'bogs pa dang / mi 'jigs par slob dpon dang mkhan po'i drung du 'gro ba dang / mi 'jigs
par byams pa dang ldan pas 'khor la rjes su ston pa dang / mi 'jigs par gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad la spyod pa dang / des smras
pa gzung bar 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu/ tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa bcu po de dag 'thob bo/ /shA ri'i bu/ zang zing med pa'i sems
kyis chos sbyin pa sbyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ yon tan gyi chos bcu yongs su 'dzin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di de sdig pa mi 'dod pa yin/ de shes kyis khe mi 'dod
pa yin/ de grags pa mi 'dod pa yin/ de khyim yongs su mi 'dzin pa yin/ de khyim la ser sna med pa yin/ de gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang /
yo byad ngan mngon tsam gyis chog shes pa yin/ des smras pa gzung bar 'os pa yin/ lha dag kyang de'i drung du 'gro ba yin/ de tshul bzhin ma yin pa rnam par rtog pa yid
la byed pa mi skyed pa yin/ de sangs rgyas kyi sems la sems bskyed pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
ni| yon tan gyi chos bcu bo de dag yongs su 'dzin to/ /shA ri'i bu/ dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ yon
tan gyi phan yon bcu yongs su 'dzin to/ /bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di 'du 'dzin rnam par spong ba dang / rab tu dben pa la brten pa dang / de bsam gtan la sems
dmigs par 'gyur ba dang / bya ba mang por mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams 'dod pa dang / de'i lus bde ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / de'i tshangs par spyod
pa bar chad du mi 'gyur ba dang / tshogs chung ngus ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa dang / des tshig dang yi ge bstan pa rnams chud mi za ba dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams
kyi don rab tu shes pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ yon tan gyi phan yon bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin to/ /
shA ri'i bu/ chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de
lta bu yongs su 'dzin to/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bu 'dod pa
de lta bu yongs su 'dzin te/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bden pa smra ba yin/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed cing nga rgyal bcom pa yin /
nga rgyal tshar gcad pa'i phyir zhugs shing phrag dog dang ser sna yongs su spangs pa yin/ /pha rol 'byor pa la yid dga' ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ bden
par smra ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de'i kha nas ut+pa la'i dri ngad 'byung ba dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs
su dag par 'gyur ba dang / lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi tshad mar gyur cing tshig 'khrul ba med par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung phun sum tshogs pa yongs su
'dzin pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' bden par smra ba'i phan yon yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ nga rgyal bcom pa'i byang
chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gang 'di ngan 'gror skye ba rnam par spong ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / rta'i skye gnas
dang | de bzhin du gzhan smad par skyes pa rnam par spong ba dang / mi smad par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan phyir rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba
dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu/ bzhi po de dag ni/ nga rgyal bcom pa'i byang
chub sems dpa'i phan yon no/ /shA ri'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ phrag dog dang ser sna yongs su spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bzhi gang
zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de gtong ba'i sems la mi rmongs pa dang / mu ge 'byung ba'i dus na sbyin bdag tu 'gyur ba dang / de tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'ongs na khyim
gyi sgo gcod par mi 'gyur ba dang / de'i gtong ba dang len pa la su yang phrag dog mi byed pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ bzhi po de dag ni/ phrag dog dang ser sna yongs su
spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no/ /shA ri'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ pha rol 'byor pa la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' phan yon te/ bzhi
gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag bzung ste/ bdag 'di dag gi ched du go cha bgos nas 'di dag bde ba la sbyar bar bya ba yin no/ sems
can 'di dag ni/ rang gi mthus bsgrubs pa'i longs spyod kyis bde bar 'tsho'o/ /zhes dga' ba rnyed pa dang / de'i longs spyod rgyal po dang / rkun po dang / me dang / chu la
sogs pa dang / bgo skal la spyod pa mi mdza' ba rnams kyis mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe bu phun sum tshogs pa dang / g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs
pa dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa rnyed pa de'i tshe de la rgyal po yang dga' bar 'gyur na/ sems can gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de longs spyod dang / kun
tu spyod pa rgya chen po la sems 'jug pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ bzhi po de dag ni/ pha rol 'byor pa la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no/ /shA ri'i bu/ chos
bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to//
shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta
bu yongs su 'dzin cing yongs su sbyong ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam pa phun sum tshogs
pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos kun tu tshol zhing / de gang la chos nyan pa de la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar yon tan 'di dag yongs su sgrub pa de kun
'dri zhing des chos de thos nas de bzhin du nan tan byed pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar smon cing / de tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ste/ de tshul khrims yongs su dag pas gang dang gang du smon
bde dang der skyes te/ de der skyes nas de sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la sems shing rtog ste/ nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa'am/ byang chub sems
dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa'am/ longs spyod dang kun tu spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa mtshan mar 'dzin te/ des de dag mtshan mar bzung nas gus pa dang
bcas| zhes dang bcas shing thal mo sbyar te de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du song nas bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpas ji ltar spyad na/ sangs
rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rgya chen po yongs su 'dzin ces kun tu zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen te/ gang rnams
kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rgya chen po yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag ston cing / yang dag par rab tu 'chad de/ des de
thos nas de bzhin du nan tan byed pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dang ldan zhing / bya ba dang ldan pa yin te/ de mi shes pa
yongs su sbyong zhing bya ba ma yin pa yongs su spong ngo / /de la ye shes ni/ gang / bya ba ni/ gang zhe na/ ye shes zhes bya ba ni/ gang dmigs pa la dmigs pa ni/ ye
shes te| nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang bral ba'o/ /bya ba zhes bya ba ni/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams la nan tan byed pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang
'di la byang chub sems dpa' rgyu dang 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te/ de la rgyu ni/ gang / 'byung ba ni/ gang zhe na/ rgyu zhes bya ba ni/ gang 'di tshul bzhin
ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste/ gang las phyin ci log bzhi la sems can rnams gnas par 'gyur ba'o/ /de ni/ tshul bzhin la brtson
pa yin te/ de la tshul bzhin sbyor ba gang zhe na/ gang 'di chos thams cad yid la byed pa ste/ 'byung ba yang de nyid yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang
'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyang rab tu shes/ zhing gi ngo bo nyid kyang rab tu shes so/ /de la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid gang / zhing gi ngo bo
nyid ni| gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba de ni/ ming tsam mo/ /zhing gi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba de yang ming
tsam mo| |gang ming tsam de dben par shes shing / ji ltar chos gang yang mi dmigs pa de ltar shes pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ chos lnga po de dag dang
ldan na| byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi g.yo zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin cing yongs
su sbyong ngo / /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang chos drug dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin te/ drug gang zhe na/ shA
ri'i bu| 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sbyin pa po sbyin bdag tu 'gyur ba ste/ de dngos po gang phangs pa yid du 'ong ba mngon par 'dod par
'gyur ba de yongs su gtong yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / yid dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa dang / yid bde ba skyes nas 'di ltar
gang 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mngon par smon pas bdag gis sbyin pa chen po dang / theg pa chen po dang / bya ba chen po yongs su
rdzogs par bya'o/ /kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems kyis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par mi nus so/ /snyam du rtog go/ des de ltar brtags nas
bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ des rang gi lus dang / srog yongs su gtong yang yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur na/ gzhan nor gyi rnam pa
dang | chung ma dang / bu pho dang / bu mo lta smos kyang ci dgos/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la ji snyam du sems/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di'i bstan pa ji
lta bu zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin te/ de'i
phyir de byang chub thob pas na/ thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim par gyur pa yang rung / rab tu byung
ba yang rung ste/ tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par 'dzin pa la rab tu gnas pa yin te/ de srog gi phyir yang bslab pa las mi 'da'o/ /gang tshul khrims kyi sdom
pa yang dag par bzung ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
yongs su bsngo ste/ bdag ni/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/ /zhes dga' ba rnyed cing mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ mngon par dga' bas tshangs par spyad pa spyod de/
de tshangs par spyod cing bde bar nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed do/ /de bde bar chos mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi tshul dang ldan par yang dag par so sor rtogs
