de skad ces bka' stsal nas ring po ma lon par de'i mod la byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po de dag lhags te/ lhags nas kyang khang pa brtsegs pa de dag nas babs
nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khod ma thag tu thams cad dang
ldan pa'i 'khor phyogs bzhi nas snang ba chen pos snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
dag /skyes bu dam pa 'ongs pa bzhi po 'di dag ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gos gyon pa/ 'jug pa chen pos yang dag par zhugs pa yin gyi/ rigs kyi bu
dag /khyod kyis skyes bu dam pa 'di dag la rim gro bskyed la chos dris shig /rigs kyi bu dag /skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gi smon lam nyon cig /rigs kyi bu
dag /skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gi smon lam ni/ rnam pa 'di lta bu ste/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang su dag gis
bdag cag mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ bskal pa bye ba phrag nyi shur 'khor
ba phyir bsnyil bar gyur cig /pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /bud med gang gis bdag cag gi ming thos na yang myur du bud med kyi lus las
'gyur bar shog cig /ces bya ba de lta bu'i smon lam dang ldan pa dag go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bstan te rdzu 'phrul de dag phyir btul ba
mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
chos thams cad ni/ sgyu ma lta bu ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan ni/ sgyu ma sprul pa'ang bgyid/ sgyu ma ma mchis par yang bgyid de/ bcom
ldan 'das/ de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang skye yang skye/ 'gag kyang 'gag ste/ gang las skye ba dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa de ni/ mnyam pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan
'das| mnyam pa nyid la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
rgya'o| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub ji lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs
par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang sus kyang ma thob ma bshig cing / gang la yod pa'am med par chags pa dmigs
su med pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub de ji tsam du yod pas kyang mi 'thob/ med pas kyang mi 'thob bam/ smras pa/
rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni/ gzod ma nas ma skyes pa ste/ yod par ma gyur/ mi 'gyur pas de'i phyir thob par 'gyur ba
med do| |smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ tshul gcig pa'i chos bstan pas de skad du ston tam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ tshul gcig pa'i chos
bstan pa zhes bya ba gang yin/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ gang phung po rnams kyang mi mthong / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyang mi mthong la/ dmus long yang
ma yin| sha'i mig can yang ma yin zhing / chos gang la yang mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog pa dang / chos gang la yang 'phel ba dang / 'grib par mi mthong ba 'di
ni| chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras smras pa/ gang de bzhin nyid dang
mi 'gal zhing chos nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed de/ 'di dag ni/ so so'i skye bo'i chos so/ /'di dag ni/ nyan thos kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos
so| |'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos so/ /zhes bya bar tha dad du mi 'byed cing / gang 'di dben pa'i tshul du tshul gcig la 'jug pa 'di ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig
tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthong dgas smras pa/ gang de bzhin nyid la yang zhugs la/ de bzhin nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing / 'di ni/
zab bo| |zhes bya bar mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa mi
zad pas smras pa/ chos thams cad mi zad pa gang yin pa de ni/ shin tu zad pa ste/ gang chos thams cad mi zad par chos bstan pa de ni/ chos nyid las
'gal bar mi byed pa ste/ de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa legs par sems
pas smras pa/ gang bsam pas bsam du med pa la yang 'jug la/ bsam du med pa des kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing / mi dmigs pa de ltar bstan pa
gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdul dang bral bas smras pa/ gang 'dod chags dang
shin tu bral ba de ni/ mtshan ma thams cad la 'dod chags pa yang med/ 'dod chags dang bral ba yang med/ rjes su chags pa yang med/ khong khro ba yang med/
rmongs pa yang med/ gcig tu byed pa yang med/ gnyis su byed pa yang med/ byed pa yang med/ mi byed pa yang med/ len pa yang med/ 'dor ba yang med de/
de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos smras pa/ gang rgya mtsho lta bur zab cing gting dpag dka' ba'i
chos la zhugs pa de chos la'ang mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog la/ ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du chos ston cing / bdag dang gzhan du rlom sems su mi byed pa de ltar
bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /zla ba'i bla ma gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ gang sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis
zla ba lta bur gyur kyang sems can de dag la'ang rlom sems su med pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems
dpa' mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad rnam par sel bas smras pa/ gang mya ngan thams cad rgyun chad pa de ni/ mya ngan med cing zhum par 'gyur ba med do/ /sems can
rnams ni/ mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan pa'o/ /de la mya ngan gyi rtsa ba gang zhe na/ gang 'di ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa ste/ gang ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin
pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing chos ston pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa med pas smras pa/ gang 'dod pa'i khams
la yang mi dmigs/ gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang mi dmigs pa de ltar
bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu lta bas smras pa/ gang chos ston na/ gang 'di stong pa nyid kyi mnyam
pa nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid ston la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su mi byed/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul
gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas smras pa/ gang chos ston pa'i tshe 'khor gsum dang 'gal bar mi byed de/ 'khor
gsum gang zhe na/ bdag mi dmigs pa dang / chos nyan pa mi dmigs pa dang / chos la'ang mngon par zhen pa med pa'o/ /'di ni/
'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i chos bstan pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'gro
pa grub pas smras pa/ gang chos thams cad 'du ba med par yang shes shing / ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du yang ston la 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad brjod du med
pa'i phyir yi ge gcig kyang mi brjod pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' zab mor spyod pas smras pa/
gang chos thams cad kyi zab pa nyid kyang shes la/ chos de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gang ston pa dang / gang la ston pa dang / gang bstan pa de
yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po gzi brjid chen po dag gis so so nas rang rang gi spobs pa ston par gyur to/ /tshul gcig tu bstan pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di bstan
pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bdun cus mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni/ bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes par gyur to/ /dge slong bdun stong ni/ nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /lha dang mi'i
skye rgu las khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa drug ni/ chos la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med par rnam par dag par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i
byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni/ ji snyed cig tu 'gyur/ de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni/ ji tsam zhig tu 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni/ ji srid cig na bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
'di nyid la dris shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad
ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ khyod ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya/ 'jam dpal
gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gang gi tshe nam mkha'i khams gzugs can du gyur pa de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gang gi tshe sgyu
ma'i skyes bu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gang gi tshe dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa
byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gang gi tshe rmi lam gyi skyes bu dang / brag ca dang / mig
yor dang / chu zla dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
rgya'o| |gang gi tshe nyi ma'i 'od kyis mtshan mor gyur la/ zla ba'i 'od kyis nyin mor gyur pa de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rigs
kyi bu| de ltar yin gyi/ su byang chub tu smon pa de la dris shig /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod byang chub tu mi smon tam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ni/ ma yin
te| de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ nyid kyang byang chub la/ byang chub nyid kyang 'jam dpal lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ gang 'di byang chub ces bya ba'am/
'jam dpal zhes bya ba ni/ ming tsam mo/ /ming gang yin pa de ni/ dben zhing byed pa med pa ste/ stong pa'o/ /stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub bo/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod
kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa dang / nyan thos 'dus pa mthong ngam/ thos sam/ gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis mthong ngo / /thos so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ bsam gyis
mi khyab bo/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de ni/ bgrang du ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ yul ma ga d+ha'i
til gyi dong nas til gyi 'bru gcig cig blangs nas rigs kyi bu/ til gyi 'bru gcig po de ji lta ba de lta bur ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi byang
chub sems dpa' 'dus pa dang / nyan thos 'dus par blta'o/ /phyi na til gyi lhag ma lus pa ltar ni/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'dus par blta'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams 'di thal bar brlags te rdul phra rab tu byas pa la rigs kyi bu/ rdul phra rab ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi bskal par de bzhin gshegs
pa kun tu gzigs pa de bzhugs par byas kyang brgya'i char yang smos par mi 'gyur ro/ /stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig phrag
'bum gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / rgyur yang smos par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i tshe tshad ni/ tshad med grangs med par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di
lta ste| dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di skyes bu la la zhig gis rdul phra rab tu brlags te thal bar byas pa de las skyes bu la
la zhig gis rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig khyer te rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas der rdul phra rab kyi
rdul gcig bzhag ste/ skyes bu des tshul de bzhin du shar phyogs logs su rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag thams cad zad zad du bkod par gyur la/ de bzhin du skyes
bu gnyis pa zhig skyes te/ des kyang lho phyogs logs su de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re nas tshul de bzhin du bor te/ de bzhin du phyogs bcur skyes bu de lta bu
re res tshul de dang 'dra bar de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul zad zad du re re nas bor na/ rigs kyi bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
gyi khams de dag brgya phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /stong phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /'bum phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba phrag ni/ 'di snyed
cig yod do/ /bye ba brgya phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba stong phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba 'bum phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba khrag khrig
'bum phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /gtams phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /dkrigs phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /mi 'khrugs pa phrag ni/ 'di
snyed cig yod do/ /zhes bya bar tshad gzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ mi nus so/ /bde bar gshegs
pa| de ni/ mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ skyes bu bcu po de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
ji snyed cig 'das pa dang / gang dag tu phyin te rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag bor ba dang / gang dag las 'das te rdul phra rab ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams
de dag thams cad btags te rdul phra rab tu brlags na/ rigs kyi bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ rdul phra rab de dag rtsis shes pa'am/ rtsis la mkhas pas
brgya phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /stong phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /'bum phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /
bye ba brgya phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba stong phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba 'bum phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
phrag ni| 'di snyed cig yod do/ /gtams phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /dkrigs phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /mi 'khrugs pa phrag ni/ 'di snyed
cig yod do/ /zhes bya bar shes pa'am/ bgrang ba'am/ gzhal ba'am/ tshad gzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dpe de la ni/ sems can
rnams mos par 'gyur gyi/ don 'tshal ba'am/ gzhal ba'am/ bgrang ba'am/ tshad gzung bar mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
bu| de bzhin gshegs pas ni/ rdul phra rab de dag bgrang ba'i tshul gyis brgya phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /stong phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /'bum phrag
ni| 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba brgya phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba stong phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba 'bum phrag
ni| 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /gtams phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /dkrigs phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod
do| |mi 'khrugs pa phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /zhes bya ba de bas kyang lhag par gong du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa thams cad du thugs su chud do/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te ye shes chen po de lta bu'i slad du byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par sems can dmyal ba chen por bsregs kyang bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bzod par bgyi'o/ /de lta bu'i ye shes chen po ni/ yongs su gtang bar mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa| byams pa/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ sems can mos pa chung ngu dang / le lo che ba dang / brtson 'grus chung ba ma gtogs par su
zhig de lta bu'i ye shes chen po la 'dod pa mi bskyed/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di bstan pa'i tshe srog chags khri byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar phyogs bcur
skyes bu bcu po de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig 'das pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag tu phyin te rdul phra rab
kyi rdul bor ba dang / gang dag las 'das te ma bor ba de thams cad rdul phra rab tu brlags pa de dag pas kyang mang ba'i bskal par da dung 'jam dpal gzhon
nur gyur pa byang chub gyi spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i smon lam ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ yang dag par
'jug pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang bsam gyis mi khyab par
'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta
ste| 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ltar bskal pa 'di snyed du yang skyo ba mi skyed pa'i 'jug pa chen po de ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ spyod pa
chen po de ngo mtshar lags so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ nam mkha'i khams 'di snyam du zhag dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba phyed
dang / dus dang / lo dang / bskal pa dang / bskal pa brgya dang / bskal pa stong dang / bskal pa bye ba dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig dang / bskal pa bye ba
khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag dang / gtams dang / dkrigs dang / mi 'khrugs pa zhig 'das so/ /snyam du sems sam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de ni/ ma
yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i khams la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin te/ byang
chub sems dpa' gang gis chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur khong du chud de/ ci nas kyang mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog pa de ltar khong du chud pa de ni/ 'di snyam
du zhag gcig 'das par gyur to/ /nyi ma gcig 'das par gyur to/ /zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du lo 'di snyed cig 'das par gyur to/ /zhes rnam par mi rtog
go /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos gang la yang de'i 'du shes gang yang 'jug pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i khams ni/ bskal
pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed pas lhag pa zhig 'das par gyur kyang skyo zhing yongs su yid chad pa med do/ /nam mkha'i khams la skye ba'am/ 'jig pa'am/ tshig
pa'am| 'gyes par 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i khams la dngos po med pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang
gis chos thams cad dngos po med par shes pa de ni/ skyo ba dang / yongs su yid chad pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang la nam mkha'i khams zhes
bya ba de ni/ tshig pa med/ skyo ba med/ yid chad pa med/ g.yo ba med/ skye ba med/ 'chi ba med/ rga ba med/ 'pho ba med/ 'byung ba med/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba
med do| /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du gang 'jam dpal zhes bya ba'i ming 'di la yang tshig pa med/ skyo ba med/ yid chad pa med/ g.yo ba med/ skye ba med/ rga ba med/
'chi ba med/ 'pho ba med/ 'byung ba med/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ming de ni/ shin tu dben pa'i phyir ro/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan
pa'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu gzhan yang dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa dag gis
mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags
na| gang gis thos nas 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan la yang rgya cher ston pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das/
sems can gang dag 'di skad du bdag cag gis gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya'o/ /bcang bar bya'o/ /
bklag par bya'o/ /kun chub par bya'o/ /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bya'o/ /zhes tshig tu brjod pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras
'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog
gam| kun chub par bgyid dam/ 'jug par bgyid dam/ gzhan dag la rgya cher bstan pa dang / gang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rjes su bslab
bo| |zhes sems bskyed pa des bsod nams ci tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
gang la las phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed cig gzigs pa de dag thams cad rin
po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re la phul ba dang / rnam grangs de bzhin du sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems kyis
tshul khrims kyi sdom pa thams cad yang dag par blangs pa la gnas te phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug gi bar du sbyin pa byin pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig
gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ 'jug par byed dam/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston par byed
dam| 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rjes su bslab par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du sems bskyed cing / gom pa bdun 'dor na/ bsod nams kyi phung po de la
bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba'i char yang
mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba khrag khrig
'bum phrag gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas
de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kun nas snang ba sgyu ma lta bu 'byung ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ting
nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig 'dus par gyur pa dag gis phyogs bcu'i
'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi spyan snga na
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug cing / rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ston par mthong nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'jam dpal gzhon
nur gyur pa 'di de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang por gcig car du snang bar gyur pa ni/ smon lam dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes
kyi khyad par ngo mtshar che'o/ /snyam du ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes skyes par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas
'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
byams pa/ de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /smon lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar yang zungs
shig |'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /byang chub kyi sems yang dag par dga' bar byed pa zhes bya bar yang
zungs shig /de nas de'i tshe 'khor der phyogs bcu dag nas byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog gi char chen po phab nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas
kyi zhing du 'dong zhing 'di skad du/ kye ma sangs rgyas/ kye ma sangs rgyas/ deng ni/ bdag cag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i seng+ge'i sgra dang / bkod pa
bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos so/ /zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /sems can tshad med pa yang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su grub par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i rtsal gyis mngon
par bsgrags pa'i sgra dang / phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha
dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags
pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes
bya ste| le'u bco lnga pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/
skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya pi tA pu tra sa mA ga ma na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa
yab dang sras mjal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grol ba grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dul ba dul ba'i 'khor
dang ldan pa/ zhi ba zhi ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ rgal ba rgal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ thang la phyin pa
thang la phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dbugs phyin pa dbugs phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dge slong dge slong gi 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyon mongs pa bcom pa nyon mongs
pa bcom pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dge sbyong dge sbyong gi 'khor dang ldan pa/ sdig pa bsal ba sdig pa bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ tshangs pa tshangs pa'i 'khor
dang ldan pa/ sdig pa bsal ba'i chos can sdig pa bsal ba'i chos can gyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ rig pa can rig pa can gyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ khrus byas pa khrus
byas pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ sgrog pa po sgrog pa po'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyon mongs pa byang ba nyon mongs pa byang ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par
gsal ba yan lag lnga rnam par gsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa dang rnam par bral ba sgrib pa dang rnam par bral ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ yid rnam par dang ba
yid rnam par dang ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa yan lag drug dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ bsnyen bsring dang bral ba bsnyen bsring dang
bral ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ srung ba gcig pa srung ba gcig pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dran pa'i sgo srung phun sum tshogs pa dran pa'i sgo
srung phun sum tshogs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ rton pa bzhi dang ldan pa rton pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyi tshe ba'i bden pa bsal ba nyi tshe ba'i
bden pa bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ btsal ba spangs pa btsal ba spangs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ mthar phyin pa mthar phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/
don gyi mthar thug pa don gyi mthar thug pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid bsgoms pa bdag nyid bsgoms pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ kun tu rtog pa'i rnyog
pa med pa kun tu rtog pa'i rnyog pa med pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ rnam par rtog pa yongs su chad pa rnam par rtog pa yongs su chad pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ lus
kyi 'du byed rab tu bsal ba lus kyi 'du byed rab tu bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ mi g.yo ba la mngon par mos pa mi g.yo ba la mngon par mos pa'i
'khor dang ldan pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sems shin tu rnam par grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba shes rab
shin tu rnam par grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa 'phags pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / lcug ma dang / shun
phrags kyi skyon dang bral ba/ dag pa/ snying po la gnas pa/ shAkya'i yul na ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na lnga sde dang / grags sbyin dang /
'char ka dang / lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / ga ya 'od srung dang / chu klung 'od srung dang / 'od srung chen po dang / shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu la sogs pa
dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa
med pa| dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ /bya ba byas pa/
byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol
ba| sems can thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sha stag dang thabs cig ste/ de'i tshe nam gyi tho rangs kyi res la bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge
'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing / /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun gyis bltas te bla gab med pa na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das cang
mi gsung bar thams cad dang ldan pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun cang mi smra ba la gzigs so/ /thams cad dang ldan pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la gzigs nas
dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /dge slong gang gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu 'ga' zhig tshol cig /de nas
tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u Di n+ya stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de
logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par
bgyi'o| |de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u Di n+ya la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ko'u Di n+ya/ khyod ni/ bla ma bla mar
bya ba'i chos dang ldan par bya ba yin gyi/ 'dug cig /de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / ming chen dang / grags sbyin dang / lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / chu
klung 'od srung dang / ga ya 'od srung dang / 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
to| |bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bgyi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal
gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu/ khyod kyang bla ma bla mar bya ba'i chos dang ldan par bya ba yin gyi/ 'dug cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa
mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed pa'i dge slong gang zhig bcom ldan 'das bzhed snyam ste/ de nas tshe dang
ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa de lta bu la mnyam par bzhag ste/ de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa tshe
dang ldan pa 'char ka la gnas shing / dge slong 'char ka 'di rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed do/ /zhes dgongs pa mthong ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na|
khang pa brtsegs pa'am/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i khyams sgo byang phyogs su lta ba'i shar phyogs kyi skar khung nas nyi ma'i 'od zer byung ste nub phyogs kyi rtsig ngos la shar
ba de bzhin du/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la shar cing / dge
slong 'char ka 'di rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed do/ /zhes dgongs pa mthong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ting nge 'dzin de las
langs te tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka /bcom ldan 'das ni/ khyod
la dge slong 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bya bar nus so/ /zhes dgongs shing bzhed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka /de lta yin gyi/ khyod
kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bya bar dad pa skyed cig de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu
chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po/ /rigs rnams ni/ dad par bya bar shin tu dka' ste/ rgyal po'i rigs ni/ lhag
par dka'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams ni/ mgu bar dka' ste/ tshe dang ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu chen po/ /'di lta ste/
dper na/ shing khur bcu'am/ nyi shu'am/ sum cu'am/ bzhi bcu'am/ lnga bcu'am/ shing khur brgya yang rung ste/ gsher bag med cing skam la lo mang du lon pa
zhig yod pa/ de la mi la la zhig gis me btang na/ me'i phung po chen po 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /de la yang la la zhig gis mar ram/ 'bru mar zhig gis gtor na/ me'i
phung po de bas ches cher 'bar te/ de'i steng ngam drung gi 'khor du 'gro ba ni/ shin tu dka'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po/ /de bzhin du rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi
bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams ni/ mgu bar dka'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ glang po che mche ba can kha gdangs pa'i so phrag tu 'gro
ba ni| shin tu dka'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po/ /de bzhin du rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams kyang mgu bar dka'o/ /de skad ces smras
pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka /de ni/ de lta mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod ni/ dge
slong 'char ka 'dis rgyal po zas gtsang mngon par dad par bya bar nus so/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs shing bzhed pa yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa maud
gal gyi bu chen po/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par byed par dgongs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
pa 'char ka /de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 'char ka ni/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par byed do/ /zhes dgongs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par gyis shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'char ka /rgyal po zas gtsang ma
ni| yang na ngas dad par bya'i/ yang na khyod kyis dad par bya'o/ /'char ka /nga'i nyan thos ji snyed yod pa de dag gi nang na khyod ni/ 'di ltar rigs dad par
byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka bzang po nga las nyan par
byos| |khyod ni rigs dad byed mchog rab yin gyi/ /shAkya'i rigs rnams dga' ba skyed pa yi/ /rgyal po'i dam pa rab tu dad par byos/ /rgyal po'i rab de dad
par byos na ni/ /rigs bu lha dag dang ni mi rnams la/ /mtha' dbus med pa'i legs pa 'byung 'gyur gyi/ /mi yi dam pa myur du dad par byos/ /da lta na ni shAkya'i
bdag po de/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal rtog pas dkrugs shing nyams/ /ri yi ngos nas rbab 'dril ji bzhin du/ /brtson 'grus rtsol ba thams cad btang ste gnas/ /dbang
phyug nyams pa rjes su dran byed pas/ /yid la gnod 'gyur sems la yid kyang stor/ /dper na tshong pa nor dang bral ba dang / /rjes su dran zhing nyon mongs gnas
pa bzhin/ /lha yi gnas nas lha dag shi 'phos shing / /lha rdzas 'dod pa rjes su dran pa bzhin/ /rgyal ba'i bstan pa mngon par mi shes shing / /rgyal po sde nyams
snying rjer smre sngags 'don/ /nga yi rin po che ni sna bdun dang / /mi yi phun sum tshogs pa bzhi po dang / /longs spyod dag ni rjes su dran byed cing / /sa bdag de ni
snying rjer smre sngags 'don/ /mdangs 'phrog byed pa'i srin po stobs can gyis/ /ji ltar mi zhig yongs su non gyur na/ /bdag kyang mi shes gzhan yang mi shes
ltar| |sa yi bdag po de yang de bzhin no/ /ti se'i gangs kyi ri bos bsgribs gyur na/ /ji ltar mi dag blta bya mi mthong ba/ /de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos bsgribs pas
na| |rgyal pos blta bar bya ba mi mthong ngo / /gnyid kyis log gam shi bas myos gyur pa'i/ /mis ni rang gi sems kyang mi shes te/ /de bzhin nga rgyal chen po myos
gyur pas/ /rgyal po des kyang dge ba mi shes so/ /dper na khyim thab shi bas myos pa yi/ /bud med snying rjer smre sngags 'don byed pa/ /
de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos myos gyur pas/ /rgyal po de yang snying rjer smre sngags 'don/ /da lta bas na 'char ka thabs mkhas pa/ /khyod kyis 'dir ni rgyal po dad
par gyis/ /nga rgyal rgyal mtshan rab tu bsnyal bar byos/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bslang bar gyis/ /'char ka khyod ma gtogs par srid pa yi/ /'gro ba dag na
skal mthun spyad med pas/ /rgyal po'i sems ni rab tu dad bya bar/ /gang gis nus pa'i dge slong gang yang med/ /'char ka sngon gyi dus na byung ba ni/ /'das pa'i
dus na sa yi bdag po zhig /ming ni bden pa 'phel zhes bya ba ste/ /sa skyong byed pa rnam par grags pa byung / /de ni chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan/ /srog chags bye ba
khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod/ /rgya mtsho'i mtha' mar thug pa'i sa 'di ni/ /chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po des kyang bskyangs/ /grong dang grong khyer dag kyang 'dab nye zhing / /
bza' shing 'bras bu me tog rgyas pas gang / /'phags pa'i skye bo dag dang shed las skyes/ /sdig dang bral ba rnams kyis rab tu gang / /dri za brgya mang dag gis
gang ba ste/ /sdong dum tsher ma rtswa shing ngan pa med/ /'jam zhing dge sbyong gnas kyi tshogs kyis spras/ /chu klung 'bab stegs bde bas rab tu brgyan/ /drang srong tshogs brgya
rjes su rgyu ba ste/ /skye bo'i dkar chos rnams kyis kun du bsgrubs/ /ngan song lam ngan rnams ni rab tu bcad/ /de nas sems can thams cad lha gnas 'dod/ /rgyal po
de la bu dag yod pa ni/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas byung ba mthong ba ste/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ni bskyed pa can/ /yon tan mang pos bsgos pa'i blo gros ldan/ /ming ni blo gros snying
po zhes bya ste/ /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod/ /'dod pa rnams la skyon du lta ba can/ /mi bdag khyim na gnas kyang dben la dga'/ /rgyal po bden
pa 'phel zhes bya ba des/ /lha yi pho brang 'dra ba'i khyim mchog 'dir/ /na chung tshogs kyis kun nas mdun bdar te/ /'dod pa'i yon tan bzang la spyod ces smras/ /
bu yi dam pa khyod la nga yis ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i bya ba gang ma byas/ /'dod pa rnams la khyod yid ci yi phyir/ /ma mos nga la bu khyod myur du smros/ /srid pa'i 'gro ba'i
yon tan mkhas bgyis te/ /bu khyod rin chen khyim la dga' ba bskyed/ /bud med rin chen 'khor dang 'grogs bgyis te/ /yul la dga' zhing mos pa bskyed par gyis/ /
dka' thub nags na 'khod pa'i drang srong dag /de btang nas ni phyir yang 'di dag na/ /dka' thub btang zhing 'dod pa'i dga' la spyod/ /
'dod pa de dag bu gcig khyod la bstabs/ /de lta bas na 'dod pa'i dga' la spyod/ /nga dang rgyal srid thams cad khyod dang mthun/ /rnam thos bu yi gnas dang
'dra ba yi/ /gzhal med khang gis brgyan can khyim 'dir spyod/ /'di dag rnams kyang mchog gi gzugs ldan zhing / /lha mo 'dra la sgyu rtsal tshar phyin pa/ /rol
mo'i sgra yi tshul dang glu la mkhas/ /bsnyen bkur snyoms shing yon tan yid kyang 'phrog /mig ni pad+ma'i lo ma 'dra ba ste/ /bim pa'i mdog 'dra mchu mdzes yid
du 'ong / /so dang bzhin mdog dri ma med cing bzang / /dpral ba smin ma legs shing mgul pa sdug /brla ni glang po che yi sna yang 'dra/ /phrag so shas rgyas thal
gong legs dang ldan/ /lag dang rkang pa'i mthil ni zangs kyi mdog /sor mo byin pa phra bar legs dang ldan/ /lce ni zangs mdog 'dra ba srab cing ngag /tshig ran
'jam par smra ba'i tshul dang ldan/ /so ni thags bzang so rnams rad rod med/ /mche ba rab dkar mchog gi rgyan dang ldan/ /lto ba phyang nger 'dug cing lte ba sdug /
sta zur yangs shing rked pa rdo rje 'dra/ /byin pa glang po che yi so 'dra zhing / /mda' rgyu snying po legs par skyes pa bzhin/ /dregs bcas glang chen 'dra ba'i 'gros dang ldan/ /gzhan
du mi sems yid kyis khyod la lta/ /rtse ba 'dod cing dar la bab dang ldan/ /gzhon nu snying rje ltos la rtse bar byos/ /bu gcig khyod dang bud med 'di dag gi /mdog bzang ba
dang dar la bab pa yang / /shing gi rtse mo'i me tog bzhin lhung gis/ /nga rgyal thong la 'dod pa bsten par gyis/ /blo gros snying po ldan des sme ba yi/ /pha dang 'khor rnams kun
la 'di skad smras/ /yab cig khyod ni med par gsungs pa lags/ /gang dag tshig gis grags pa ma smad med/ /yon tan rnams la mos pa bdag gi tshig /bsam ste gtan
la phab la rgyal po gson/ /ji ltar rmi lam na yang 'dod la bdag /sems mi dga' zhing ma mos de 'dra gson/ /sa yi bdag pos bka' stsal 'di dag ni/ /mkhas pa
rnams la mdzes pa ma lags te/ /mi mkhas skye bo dag gis yang dag bsam/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis de dag rtag tu smad/ /long ba ma lags ci yi rgyu zhig gis/ /long ba'i
tshig gis lam gol 'dzin par bgyid/ /thang la gnas pa su zhig ji ltar na/ /mgon med chus khyer ba la 'dod pa bskyed/ /grol ba ji lta bur na bcings pa yi/ /tshig gis
btson ra der ni 'jug par bgyid/ /sa mnyam gnas shing ma 'khrul ji ltar na/ /nyam ngar gnas la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid/ /sa bdag
'dod pa rnams la chags bcas shing / /'dod pa'i longs spyod dag gi chus khyer ba/ /long ba chus khyer btson rar gnas pa dang / /nyam ngar gnas 'drar bdag
ni de snyam bgyid/ /mi yi bdag po khyod ni long ba bzhin/ /bdag ni mig can khyad par mthong ba lags/ /khyod ni 'dod pa'i chu bos khyer ba lags/ /bdag ni 'dod
pa rnams la rnam par smod/ /'dod pa dag ni dug gi lo ma bzhin/ /sprul gyi mgo 'dra sdug bsngal bgyid pa ste/ /rtse gsum pa dang ral gri mdung thung 'dra/ /me yi phung
po shin tu 'bar ba bzhin/ /blo gros snying po ldan pas de skad du/ /smre sngags 'don pa'i pha dang 'khor la smras/ /rin chen sna bdun dag la ma bltas bar/ /rgyal
srid rnam par spangs te rab tu byung / /sprul gyi pags snying brjes pa ci 'dra dang / /ngar snabs rus pa'i thal ba bzhin spangs te/ /blo gros snying po ldan pa chags med
par/ /sdig dang rnam par bral te rab tu byung / /gzhon nu de ltar rab tu byung gyur nas/ /blon po'i bu zhig rjes su rab byung ba/ /ming ni zla bas byin zhes bya ba ste/ /blo
gros snying po'i rjes su rab tu byung / /gzhon nu de ltar rab tu byung gyur nas/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po bskyed nas ni/ /grogs dang bcas pas mngon par shes pa
lnga| |ma lus mtha' dag bskyed par byas par gyur/ /'dod pa rnams la skyon du lta bas na/ /mi yi seng+ge de ni 'dod khams 'das/ /tshangs pa yang dag nyid ni thob bya'i
phyir| |tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba byas/ /de ltar gzhon nu rab tu byung bas na/ /pha de bu la ma dad gyur pa dang / /zla bas byin pa de yi gan song nas/ /legs
par bshad pa'i tshig gis dga' bar byas/ /'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems/ /de tshe blo gros snying po gzhan snyam mam/ /nga nyid de yi tshe na der gyur te/ /'dod pa'i
longs spyod don du gnyer ba med/ /'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems/ /bden pa 'phel ba gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ /sa bdag zas gtsang 'di nyid de yi tshe/ /rgyal
bo bden pa 'phel zhes bya bar gyur/ /'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems/ /rjes su rab byung zlas byin gzhan snyam mam/ /khyod nyid de tshe de yi dus na ni/ /bden pa 'phel ba
dad par byed pa yin/ /de lta bas na 'char ka khyod kyis 'dir/ /rgyal po zas gtsang dad pa mngon skyed cig /sa skyong byed pa 'di ni dad gyur na/ /skyid pa chen po phun sum tshogs
par 'gyur/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 'das la mi smra bas khas blangs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka zhag de 'das
nas snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs bogs/ lhung bzed thogs te/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por song ngo / /de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma btsun mo'i
'khor gyi mdun na shAkya stong tsam zhig dang dgos pa zhig gi ched du 'dus shing 'khod do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas su byon cing /
ser skya'i gnas 'di nyid na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /zhes thos nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu de rab tu byung bas bdag ni/ dbang phyug
gi longs spyod chen po las nyams par byas so/ /gal te gzhon nu de khyim na gnas na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ chos dang ldan pa/
chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni/ 'di dag ste/ 'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin
po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / blon po rin po che ste/ 'di bdun no/ /de la bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag
mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ gzhan gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshang bar 'gyur zhing / des gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang chad pa med cing
mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/ mnyam ste mi mnyam pa med cing chos dang mthun pas legs par phab nas bskal pa rdzogs par legs par bskyangs par 'gyur ba zhig ste/ de ltar
gyur na| bdag cag kyang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid la dbang phyug gi dbang dang ldan zhing / rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / bsti stang du byas pa dang /
mchod par byas pa dang / dbang phyug gi dbang chen po yang rnyed par 'gyur ba zhig na/ da ltar bdag cag ni/ gzhon nu de rab tu byung bas de lta bu'i longs spyod kyi dbang chen
po dang bral bar gyur to snyam mo/ /des de snyam du bsam nas shAkya rnams la bsgo ba/ nga'i bu de la blta ba'am/ bsnyen bkur byed par su'ang ma 'gro zhing / la la zhig nga'i
bu de la blta ba'am/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro na de'i lus la gnod pa'i chad pas gcad do/ /de'i tshe shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nas byung
nas song bar gyur te/ shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin gyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyang ring po nas 'ongs pa mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song ste tshe dang
ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legs so/ /tshe dang
ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring zhig nas byon to/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka /bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/
mi bde bar mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das/ bde bar byon tam/ shin tu ma mnyel tam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal
tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /dga' ba'i bzhin/ de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan
'das la snyun mi mnga'o/ /stobs dang ldan no/ /bde bar bzhugs so/ /mi bde ba mi mnga'o/ /de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga'o/ /bde bar byon to/ /mnyel ba med do/ /bsod
snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do/ /shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sad kyis kyang shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang lhan cig dben pa na 'khod pa
mthong nas 'khor de nas byung ste tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur
spyon| tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring zhig nas byon to/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka /bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/
stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das/ bde bar byon tam/ shin tu ma mnyel
tam| bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sad la 'di skad ces smras so/ /shin tu
legs par sad/ de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'o/ /stobs dang ldan no/ /bde bar bzhugs so/ /mi bde ba mi mnga'o/ /de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga'o//
bde bar byon to/ /mnyel ba med do/ /bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do/ /shAkya'i bu mya ngan med dang / mya ngan bral gyis kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang / shAkya'i bu
dga' ba'i bzhin dang / shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sad gnas dben pa na 'khod pa mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char
ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring zhig nas
byon to| |tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka /bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba
mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/ shin tu ma mnyel tam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal tam/
de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas shAkya'i bu mya ngan med dang / mya ngan bral la 'di skad ces smras so/ /mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral/ bcom ldan
'das la snyun mi mnga'o/ /stobs dang ldan no/ /bde bar bzhugs so/ /mi bde ba mi mnga'o/ /de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga'o/ /bde bar byon to/ /mnyel ba med do/ /bsod
snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dag bcom ldan
'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par byed do/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / shAkya'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa 'char ka/
bdag cag ni/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dod na/ bdag cag gis de ltar ma nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang
mas nga'i bu la blta ba'am/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir su yang ma 'gro zhig /la la zhig de la blta ba'am/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song na/ lus la gnod pa'i chad pas
gcad do/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /de bas na 'phags pa 'char ka de ltar bdag rgyal pos 'jigs pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'am/ bsnyen bkur byed du 'dong bar
mi nus so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di ni/ shin tu nga rgyal gyis non par gyur na/ ji ltar bdag gis de'i drung
du 'gro bar bya snyam nas des 'di snyam du bsam mo/ /'on kyang bdag gis nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis shing rta la bdun srid kyi steng gi bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te rgyal
po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'gro bar bya'o/ /snyam nas de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa de lta bu la mnyam par bzhag ste/ sems mnyam par bzhag pa
des nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te rgyal po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song ngo / /rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang tshe dang
ldan pa 'char ka rgyang ring po nas nam mkha' la shing rta la bdun srid du 'phags te rdzu 'phrul gyis bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas shing 'ong ba mthong nas de la thal mo sbyar te
tshigs su bcad nas smras pa/ tshon bsgyur gos can khyod ni gang nas 'ongs/ /khyod la ci dgos myur du smra bar byos/ /khyod la gang
dgos de yang myur du sbyin/ /brtul zhugs grub pa mthong bar shin tu dka'/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshigs su
bcad de slar smras pa/ rgyal po bdag ni khyod kyi sras kyi bu/ /bdag la chos dgos rgyal po gang na bzhugs/ /bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bshos skyel te/ /
bde bar gshegs pa skyob pa'i bshos bkur ro/ /yul 'khor bdag po che ba'i dpal mnga' ba/ /khyod la mi mchog sras mnga' grags pa thob/ /gzi brjid kyis
ni phyogs rnams kun tu 'bar/ /ston gyi nyi ma'i gung gi 'od dang 'dra/ /ji ltar sprin med nam mkha'i nyi ma ni/ /phyogs rnams kun du 'od byed mngon par 'bar/ /
de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras/ /ye shes mnga' bas phyogs rnams kun du snang / /ji ltar ston gyi nyi ma shar ba na/ /srin bu me khyer zil gyis mnan cing snang / /
de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras/ /mu stegs gzhan rnams kun bcom lam mer bzhugs/ /ji ltar nyi mas zil non skar ma rnams/ /nyin par 'od stong lam
mer mi rung ba/ /de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod sras kyis/ /zil gyis mnan pas mu stegs gzhan mi snang / /ji ltar nyi ma'i zil gnon zla ba ni/ /nam mkha'i dbyings na
'od stong nyid mi snang / /de bzhin khyod sras zil mnan mu stegs rnams/ /nyi mas zil non zla bzhin gsal ba med/ /seng+ge'i nga ro thos nas phra mo rnams/ /shugs
kyis rmongs nas bsam pa ji bzhin du/ /ri sul gseb tu byer nas 'khra zhing gnas/ /stag gi nga ro gzhan gyis bzod par dka'/ /de bzhin rgyal ba drang srong chen po'i
gsung / /bdag med nga ro mu stegs gzhan thos na/ /shes rab dman pa srid pa'i rtser phyin kyang / /gsung thos pas ni thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur/ /lha dang
bcas pa'i 'jig rten long ba la/ /spyan dang ldan pa des ni mig kyang stsal/ /snang ba mdzad cing rdul kyang rnam par sbyangs/ /ye shes snang ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon
par shar/ /bde dang mi bde lam gnyis rab tu bstan/ /lam dang gol ba'i lam yang rgyal bas bstan/ /lam stor skye bo rnams ni lam du btsud/ /'dam du bying
ba rnams kyang thang la bton/ /ji ltar skom pa'i sa la sprin gyis ni/ /sgang dang gshong bcas char gyis ngoms par byed/ /de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras/ /'gro
ba lhar bcas chos kyis ngoms par mdzad/ /ji ltar char gyis ngoms pa'i ri sul nags/ /rtswa dang gel ba nags tshal shing rnams dang //
'khri shing sdong po sman gyi rnam pa dang / /me tog sna tshogs kyis ni sa mdzes pa/ /de bzhin stobs bcu mi 'jigs mnga' ba dang / /ma 'dres bco brgyad chos lnga'i sdong po
la/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes me tog dang / /'bras bu spras pas rgyal po'i sras mdzes so/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dbus na lhun po'i ri/ /lha yi gnas gyur mi
bsgul rnam par mdzes/ /de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras/ /dge sbyong rgya mtsho'i nang na rnam par mdzes/ /bde sogs khyim thab brgya byin lha dbang po/ /lha yi stan
la 'dug na mdzes pa ltar/ /de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras/ /dge sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par mdzes/ /byams pa'i stobs can zab mo'i 'brug bsgrags
te/ /thugs rje chen po'i glog phreng rir ldan pas/ /dran pa nyer gzhag char rgyun 'dab 'khrigs te/ /rgyal ba klu mchog de ni chos char 'bebs/ /yongs dag dkyil
'khor tshul khrims rab kyi zer/ /ting 'dzin nyon mongs lha min rab 'joms shing / /ye shes nyi zer srid pa'i sred pa skem/ /rgyal ba'i nyi chen 'gro bar rnam par
mdzes| |ting 'dzin tshul khrims gzings dang gru chen te/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i nor bu rin chen tshogs/ /byang chub yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas bsam gtan
rlabs| |thar pa 'dod pas sangs rgyas rgya mtsho bsten par bya/ /tshul khrims rnam dag rtsa ba brtan par zug /ting 'dzin lo ma dran pa yal ga 'dab/ /byang chub yan lag
me tog stong pa'i sdong / /bdag med grib ldan rgyal ba'i sdong po bsten/ /tshul khrims nags mtha' bsten pa'i stobs chen po/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba'i ri khrod phug na gnas/ /
stong pa mtshan med smon med spyod yul can/ /rgyal ba stobs can seng+ge khyod kyi sras/ /thub pa mi gnas gnas ni rnam par ston/ /rgyal ba khyu mchog brjid pa'i stabs
bzhud pas/ /byis pa so so mu stegs gzhan bsngags te/ /khyod kyi sras ni khyu mchog sgra yang 'byin/ /tshul khrims gter dang yon tan dbyig gis brgyan/ /bsam
gtan dang ba'i zhi gnas nye bar bskyabs/ /ye shes kyis bsrungs thar pa'i spyod yul can/ /rgyal ba tshong dpon gtso bo nor gtong mdzad/ /dge ba yongs su bzung
bas sdig bcom ste/ /nyon mongs zhi mdzad dge bsnyen bka' stsol pas/ /lha dang lha min bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ /rgyal po khyod kyi sras mchog rnam par mdzes//
tshul khrims mchog sprin blo ros glog 'byin cing / /yan lag brgyad lam cher chen rlan gyis spangs/ /thub pa gces pa'i lo tog 'bras
bu stsol/ /khyod kyi sras ni klu chen po 'brug sgra sgrog /rgyal pos smras pa/ gang zag mchog de bde bar 'ongs sam ci/ /bsod snyoms rgyu bas 'dren pa ma ngal lam/ /de
yi lus la ngal bas dub med dam/ /thang gnas ut+pa la bzhin ma rnying ngam/ /'char kas smras pa/ rdzu 'phrul stobs mnga' bsam gtan spyod yul can/ /dgyes shing
bde bas yan lag yongs rgyas te/ /thub pa zhi ba'i snyoms 'jug gnas bcas pas/ /gser gyi pad+ma lta bur rgyal ma rnying / /rgyal pos smras pa/ sngon chad rdza rnga rnga bran
sgras bskul zhing / /gling bu'i sgra snyan nga ros bskul byas te/ /bud med glu yi dbyangs kyis bslang bslang na/ /da ltar sad na sdug bsngal mi myong ngam/ /'char kas
smras pa/ bsam gtan dgongs pas ting 'dzin zhi yul can/ /ting 'dzin sgrub pa'i tshul la mkhas pa ste/ /mnal lam bzhengs sam bzhud dam bzhugs pa na/ /
sdug bsngal mi mnga' rgyal ba rtag tu dgyes/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ che ba'i rkyen 'os lam mchog bshams pa la/ /me mar sdong pos kun nas mtha' bskor te/ /bud
med tshogs kyis bskor cing nyal nyal na/ /da lta mun par nyal na cis mi rmongs/ /'char kas smras pa/ thub chen 'phags pa gzims lam gzims pa ni/ /byams pa'i
gdan bting thugs rjes bde bar bzhengs/ /dga' bas gnas pas dgyes dang ldan pas na/ /srid med btang snyoms can la rmongs mi mnga'/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ shAkya
dpa' bos de rtag mdun du bdar/ /bstan bcos mkhas dang rtse zhing dga' byas te/ /gzhal med khang 'dra'i khyim du dga' byas na/ /nga yi bu de nags mthar ji ltar
dga'| |'char kas smras pa/ chos kyi byung ba zhi sems ldan rnams kyis/ /zhi ba'i thugs mnga' de rtag mdun du bdar/ /zhi ba'i dgon par zhi ba bstan mdzad pas/ /
ston pa 'jigs bral de ni der dgyes so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ sngon chad gzhon nu khyim na gnas pa'i tshe/ /yan lag spos kyi 'bru mar zhim byugs te/ /rgyal po'i
rkyen du 'os pas khrus byas na/ /nags kyi mtha' na thub pa su yis bkru/ /'char kas smras pa/ khrims gtsang 'bab stegs chos chu rdzing bu ste/ /thub pa de bkru gzhan
yang dkru ba mdzad/ /sku la mi gsher sras dang bcas su 'bog /rang yang rgal la skye bo phal chen sgrol/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gser gyi skud pa nor bu'i phreng bas
brgyan/ /rgyal po'i rkyen 'os gos mchog bzang po gyon/ /tsan+dan zhim pos shing 'dab legs par bris/ /nags chen de gseb thub
pa su yis brgyan/ /'char kas smras pa/ tshul khrims spos byugs yon tan phreng bas brgyan/ /khrel yod na bza' ting 'dzin bsam gtan brgyan/ /mngon shes
rig pa rnam thar brgyan pa'i sku/ /rnam grol gzi mnga' thub pa nags na mdzes/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ rtse gnyis mtshon dang ral gri mtshon thogs pa'i/ /dpa' bo
g.yul du 'ongs pas lus bsrungs te/ /bla re gdugs kyis rtag tu dgab dgab pa/ /gcig pu nags na 'dug na su yis bsrung / /'char kas smras pa/ byams
pa'i stobs kyis thub pa yongs bsrungs te/ /de dpung ye shes nyan thos zham ring g.yog /yon tan tshogs la nges pas 'jigs mi mnga'/ /stobs bcu dgyes
pa mnga' zhing mi 'jigs brnyes/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ nga yi bu yi yon tan khyod kyis smras/ /chos legs spyod cing dub med brjod pa thos/ /khyod kyang zan zo bsod
snyoms bkur bar gyis/ /bdag kyang mi yi dbang po bltar 'gro'o/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras
so| |rgyal po chen po/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ tshogs kyi slob dpon/ tshogs kyi mchog /dge sbyong gi tshogs yongs su sdud pa drang srong chen po ste/ dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi
nang na bzhugs na/ dge sbyong gi rgyal po lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes bco lnga la zla ba nya ste yongs su rgyas pa'i
tshe skar ma'i tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba ni/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ lham me/ lhan
ne/ lhang nge'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma ni/ sngon gyi dus na shin tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi
tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ shin tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab rgya mtsho'i nang na 'dug pa ni/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang
nge'o| /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni/ chos
bzang lha'i mdun sa na gnas na/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ lham me/ lhan ne/
lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang / lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan dang / lha'i bu rab 'phrul dga' dang / lha'i
bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha'i tshogs kyi nang na gnas na/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs
na| lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa ni/ tshangs pa bye ba phrag stong gis bskor na/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang
nge'o| |de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma bcom ldan
'das kyi yon tan de lta bu brjod pa 'di thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos su zad na/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di
ltar mthu che la 'di ltar dbang che bar grags na/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma btsas pa nyid kyi tshe sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab
tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem
chem| 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs shing / snang ba dpag tu med pa byung ba lta ci
smos/ btsas ma thag tu sus kyang ma brten par sa la gom ba bdun por ba dang / steng gi bar snang las chu'i rgyun grang dro rnam pa gnyis byung ste/ de gnyis kyis khrus
byas pa dang / de'i tshe lha'i khri bzang po dbus gser las byas pa byung ba dang / steng gi bar snang las lha'i gdugs rnga yab dang bcas pa byung ba lta'ang ci smos/ btsas
ma thag tu lha thams cad phyag 'tshal bar gyur pa dang / gang gi tshe btsas nas gang gi tshe mngon par byung ba de'i bar du nam yang 'khrul pa med pa/ rtag tu dam
bcas pa la brtan ba/ ji skad smras pa de ltar byed pa/ rtag tu rgyun mi gcod par brtson 'grus brtan pa/ yang dag par smra ba/ slu ba med pa lta ci smos/ gang gi tshe
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te brgal nas bsgral bar bya'o/ /zhes smras pa lta ci smos snyam ste/ des de ltar bcom
ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i dam bcas pa de dran nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /blo mchog ldan pa gang zhig bltams ma thag /nor pa med pa'i
gsung ni brjod mdzad de/ /gang zhig la ni bden pa'i gsung mnga' ba/ /de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/ /gang zhig bltams par
gyur ma thag nyid du/ /'jig rten gtso bor 'gyur bar bya'o zhes/ /mgon 'os mnyam pa med pa'i gsung brjod pa/ /de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/ /su zhig rmi lam
rmi ba'i dus na yang / /rdzun gyi tshig ni nam yang ma gsungs te/ /ji skad gsungs pa de dag mdzad mdzad pa/ /de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/ /gser gyi phung
po gangs rir mnyam pa yis/ /gang zhig chags par bya bar ma nus shing / /gang zhig chags las rnam par 'das gyur pa/ /de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/ /
mtshon rnon 'dra ba'i dag rtsub tshig rnams kyis/ /gang zhig khro bar bya bar ma nus shing / /zhe sdang dngos po las ni rab 'das pa/ /de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi
ches| |chags par 'gyur dang zhe sdang rmongs 'gyur bas/ /gang zhig thul bar nus par ma gyur te/ /shes rab rgyal po dang ni ldan gyur pa/ /de la mkhas pa su zhig
yid mi ches/ /'dod pa'i dga' dang bde rnams du ma dang / /longs spyod dag la rtog pa'i rnam pa yis/ /gang zhig bcing bar nus par ma gyur pa/ /de la mkhas pa
su zhig yid mi ches/ /rmad du byung ba rnam pa brgyad dag gis/ /ngo mtshar 'dzin 'jug nam yang ma nus te/ /dpal stug ldan zhing lag tu mi dam pa/ /de la mkhas pa su
zhig yid mi ches/ /mkhas pa dag gis brjod pa'i tshig snyan pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'i tshig gis kyang / /gang zhig bcing bar nus par ma gyur pa/ /de la mkhas
pa su zhig yid mi ches/ /don gyi tshul la brtson dang ldan pa dang / /chos dang 'dod la nges pa'i tshig rnams kyis/ /gang zhig bcing bar nus par ma gyur pa/ /de yi
gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /dri ma med stobs mtha' yas ldan gyur pa/ /gang zhig grong khyer mchog nas 'byung ba'i tshe/ /dpung rnams kyis ni thub par ma gyur
pa| |de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /byang chub dam pa mngon par bzhed pa'i phyir/ /gang zhig 'dod pa'i bde ba spangs nas su/ /'chi med rgyu phyir ri dwags spyod
mdzad pa/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /byang chub dam pa mngon par bzhed pa'i phyir/ /zhen pa ma yin sems can gang zhig gis/ /lo drug bar du dka' thub
drag spyad pa/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /'jig rten la ni phan dang bde ba'i phyir/ /byang chub dam pa don du gnyer ba na/ /lo drug lon pa'i tha mar tshod khu
gsol| |de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /gang la lo drug bar du bdud kyis ni/ /rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brangs te glags btsal kyang / /
de la glags ni rnyed par ma gyur pa/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang bral gyur cing / /su la cung zad tsam yang mi slong la/ /
'jig rten dag gi don ni mdzad gyur pa/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /gang zhig gzhan la gsan pa ma mdzad par/ /rtogs pa dka' ba rab tu zhi ba yi/ /
byang chub bla med mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas pa/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /gang zhig tshangs pa nyid kyis gsol btab pas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de yi
tshig gsan te/ /nyid kyis chos ni rab tu bshad pa na/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /gang zhig bdag la thugs brtse don gyi phyir/ /shAkya'i grong khyer khyim
du byon gyur te/ /shAkya'i tshogs rnams grol bar mdzad pa na/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /brgal bar gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das gang gis/ /sngon gyi thugs
dam bcas pa dgongs mdzad de/ /bdag cag srid pa'i rgyun las sgrol mdzad pa/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /de dus nga bab de ltar dus mkhyen pas/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis de yi dus mkhyen te/ /'dren pa dus su thugs brtse mdzad pa po/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /mi yi 'dren pa yi ni sku mchog la/ /blta ba'i don
du bdag ni 'gro bya zhes/ /rgyal po des ni rang gi sems kyis su/ /de snyam du ni rjes su bsam pa byas/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas de ltar ring zhig rjes su bsam nas
tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa/ dge slong khyod la ci zhig dgos/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshigs su bcad
de slar smras pa/ rgyal po khyod kyi don du bsam byas te/ /khyod nyid dad par bya phyir bdag 'dir 'ongs/ /stobs bcu mnga' la dad pa'i sems bskyed na/ /skyes pa bud
med dag kyang mtho ris 'dong / /stobs bcu mnga' zhing yon tan tshad med ldan/ /drang srong chen po shAkya dga' mdzad pa/ /'dir spyon rgyal po thugs dang skyed cig dang //
khyod kyi grags pa tshad med 'jig rten 'byung / /khyod kyi sras ni mi dbang dam pa ste/ /stobs bcu thugs rje thugs brtse che mnga' ba/ /chu khrod pad+ma ji bzhin chags med par/ /
stobs bcu chags med thugs mnga' spyod pa mdzad/ /srid pa'i chu bo bzhi las brgal gyur nas/ /'gro ba mang po chu bo che las sgrol/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo mi 'jigs thang
'don gyi/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /srid pa'i zug rngu bzhi po kun bton te/ /sman pa'i gtso bo skye rgu'i zug rngu 'byin/ /gsol
byed pa mkhas pa dam pa'i mchog /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /bdud kyi sde chen dpag med pham mdzad de/ /nag po'i phyogs rnams sder bcas yongs
mnan nas/ /mchog tu zhi ba'i byang chub rnyed gyur gyi/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /'gro ba 'grol zhing chos kyang bstan pa dang / /'chi med zhi ba mi la
bshad gsol zhes/ /mi dbang la ni lha dbang gsol 'debs kyi/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad bskyed/ /phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs rnams zil mnan te/ /ston pa
dpag yas 'khor lo rab bskor nas/ /sems can bye ba tshad med 'dul mdzad kyi/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /rnam dag spyan mnga' de ni 'gro ba dag /
mun pa rab rib stug pos bsgribs pa yi/ /mig sbyong rab rib sel cing gsal mdzad kyi/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /rga dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa nyon
mongs la/ /rga shi med mchog mi la ston mdzad cing / /'chi med gnas su sems can don mdzad kyi/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /me chen gsum gyis
bsregs pa'i 'jig rten 'di/ /mes tshig sa la sprin chen char pa bzhin/ /bzhi gnyis dam pa'i sprin gyis char 'bebs kyi/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /dri
gsum dri ma spangs shing skyon bsal te/ /dri ma gsum las skye bo grol mdzad cing / /stobs bcu rnam par snang ba skyed mdzad kyi/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa
skyed| |skye rgu kun la pha bzhin thugs brtse bas/ /stobs bcu thugs rje mnga' ba byams par dgongs/ /thugs rje thugs brtses sems can sgrol mdzad kyi/ /'dren pa mi mchog la
ni dad pa skyed/ /bcom ldan de ni ma dul sems can 'dul/ /thugs rje mnga' ba ma zhi zhi mdzad cing / /rgod pa rnams kyang nyon mongs zhi mdzad kyi/ /'dren pa mi mchog la
ni dad pa skyed/ /skye bo rnams kyi srid pa'i rgya mtsho skem/ /rgya mtsho la ni lha'i bu ji lta bar/ /stobs bcu thugs rje che mnga' sgrol mdzad kyi/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa
skyed| |tshad med yon tan tshogs kyis mdzes gyur pa/ /thugs rje chen po dang ba'i thugs kyis spyod/ /yun ring 'khrugs pa'i skye bo dad mdzad kyi/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni
dad pa skyed/ /nor bu rin chen chu dang byed pa bzhin/ /rgyal ba skye ba dang bar spyod mdzad cing / /mi yi 'thab rnyog rab tu dang mdzad kyi/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed//
nor bu rin chen rang bzhin yongs dag pa/ /mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' ba yongs su skyed/ /rgyal ba de bzhin skyon bsal dag pa'i thugs/ /
mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' ba yongs su skyed/ /'jig rten gtso la dad pa thob gyur na/ /lha dang mi dag sdug bsngal khur yang 'dor/ /srid pa'i rgyud spangs zhi ba mchog
tu 'dong / /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /bdag gis yon tan phyogs gcig brjod pa ni/ /nam mkha'i dbyings la mkha' lding rjes bzhin te/ /bdag ni
rgyal ba'i yon tan mthar phyin min/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka las legs par bshad pa yang
thos/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' mdzad pa'i yon tan de lta bu yang nyid kyis mngon du mthong / /sngon bdag brgal nas skyes bu khyu mchog khyod kyang
bsgral bar bgyi'o/ /zhes dam bcas pa yang rjes su dran nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la dad pa thob par gyur to/ /de ltar dad pa thob pa'i sems kyis tshe dang ldan pa
'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so/ /dge slong khyod ni/ nga'i bu'i chos las skyes pa'i bu yin na/ khyod bdag zan zo la bcom ldan 'das kyi bshos khyer te song
zhig /da yang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir phyi bzhin 'ong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byas nas zan zos te
bcom ldan 'das kyis bshos khyer nas song ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /rgyal po zas gtsang ma ni/ dge slong
'char kas dad par byed de/ deng skye bo phal po che'i don du 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das kyi bshos khyer te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
song nas bdag gis byas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la legs so/ /zhes bya ba gnang ste/ 'char
ka legs so/ /legs so/ /de ring rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par byas pas khyod kyis bsod nams mang du bskyed do/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams
la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de ring dge slong 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bskyed pa de la gal te gzugs
shig yod na ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma rnyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su yang bsod nams kyi phung po de mi shong ste/ bsod nams kyi phung po
de ni| de tsam du dpag tu med do/ /bam po gnyis pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol nas phyag bcabs/ lhung bzed bkrus te
mtshan ma'i rnam pa 'di lta bu mdzad do/ /mtshan ma'i rnam pa de lta bu mdzad pas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor
cing mdun du bdar nas 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskum pa las brkyang pa'am/ /brkyang pa las bskum pa tsam gyis rgyal po chen po
rnam thos kyi bu rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas
byang phyogs su brten te steng gi bar snang la gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing
'dug par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung yang dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan
'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs logs su brten te steng gi bar snang la dri za'i
tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po yang grul
bum bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das
kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lho phyogs logs su brten te steng gi bar snang la grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang /
dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang yang klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du
bdar nas snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas nub phyogs logs
su brten te steng gi bar snang la klu'i tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to/ /
lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas snga ma bzhin du steng gi bar snang
la thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to/ /de bzhin du lha'i dbang po rab 'thab
bral dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / lha'i rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i rgyal po
'od gsal dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i ris nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te steng gi bar snang la re re zhing yang g.yog lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig
brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzang ris kyang lha
ma yin bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang pa'am/ brkyang pa las bskum
pa tsam gyis lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzang ris lha ma yin gyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dus par gyur nas bcom ldan
'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dus par gyur to/ /bya'i rgyal po 'dab bzang brgyad
khri drug stong yang rang rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to/ /gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu rgyal po'i khab tha dad pa nas lhags
pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu yang 'dus par gyur to/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i dbyings dkyil du/ /ma lus rdzogs gyur zla ba nya ba yis/ /
skar ma'i tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni/ /nam mkha' zla ba bzhin du rnam par mdzes/ /zla ba dri med dkyil 'khor zhal mnga' ba/ /mun pa rab rib sel cing
dri gsum 'joms/ /rtog ge can tshogs zil gyis mnan nas ni/ /mkha' la skar ma'i bdag po bzhin du mdzes/ /nyi ma 'od zer brgya yi lus 'dzin pa/ /ston gyi
dus na mun sel rnam mdzes shing / /lha min tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas su/ /nyi ma de ni pad+ma'i kha yang 'byed/ /nyi ma 'od zer brgya 'dra'i sku mnga' bas/ /stong
gsum po dag zil gyis mnan nas ni/ /mi yi nyi ma rnam par mdzes gyur cing / /nyan thos pad+ma'i tshal mchog kha yang 'byed/ /lha
yi rgyal po dbang po brgya byin ni/ /'dun sar lha yi tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba/ /lha yi 'khor rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni/ /bde sogs khyim thab sbyin ldan rnam par
mdzes| |rkang gnyis dbang po dpal stug stobs bcu yang / /dge sbyong tshogs kyis mdun bdar stong gsum ni/ /rtog ge tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni/ /dge
sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par mdzes/ /lha yi rgyal po mtha' bral dbang byed pa/ /mtha' bral bzang po lhas mchod btsun byas ba/ /mtha' bral bzang po lha tshogs
nang zhugs te/ /mtha' bral rnams kyi nang na 'dug pa mdzes/ /gzi brjid mtha' yas stobs bcu mnga' ba yang / /lam ngan ngan 'gror 'gro ba zil mnan nas/ /yan
lag brgyad pa rab tu ston mdzad cing / /stobs bcu yon tan rnams kyis rab tu mdzes/ /lha yi rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan de/ /dga' ldan gnas na lha yi tshogs
kyis bskor/ /lha tshogs mang po zil gyis mnan nas ni/ /sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas rab tu mdzes/ /de bzhin lha dang lha min bla ma yang / /lha dang lha min tshogs kyis
bla mar byas/ /'khor brgyad po dag zil gyis mnan nas ni/ /skyes bu seng+ge dam pa 'jig rten mdzes/ /lha yi dbang po bdag po rab 'phrul ni/ /lha tshogs mang po zil gyis
mnan nas su/ /rang gi bsod nams mthu yis lha gnas na/ /gnas shing de ni rab tu rnam par mdzes/ /de bzhin nyon mongs rnams las rnam grol zhing / /stobs bcu
mnga' ba nyon mongs bral ba po/ /ma dul 'dul mdzad 'dul ba'i rgyal po yang / /skye bo zil gyis mnan nas rnam par mdzes/ /lha yi rgyal po dbang bsgyur byed pa ni/ /lha
gnas 'dug cing lha tshogs zil mnan te/ /sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis/ /rnam par mdzes par gyur pa ji bzhin du/ /de ltar rgyal ba stobs bcu'i spyod pa
dag /sngon chad spyad pas lha mi zil mnan te/ /sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis/ /rgyal ba de ni rab tu rnam par mdzes/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na ni tshangs pa yang / /
tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams rang gis zil mnan te/ /shin tu snyan pa yan lag brgyad ldan dag /yongs su rjod par byed cing mngon du mdzes/ /de ltar rgyal ba tshangs pa 'drar
gyur pa| |dge sbyong rgyal po dge sbyong tshogs rnams kyis/ /mdun du bdar te bden pa'i gtam gsung zhing / /'jig rten gsum po dag na mngon du mdzes/ /nyan par 'dod
pa lha dang mi rnams dang / /lto 'phye chen po dag ni 'dus mkhyen nas/ /skyes bu khyu mchog yan lag brgyad ldan gyi/ /gsung rnams kyis ni
rab tu ston par mdzad/ /bya lam nam mkha' dpag par nus kyang srid/ /rgya mtsho bum pas gzhal du rung yang srid/ /ri rab srang la gcal du rung yang srid/ /sangs
rgyas yon tan mtha' rtogs mi nus so/ /rgyal po mngon par dad par byas pa'i le'u ste/ dang po'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka song nas ring po
ma lon par rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya rnams la bsgo ba/ /grogs po dag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma 'char ba'i snga ltas ni/ gang 'di dmar rengs 'char ba'o/ /
dmar rengs shar na/ nyi ma 'char bar shes so/ /grogs po dag /de bzhin na dge slong 'char ka yang bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i snga ltas yin te/
dge slong 'char kas yon tan gang brjod pa de dag ni/ nges par thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan yin no/ /grogs po dag /de lta bas na/ gzhon pa'i mchog
rnams stod de sta gon gyis shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ring kho na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das mchog tu blta na sdug pa de blta zhing 'dong ngo / /lha/ legs so/ /
zhes gsol nas shAkya rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i ltar mnyan te/ theg pa'i mchog rnams myur du bstod do/ /de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma ser skya'i gnas dang / n+ya
gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba'i bar de dag thams cad rgyal po'i gshegs shul du mnyam par byed du bcug cing / bye ma gtsang ma bdal du bcug ste nyams dga' ba dang / me
tog sil mas gang ba dang / dar gyi lda ldi dang / phreng ba mang pos brgyan te/ skabs skabs su gar mkhan dang / glu mkhan dang / gyad dang / bum rnga thogs pa dang /
sil snyan dang / rol mo dang / klu'i cha byad dang / yo byad thams cad thogs pa dag bkod par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma bzhon pa'i mchog dang chas pa
rnams dang / bdag nyid kyang bzhon pa'i mchog la zhon te ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe shAkya
la la'i gzhon pa'i mchog ni/ rnam pa 'di lta ste/ 'di ltar shing rta dag kyang sngo la/ rta sngon po rnams kyis drangs shing / rgyan rnams kyang sngo la dril bu g.yer ka'i dra
bas brgyan pa/ 'khor rgyan sngon po can gyis bskor ba/ /gdugs dang / ral gri dang / thod dang / nor bu can gyi rnga yab dang / lham rgyan can sngon po dang ldan pa/ kha
tshar ma bcad pa'i ras sngon po gyon cing / rgyan sngon po thogs pa'i zhal ta ba rnams zhal ta byed pa/ rgyan sngon po can gyi lcags thogs pa dang /
khrid pa du ma dang ldan pa/ rgyal mtshan sngon po bsgreng ba sha stag ste/ shing rta re re zhing yang rgyan sngon po can gyi mi brgya phrag re res bskor bar gyur to/ /shAkya la la'i
bzhon pa rnam pa 'di lta bu ste/ 'di ltar shing rta dag kyang thams cad du ser ba nas thams cad du dmar ba dang / thams cad du dkar ba dang / thams cad du khra ba
dang / shing rta re re zhing yang rgyan khra bo can gyi mi brgya phrag re res bskor ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/ /shing rta de dag re res phyi bzhin du yang glang po che brgyad khri gser
gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi rgyal mtshan can/ gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa sha stag bshams te/ glang po che brgyad khri po de dag gi steng du rin po che sna
bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa/ bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa brgyad khri bzhag nas 'dong bar gyur to/ /glang po che brgyad khri po de dag gi phyi bzhin rta gser gyi rgyan gyis
brgyan pa/ gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha brgyus pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyan dang ldan pa brgyad khri bshams te 'dong bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / shAkya rnams rgyang ring po 'ong ba gzigs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyed gang dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha
skyed mos tshal du 'dong ba ma mthong ba de dag gis shAkya ser skya'i gnas nas 'ong ba 'di dag la ltos shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag /shAkya rnams ser skya'i
