gnas nas byung ba de dag ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha skyed mos tshal du 'dong ba dang rjes su mthun pa'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ser skya zhes bya'i grong khyer dam pa
nas| /rgyal po zas gtsang mi yi khyu mchog de/ /'khor dang bcas te ji ltar 'ongs gyur pa/ /de ltar bstan gyi khyed rnams de nyon cig /shing rta brgya stong mchog dang
bcas pa dag /legs par brgyan cing mdzes par spras nas ni/ /ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer dam pa nas/ /mi yi dbang po dam pa byung bar gyur/ /shing rta sngo zhing rgyan
kyang sngo ba dang / /rta yang sngo zhing sngo ba'i 'khor dang bcas/ /mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang sngo ba ste/ /de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang sngo/ /lcags kyang sngo zhing thag srang rnams
kyang sngo/ /dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas/ /mi rnams kyang ni sngon po'i gos can te/ /rgyal mtshan sngon po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas/ /shing rta ser zhing
rgyan yang ser ba dang / rta yang ser zhing ser po'i 'khor dang bcas/ /mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang ser po ste/ /de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag
kyang ser/ /lcags kyang ser zhing thag srang rnams kyang ser/ /dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas/ /mi rnams kyang ni ser po'i gos can te/ /rgyal mtshan ser po
bsgreng bas mdzes par byas/ /shing rta dmar zhing rgyan kyang dmar ba dang / /rta yang dmar zhing dmar po'i 'khor dang bcas/ /mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang dmar po ste/ /de
bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang dmar/ /lcags kyang dmar zhing thag srang rnams kyang dmar/ /dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas/ /mi rnams kyang ni dmar po'i
gos can te/ /rgyal mtshan dmar po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas/ /shing rta dkar zhing rgyan kyang dkar pa dang / /rta yang dkar zhing dkar po'i 'khor dang bcas/ /mtshan
ma lnga po dag kyang dkar po ste/ /de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang dkar/ /lcags kyang dkar zhing thag srang rnams kyang dkar/ /dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang
bcas| |mi rnams kyang ni dkar po'i gos can te/ /rgyal mtshan dkar po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas/ /shing rta khra zhing rgyan kyang khra ba dang / /rta yang khra zhing khra ba'i
'khor dang bcas/ /mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang khra ba ste/ /de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang khra/ /lcags kyang khra zhing thag srang rnams kyang khra/ /dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams
dang bcas/ /mi rnams kyang ni khra ba'i gos can te/ /rgyal mtshan khra bo bsgreng bas mdzes par byas/ /shing rta de dag rnams kyi phyi bzhin du/ /glang po brgyad khri tshang bar
bshams pa ni/ /gser gyi rgyal mtshan rnams kyis legs par brgyan/ /glang chen rnams ni gser gyis tshal bar brgyan/ /de dag steng du rin chen sna bdun gyi/ /khang pa
brtsegs pa dag ni bzhag nas su/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi/ /shing rta rnams kyis phyi bzhin 'brang bar bshams/ /de bzhin rta mchog stong phrag brgyad cu
yang / /rin chen sna bdun rgyan gyis dga' bar brgyan/ /rgyal po'i chas gos rgyal po 'cham stabs can/ /glang po de dag rnams ni phyi bzhin 'brang / /rab tu dri zhim kha
dog lnga pa yi/ /me tog sil ma rgyal po'i lam du bkram/ /dar gyi lda ldi dag kyang rab tu bres/ /bdug spos snod rnams kyis ni legs par brgyan/ /glu mkhan gar
mkhan rnams dang gyad rnams dang / /bum rnga thogs pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas/ /rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa mang / /rab tu dga' zhing rgyal po'i phyi bzhin
'brang / /rgyal po gshegs pa'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// //de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / /shAkya rnams rta babs
sa'i bar du bzhon pa dang dong ste phyin nas bzhon pa las babs te/ rkang thang gi 'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas mdun du bdar te n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar dong
ngo| /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma nga rgyal che bar mkhyen nas mi gang lhag tsam gyi steng gi bar snang gi nam mkha' la rgyal po zas gtsang
ma mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir 'chag cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'chag pa'i g.yas phyogs nas mi mjed kyi bdag po
tshangs pa zhal 'bring du 'chag cing 'gro'o/ /g.yon phyogs nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin zhal 'bring du 'chag cing 'gro'o/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i
zhal 'bring du lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams bcom ldan 'das la
mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gdugs 'dzin cing bsil yab kyis g.yob par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / yul 'khor srung gnyis kyang bcom
ldan 'das 'chag pa'i shar phyogs logs kyi thog ma la bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga smad nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su
thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'das
'chag pa'i nub phyogs logs kyi thog ma la bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga smad nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to/ /de'i tshe rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang /
dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir steng gi bar snang la gnas te/ lha'i
me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / lha'i man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / lha'i spos kyi phye ma rab tu 'thor bar gyur to/ /bcom
ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha'i rol mo'i sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs dag kyang steng gi bar snang la sgra 'byin par gyur to/ /mi'i las 'das pa'i glu'i nga ro yang
bar snang las byung bar gyur to/ /sprin las spos kyi char zam zim yang bab par gyur to/ /lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i
char yang bab par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa gang mngon par mdzad pas lha dang mi rnams kyang gcig gis gcig mthong
bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par mdzad do/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas lha de dag bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa byed pa yang mthong / lha'i rin
po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las grub pa'i khang pa brtsegs pas kyang bar snang gang bar mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs
par gsungs pa de ni/ ngo mtshar che ste/ sngon bcom ldan 'das gzhon nur gyur pa'i tshe 'di skad du nga la ni/ gling chen po bzhi'i dbang phyug la dbang bar 'gyur
ba ngo mtshar mi che ste/ ngas ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su lha dang mi'i nang du chos kyi dbang phyug la dbang bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs na/
bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dbang phyug la dbang ba de ni/ 'di yin par blta ste/ bdag ni/ mi'i 'khor can du zad/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ lha dang mi'i
'khor can du gyur to/ /snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas bla gos phyogs gcig tu bgos te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi
bos phyag 'tshal te tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das bltams ma thag tu sus kyang ma brten par sa chen po la gom pa bdun bzhud de phyogs bzhir gzigs nas
gsung brjod pa/ nga ni/ 'jig rten na mchog /nga ni/ 'jig rten na gtso/ nga ni/ 'jig rten na rab ste/ ngas skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba mthar dbyung ngo / /
zhes gsungs pa de'i tshe yang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos gtugs te phyag bgyis so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das zhing pa'i grong du bzhud nas
dzam+bu'i grib ma bsil ba la bzhugs pa'i tshe nyi ma yol yang dzam+bu'i grib mas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku de ma btang ste/ lha'i bu gzhon nu drug thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod
par gyur pa de'i tshe yang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag bgyis so/ /da yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di dang lan gsum du phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes smras nas de'i tshe tshigs su
bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gang tshe rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod bltams nas/ /sa chen 'di la gom pa bdun bzhud de/ /nga ni 'jig rten 'di na mchog ces gsungs/ /de tshe mkhas
pa khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /gang tshe thub chen zhing ba'i grong bzhud de/ /dzam+bu'i grib mas bzhugs pa ma btang zhing / /lha bu gzhon nu drug gis
btud gyur pa/ /de tshe mchod 'os khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /nga yang 'di dang khyod la lan gsum du/ /thub pa khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje che mnga' lha
mis mchod pa gtso/ /khyod 'dra 'jig rten ma mchis lhag ci smos/ /mtshan ni don grub lags zhes sngon brjod pa/ /pha dang ma yis bsam ste btags pa lags/ /khyod kyis bsam
rdzogs bdud rtsi brnyes pas na/ /don grub lags par bdag gis nga gdod 'tshal/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi seng+ge'i khri lha'i yid bzhin gyi
ngas bcos bu bting ba rnam pa sna tshogs su spel ba bshams so/ /thams cad dang ldan pa'i n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar yang lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu yog par
bting ngo / /steng du yang lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu'i bla re bres so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bar snang gi 'chag sa de nas babs te gdan khri bshams pa la
bzhugs so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha
rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bar snang la 'khod par gyur to/ /'di la 'di ni/ chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /ser skya zhes bya
grong khyer dam pa yi/ /n+ya gro d+ha yi ra ba nyams dga' bar/ /rgyal po zas gtsang de dang gang gi tshe/ /'jig rten mgon po phrad pa de yi tshe/ /skye bo mang po dag ni 'dus gyur te/ /lha
ma yin dang mkha' lding dbang po dang / /klu tshogs rnams dang de bzhin grul bum dang / /dri za'i rgyal po rnams kyang 'dus par gyur/ /de bzhin gsang ba'i bdag po rnams
'dus te/ /mi'am ci yi tshogs dang mi rnams dang / /de bzhin 'dod pa dag na spyod pa'i lha/ /rab tu dga' ba rnams kyang 'dus par gyur/ /de bzhin gzugs kyi khams su
gtogs pa yi/ /tshangs pa rnams dang tshangs pa'i ris rnams dang / /'od gsal ba dang dge rgyas pa dag dang / /'bras bu che bar gtogs dang gnas gtsang 'dus/ /dge
sbyong dag dang de bzhin bram ze dang / /spyod pa can dang kun tu rgyu dag dang / /gcer bu pa dang mu stegs gzhan mang po/ /log lam rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang 'dus/ /sangs rgyas
nyid kyi gzi brjid dam pa yis/ /rgyal po chen po zas gtsang de yi sems/ /yongs su smin par bya ba'i don gyi phyir/ /de yi tshe na 'dus pa chen por gyur/ /sngon chad bcom ldan
'das kyis legs bshad pa'i/ /tshig gis 'khor rnams yongs su tshim par mdzad/ /da ni rgyal ba rgyal po zas gtsang la/ /rgyal ba'i mthu ni rab
tu bstan par bzhed/ /bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po zas gtsang gis/ /gzhon nu khyod ni sa bdag chen po yi/ /rgyal por 'gyur zhes mkhas pas lung bstan gyi/ /
khab nas ma byung zhig ces mngon gsol ba/ /gling bzhir dbang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba ste/ /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod/ /rin chen sna bdun
dag dang ldan par 'gyur/ /'byor pa bzhi po dang yang ldan par 'gyur/ /chos la gnas shing sa yang skyong ba ste/ /gling bzhi dbang bar rgyal rigs rgyal chen 'gyur/ /
mi yi bdag dang mi yi mchod par 'ong / /lto 'phye ches mchod 'gyur zhes gsol ba btab/ /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' des/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig dpag
med nas/ /bdag ni rtag tu bden pa'i tshig smras kyi/ /rgyal po bdag gi tshig la gson ces gsungs/ /'di ltar gling bzhi pa yi rgyal srid kyis/ /bdag la slu ba
mdzad par bzhed pas na/ /de lta'i tshul las rgyal po chen po khyod/ /bdag la cung zad tsam yang thugs mi re/ /rgyal po chen po sngon tshe byung ba ni/ /rgya mtsho'i rlabs
kyis rus sbal gcig cig 'phangs/ /rgya mtsho'i rlabs ni phyir log gyur pa na/ /rus sbal de ni khron pa'i nang du lhung / /de la khron pa'i nang gi rus sbal gyis/ /rgya mtsho'i rus sbal
ga nas 'dir 'ongs kye/ /nga yi the tshom skyes pa gcad pa'i phyir/ /myur du nga la smros zhes de skad smras/ /khron pa'i nang gi rus sbal de nyid la/ /rgya mtsho'i rus sbal blo chen des
smras pa/ /nga ni rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis bkur bkur te/ /khron pa 'dir ni de ring bor bar gyur/ /rgya mtsho'i rlabs chen de ni phyir log song / /nga ni slar log 'gro bar ma nus
te| |nga ni rlabs dang bral bar gyur pas na/ /rus sbal khyod kyi khron par gnas 'cha' 'o/ /de la khron pa'i nang gi rus sbal gyis/ /rgya mtsho de ni khron pa 'di tsam mam/ /'on te
khron pa 'di bas che ba zhig /dris lan nga la myur du smros zhes smras/ /rgya mtsho'i rus sbal blo chen rgyal po des/ /khron pa'i rus sbal de la tshig smras pa/ /khron pa'i rus sbal khyod
ni byis pa ste/ /blo rgya chung zhing shes pa rab tu zhan/ /nga ni lan tshwa can gyi chu der btsas/ /yun ring dus nas de na skye skye yang / /rgya mtsho'i mtha' ma shes par mi nus na/ /dbus
lta shes par ga la nus zhes smras/ /de ltar mi yi bdag po khyod kyis kyang / /bdag gi mthu ni thugs su ma chud de/ /gling bzhi ba yi mchod pa rnams kyis ni/ /khyod kyis bdag
la slu ba mdzad par bzhed/ /bdag ni chos can chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur/ /chad pas mi gcad mtshon chas bda' med par/ /stong gsum 'jig
rten khams 'di bskyang bar bya/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod pa thob par 'gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul stobs bsgoms pa yi bdag nyid can/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon tshig sbyang
bzhed nas/ /de phyir 'khor chen po ni de dag dang / /sems can rnams la thugs kyis dgongs pa mdzad/ /rgyal po zas gtsang sems ni mgu bya'i phyir/ /thugs kyis
yongs su bskul ba mdzad pa dang / /'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag ma lus par/ /de yi tshe na de ni 'dus par gyur/ /rgyal po 'dun par byas pa'i le'u ste/ gsum
pa'o|| //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzang ris bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i sems thog mar skye
bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mtshan ma mdzad do/ /de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzang ris lha ma yin khrag khrig phrag drug cu dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo khrag khrig
phrag drug cu dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa thog mar byas te/ de nas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po che rin thang yod pa dang / rin thang med pa ji
snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir phul lo/ /rin po che gzhan rgya mtsho chen po de na med pa dag kyang mngon par sprul pa byas te
mchod pa phul lo/ /rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can gyi shing rta khrag khrig phrag drug cu yang mngon par sprul to/ /shing rta de dag re re zhing yang rta cang shes khrag
khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to/ /rta de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba can la rkang lag gi rgyan gser las byas pa rin po che sna bdun
gyis spras pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis byas pa'i 'phyar 'dab can/ gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa sha stag go /rta cang shes de dag gi rgyan du bya ba'i phyir
rin po che sna bdun gyi bla re dag kyang mngon par sprul to/ /shing rta de dag kyang gser gyi rgyal mtshan can gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa sha stag go /yid bzhin gyi nor
bu'i bla re de dag kyang steng gi bar snang las shing rta de dag gi phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur te/ shing rta de dag 'dong na ni/ rjes su 'dong / shing rta de dag sdod na ni/
sdod pa sha stag go /yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re de dag la yang mdzes par bya ba'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi phreng ba'i lda ldi mngon par dbyangs so/ /yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re
de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang ldan par mngon par sprul te/ /shing rta'i rgyan dang / rta'i rgyan dang / yid
bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod na/ sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan na bde ba sha stag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rol mo sil
snyan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa mkhas pas sgra phyung na/ sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba dang / mnyan na bde ba 'byung ba de bzhin du shing rta'i rgyan de dag dang / rta'i rgyan de
dag dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod na/ sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan na bde ba sha stag 'byung bar gyur te/ /shing rta de dag gi 'phang
gis kyang steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad drug cu bsgribs te 'khod par gyur to/ /shing rta de dag gi phyi bzhin yang rol mo sil snyan sna tshogs rjes su 'brang bar gyur to/ /
shing rta de dag thams cad la yang lha ma yin gyi bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dag 'khod do/ /bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la ni/ rol mo byed/ la
la ni| sil snyan dkrol/ la la ni/ glu len/ la la ni/ gar byed/ la la ni/ tsan+dan dang ut+pa la'i phye mas 'thong / la la ni/ a ga ru dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye mas
'thor| la la ni/ lha ma yin gyi rdzas kyi phye mas 'thor/ la la ni/ gser dngul gyi phye mas 'thor/ la la ni/ man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu Sha ka dang /
many+dzu Sha ka chen po dang / pa ru Sha ka dang / pa ru Sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / skya snar dang / skya snar chen po dang / skya sngar khra bo dang /
skya snar bkra chen gyi me tog mngon par sprul cing bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro/ /la la ni/ gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / shel gyi me tog
dang | bai DUR+Ya'i me tog dang / spug gi me tog dang / mu tig dmar po'i me tog dang / rdo'i snying po'i me tog gis mngon par 'thor to/ /la la ni/ rin po che sna bdun
dang | dbyig gis snyim pa bkang zhing bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro/ /la la ni/ na bza' dang / rgyan 'bul lo/ /la la ni/ sku rags dang / zhabs kyi rgyan dang /
phyag gi rgyan dang / sor gdub dang / gdu bu dang / gdu bu tham pa dang / dbu rgyan rtse gsum pa dang / dpung rgyan dang / cod pan dang / gser skud dang / mu tig gi do
shal dang / nor bu'i do shal dang / sen mo do dang / gya do dang / mgul rgyan sna tshogs 'thor bar gyur to/ /la la ni/ tsong tsong gshibs pa/ la la ni/ mgo rgyan/
la la ni/ rna cha gdub kor/ la la ni/ gser gyi phreng ba rin po ches spras pa/ la la ni/ rin po che'i phreng ba gser gyis spras pa/ la
la ni/ gser gyi dra ba/ la la ni/ gser gyi phreng ba dang / nor bu'i phreng ba dang / mu tig gi phreng ba thogs so/ /la la ni/ gser gyi gdugs dang / dngul gyi
gdugs dang / bai DUR+Ya'i gdugs dang / shel gyi gdugs dang / spug gi gdugs dang / rdo'i snying po'i gdugs dang / mu tig dmar po'i gdugs dang / rin
po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sna tshogs tha dad pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang / tshon sna tshogs can
mang po thogs so/ /la la ni/ spos chu'i char 'bebs shing 'khod par gyur to/ /la la ni/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod par
gyur to| |mi mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi phul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rkang gnyis gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod la do zla yong ma mchis/ /'jig rten gsal
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal dang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan rdzogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyon
mongs sel la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyod dag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems dag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnas pa mi mnga' zhum mi mnga'/ /le lo mi mnga' rgod mi mnga'/ /brtson
'grus brtsams shing rtul ba nyid/ /nges par rtogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag
khrig phrag drug cu yang mngon par sprul to/ /rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag re re zhing yang bzhugs sa khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to/ /bzhugs sa de dag
re re zhing ba gam bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can brgya phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to/ /ba gam de dag re re la yang khang pa brtsegs
pa bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de dag re re zhing yang khyams bkra
ba| blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to/ /de la gser gyi khyams rnams kyi gdung phyam ni/ dngul/ gral
bu dang sgo 'phar ni/ bai DUR+Ya/ them pa dang kha khyer ni/ shel/ ka ba ni/ spug /ka zhu ni/ mu tig dmar po/ /sa gzhi ni/ rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go /dngul
gyi khyams rnams kyi gdung phyam ni/ gser/ gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni/ bai DUR+Ya/ them pa dang kha khyer ni/ shel/ ka ba ni/ spug /ka zhun/
mu tig dmar po/ sa gzhi ni/ rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go /bai DUR+Ya'i khyams rnams kyi gdung phyam ni/ shel/ gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni/ gser/ them pa dang
'khyer ni/ dngul/ ka ba ni/ spug /ka zhu ni/ mu tig dmar po/ sa gzhi ni/ rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go /shel gyi khyams rnams kyi gdung phyam ni/ bai DUR+Ya/
gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni/ spug/ them pa dang kha khyer ni/ rdo'i snying po/ ka ba ni/ gser/ ka zhu ni/ dngul/ sa gzhi ni/ mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin can sha stag
go /spug gi khyams rnams kyi gdung phyam ni/ rdo'i snying po/ gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni/ mu tig dmar po/ them pa dang kha khyer ni/ gser/ ka pa ni/ dngul/ ka zhu
ni| shel/ sa gzhi ni/ bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin can sha stag go /mu tig dmar po'i khyams rnams kyi gdung phyam ni/ spug /gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni/ rdo'i snying po/
them pa dang kha khyer ni/ dngul/ ka ba ni/ gser/ ka zhu ni/ bai DUR+Ya/ sa gzhi ni/ ke ke ru'i rang bzhin can sha stag go /rdo'i snying po'i khyams rnams kyi gdung
phyam ni| mu tig dmar po/ gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni/ gser/ them pa dang kha khyer ni/ dngul/ ka ba ni/ bai DUR+Ya/ ka zhu ni/ ke ke ru/ sa gzhi ni/ shel gyi rang bzhin
can sha stag go /khyams de dag tu yang seng+ge'i khri rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can/ lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi gos sna tshogs bting ba/ ka tsa linada'i steng g.yogs can/
mtha' gnyis su rten ma bzang po bkod pa khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to/ /seng+ge'i khri de dag gi rkang rten rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can dag la
ras bcos bu sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ shing bal las byas pa shin tu phra ba dang / srin bal las byas pa shin tu phra ba dang / zar ma'i shun pa las byas pa shin tu phra ba
dang | shun phrags las byas pa shin tu phra ba dang / ka shi ka las byas pa shin tu phra ba bye ba phrag drug cu drug cu bting bar gyur to/ /seng+ge'i khri de dag gi re re'i ngos
gnyis su yang lha ma yin gyi bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i bsil yab thogs pa gnyis gnyis mngon par sprul te/ seng+ge'i khri
de dag la lha ma yin gyi bu mo gzhon nu 'khod pa dag la g.yob bo/ /khyams de dag re re zhing yang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gdugs khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug
cu mngon par sprul to/ /khyams de dag re re zhing yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul
to| |de la gser gyi khyams rnams su ni/ rgyal mtshan sngon po la yu ba ser po shel gyis spras pa dag btsugs/ dngul gyi khyams rnams su ni/ rgyal mtshan ser po yu
ba dmar po gser gyis spras pa dag btsugs/ bai DUR+Ya'i khyams rnams su ni/ rgyal mtshan dmar po yu ba ser po shel gyis spras pa dag btsugs/ shel gyi khyams
rnams su ni/ rgyal mtshan dkar po yu ba bai DUR+Ya gser gyis spras pa dag btsugs/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi khyams rnams su ni/ rgyal mtshan khra bo gser gyi yu ba
bai DUR+Yas spras pa dag btsugs so/ /de la rgyal mtshan sngon po rnams ni/ tog ser po/ /rgyal mtshan ser po rnams ni/ tog sngon po/ rgyal mtshan dmar po rnams ni/ tog
dkar po/ rgyal mtshan dkar po rnams ni/ tog dmar po/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan rnams ni/ tog rin po che sna bdun pa sha stag go /rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de
dag bar snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed par gyur to/ /de 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po
ches srung gi bu ni/ bar snang gi nam mkha' las 'gro zhing sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal yongs 'dus rtol du nye bar 'jog /de bzhin du pho brang gi rdal de
dag kyang bar snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed do/ /rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag dang / bag ma de dag dang / bzhugs sa
de dag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang / khyams de dag dang / seng+ge'i khri de dag dang / gdugs de dag dang / rgyal mtshan de dag dang / ba dan de dag las
lha'i tsan+dan dang / ut+pal dang / a ga ru'i phye ma'i char bab par gyur to/ /me tog man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu Sha ka dang / many+dzu Sha ka chen po dang / pa ru
Sha ka dang / ba ru Sha ka ra chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / skya snar dang / skya snar chen po dang / skya snar khra bo dang / skya snar bkra chen gyi char
yang mngon par bab par gyur to/ /gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rin po che thams cad
kyi me tog dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu'i char yang mngon par bab par gyur to/ /yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re de dag gi mthus lha
ma yin gyi bu de dag rin po che gang dang gang gi char dbab par 'dod pa de dang de dag las mngon par bab par gyur to/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i
gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas khor yug tu ni dpag tshad drug khri 'phang du yang dpag tshad drug khrir lha ma yin gyi mchod pa de lta bus rgyas par gang bar gyur to/ /rin po
che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur to/ /ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer
chen po yang mi 'greng bdun tsam du me tog man+dA ra bas rgyas par gang bar gyur to/ /spos chus kyang rdzab tu gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams kyang spos chu'i rdzab kyi dri des khyab par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can gang dag gis spos chu'i rdzab
kyi dri de tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed pa dag ni/ smos
kyang mi dgos so/ /de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzang ris rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la tsan+dan gyi phye
mas mngon par gtor te tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ byang chub dam pa don du gnyer slad du/ /skyabs kyi dam pa rab tu mi sgul ba/ /lhar bcas 'jig
rten mi 'jigs stsol ba po/ /khyod la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi/ /gang la dga' ba'i yid kyis skyabs song na/ /log ltung dag tu ltung bar mi 'gyur ba/ /de la bdag ni
skyabs su nye bar mchi/ /dpe med byang chub 'tshal ba'i slad du'o/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag ni bshig bcom zhing / /mya ngan las brgal nyon mongs dag gyur la/ /'dren pa
gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa/ /khyod la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi/ /rga dang 'chi bas nyen par gyur pa yi/ /lha dang mi rnams 'dren pa bcom ldan 'das/ /gang la skyabs
song phyis kyang mi skye ba/ /khyod la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi/ /de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzang ris kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe rta'i
rgyan de dag dang / shing rta'i rgyan de dag dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyan de dag dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyan de dag dang / bla re dang dril bu g.yer
ga'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod pas sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan na dga' ba 'di lta bu dag byung bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rol mo sil snyan yan lag brgyad
pa mkhas pas sgra phyung ba bzhin no/ /de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzang ris kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i
tshe steng gi bar snang las lha'i tsan+dan dang / ut+pa la dang / a ga ru dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma'i char mngon par bab par gyur to/ /lha ma yin gyi spos kyi phye ma rnam
pa sna tshogs du ma'i char mngon par bab par gyur to/ /lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu Sha ka dang / many+dzu Sha ka chen po dang / pa ru Sha ka
dang / pa ru Sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / skya snar dang / skya snar chen po dang / skya snar khra bo dang / sna skyar bkra chen gyi me tog rnams
dang / sprul pa'i me tog sna tshogs kyi char mngon par bab bo/ /steng gi bar snang las gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang /
mu tig dmar po dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi char yang mngon par bab bo/ /lha dang lha ma yin gyi spos chu'i char yang mngon par bab bo/ /spos chu'i char de babs
pas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas 'khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad spos chus rdzab tu gyur to/ /spos chu'i rdzab kyi dri des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen
po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur to/ /sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzang ris kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe bar snang las
lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi sil snyan gyi sgra dag byung ngo / /sil snyan de dag gi sgras kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su grag par gyur to/ /theg pa chen po
la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can gang dag gis sgra thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur
to| |de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzang ris kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgya stong dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod
pa bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzang ris kyi 'khor bya ba'i phyir la la ni/ glu len/ la la ni/ sil snyan byed/ la la ni/ gar byed/ la la ni/ lus kyi
tshul bsgyur/ la la ni/ tsan+dan dang / ut+pa la dang / a ga ru dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma 'thor/ /la la ni/ lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu Sha ka
dang / many+dzu Sha ka chen po dang / pa ru Sha ka dang / pa ru Sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / skya snar dang / skya
snar chen po dang / skya snar khra bo dang / skya snar bkra chen dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams dang / gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying
po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog rnams 'thor zhing bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro/ /la la ni/ na bza' dang / rkang gdub dang /
sku rags dang / phyag gi rgyan dang / sor gdub dang / gdu bu dang / gdu bu tham pa dang / dbu rgyan rtse gsum pa dang / dpung rgyan dang / cod pan dang / gser
skud dang / mu tig gi do shal dang / nor bu'i do shal dang / se mo do dang / gya do dang / mgul rgyan sna tshogs dang / rna cha dang / rna cha gdub kor dang / tshong tshong
gshibs pa dang / mgo rgyan dang / phreng ba'i lda ldi dang / spos kyi lda ldi dang / nor bu'i lda ldi dag 'thor zhing / me tog gi bla re dang / spos kyi bla re dang / nor bu'i bla re
dag thogs so/ /la la ni/ spos chu'i char 'bebs so/ /la la ni/ phye ma'i char 'bebs so/ /la la ni/ mu tig dmar pos snyim pa bkang ste bcom ldan 'das la mngon
par 'thor ro/ /la la ni/ rin po ches snyim pa bkang / la la ni/ gser gyis snyim pa bkang ste bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras
so| |gang brten gang la gnas bcas nas/ /gang zag mchog la mchod 'gyur pa/ /de 'dra ba yi grogs po dang / /rtag par rgyun du phrad par shog /lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag
bzang ris kyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te bcom ldan
'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ stobs bcu brtson bden khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /me
'jigs 'jigs bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la ma 'dres nges par gyur pa po/ /'gro ba'i 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun sbyor 'ching ba gcod la phyag
'tshal lo/ /'khor brgyud mi gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mthar phyin thang gnas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba bying ba sgrol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can 'grogs
kyang rgod pa mi mnga' zhing / /'gro ba kun la thugs ni rnam grol te/ /pad+ma chu yis mi gos 'dra ba po/ /blo zab bsam mi khyab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thub pa khyod kyis
stong nyid mkhyen/ /rnam pa kun tu mtshan ma thams cad bshig /khyod ni gang du 'ang smon pa yong mi mnga'/ /mi gnas nam mkha' mnyam
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po shing rta bzang gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas
nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing gser phye dag gis gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan
'das la mngon par bstod pa/ sa dang bar snang dang ni lha yul na'ang / /bde gshegs khyod mnyam ma mchis lhag ma mchis/ /mtshan mar bzung nas phyin ci log zhugs
pa'i| |'gro ba smig rgyu 'dra bar khyod kyis mkhyen/ /'di ni byed pa tshor ba sems can med/ /gang zag med cing bdag gir bya ba med/ /chos kun stong zhing byed pa kun
la dben/ /rang bzhin med cing g.yo med zhi zhes bstan/ /su zhig bde gshegs bstan pa 'dir mos te/ /chos kun byas pa med pa'i rjes 'brang ba/ /de 'dir 'dren
pa'i sras su gyur pa ste/ /ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin yab ltar spyod/ /rnam 'dren khyod la bdag bstod bsod nams gang skyes te/ /ji ltar rgyal ba mkhyen pa yis ni mkhyen
gyur pa| |dge ba'i rtsa ba de kun ma lus mtha' dag 'dir/ /'gro la rtsal gyis thams cad sangs rgyas 'grub par shog// //bam po gsum pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po shing rta bzang
gis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs ldan gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon nas bcom ldan 'das la
lan gsum bskor ba byed cing dngul gyi me tog rnams kyis gtor te tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chu las pha
rol rnam brgal ba/ /brgal nas skye bo rgyun gyis rjes 'gro sgrol mdzad cing / /bde gshegs pha rol thang bde 'jigs pa med 'jog pa/ /spyan mdzes bde bar gshegs pa
khyod kyi zhabs la gtugs/ /blo mchog khyod kyis 'gro ba thams cad kun tu mkhyen/ /phyin ci log lta thibs por rab zhen blo ldan te/ /'khrul pa smig rgyu lta bur ma shes gyur
rnams la/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i thugs rje bskyed nas rtogs par mdzad/ /mi mchog khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu 'dra zhing mig yor mtshungs
zhes rab tu bstan/ /thub pa dam pa khyod kyis chos kyi sras mchog bskyed/ /srid pa gsum po dag na mi chags spyad pa spyod/ /dngos po log pa'i don gyur rang bzhin bral ba
dang / /gzhan gyi dngos pos stong par mi dbang khyod kyis mkhyen/ /byis pa rmongs pa'i blo gros rmi lam dga' lta bur/ /mi dbang khyod kyi
sras kyis 'tshal nas spyad pa spyod/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs ldan gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la
mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing me tog skya snar khra bo rnams kyis gtor te tshigs su
bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ mi mchog khyod kyi sku yis ni/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten zil gyis mnan/ /ri rab kyis ni yungs 'bru dang / /rgya
mtshos ba rjes chu bzhin no/ /gzugs mdzes mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan/ /gzugs kyis gzugs kyi dam pa dang / /gzugs rnams thams cad zil gyis mnan/ /dper na
nyi mas me khyer bzhin/ /gzi brjid phung po gzi brjid kyis/ /sems can zil ldan zil gyis mnan/ /zil mnan de dag lam me min/ /nyi mas me khyer zil brlags
bzhin| |ye shes rgya mtsho ye shes kyis/ /'jig rten gsum kun zil gyis mnan/ /zil mnan de dag lam me min/ /nyi mas zla 'od zil brlags bzhin/ /lha ma yin gyi
dbang po sgra gcan gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te bcom
ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing me tog skya snar khra bos mngon par gtor te tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ /'dren pa'i
blo gros zhi ba po/ /zhi gnas dgyes pas 'gro ba yi/ /'dod sdang gti mug rdul zhi mdzad/ /char pas rdul rnams zhi bgyid bzhin/ /'bar zhing chos tshul 'bar bar mdzad/ /
blags sbyin gyis ni me bzhin no/ /nags btang nags mes shing bsregs ltar/ /de bzhin nyon mongs dra ba bsregs/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig ni/ /dpag tu med par dge
rtsa 'dzin/ /nyon mongs thams cad 'joms mdzad de/ /bdud rtsis lus byugs dug bzhin no/ /mun pa mun nag sel mdzad de/ /mun khung sgron ma 'bar ba bzhin/ /chos
kyi tshul yang ston mdzad de/ /nor mkhan rin chen yon tan bzhin/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog gis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po g.yul la mngon
par dga' bas kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing rin po che'i me tog
rnams kyis gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ gdul dka' mi bzad sems ni khyod kyis
brtul| |g.yul las dpa' bas g.yul ngor dpa' bo bzhin/ /shin tu tshar bcad rang gi dbang du mdzad/ /thugs dul mi bsnyengs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyis dbang po
thul cing dgra yang bcom/ /gang du'ang mi bsnyengs mi bskyod bde ba brnyes/ /khyod ni nyon mongs rnams kyis yang mi 'khrugs/ /rnam pa kun tu dug ni ma lus bcom/ /
mthu chen khyod kyis byams pa legs bsgoms te/ /khyod kyi thugs ni dgra dang byams la mnyam/ /thub pa khyod kyis sems can blo gros bshig /'gro ba kun tu khyod
ni bzhud mi mnga'/ /shes rab rnam grol srid pa'i sred pa bskams/ /shes rab rnam dag khyod kyi thugs kyang dag /chos rnams kun la thugs ni chags mi mnga'/ /
thams cad zil mnan thub mchog khyod 'dra med/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po g.yul la mngon par dga' bas ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po mig bzang gis
kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing bcom ldan 'das la gter chen po
yang phul nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis ni/ /chos rnams yang dag mtshan nyid mkhyen/ /gang 'di
chos zhes brjod pa yang / /de ni brdar btags tshig tu zad/ /chos rnams chos kyi ngo bo yis/ /rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs so/ /gang 'di chos zhes brjod pa yang / /de ni
ming tsam zad ces gsungs/ /ming ni ming gis dben pa ste/ /mtshan nyid kyang ni de bzhin no/ /chos rnams mtshan nyid med pa ste/ /ming yang med ces khyod kyis bshad/ /
rab tu bshad ces bgyi ba yang / /bshad pa ci yang ma mchis te/ /gang gis kyang ni ma bshad cing / /su la'ang bshad pa ma mchis so/ /khyod kyi sras po mi mchog rnams/ /
chos rnams de ltar 'tshal nas ni/ /chos rnams la yang mi chags par/ /rnam par spyad do thub pa che/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po mig bzang gis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma
yin gyi dbang po 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon pas kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
bskor ba byed cing bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal yang phul nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ dgra zla ma mchis
khyod la bdag bstod do/ /tshul khrims dang ni gzugs dang ye shes stobs/ /des ni 'jig rten gsum na mtshungs ma mchis/ /de phyir
khyod ni dgra thul mtshungs ma mchis/ /khyod kyi gzugs ni chos kyis bskyed pas na/ /gzugs kyi stobs kyis khams gsum zil gyis mnan/ /sbyin pa'i stobs kyis
mtshan ni phun sum tshogs/ /dpe byad phun sum tshogs shing gzugs kyang dag /tshul khrims stobs kyis khyod ni mi bskyod de/ /skye bo mkhas pas so sor bsam mi lad//
khyod ni tshul khrims ldan zhing thugs kyang dag /mi yi seng+ge mdzad pa thams cad 'byor/ /shes rab stobs kyis khyod mtshungs 'ga' ma mchis/ /des na mi bsnyengs 'jig
rten gsum btul nas/ /'khor du seng+ge lta bur sgra bsgrags te/ /rtog ge tshogs kyi blo gros zil gyis mnan/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon
gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnam par snang byed kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te bcom
ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing rin po ches snyim pa bkang ste gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /thub pa chen
po skye bo tshogs pa 'di/ /dang ba'i yid kyis khyod kyi zhal du blta/ /kun gyis rgyal ba mdun na bzhugs par mthong / /de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis gsung gcig brjod pa la/ /skye bo bsam pa ji bzhin so sor 'tshal/ /thub pa khyod kyi gsung de de ltar 'byung / /de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis gsung gcig brjod pa la/ /'khor gyi tha dad gsung du rnam 'tshal zhing / /'gro bas rang don ji lta bzhin du'ang 'tshal/ /de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres
mtshan| |gsung gcig rab tu brjod pa mdzad pas ni/ /gcig la 'jog gi gzhan ni dgag par mdzad/ /'dren pa su dag ma bslab rtogs par mdzad/ /de ni rgyal ba'i sangs
rgyas ma 'dres mtshan/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnam par snang byed kyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po btang bzung gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas
nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing mu tig dmar pos snyim pa bkang ste gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis
bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ rgyags dang nga rgyal sdig pa'i lta ba spyod pa gang / /yid dga' rab tu dang bas mi dbang bde gshegs kyi/ /blo la mngon par
dga' ba de dag bag mchis te/ /mtshungs med bsnyen bkur bgyid pa de dag ston pa'i sras/ /chos rnams 'di dag ngo bo nyid kyis ma mchis te/ /
rmi lam dga' ba thams cad tshad ma ma lags 'dra/ /rmi lam dga' spyod ma mchis kyang ni 'du shes mchis/ /de ltar rgyal bas chos rnams thams cad rab tu gzigs/ /
ston ka'i sprin dang mtshungs shing chu yi zla ba 'dra/ /byis pa'i blo ldan rnams kyi yid ni rmongs par bgyid/ /gang dag rtag tu bag mchis bde gshegs blo mnga' ba/ /mkhas
pa'i skye bo dag la 'di ni rmongs mi bgyid/ /rgyal ba khyod kyis bstan la rtag tu bag mchis gang / /mi mchog dam pa de dag mi dal yong mi mchi/ /chos rnams thams
cad rmi lam 'dra bar rnam brtags nas/ /yang dag mthong ba de dag ting 'dzin thob par 'gyur/ /de nas thag bzang ris la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po bye ba phrag drug
cu po de dag gis mchod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu byas nas byang chub tu gzhol ba'i sems kyis tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang / yid bde
ba skyes te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha ma yin gyi dbang
po'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs/ lha ma yin de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa yang thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos
nyid de| gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang /
dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten snang bas rgyas par bkang ste phyir logs nas
bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa cig la gzar
nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don tshigs su bcad
de zhus pa/ 'jig rten phan bzhed rgyu zhig ma mchis par/ /mi yi seng+ge 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ /drang srong chen po ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad/ /skyes bu mchog gis 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang
gsungs/ /lha min mchod pa rgya chen gzigs gyur nas/ /'jig rten phan bzhed khyod ni 'dzum mdzad na/ /lha mi rnams la lung bstan bka' stsal gsol/ /de thos bdag cag rnams
ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /de ring su yis dogs med rgya chen sems/ /'khor 'dir yang dag bskyed par gyur cig gu/ /de bzhin gshegs pas
gang gi bsam mkhyen nas/ /mi yi seng+ge 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur/ /de ring yongs su dag pa'i yid kyis su/ /mi yi mchog la dad pa gang gis bskyed/ /de bzhin gshegs
pas gang gi bsam mkhyen te/ /yid du 'ong ba'i 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur/ /bde gshegs zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas/ /'di ltar bde gshegs 'dzum pa mdzad pa
'di| |su yis dpung bcas bdud ni deng bcom zhes/ /'khor 'di de ring the tshom 'tshal bar gyur/ /drang srong chen po rgyal ba dgra las rgyal/ /the tshom 'tshal ba'i som nyi
gcad du gsol/ /mi mchog khyod kyis de ring 'gro ba yi/ /the tshom myur te legs par gcad du gsol/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis zhu ba zhus pa'i lan bcom ldan
'das kyis tshigs su bcad de tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris/ /'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa ngas byas pa/ /de yi
'bras bu ma lus bstan par bya/ /bstan pa de ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir/ /lha min rnams kyis nga mchod 'di byas te/ /de dag sems
ni ci la'ang chags med pas/ /nam mkha'i ngos la lag mthil chags med bzhin/ /lha min tshogs kyis dad pa'i yid byas te/ /de dag nga la mchod pa 'di byas pas/ /blo can de
dag lha min ris bor te/ /mtho ris dong nas yun ring dga' bar 'gyur/ /de dag phyi dus rgyal ba mi'i seng+ge/ /gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba snyed/ /bsnyen bkur byas nas yid 'ong
bskal pa la/ /de dag thams cad mtshan mthun rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de tshe bde gshegs khrag khrig drug cu rnams/ /'jig rten sgron ma phyogs su grags pa ste/ /de dag mi gnas
chos ni ston mdzad cing / /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'grel par 'gyur/ /'jig rten mkhas pa de dag rnams kyi zhing / /shin tu yangs shing snyigs ma med par 'gyur//
de tshe khrag khrig drug cur tshang ba yi/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis stong gsum sbyong bar 'gyur/ /de dag ngan song thams cad sel bar mdzad/ /de dag zhing der dga' bar spyod par
'gyur| |brtan pa de dag mi khom thams cad sbyong / /bla na med pa'i theg pa ston par 'gyur/ /de dag tshe yi tshad du gyur pa ni/ /bskal pa khrag khrig drug cu tshang bar yang / /rnam
par 'dren pa de dag 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /chags pa med pa'i chos kyang ston par mdzad/ /thub pa de dag mya ngan 'das gyur te/ /'jig rten mkhas pa rab tu zhi gyur nas/ /bskal
pa khrag khrig drug cu tshang bar ni/ /rang byung rnams kyi dam chos gnas par 'gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pa de dag 'gro ba'i tshogs/ /
gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi skye bo 'dul/ /dgra las rgyal ba'i rgyal bar mtshan mthun 'gyur/ /zhing dang tshad dang chos gnas 'gyur pa'ang mthun/ /bde gshegs de dag khrag
khrig drug cu yi/ /skyes pa bud med yongs su smin mdzad de/ /bla na med pa'i theg pas 'doms par 'gyur/ /mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba'i gdung yang 'dzin/ /rgyal bas
lha min de dag lung bstan pa/ /'jig rten phan phyir drang srong chen pos gsungs/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten de thos nas/ /yid rangs gyur cing stobs kyang skyes par
gyur| |lha ma yin lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bzhi pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos lha ma yin gyi mchod pa rnam pa de lta bu de mthong nas
ngo mtshar du gyur te/ 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu zhig mngon par 'du mdzad na/ 'di lta
bu'i rnam par smin pa grub snyam nas de'i tshe sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag pas bskal pa grangs med pa yang rjes su dran zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyis srid pa'i
rgyud de dang der 'chi 'pho dang skye ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang
dag par bsgrubs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis phyir mi ldog pa brnyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad rjes su dran par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par
bzhag go /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag nyid chen po rjes su dran par gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag nyid chen po de lta bu mdzad na/ de'i thugs bskyed pa gcig la yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa
de dag thams cad mi'i lus thob par gyur te/ lha ma yin gyi mchod pa ji snyed pa de snyed du sems can re res bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du mchod pa byas kyang de dag gi thugs
bskyed pa gcig la yang lan lon par mi nus so/ /snyam mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ ngo mtshar dang dad pa thob par gyur nas de'i tshe
bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod pa/ thub pa byang chub gzhol ba yi/ /thugs bskyed pa ni re re la'ang / /lha ma yin gyi mchod pa 'dis/ /cha tsam mi spyod
mi'i seng+ge/ /de lta'i yon tan mthar phyin te/ /lha dang mi yis mchod gyur pa/ /tsan+dan phur ma ri rab tsam/ /mi mchog khyod la mchod par 'os/ /
mi yi seng+ge khyod la ni/ /gang+gA'i bye ma ches mang ba'i/ /rgya mtsho rab tu bkang ba yi/ /spos chu dag gis mchod par 'os/ /yon tan chen po mnga' ba la/ /gang+gA'i bye ma ches mang
ba'i| |me tog tshogs ni ri bo mchog /khor yug chen po mnyam mchod 'os/ /rgyal ba sgron ma rang byung ba/ /mar me'i snying po ri rab tsam/ /'bru mar rgya mtsho'i chu snyed kyi/ /mar
me rnams kyis mchod par 'os/ /mthu chen mnga' ba de lta bur/ /yon tan pha rol phyin gyur pa/ /gang+gA'i bye ma ches mang ba'i/ /me tog mchod rten mchod par 'os/ /mi dbang
mchod pas thugs brtse ba/ /rin chen gdugs ni che rnams kyis/ /bskal pa khrag khrig rnams su yang / /sems can mchog la mchod par 'os/ /yon tan mtha' yas
mnga' ba khyod/ /rin po che yi rgyal mtshan gyis/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bkang ste/ /bskal pa bsam yas mchod par 'os/ /mi yi seng+ge khyod la ni/ /bskal pa
khrag khrig dpag med par/ /gang+gA'i phye ma ches mang ba'i/ /ba dan rnams kyis mchod par 'os/ /drang srong chen po smra ba'i stag /lha rnams dang ni mi dag dang / /gzhan yang
sems can gang tshogs pa/ /brtag bzung dpe la gsan du gsol/ /gal te gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams kyi/ /sems can thams cad sangs rgyas
su| |mi mchog stobs bcu'i stobs ldan la/ /de dag re re'i mgo bo yang / /gang+gA'i bye ma snyed gyur te/ /mgo bo de dag re re zhing / /de snyed kha dang ldan gyur la/ /kha rnams de dag re
re zhing / /lce dang kha yi grangs mnyam la/ /gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi/ /bskal par bstod pa bgyis kyang ni/ /rgyal ba de dag spobs mi bas/ /khyod kyi yon tan mthar mi phyin/ /
rgyal ba de lta'i yon tan gyi/ /pha rol tu ni phyin par gyur/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ /dge slong dag/ legs so/ /legs so/ /nga'i
nyan thos rnams ni/ drang por gyur pa/ ye shes dang ldan par gyur pa/ chos su gyur pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ tshad mar gyur pa sha stag gnas te/ de dag ni/ nga'i yon tan
gyi tshogs la 'jug par sha stag go /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa ste/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang
ldan pa'o/ /dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon
tan gyi tshogs ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams gzugs can zhig yin na ni/ sems
bskyed pa re re'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du shong bar mi 'gyur te/ sems bskyed pa re re'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyang de bzhin
gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gang 'di grangs kyis tshad gzung bar brjod kyang brjod par mi nus/ bsam yang bsam par mi
nus so| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe sems bskyed pa gang yang sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa sems can
gang ji snyed cig yod pa'i sems can de dag thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du ma bskyed pa gcig kyang med de/ sems can gyi khams ni/ tshad med pas sems
can gyi khams ji snyed pa de snyed kyi bsod nams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re las 'byung ngo / /sems can gyi khams ni/ mi zad pa ste/ sems can gyi
khams ji ltar mi zad pa de ltar mi zad pa'i bsod nams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re las 'byung ngo / /sems de ni/ sems can thams cad la phan
pa'i don du skyes pas/ sems can thams cad kyis mchod kyang lan lon par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i mchod pa ni/ zang zing dang bcas pa yin la/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du 'byung ba ni/ sems can 'khor ba la gzhol ba 'di dag mya ngan las 'das pa
la ji ltar gzhol bar 'gyur zhes te/ zang zing med pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe sems can rnams kyi don du zang
zing med pa'i sems dpag tu med pa bskyed par gyur to/ /dge slong dag/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i 'dus bskal pa dpag tu med pa/ bgrang du med pa/ bsam gyis mi
khyab pa| mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa
dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das dbang po'i tog ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog des sems bskyed pa re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig
rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams la phan par dgongs par gyur te/ don kyang mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi sangs
rgyas kyi zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu gyur te yongs su dag cing ngan song dang / mi khom pa thams cad yongs
su chad pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na log par nges pa'i sems can gyi skye bo yod med par gyur to/ /lta ba'i rnam pa yod med
par gyur to/ /mngon pa'i rgyal can yod med par gyur to/ /lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su ma dag pa dang ldan pa'i sems can yod med par
gyur to/ /ngan song gi rgyur 'gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / las 'byung ba yod med par gyur to/ /der ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa des yun ring po nas sems
can rnams dge ba'i chos rnams la btsud cing gdams te/ rjes su bstan cing bslab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas dbang po'i tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyang bde ba lnga thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar la la ni/ 'dod pa'i bde ba dang ldan par
gyur to| |la la ni/ khyim nas 'byung ba'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /la la ni/ bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /la la ni/ snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dang ldan par
gyur to| |la la ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/ /de dag bde ba de la yang spyod la/ bde ba de dag la yang mngon par zhen pa med
par gyur te/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ bung ba me tog gi khu bas nye bar 'tsho yang de la mngon par zhen pa med do/ /de bzhin du sems can de dag kyang bde ba de la yongs su spyod
kyang de la mngon par zhen pa med do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ bar snang la yang rgyu ba'i bya ni/ bar snang la yang rgyu la/ de la mngon par chags pa yang med do/ /de bzhin du sems
can de dag kyang bde ba de la yongs su spyod kyang de la mngon par zhen par med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na 'khod pa'i sems can
rnams la yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba'i mi dga' ba med/ rmongs par 'gyur ba med de/ gzhan du na yid bde bar 'gyur ba'i dga' ba sha stag la yongs su spyad de/ de ni/
'di ltar sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta bu bskyed pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i
spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe mi dge ba las yongs su bzlog ste dge ba'i rtsa ba la btsud pas de dag la las gang gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar
'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa dbang med par 'byung ba mi dge ba'i las de lta bu yod med de/ de ma bsags pa'i phyir sdug bsngal tshor bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa mi
'byung ngo / /de dag gis rmongs pa'i sems tsam gyis kyang las gang gis rmongs pa rnams la sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung bar 'gyur
ba de lta bu mngon par 'du ma byas te/ de ma bsags pa'i phyir rmongs par 'gyur ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa de mi 'byung ngo / /de bzhin
gshegs pa dbang pa dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rgyu gang gis sems can de dag dus gyur pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung bas nyams su mi bde ba'i nyi ma
mi 'char ro/ /rlung nyams su mi bde ba mi ldang ngo / /char nyams su mi bde ba mi 'bab bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod
pa'i tshe sems can de dag la lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las thams cad shes pa sngon du 'gro zhing shes pa'i rjes su 'brel ba bstan cing bshad pas sems can de
dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' de las bstan pa de thos nas lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las thams cad shes pa mngon du 'gro zhing shes pa'i rjes su 'brang
bar yongs su bsgrubs pas las de'i rnam par smin pas de dag la rmongs par 'gyur ba'am/ yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ba med do/ /rmongs pa rnams la rgyu gang gis
bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung ba med do/ /de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can de dag la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba med cing bde
ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i sems can de bzhin gshegs pa des gdams pa de dag ni/ chos la
rim gro bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas par gyur to/ /de dag 'chag na yang chos nyid la sems shing chos la mos pas zhen pas yid kyis 'chag ste/ chos la mos
shing zhen pa'i yid kyis 'chag pa de dag la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'byung ngo / /de bzhin du 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / sad pa dang / spyod
lam thams cad du yang sdug bsngal mi 'byung ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can de dag la yang ba ma spangs pa med de/ de'i phyir yang ba ma spangs pa'i sdug bsngal
gyi tshor ba mi 'byung ngo / /yang dag pa'i spang pa yod pas de dag la skyo ba med de/ de'i phyir de dag la yang dag par spang bar bya ba'i sdug
bsngal yang med do/ /sems can de dag la 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal yang med de/ de ni/ 'di ltar sems can de dag chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med
pa'i phyir ro/ /de dag la mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal yang med de/ de ni/ 'di ltar sems can de dag sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems
nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /de dag la sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal yang med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa
med pa'i phyir ro/ /sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal ni/ sdug pa las 'byung ste/ de'i phyir de la sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal yang med do/ /sems can
de dag la sdug bsngal ba'i sdug bsngal yang mi 'byung ngo / /'di ltar de na sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhan du na 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gcig
pu yod de/ 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa'i sdug bsngal nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de ni/ don dam pa'i chos ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po tog de
bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bzhugs pa'i tshe des gsungs pa la phyir smra ba'i sems can gang yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ma byung ste/ de ni/ 'di ltar sngon sems
can de dag legs par yongs su smin par byas pa'i phyir ro/ /dge slong dag /de la ji snyam du sems/ dge ba'i rtsa ba zhan pa dang / dma' ba dang / zhum pa dang /
chung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bsgrubs pa dang / sdug bsngal dang 'dres pa dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bzung ba
dang / nyes par brtsams pa dang / nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas sems can de snyed cig gi don bya ba'am/ de dag la phan par bsam pa'am/ bde ba sgrub
pa'am| sdug bsngal bsal ba'am/ de ltar tha gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'am/ sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus sam/ gsol
pa| bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de la ji snyam du sems/ sems zhen pa dang / sems dma' ba nas nyes par
bsgrubs pa'i bar gyi sems kyis sems can de snyed cig gi don bya ba'am/ de dag la phan par bsam pa'am/ bde ba sgrub pa'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba'am/ de
ltar tha gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'am/ sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus sam/ gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de la ji snyam du sems/ dad pa zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dad pa'i bar dang / tshul
khrims zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i tshul khrims kyi bar dang / thos pa zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i thos pa'i bar dang / brtson 'grus zhan pa nas nyes par
bsgrubs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi bar dang / dran pa zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dran pa'i bar dang / ting nge 'dzin zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i ting nge 'dzin
gyi bar dang / shes rab zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyi bar gyis sems can de snyed cig gi don bya ba'am/ de dag la phan par bsam pa'am/ bde
bsgrub pa'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba'am/ de ltar tha gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'am/ sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus
sam| gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /legs so/ /legs so/ /de ni/ dge
ba'i rtsa ba zhan pa dang / sems zhan pa dang / dad pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab zhan
pa dang / dma' ba dang / zhum pa dang / chung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bsgrubs pa dang / sdug bsngal dang 'dres pa dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang /
sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / nyes par bsam pa dang / nyes par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyis sems can de snyed kyi don bya ba'am/ de dag phan par
bsam pa'am/ bde ba sgrub pa'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba'am/ de ltar tha gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'am/ sems can de snyed yongs
su smin par bya bar mi nus so/ /dge slong dag /de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba byung ba de gang zhig yin
snyam| de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong de dag cang mi zer bar 'khod do/ /de'i tshe shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das
pa na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te
'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dus shing 'dug par gyur pa des bcom ldan 'das kyi
dgongs pa sems kyis shes nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar
mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa chos ston gyi/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du bdag kyang mchi'o//
de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to| |'jam dpal/ de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum
pa las brkyang ba'am brkyang pa las bskum pa tsam gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa de nas mi snang bar gyur
te bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan snga 'dir gnas par gyur to/ /des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig
tu 'dug nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du dge slong dag /de la ji snyam du
sems| de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba byung ba de gang zhig yin snyam zhes bka' stsal pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das
nyid ni| de'i tshe de'i dus na dbang po'i tog ces bgyi ba'i de bzhin gshegs par gyur to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba la chog pa mi mnga'/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba la rgyun chad par bgyi ba ma mchis/
sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la dgod pas chog pa mi mnga' ste/ la la zhig yang dag par smra bas yang dag par smra na/ rgyal ba gtso bo/ /rgyal
ba dam pa/ rgyal ba mchog /rgyal ba rab ces brjod pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das nyid lags par yang dag par brjod pas yang dag par brjod do/ /de skad ces smras
nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /dpa' bo rnams ni thabs mkhas te/ /sems can
rnams la thugs brtse zhing / /sems can yongs su smin mdzad phyir/ /dpa' bo chen po rnam par 'phrul/ /bye ba brgyad cur rgyal ba nyid/ /sangs rgyas nyid du bstan
gyur kyang / /da dung chog pa'i 'du shes bsal/ /byang chub mchog tu thugs kyang 'jug /stong gsum drug cu rtsa gcig gi /sangs rgyas zhing rnams dag mdzad
pas| |ji ltar thub pa thabs mkhas pa/ /rgyal ba khyod ni kun gyis 'tshal/ /da dung dang po thugs bskyed par/ /de dang der ni yongs bstan te/ /da dung du yang
'dren pa khyod/ /sangs rgyas mang po ston pa mdzad/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs rnams kyis/ /gang zag mchog ni spyod pa mdzad/ /chos kyi dbyings la chags mi
mnga'| |khyod kyis gang yang mkhyen mdzad de/ /brgya byin tshangs pa'i cha byad dang / /la lar bdud kyi cha byad kyis/ /sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de/ /'jig
rten rnams kyis rtogs mi nus/ /bud med cha byad spyod pa mdzad/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams na'ang gda'/ /'jig rten chos kyis mi gos te/ /pad+ma chus mi
mi chags pa bzhin/ /'dren pa sna tshogs khams can gyi/ /'jig rten 'di yi rjes 'jug mdzad/ /des na skye rgu 'di dag rnams/ /gdugs mtshan khyod kyi yon tan
brjod| |la lar bltams pa yongs su bstan/ /la lar mya ngan 'das pa bstan/ /la la na ni 'khor lo bskor/ /la lar spyad pa spyod pa mdzad/ /sems can 'dul ba'i
don slad du/ /dgyes shing mgur len rol pa mdzad/ /bshums mo dag kyang 'byin par mdzad/ /sems can sus kyang yod ma 'tshal/ /'dod chags mi mnga' chags
pa'i tshul/ /'jigs pa mi mnga' 'jigs pa ltar/ /sems can rnam par 'dul don du/ /'dren pa rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad/ /rmongs med rmongs pa'i tshul bstan te//
byis pa ma lags byis tshul gyis/ /sems can rnam par gdul don du/ /'dren pa rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad/ /smyos pa ma lags smyos pa'i tshul/ /zha ba ma lags
zha ba ltar/ /rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis/ /sems can rnams ni 'dul ba mdzad/ /de ltar bsam yas mgon po khyod/ /dam pa'i chos kyang bsam mi khyab/ /
dpa' chen khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /sems can thub chen 'drar gyur cig /sngon byung ba 'od srung chen pos zhus pa'i le'u ste/ lnga pa'o// //de nas
bya'i rgyal po 'dab bzang brgyad khri drug stong gis lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas
bcom ldan 'das la gzhal du med pa'i dad pa skyes te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i don du rin po
che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa shin tu bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong mngon par sprul to/ /lha'i rin po che sna bdun ni/ 'di lta ste/ gser
dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po dang bdun no/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de dag kyang rin po che
sna bzhi'i lan kan gyi dra ba ris bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor to/ /rin po che sna bzhi ni/ /'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang /
baiDUR+Ya dang / shel lo/ /gser gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni/ gser/ shar bu rnams ni/ dngul/ dngul gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka
pa dang gdang bu rnams ni/ dngul/ shar bu rnams ni/ gser/ baiDUR+Ya'i lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni/ bai DU R+Ya/ shar bu rnams ni/ shel/
shel gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni/ shel/ shar bu rnams ni/ dngul las byas pa'o/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba
bkra ba| blta na sdug pa rin po bdun gyis kun nas bskor to/ /de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa sha stag ste| 'di ltar gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya
dang | shel dang / spug dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po dang bdun no/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi dra ba bkra ba/ blta na sdug
pa 'di lta ste/ gser gyi dra ba dang / dngul gyi dra ba dang / bai DUR+Ya'i dra ba dang / shel gyi dra ba dang / mu tig dmar po'i dra ba dang / spug gi dra ba dang / rdo'i snying po'i
dra bas kun nas bkab par 'gyur ro/ /gdugs bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong mngon par sprul to/ /de dag kyang 'di ltar gser nas rdo'i snying po'i bar gyi rin
po che sna bdun las bsgrubs pa sha stag go /rgyal mtshan bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul te/ rgyal mtshan de dag kyang gser dang / dngul
dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / rin po che sna bzhi'i rgyu las bsgrubs pa sha stag ste/ rgyal mtshan sngon po rnams ni/ tog ser po can/ rgyal mtshan ser po rnams
ni| tog sngon po can/ rgyal mtshan dmar po ni/ tog dkar po can sha stag sngon por sprul to/ /ba dan kha dog sna tshogs can bkra
ba| blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul bar gyur to/ /bla re bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul bar gyur te/
bla re de dag kyang gser skud kyi bla re dang / dngul skud kyi bla re dang / bai DUR+Ya'i bla re dang / shel gyi bla re dang / mu tig dmar po'i bla re dang / spug gi bla re dang /
rdo'i snying po'i bla re ste/ rin po che sna bdun las bsgrubs pa sha stag go /de nas bya'i rgyal po 'dab bzang de dag gis khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri drug stong po de
dag dang / gdugs brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / rgyal mtshan brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / ba dan brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / bla re brgyad khri
drug stong po de dag bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang / de dag thams cad steng gi bar snang la lding zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas so/ /'di lta
ste| dper na/ glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams mgo la khyer zhing nam mkha' las song ste yongs 'dus rtol du gzhog go /de
bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang / gdugs de dag dang / rgyal mtshan de dag dang / ba dan de dag dang / bla re de dag bar snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing bcom
ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed par gyur to/ /de nas 'dab bzang brgyad khri drug stong po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te bcom ldan 'das la
lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ rga dang
'chi las rnam grol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rga dang 'chi las rnam 'grol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can gzhal yas kha lo sgyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod dang
mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag pa'ang ma mchis so/ /bdag cag rnams kyang sred med bu yi lus ldan zhing / /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan pa dang / dpe byed
bzang po brgyad cus shin tu mdzes byas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnam par 'dren pa khyod 'drar 'gyur bar shog /bdag cag 'dom gang 'od kyi gzi ldan zhing / /mngon 'phags
gzugs kyi dam pas mdzes gyur te/ /spyod lam mchog dang bdag cag ldan gyur cing / /'gro ba rnam spyod mya ngan zlo bar shog /bdag cag tshul khrims ting 'dzin rab ldan
zhing / /shes rab ldan pas mchog tu 'gyur bar shog /da ltar rnam par 'dren pa khyod lta bur/ /skye bo rab 'grel sangs rgyas 'grub par
shog /'dren pa 'jig rten mkhas pa khyod lta bur/ /bdag cag 'dren pa stobs bcu ldan pa dang / /ma 'dres bco brgyad chos kyi mthar phyin cing / /'jig rten mkhas
pa thams cad mkhyen du shog /bdag cag kun kyang 'gro ba dngos med dang / /rmi 'dra sgyu 'dra gnas pa med pa dang / /brag ca nam mkha' 'dra bar ston byed cing / /
ji ltar rnam 'dren khyod ston bzhin du shog /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bya'i rgyal po 'dab bzang de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de
nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgyal ba rnam 'dren gtso bo sangs rgyas rnams/ /rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi
mdzad na/ /'dzum mdzad 'di yi rgyu rkyen gang lags pa/ /'jig rten phan mdzad thugs rje mnga' bas gsungs/ /'dab bzang rnams kyis rgyal ba mchod bgyis te/ /bla
re nam mkha' rgyas par gang bar bstan/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di la ngo mtshar bskyed/ /rkang gnyis dam pas de dag lung bstan gsol/ /'gro ba thams cad thal
mo rab sbyar cing / /dga' ba'i sems dang mgu ba'i sems kyis 'khod/ /mkha' lding 'gro ba cir 'gyur nyan par 'tshal/ /rkang gnyis dam pas de dag lung bstan gsol//
mi mchog khyod la 'khor dag mchi ba ni/ /'gro ba thams cad the tshom med 'gyur zhing / /the tshom med pas 'khor du 'jigs med 'gyur/ /'dis ni sangs rgyas mnyes par
bgyis zhes mchis/ /'khor 'di 'jigs med rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /yongs su sbyangs shing shin tu skyon bsal nas/ /rgyal bas lung bstan de dag mngon dga'
ste| |slob ma mchog la bla mas bstan pa bzhin/ /the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom gcad du gsol/ /rab tu dga' mdzad rjes su smon pa mdzod/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis
'khor 'di 'dus gyur gyi/ /rang byung mkha' lding 'gro ba cir 'gyur gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka'
stsal pa| thams cad zil gnon stobs bcu brtson 'grus bden/ /rgyal ba dbang po thub pa de bzhin gshegs/ /'dren pas yan lag brgyad ldan gsung dbyangs kyis//
'dab bzang 'gro ba rta thul bka' stsal pa/ /rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris/ /'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum gang ngas bstan pa/ /de yi 'bras bu dga' ba'i yid
kyis nyon/ /the tshom sol la rab tu dga' ba skyed/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub zhi tshol zhing / /stobs dang mi 'jigs bzhi po gang rnams kyis/ /
'dren pa 'jigs med 'gyur ba btsal ba'i phyir/ /'dab chags dbang pos nga la mchod legs byas/ /ma 'dres bco brgyad chos ni smra ba yi/ /sred med bu lus
shin tu mkhregs pa dang / /sum cu gnyis mtshan dpe byad bzang po rnams/ /yongs su btsal phyir nga la mchod pa byas/ /rgyal ba'i tshul khrims ting 'dzin btsal
ba dang / /gzhan yang sangs rgyas spyod yul shes rab dang / /phun tshogs zhing dang 'gro ba rnam dgrol ba/ /'di dag kun btsal don du mchod pa byas/ /de dag
nga la dga' bas mchod byas pas/ /dud 'gro'i gnas nas de dag shi 'phos nas/ /lha dang brtul zhugs mthun par de dag 'dong / /'di ni ngan song srid pa'i tha
ma yin| |bskal pa bye ba gang+gA'i bye snyed du/ /de dag lha mi'i nang na gnas gyur cing / /rnam 'dren khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod byas nas/ /de dag dbang po thul
ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de dag zhing du ngan song mi 'byung ste/ /mi khom mi 'byung mtshan dang mi ldan med/ /rgyal ba de dag mtshan ni kun tu mdzes/ /ri rab
rgyal mtshan bskal la rab byung 'gyur/ /lo ni bye ba brgyad cu bzhi bgrangs par/ /'jig rten phan phyir 'dren pa de dag bzhugs/ /'jig rten phan phyir rnam 'dren
mnyam bzhag pas/ /lus can rnams la mnyam pa'i don mdzad 'gyur/ /skyob pa rdul med gyur pa de dag gi /'dus pa nga rgyal spangs pa brgyad cu 'gyur/ /de tshe
skyob pa rdul dang bral rnams kyi/ /shin tu sems dul bye ba brgyad cu 'byung / /'dren pa de dag 'gro ba'i ngal bsal phyir/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar 'gyur/ /mi
dag de ltar 'di rnams nga rgyal che/ /'dab bzang lus su gyur nas stobs po che/ /'di dag sngon tshe 'das pa'i dus shig na/ /drang srong dka' thub drag po'i tshogs chen gyur/ /
stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa drug tshang ba ste/ /dka' thub spyad de rdzu 'phrul phun sum btsal/ /de dag rdzu 'phrul thob nas nga rgyal gyis/ /dga' bas dka' thub drag dang ldan par
gyur| |tshul khrims ma zhig de dag nags 'dabs su/ /tshe zad shi 'phos gyur te lus kyang zhig /nga rgyal des ni mkha' lding mkha' 'gror gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul sems kyis
rdzu 'phrul ldan par skyes/ /tshul khrims dag pas rgyal ba'i bstan la dad/ /nga rgyal gyis ni byang chub sems kyang bskyed/ /nam mkha' lding lung bstan pa'i le'u ste /drug
pa'o|| //bam po bzhi pa/ de nas klu'i bu mo bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug gis lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag dang / nam mkha'
lding gi dbang po de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes te de dag dga' mgu yi rangs nas rab tu dga'
ste| dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur to/ /de dag gis rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs baiDUR+Ya'i dra
ba lda ldir bkye ba/ mu tig dmar po'i dra bas bskor ba/ gser gyi yu ba can/ bai DUR+Ya'i thur ma brgyad stong bkye ba/ rin po che'i chun po dbyangs pa bye ba phrag dgu
bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to/ /rta sngon po/ kha dog sngon po/ /sngon po lta bur ston pa/ 'od sngon po 'byung ba/ rgyan sngon pos brgyan pa/ bai DUR+Ya'i srab kyis bsrabs
pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to/ /nor bu skar mdog gi bla re kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu yod pa/ des 'khor de dag thams cad yog
pa gcig kyang steng gi bar snang la mngon par sprul to/ /de la rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi bkra ba/ mig tu mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug
bres par mngon par sprul to/ /bla re de'i kho ra khor yug tu rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba mngon par sprul te bres so/ /rin po che sna bdun gyi khrung khrung rkang
dag mngon par sprul to/ /klu'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to/ /de nas klu'i bu mo de dag rta sngon po de dag la zhon nas rin po che sna bdun gyi
gdugs steng gi bar snang la bres te nam mkha' las 'dong zhing rol mo'i sgra bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag len cing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
byed la| lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor/ lha'i a ga ru dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / ut+pa la'i phye ma dang / me tog sna tshogs
kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor/ me tog ut+pa la dang / tsam pa ka'i phreng ba dag kyang 'thor/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dag kyang 'thor/ spos sna
tshogs kyi phreng ba dang / na bza' dang rgyan dag kyang 'bul te/ lha ma yin gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du mchod pa rgya cher byas so/ /de nas de dag gis rol mo sil snyan
bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag byas pa'i sgras stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur te/ sems can gang dag gis rol mo'i
sgra de thos pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /nor bu'i skar mdog gi
bla re dag dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi de dag dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dag dang / khrung khrung rkang de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las 'di lta ste/ /
dper na/ rol mo sil snyan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa mkhas pas dkrol ba de lta bur snyan la/ de lta bu'i yid du 'ong zhing mnyan na bde ba'i sgra byung bar gyur to/ /
sgra des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur te/ sems can gang gis rgyan gyi sgra de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams
cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char dang / spos
chu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char mngon par phab par gyur te/ me tog gi char de bab pa'i tshe spos kyi dri zhim po'i ngad byung ste 'gro zhing ldog go /spos chu'i char de bab pas
kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad spos chus rdzab tu gyur te/ spos kyi dri des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen
po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur to/ /sems can gang gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis gdugs bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang / rta bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang / rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag
dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa de dag bar snang gi nam mkha' la 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to/ /de'i
tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/ /klu yi bu mo mkhas pa de dag yid rangs dga' mgu yid kyis su/ /byang chub zhi ba tshol zhing shAkya thub la der ni mchod pa chen po
byas| |rgyan gyis legs brgyan bye ba dgu bcu drug gi gdugs rnams mngon sprul te/ /bde bar gshegs la mchod cing rab tu dul ba'i yid kyis chags dang bral/ /rgyan gyis
legs brgyan bye ba dgu bcu drug gi rta rnams mngon sprul te/ /kha dog sngo zhing rgyan kyang sngo ba'i rta la rgyal mtshan sngon pos brgyan/ /de dag thams cad bar snang dong nas thub
la rta yis mchod pa byed/ /klu yi bu mo de dag dang ba'i yid kyis thub la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /mchog la mchod pa'i don du klu yi gnas nas klu yi sil
snyan gyis/ /mchod pa'i 'os gyur 'dren pa shAkya thub la der ni mchod pa byas/ /sil snyan de dag bde bar gshegs la mchod pa'i sgra de khams gsum grag /sgra de
thos pa'i sems can khrag khrig dag ni byang chub yang dag zhugs/ /de dag rnams kyis der sprul mkha' la bla re chen po gcig tu gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i dpag tshad
drug bcur rgyas shing 'gro ba thams cad khebs par gyur/ /nor bu rin chen skar ma'i mdog gi gzi brjid phyogs su 'bar zhing gsal/ /klu yi bu mo dga' nas 'gro
