ba'i don du rgyal la mchod pa byas/ /gzhal du med pa'i sems bskyed dga' nas byang chub zhi ba tshol byed cing / /'jig rten don byed bde gshegs sangs rgyas 'jig
rten mkhas pa grub par shog /ji ltar stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni sems can sdug bsngal 'gro ba ltar/ /chos kyang bstan te sems can nyon mongs sdug bsngal
bsgribs pa khrag khrig dgrol/ /chos rnams sgyu ma smig sgyu 'dra zhing lbu ba lta bur nyam chung la/ /char rgyun chu la phog pa'i chu bur lta bur 'jig cing bdag po med/ /me
long nang gi gzugs brnyan 'dra bar 'gro ba thams cad btags nas ni/ /'gro ba dag la chos kyi rang bzhin yang dag de nyid bstan par bgyi/ /sgyu ma bkod pa lta bur ma mchis
rdzun pa byis pa rmongs bgyid pa/ /skye bo mi mkhas ji bzhin ma 'tshal ba dag ma rung rab bgyid pa/ /byis pa rmongs bgyid chos rnams sdig med khyod kyis de ltar legs par
gzigs/ /de dag ji ltar gzigs ba de bzhin de dag sems can rnams la bstan/ /ji ltar sa chen 'di la sprin 'khrigs gyur na ri ltar gda' ba yang / /yang dag tu na
ri ltar ngo bo nyid kyis de la gnas ma mchis/ /de ltar 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis dbang po rmongs par bgyid/ /shes pas brtags nas skye bo mkhas pa dag ni
rmongs par 'gyur ma mchis/ /yang dag tu na 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis khyod ston pas/ /des na 'dren pa rgyal ba khyod la skye bo mkhas pa mi phyed 'gyur/ /khyod
kyi sras rnams chos kyis yongs su tshim nas rdza ba la zam pa 'dra/ /'di ni byis pa'i skye bo'i yul ma ni 'gro ba 'di ni sgra phyir 'brang / /de lta lags pas sdig med yang dag ston
pa byis pa'i skye bo'i mgon/ /skyabs dang dpung gnyen gnas dang rten dang rtsa lag khyod la skyabs su mchi/ /gzhal yas byang chub de btsal slad du rnam par 'dren pa khyod la
mchod/ /sangs rgyas gyur nas rtogs bgyid sdig bral 'jig rten don rnams bgyid par shog /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bu mo
de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ /'jig rten na
ni 'jig rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren mchog khyod 'dzum mdzad/ /dpal stug 'dzum pa mdzad la rgyu ma mchis pa bdag gis yod ma mthong / /mi yi dbang po dam pa 'dzum
pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni yang dag gsungs/ /de thos lha mi lha min tshogs dang klu yi bu mo gsang ba pa/ /dri ba rnams kyang skyob pa'i dgongs pa thos nas yid ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /
'jig rten dag na 'jig rten rnam 'dren khyod kyis rgyu rnams thams cad mkhyen/ /rgyal bas chos gang rgyu dang rnam pas mkhyen par ma gyur yod ma mchis/ /de ltar bde gshegs
rgyal ba khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chud 'dzum rgyu gsungs/ /de thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad yid rangs dogs pa chad par 'gyur/ /thub pa bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog
la don kyang thob par mchi/ /'khor rnams 'di dag don myong gyur nas yid ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /kun rtog dbang du mi 'gyur byang chub yid kyis rgyal ba'i spyod nyan 'gyur/ /
bde gshegs khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad don thos rang byung nyid du nges par 'byung / /'khor 'di rgyal ba khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum mthong the tshom 'tshal gyur te/ /sdug bsngal dogs
bcas yid mi bde zhing chos la som nyi gang 'tshal ba/ /de dag la ni thub pa ston pas dogs bsal the tshom dgum du gsol/ /drang srong khyod kyis gang slad 'dzum bstan myur
du bka' stsol the tshom khum/ /rgyal ba gang gis de ring yid ni rnam par sbyangs shing bdud bcom thul/ /su zhig yid rab tshim nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dam pa bgyis/ /
'di ni su yi mthu lags ston pa 'gro ba'i mdun du 'di bka' stsol/ /thos nas bdag cag yid rangs mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas bde bar 'gyur/ /khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung du 'dus
pa'i gro ba 'di dag the tshom 'tshal/ /'dzum rgyu dga' ba bskyed pa bka' stsol thub pa the tshom bsal du gsol/ /de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis 'gyur/ /rgyal
pa'i gsung sgra yang dag thos nas de dag yid dga' 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ /rta thul legs so rgyal ba'i
dgongs pa 'dzum pa 'di ni legs par dris/ /klu yi bu mos mchod de 'jig rten phan phyir ngas ni 'dzum pa bstan/ /de yi 'bras bu bstan gyi yid gnyis tha ba spangs pa'i sems kyis
nyon| |gang gi don du ngas ni 'dzum pa 'dir mdzad nga yi tshig la nyon/ /klu yi bu mo 'di dag chags med yid kyis byang chub yang dag zhugs/ /'gro ba thams
cad stong bar rnam gzhig blo ldan dogs med legs par gnas/ /'di ni byed med tshor med gang zag med cing skye ba po yang med/ /chos rnams 'di dag rdzun zhing smig rgyu
mtshungs la me long gzugs brnyan 'dra/ /'di dag rnams kyis mchod byas byas gzo blo gros yang dag nas shes so/ /rgyal ba'i chos nyid dang ni 'gro ba stong zhing bdag po med
mthong legs/ /mchod pa rnam par phye zhing legs par bkod pa 'di dag sgyu ma 'dra/ /byang chub gzhal yas gang du smon lam btab pa de yang 'di 'drar stong / /nga la gzhal
yas mchod pa de byas pa dang 'gro ba stong skyes pas/ /klu las shi 'phos nas ni lha gnas brgya byin gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sum cu rtsa gsum song ste lha yi nang du dga' bar
tshe rdzogs nas/ /ma smad grags dang ldan pa'i lha gnas 'thab bral gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'thab bral lha nang gnas te lha yi dga' ba spyod/ /lha 'gyur bde gshegs
sras rnams de ni tshe yi tshad du gnas par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'thab bral dga' ba spyad nas che tshad zad pa dang / /dga' ldan gnas su lha yi grong khyer lha dang brtul
zhugs 'dra bar 'gyur/ /de dag de ni lha yi bu mos bskor nas lha yi dga' ba spyod/ /pad+ma chus mi chags pa bzhin du bde gshegs mi gnas blo can gnas/ /'gro ba thams cad stong
par rtogs rig blo las nyams par yong mi 'gyur/ /skyob pa rnams kyi dran pa rdo la brkos pa bzhin du yong mi nyams/ /de dag dga' ldan gnas der gnas te lha yi dga' ba spyad nas
ni| |tshe tshad yongs su zad nas de tshe rab 'phrul dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bde gshegs ma smad grags ldan der yang lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod 'gyur te/ /mi gnas blo gros ldan
pa tshe chad bar du gnas na gnas par 'gyur/ /de dag gnas der rab 'phrul gyur te lha yi dga' ba spyad nas ni/ /mkhas pa che zad blo gros ldan pas chos kyi mthar ni phyin gyur nas/ /
'dren pa bsam pa dag pa chags med yid ldan chos kyi bsam pa can/ /chos dang ldan rnams gzhan 'phrul gnas su lha 'du bar ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de dag la gnas de na gnas shing lha yi
dga' ba spyod par 'gyur/ /bde gshegs ma rmongs blo ldan de dag rang gi tshe tshad gnas par 'gyur/ /mya ngan 'das ltar lha yi 'dod pa'i yon tan mnyam nyid zhi bar rtogs/ /bsam gtan
bsam pas tshangs gnas ma smad grags dang ldan par 'gro bar 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i gnas su bsam gtan mkhas shing bsam gtan 'bras bu spyad gyur nas/ /der gnas dpe med
gyur cing byang chub yid kyis bskal par gnas par 'gyur/ /de dag bskal par tshangs gnas mthun par ye shes don gnyer brtul zhugs
bzang / /thub pa mkhas pa thabs mkhas de dag 'jig rten don ni mtha' yas byed/ /mkhas thub de dag de na bsam gtan spyod yul bsam gtan chags pa med/ /bsam
gtan bde ba mnyam nyid 'drar rig byang chub phyir ni dbang po zhi/ /kun du grol yid drang srong byang chub phyir ni byang chub blo dang ldan/ /mya ngan 'das pa lta bur bsam gtan blo
gcig zhi ba'i mtshan nyid 'gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pa dang bcom ldan sras po byang chub zhi ba yongs tshol ba/ /tshang pa'i yid ldan 'jig rten don byed de dag tshangs
gnas de na gnas/ /kun kyang tshangs pa'i blo ldan mthar phyin sha stag byang chub don gyi phyir/ /rang byung dgongs pa khams gsum la ma las 'das pa'i nges par 'byung
ba ston| |tshangs pa la ni gus pa bskyed nas 'gro ba byang chub tshol bar 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i bsam pa rang byung bsam pa nyes 'byung mthar thug shes nas ni/ /bde bar
gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la brtson pa de dag 'gro ba la/ ci nas chos tshul 'bras bu myur du shes 'gyur de ltar chos kyang ston/ /de dag tshangs gnas de na gnas/
shing 'jig rten dag la byang chub phyir/ /phan pa byas nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po byang chub bkod/ /rgyal ba kun la mchod phyir 'jig rten khams mang khrag khrig
'gro bar 'gyur/ /dbang po zhi ba de dag bskal pa skar ma 'dra la rgyal bar 'gyur/ /lha dang mi dang klu dang 'dab bzang dag dang lha min bcas pa dang / /dri za grul bum mi'am ci
tshogs gnod sbyin 'gror bcas dga' zhing mgu/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub tu ni yongs sbyang chos kyi stobs rnyed pa/ /de dag thams cad yi rang thal sbyar bde bar
gshegs la ma gos phyag 'tshal/ /klu'i bu mo lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bdun pa'o// //de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa
yang thos/ yongs su rdzogs par rig nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' la sogs pa klu bye ba phrag dgu bcu ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
de sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa mkhyen cing / bcom ldan 'das de la mi mkhyen pa'am/ ma gzigs pa'am/ ma gsan pa'am/ mngon du ma mdzad pa
gang yang med cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi chos ni/ legs par gsungs pa/ yang dag par mthong ba/ rims nad med pa/ dus chad pa med pa/ nye bar gtod pa/ 'di mthong
ba la don yod pa/ mkhas pa rnams kyis rang gis rig par bya ba ni/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni/ rdzu 'phrul
che zhing mthu che ba mnga' ba'o/ /'di ltar bud med du gyur pa rgod pa mi brtan pa mi gnas pa rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa yongs su shes pa
dang / de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi slob ma dge 'dun yang legs par zhugs pa/ drang por zhugs pa/ rigs par zhugs pa/ mthun par zhugs pa 'di ltar bud med
du gyur pa 'dod chags dang / zhe sa dang dang / gti mug mi bzad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la 'jug pa ni/ ngo mtshar che'o/ /snyam ste/ ngo
mtshar thob pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir dzam+bu'i gling rgya mtsho'i ri'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad spos kyi sprin chen pos kun nas yog par byas
te thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di spos kyi ngad kyis khyab par byas so/ /spos kyi dri'i ngad des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas sems
can gang dag gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das la
mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad kyang dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad mu tig dmar pos pus mo nub tsam du rgyas par gang bar byas so/ /n+ya gro d+ha'i
kun dga' ra ba de yang rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po ches chal bar bkang ngo / /klu'i me tog gi 'dun khang rgyar dpag tshad drug cu yod pa rin po che sna bdun gyi ka ba dang ldan pa
dag mngon par sprul to/ /klu'i rol mo sil snyan dpag tu med pa dag kyang mngon par sprul te sgra phyung ngo / /klu'i me tog gi 'dun khang de la yang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lda
ldi bye ba phrag dgu bcu bres so/ /rin po che sna bdun gyi ka ba de dag kyang bai dUr+ya'i dra bas legs par brgyan te/ /'dun khang de'i gzhi yang rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po ches
yog par byas par gyur to/ /'dun khang de'i gzhi ni/ 'jam pa bsgyur du rung ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rdo leb ar mo ni ga ltar
'jam pa/ kha dog bai dUr+ya ltar 'dug pa/ ka tsa len+di ka ltar reg na bde ba/ nyams dga' ba/ sems can mthong ba rnams kyi mig mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mi
dang / lha rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba lta bu'o/ /nor bu rin po che sna tshogs de dag gi nang nas nor bu la la las ni/ me 'byung / la la las ni/ chu 'byung ba sha stag ste/ de
la'ang la la las ni/ chu kha dog sngon po 'byung / la la las ni/ chu kha dog ser po 'byung / la la las ni/ chu kha dog dmar po 'byung / /
la la las ni/ chu kha dog dkar po 'byung / la la las ni/ chu kha dog sna tshogs 'byung ngo / /nor bu la la las ni/ bde bar bsil ba'i rlung 'byung / nor bu la
la las ni/ de ma yin pa'i yo byad gzhan dag bsam pa bzhin du 'byung / la las ni/ snum gyi bya ba byed/ la las ni/ me long gi bya ba byed de/ 'khor de dag
thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che de'i nang du snang bar gyur to/ /ser skye'i gnas nas sems can gang ji snyed cig rgyu ba de dag thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che de dag gi
nang du snang bar gyur te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul de dag rnam par sprul pa mdzad pa/ nyan thos kyi dge
'dun dang bcas pa yang nor bu rin po che dag gi nang na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur to/ /'dun khang gi gzhi de'i 'og nas kyang klu'i mthus gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs
mngon par thon par gyur to/ /rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me tog gi lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / spos kyi lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs
dang / rin po che'i lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mu tig gi phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me tog brtsegs ma'i lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rta rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dril
bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyang thon par gyur to/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nyer dga' bo la sogs pa klu bye ba phrag dgu bcus rta de rnams sngon du dkri ste
rkang gis dong na bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te nor bu rin po che ka tsa lin+di ka ltar reg na bde ba dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par
gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /'dun khang gi gzhi de nas rin po che gang dag mngon par thon pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
bcas pa'i steng du char bzhin du bab par gyur to/ /klu'i rol mo sil snyan dpag tu med pa de dag kyang steng gi bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to/ /de nas klu bye ba phrag dgu
bcu po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum pa bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te cang mi zer bar bcom
ldan 'das rnam par rjes su dran par byed cing mig mi 'dzum par blta la/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan 'dod pa'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu yang dag
par zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas de dag gis cung zad cig tu mi smra bar bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rjes su dran par byas nas so so nas bla gos
phrag pa gcig la gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la yan
lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ mtshan brgya rdzogs pa brtul zhugs legs spyad pa/ /dka' thub dgyes pa dri med thugs
rje can| |rin chen 'byung gnas bcas pa'i sa spangs te/ /bde gshegs khyed ni grong khyer mngon par byung / /lo drug par du dka' thub dka' mdzad de/ /rgyal ba khyod kyis
bdud rtsi ma brnyes kyang / /bde gshegs khyod kyi thugs ni zhum ma gyur/ /thub pa khyod kyis byang chub thugs kyis spyad/ /ji ltar 'dren pa lha mi'i bla ma khyod/ /'gro la phan
bzhed dka' thub spyad mdzad de/ /'jig rten mgon po sdug bsngal btang gyur pa/ /de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid mi dga'/ /thub pa dbu dang spyan ni btang ba dang / byang chub
sems ni ji ltar sgrub mdzad pa/ /bde bar gshegs kyi dka' spyad thos gyur na/ /de thos pas kyang bdag cag bde mi 'gyur/ /gang tshe ka ling rgyal po bzod smra bas/ /zhabs
dang phyag dang snyan rnams gtubs gyur te/ /de bzhin shangs bcad rgyal ba mi 'khrugs pa/ /de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid mi dga'/ /phug ron skyabs su mchis pa ma
btang ste/ /gang tshe 'dren khyod srang la bcal gyur pa/ /rgyal ba'i de thos pas kyang mi bde ste/ /bde gshegs byang chub spyod pa sdug bsngal che/ /bdag cag mi 'tshal ma lags
ci zhe na| |bde bar gshegs la 'gro ba gnod bgyis pa/ /ngan song mun par lhung bas bde gshegs kyi/ /sdug bsngal spyod pa dran sa pa mi dga' lags/ /ji ltar 'jig
rten 'dren pa blo 'phags dang / /bde gshegs spyod pa mi 'tshe blor gyur dang / /sgrub pa'i tshe na de la mi gnod pa/ /'jig rten 'dren pa spyod bde bka' stsal gsol/ /mtha'
yas blo mnga' bde gshegs spyod pa la/ /thub pa klu tshogs 'di dag rab tu brtson/ /ji ltar khyod kyi bzhin du spyod 'gyur ba/ /de ltar bde gshegs byang chub lam bstan
gsol| |rga shi ma mchis go 'phang mthor 'tshal zhing / /klu tshogs 'di rnams thub pa skom par gnas/ /'gro ba 'di dag bde bar 'dul 'gyur ba'i/ /brtul zhugs spyod
pa bde gshegs bka' stsal gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs/ lhag pa'i bsam pas smon lam btab pa de dag kyang thugs
su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni/ chos nyid de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe kha dog
sna tshogs dang / kha dog du ma'i 'od zer bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas byung ste/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas phyir log ste bcom
ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ brtul zhugs bzang po dge
sbyong thub pa rnams/ /rgyu med rgyal ba 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ /'dren pa bde gshegs thugs rje che mnga' ba/ /mtshungs med bcom ldan 'dzum rgyu bka' stsal gsol//
tshogs kyi slob dpon skye bo 'di dag ni/ /'dzum rgyu nyan 'tshal khyod kyi zhal du blta/ /yid ni zhum gyur the tshom 'tshal zhing mchis/ /mkhas pa the tshom rnam par
bsal du gsol/ /'jig rten mkhas pa ston pa shAkya thub/ /de ring su zhig yid ni yongs su dga'/ /gang gis bdud kyi dbang po mthong gyur te/ /rmongs par bgyis nas
yid ni mi dgar bgyis/ /tshogs kyi slob dpon 'dren pa su zhig gis/ /bde gshegs chos nyid yab la bsnyen bkur bgyis/ /bde bar gshegs la mchod pa dam
pa bgyis/ /shAkya seng+ge bka' stsal the tshom khum/ /sor bcu thal mo sbyar ba mgor bzhag cing / /'gro ba 'di dag thub pa'i zhal du blta/ /tshogs kyi slob dpon the tshom bsal
du gsol/ /'dren pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu yang gsung / /de thos skye bo 'di dag dgar 'gyur te/ /rgyal bas dgongs pa'i tshul yang rtogs par 'gyur/ /bde bar gshegs
pa 'khor rnams tshim bgyis na/ /gzhan du mi sems nan tan gnas par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal
pa| thub mkhas 'dren pa tshogs kyi slob dpon gyis/ /tshangs 'dra yan lag brgyad ldan gsung brjod kyi/ /rta thul skyon med sems kyis dad byos la/ /'dzum pa mdzad pa'i
rgyu de mnyan par gyis/ /klu yi bdag po 'di dag dad gyur te/ /'gro ba zil gyis mnan nas mchod pa byas/ /skye bo bde bar yongs smin bya ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'di
ni yongs su tshol/ /snying rje chen pos rnam 'dren med pa yi/ /'gro ba bltas nas sdug bsngal cis mi bsten/ /'gro ba byang chub rgya chen thob bya la/ 'dren pa dag ni skyo bar
yong mi 'gyur/ /zhi gnas dge ba ye shes stobs ldan stobs/ /mtshan med stong pa de bzhin smon med pa/ /rnam thar sgo gsum yongs su bsgoms nas su/ /shin tu yongs
dag yid can be bar 'gro/ /'gro ba mtha' dag mnyam pa nyid rtogs te/ /gang tshe rgyal bas shes rab mtshan thos nas// mnyam pa'i
sems dang byams dang snying rje thob/ /'gro la snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas/ /snying brtse ldan pa mchog tu snying rje can/ /'jig rten mkhas pa bla na med par 'gyur//
rgyal ba de dag 'gro 'di mtshungs bsgral nas/ /de dag dgra bcom rnam par 'dren par 'gyur/ /rtag tu bdag med tshig ni nyan byed cing / /'jig rten gtam gyi
rgyud la 'jug pa ste/ /de dag bde bar gshegs kyi 'chi med thob/ /de na bdud med mu stegs tshogs kyang med/ /'dren pa bde gshegs snying rje ldan pa yi/ /rgyal
ba de dag 'gro ba kun mos byed/ /bde gshegs bka' dang tshig rnams thams cad dang / /bde bar gshegs kyi dgongs la mos byed 'gyur/ /srid par bde gshegs
rnams kyi spyad spyod cing / /rab bder 'gro ba yongs smin byed par 'gyur/ /mtshungs med thub pa bde bar myur du yang / /yongs su 'tshang rgya 'chi med thob par 'gyur/ /thob
nas 'gro ba dag kyang mos par 'gyur/ /skye bo kun kyang gzugs kyi mchog dang ldan/ /'gro ba thams cad bde gshegs de dag gi/ dgongs pa'i tshig ni mngon du shes
par 'gyur/ /phyugs dang bya dang gnod sbyin mi de dag /rang byung dgongs min cung zad byed mi 'gyur/ /de dag kun tu chos rtogs dran dang ldan/ /bde bar gshegs rnams
'chi med thob par 'gyur/ /de dag tshig thos sems can gang yang ni/ /bstan pa de la mi dgar 'gyur ba med/ /bde gshegs de dag gsung la dga' ba yi// 'gro ba 'chi
med yang dag thob par 'gyur/ /de tshe 'gro bas rgyal ba'i dgongs legs rtogs/ /rga ba dang ni na dang 'chi ba dang / /mya ngan smre sngags 'don las yongs su dgrol/ /
tshig de thos nas ngar 'dzin med par 'gyur/ /klu yi bsam pa shAkya seng+ge la/ /yongs su zhus nas ji ltar de dag rnams/ /gzhal yas byang chub thob nas thub rnams kyi/ /
ye shes 'jug 'gyur de skad sras la bstan/ /klu rnams lung bstan yid du 'ong ba yi/ /rgyal ba'i gsung thos 'khor rnams yid dga' ste/ /de la yid ni rab tu zhi gyur
nas| |dga' ba'i yid kyis rgyal ba'i skyabs su song / /klu lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ brgyad pa'o// //de nas grul bum bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyis lha ma
yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu'i bu mo rnams dang / klu rnams kyi mchod pa yang mthong / /lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te
rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas ngo mtshar thob par gyur to/ /'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab kyi mnga'
rgya chen po mnga' zhing / 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po 'di lta bu byas pas kyang ngo mtshar du mi dgongs te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/
rgya che zhing yongs su rgyas pa yin pas mtho ba'am dma' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang chos thams cad la the tshom mi mnga' zhing yon tan thams
cad yongs su rdzogs la/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yangs pa mnga' bas mchod pa 'di lta bu dag bzhes kyang mtho ba'am dma' bar mi 'gyur zhing / ngo
mtshar du mi dgongs pa ni/ ngo mtshar shin tu che'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas grul bum bye ba phrag bco brgyad po de dag gis bdag cag nyid kyi mchod pas bcom ldan 'das
la mchod pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi bla re bye ba phrag bco brgyad mngon par sbrul te/ 'di lta ste/ gser gyi skud pa'i bla re dang / dngul gyi skud pa'i bla re dang / bai
DUR+Ya'i skud pa'i bla re dang / shel gyi bla re dang / mu tig dmar po'i bla re dang / spug gi bla re dang / rdo'i snying po'i bla re sha stag go /rin po che'i bla re de dag la yang
me tog sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i lda ldi mngon par sprul te/ gser gyi skud pa'i bla re rnams la ni/ dngul gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ dngul gyi skud pa'i bla re rnams
la ni| gser gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ bai DUR+Ya'i bla re rnams la ni/ shel gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ shel gyi bla re rnams la ni/ bai DUR+Ya'i me tog
gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ mu tig dmar po'i bla re rnams la ni/ spug gi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ spug gi bla re rnams la ni/ mu tig dmar po'i me tog gi phreng ba'i
lda ldi bkye/ rdo'i snying po'i bla re rnams la ni/ shel gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye ba sha stag mngon par sprul to/ /shing rta bkra ba blta na sdug pa bye ba phrag bco brgyad
kyang mngon par sprul te/ de dag kyang gser nas rdo'i snying po'i bar du shing rta de dag gi steng du rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs thur ma brgya pa gser gyi yu ba can dang / bai
DUR+Ya'i yu ba can dang / shel gyi yu ba can bye ba phrag bco brgyad mngon par sprul to/ /gdugs de dag la rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lda ldi mngon par sprul te/ 'di lta
ste| gser gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang / dngul gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang / bai DUR+Ya'i me tog gi lda ldi dang / shel gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang / mu tig dmar po'i me tog gi lda ldi
dang / klu'i nor bu'i me tog gi lda ldi sha stag go /mu tig dmar po'i dra ba dag kyang mngon par sprul to/ /de dag gis gdugs de dag dang / me tog gi phreng ba de dag gi
gzugs byas so/ /grul bum gyi rol mo'i sil snyan dag kyang mngon par sprul to/ /shing rta de dag re re zhing yang bla re de dag re re rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur to/ /de nas grul
dum de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta de dag la zhon te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang / bla re dang / me tog de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor
te mchod pa byed cing bcom ldan 'das la steng gi bar snang las lan gsum bskor to/ /bskor nas shing rta de dag las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ thams cad du yang mi bsnyengs
mnga' dbang can/ /thub pa chen po mi mtho mi dma' ste/ /ri yi rgyal po lhun po'i ri 'dra ba/ /mchod pa rgya chen 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ /'gro ba thams cad ming
dang mtshan ma dang / /tha snyad tsam mkhyen thub pa chags mi mnga'/ /'dren pa khyod kyis ting 'dzin zhi bsgrubs pas/ /shes rab ldan pa dregs pa yong mi mnga'/ /
rgyal ba khyod kyis 'gro ba sgyu 'drar mkhyen/ /rang bzhin stong ste rmi lam dag 'dra dang / /chu zla nam mkha'i smig rgyu lta bur ni/ /bde bar gshegs pas 'gro ba 'di dag gzigs/ /
dri za'i grong khyer ji ltar snang gyur kyang / /grong khyer de ni phyogs bcu kun na med/ /gzhan du grong khyer de ni ming tsam ste/ /de bzhin bde bar gshegs pas 'gro 'di gzigs/ /mchod
pa 'di kun brag ca ji bzhin te/ /shing rta gdugs dang bla re sil snyan dang / /me tog rgyal mtshan thal mo sbyar bgyis pa/ /brag ca ji bzhin de dag de ltar gda'/ /'dren pa
mchod pa 'di bgyis bdag cag kyang / /sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog tu myur 'gyur shog /rmi lam 'dra bar 'gro ba bdag cag gis/ /rtogs bgyis rgyal ba khyod bzhin
bstan par bgyi/ /nad dang rga shis yongs su gtses gyur pa'i/ /skye bo mthong nas bdag cag rnams kyis kyang / /byang chub myur thob rga shi med pa'i gnas/ /gang thos grol 'gyur
'gro la bstan par gyis/ /bdag cag byang chub lam mchog sangs rgyas nas/ /sems can blo stor rnams la bstan par bgyi/ /thub pa'i 'khrugs med chos rnams rab stan
pa| |mya ngan 'das mchog sems can bstan par bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grul bum de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de
nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ ston pa rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad de/ /rnam 'dren 'jig
rten mkhas la mtshar mi mnga'/ /ngo mtshar 'gyur med rgyal bas 'dzum mdzad na/ /'dzum rgyu legs par bka' stsal nyan par 'tshal/ /rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum pa
mdzad mthong nas/ /'gro ba 'di dag the tshom som nyi 'tshal/ /the tshom 'tshal ba rnams kyi the tshom khum/ /mi yi dbang po 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang gsungs/ /gang gis de ring
chos la yid bzhag 'gyur/ /de ring gang gis chos kyi rgyal yab mthong / /deng sus sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i mchod pa bgyis/ /mi yi dam pa bdag ni nyan par 'tshal/ /
de ring 'dus byas sdug bsngal shes gyur nas/ /gang gis 'du byed gyur pa'i yid gcig bcom/ /gang zhig yang dag mtha' la mi g.yo gnas/ /rnam dag thugs mnga'
bdag ni nyan par 'tshal/ /de ring su yis 'khor bcas bdud rnams bcom/ /thub pa ston pa deng sus mnyes par gyis/ /'dren pa su zhig de ring gting rnyed gyur/ /the
tshom mchis te deng bdag de nyan 'tshal/ /'dzum mdzad de yi don ni mnyan slad du/ /'gro ba kun kyang thal mo sbyar cing gnas/ / 'dren pa the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom
sol| |rkang gnyis dam pas lung yang bstan du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal ba/ rta thul khyod kyis dri ba
legs par dris/ /'dzum pa'i rgyu 'di yongs su dris pas na/ /'gro ba'i don yang khyod kyis byas par 'gyur/ /de don bstan byas rta thul mnyan par gyis/ /grul bum tshogs
kyis nga la mchod byas te/ /zhi ba'i chos la de dag yid kyang bzhag /mtshar med nga mthong nas ni ngoms gyur te/ zhi ba'i chos la de dag yid kyang bzhag /de dag rnams kyis
de ring nga mchod de/ /zhi ba'i chos la blo gros rnam par btang / /lam stor skye bo rnams la snying brtse zhing / /bsam pa thag pas snying rje chen po bskyed/ /snying rje bas ni nga la
mchod pa byas/ /rab tu lam stor rnams la byams par bsam/ /mkhas pa de dag las de byas pas na/ /grul bum skye gnas shi 'phos brtul zhugs bzung / /brgya byin
lha yi drung du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /thugs thub byams don mdzad ston drung du 'dod/ /des ni cung zad yang dang yang bstan te/ /phyir zhing chos la the tshom med par 'gyur/ /de dag
bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du/ /zhing nas zhing du rnam par rgyu byed cing / /bdag nyid chen po'i chos la mchod pa byed/ /go cha chen po rab tu bgo byed kyi/ /de dag skye bo med par
'jig rten khams/ /khrag khrig mtha' yas rnam par spyad par 'gyur/ /skye bo mang po'i don byed 'dren 'gyur te/ /ngo mtshar med ces bya ba'i rgyal
bar 'gyur/ /de dag zhing rnams gang du 'gro rgyu ba/ /der ni 'gro bas rgyal ba byung bar shes/ /de dag thabs kyis ma 'ongs dus dag na/ /ngo mtshar med par skye bo rnam
grol byed/ /rgyal ba ngo mtshar med pa zhing sbyong zhing / /rdzogs pa'i byang chub bla med zhi ba tshol/ /de dag tshol ba la yang mi gnas te/ /'di ltar bla med byang chub
gnas phyir ro/ /de ltar 'dzum rgyu rgyal bas lung bstan cing / /bde bar gshegs pas 'jig rten dogs bsal te/ /grub bum mchod pa'i 'bras bu des thob
nas| |'gro ba the tshom bsal te dga' bar 'gyur/ /grul bum lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ dgu pa'o// //de nas de'i tshe dri za bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa
drug gis lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu'i bu mo rnams dang / klu rnams dang / grul bum rnams kyi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan
pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas
chos kyi dbyings 'gyur ba med pa yang dag par bka' stsal/ bya ba rnams kyang yang dag par bstan te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba yang bstan la/ chos gang la yang lung
bstan pa med par yang yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni/ ngo mtshar rmad do/ /snyam nas de dag gis chos de lta bu khong du chud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro bya
ba'i sems rgya chen po skyes nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos par gyur te/ rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la
mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to/ /glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag re re zhing mgo bye ba
phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug /mgo bo re re zhing so bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug/ so re re la rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu re re zhing yang pad+ma bdun bdun/ pad+ma re re zhing yang
'dab ma bye ba phrag stong stong / 'dab ma re re zhing lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo re re zhing yang 'khor rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lha'i bdug spos thogs pa
bdun bdun zhing pad+ma'i lo ma'i mtha' mtha' na 'khod pas bskor ba mngon par sprul te/ glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag gi mgo re re la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs
nas rin po che sna bdun gyi dra ba dag gis gdugs byas pa dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi bres pa'i bar dang ldan pa bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa
drug drug mngon par sprul to/ /glang po che'i mgo thams cad la yang lha'i spos kyi bla re sna tshogs rin po che sna tshogs kyi lda ldi bres pa sha stag mngon par sprul to/ /de
nas dri za de dag glang po che sa srung gi bu bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug po de dag la zhon te lha'i rol mo'i sil snyan len cing nam mkha' las rgyu ste/ bcom ldan 'das la
lan sum cu rtsa drug tu bskor ba byas nas lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye mas bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /lha'i a ga ru'i phye ma
dang / lha'i ta ma la'i phye ma dang / ut+pa la'i phye ma dang / lha'i gser phye dang / lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka
chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon
par rab tu gtor to/ /gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po'i me tog rnams dang / sprul pa'i me tog
rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /spos kyi bla re de dag la spos kyi ngad 'byung ste 'gro zhing ldog go /lha'i spos chu
rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char yang steng gi bar snang las mngon par bab bo/ /spos chu'i char de mngon par bab pas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po 'khor yug tu dpag
tshad drug cu tshun chad spos chus rdzab tu gyur te/ spos chu'i rdzab de'i dris stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas sems
can gang dag gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa dang / rol mo sil snyan de dag gi sgra thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /de ltar dri za re res kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir glang po che sa srung gi bu mgo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug la lha'i bu mo glu len
pa dang / gar byed pa 'khod pa dag gi mchod de skye bo thams cad kyang 'dun par byas so/ /lha'i bu mo de dag las la la ni/ lus kyi tshul bsgyur/ la la ni/ tsan+dan dang /
a ga ru dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i bye ma 'thor/ la la ni/ lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang spos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phye ma 'thor/ /la la ni/ me tog man+dA ra ba dang /
man+dA ra ba chen po nas skya snar khra bo dang / skya snar bkra chen gyi bar gyi me tog dang / sprul ba'i me tog rnams 'thor/ la la ni/ gser gyi me
tog nas rdo'i snying po'i bar gyi me tog dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / rin po che snyim pas blangs te bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor/ la la ni/ na bza'
dag 'thor/ la la ni/ zhabs kyi rgyan dang / sku rags dang / gser gyi phreng ba rin po ches spras pa'i bar dag 'bul lo/ /la la ni/ gser gyi dra ba dag 'dzin/
la la ni| rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang tshon sna tshogs can 'dzin/ la la ni/ lha'i spos chu'i char 'bebs
te| lha ma yin gyi bu mos tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas dri za de dag glang po che'i rgyal po sa
srung gi bu de dag la zhon nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byed byed pa las glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag las babs te/ yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
bskor ba byas nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par
bstod pa/ bcom ldan bde gshegs srid pa mthar 'byin pa/ /srid pa'i bcings las 'gro ba rnam grol mdzad/ /khyod 'dra srid gsum gang na'ang ma mchis te/ /khyu
mchog khyod ni gzugs dang mtshan mchog mnga'/ /mi mchog khyod kyis sa chen 'di steng du/ /grags pa mtha' yas mnga' bas ngo mtshar bstan/ /'gyur bgyid chos ni gang
yang ma mchis la/ /dge ba'i tshogs la 'gro ba rab tu bkod/ /bde gshegs 'gyur ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid/ /brjod pa tsam ste gzhan ni ci ma mchis/ /tha snyad
gdags dang tha snyad 'dogs ma mchis/ /'on kyang bde gshegs khyod kyis 'gro ba sbyong / /bde bar gshegs pas song med 'ong med dang / /gnas med rang bzhin
gyis ni stong pa dang / /chos rnams 'di dag rang bzhin med ces bstan/ /rgyal ba mchog gis bya ba rnams kyang bstan/ /chos rnams gang yang bya ba med ma mchis/ /'jig
rten gtso bo bya ba'ang yongs su bstan/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi yon tan mi dgongs la/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bgyi ba kun kyang bstan/ /shing rta yan lag rnam pa sna tshogs/
dag /bdag dang gzhan gyi yon tan mi sems kyang / /shing rta'i bgyi ba dag kyang bgyid par 'gyur/ /de bzhin chos kun bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/ /chos ni chos
la yongs su bskul mi bgyid/ /chos ni chos la dran par bgyid ma mchis/ /chos rnams chos la nye bar mi brten te/ /chos rnams gang
yang ma skyes mchi ma mchis/ /'gro ba 'di dag kun rdzob mngon par gsungs/ /kun rdzob de yang de ni ma mchis te/ /'gro ba 'di kun kun rdzob ji bzhin zhes/ /tshogs
kyi slob dpon khyod kyis yongs dag gsungs/ /mig gi rang bzhin gang na'ang ma mchis la/ /bde bar gshegs pas bya ba rnam par bzhag /chos tshul 'di 'dra
yongs su bstan pa na/ /'jig rten mkhas pas shin tu ngo mtshar mdzad/ /de bzhin bdag cag bde gshegs nyid gyur te/ /nor ba'i 'gro ba blo gros stor ba rnams/ /
chos kyis chos kyi tshul la bzung bgyis te/ /zhi ba'i go 'phang 'chi med thob par bgyi/ /rnam par 'dren pa khyod ni ci 'dra bar/ /'dren pa bde gshegs grags pa mtha'
yas pa| |thugs rje ldan pa phan bzhed 'jig rten mkhas/ /bsod nams brgya yi mtshan dang ldan par shog /ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis/ /
nga rgyal bsgrubs pa'i 'gro ba sdug bsngal ba/ /'dod pa'i yon tan rgyun gyi rjes 'gro ba/ /mngon dga' sdug bsngal brgya las yongs su dgrol/ /ji ltar bde gshegs
khyod bzhin bdag cag gis/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal gnod pa myong 'gyur la/ /g.yo yi zhags pas zin cing mu ma mthong / /yongs 'thob spre'u ltar rgod pa yongs su
dgrol| |ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis/ /'gro ba mi mkhas mig dang bral ba yi/ /sna tshogs yongs skyo gnyid kyis log gyur cing / /bdag nyid
las kyi 'bras bu chud zin dgrol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri za bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad
do| |de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bde gshegs mtha' yas gzigs pas 'dzum pa mdzad/ /'dren pa
rgyu ma mchis par mi 'dzum na/ /bde gshegs 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni myur du gsungs/ /nem nur gnod gyur rnams kyi the tshom sol/ /bde gshegs khyod kyi zhal gyi 'dzum
mthong nas/ /skye bo 'di dag the tshom rnyed par gyur/ /'dzum pa'i don ni de dag nyan par 'tshal/ /thub chen 'gro ba'i the tshom bsal du gsol/ /bde bar gshegs kyi
bstan la su zhig zhugs/ /the tshom bral zhing som nyi bsal bar gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi bsam mkhyen nas/ /mi yi mchog gis 'dzum pa bstan pa
mdzad| |su zhig bde gshegs bka' stsal tshul bzhin du/ /blo gros rtogs pa chos bzhin gnas par gyur/ /gang gi blo gros dran rtogs blo
mkhyen nas/ /bde gshegs 'gro ba'i nang du 'dzum pa mdzad/ /'gro ba 'di dag blo gzhan yongs btang ste/ /bde gshegs 'dzum don zhal nas thos par dga'/ /sor
bcu thal sbyar mgo la bzhag bgyis shing / /dga' ba'i yid kyis ston pa'i zhal du blta/ /nyon mongs bral zhing mya ngan rab spangs pa/ /dgyes pa'i thugs mnga'
thub chen 'jig rten mig /'gro ba yid gnyis som nyi bsal du gsol/ /rgyal ba thugs rje ldan pas 'dzum rgyu gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ 'gro ba'i don du 'dzum pa ngas bshad pa/ /khyod kyis don dris mthun zhing legs pa ste/ /'dzum pa de yi don ni lung
bstan pa/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen don ni de ring 'phel/ /'dzum mdzad rgyu de rta thul mnyan par gyis/ /rnam par 'dren pa 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa/ /de ni ma log par yang
ngas bstan gyis/ /bstan pa de la dga' ba'i sems kyis nyon/ /dri za 'di rnams chos kyi rjes bsnyegs shing / /bde bar gshegs la mchod pa 'di dag byas/ /chos nyid
'byung bar 'gyur ba med pa ste/ /chos nyid zad par 'gyur ba'ang med pa yin/ /rgyal ba rnam rtog sgyu ma lta bur gnas/ /rtog par mi byed de dag rmongs par 'gyur/ /gang gis
chos gang rjes su brjod bya ba/ /des ni de nyid stong zhes bde gshegs gsungs/ /de dag nga yi tshig de rtogs gyur nas/ /rta med glang po mchog gis mchod pa byas/ /byang chub
rga med 'chi med tshol byed cing / /dri za'i rgyal po rnams kyis nga mchod do/ /nor ba'i 'gro la snying rje bskyed nas ni/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'di dag mos/ /'di dag nga la
mchod pa 'di byas pa/ /dri za'i ris bor dga' ba'i yid gyur te/ /blo gros bzang rnams lha rnams lha yul pa/ /brgya byin lha 'dus par ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de dag sangs
rgyas bde gshegs rdul med pa/ /bye ba khrag khrig mang la mchod byed 'gyur/ /zhing nas zhing du rjes su rgyu byed cing / /de dag la ni mkhas pa chos kyang nyan/ /de dag bde gshegs
spyod pa yongs su skyong / /de dag zhing yang rtag par yongs dag 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i gdung 'dzin de dag sems can ni/ /khrag khrig mang po dag la byang chub ston/ /'gro ba
'di dag rang bzhin stong rig nas/ /bde gshegs 'gro ba dag la ston par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen cing kun gzigs pa/ /rdul med bskal pa khrag khrig bzhugs
par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mtshan ni mtha' yas rtogs pa ste/ /sangs rgyas re re khrag khrig phrag mang ba'i/ /bskal pa rnams su rdul med gnas
par 'gyur/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam 'di rjes su ston/ /rgyal ba thub pa nyon mongs bcom pa yis/ /de ltar de tshe dri zas mchod lung bstan/ /rta thul gyis ni 'dzum
pa'i don zhus pa/ /dri za lung bstan pa ni bshad pa mdzad/ /dri za lung bstan yid du 'thad 'gyur ba/ /de thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad dga'/ /der ni bde bar gshegs
kyi gsung thos na/ /shAkya thub la thams cad skyabs su dong / /dri za lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu pa'o// //bam po lnga pa/ de nas gnod sbyin bye ba
phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas dri za'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing
dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi shes rab kyi rnam pa la rim gro chen po bskyed de chos nyid la 'jug pa yang thos nas ston pa'i 'du
shes skyes par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang blo zad mi shes pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das blo zad mi shes pa zhes bya bar
rig nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir
brtson par gyur te tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ mngon shes stobs ni kun tu mtha' yas te/ /rgya mtsho'i chu 'dzin pad+ma
'tshal dang 'dra/ /de bas mtshungs med 'jig rten phan mdzad pa/ /mi yi seng+ge khyod la 'di ltar bstod/ /ri rab srang la gzhal bar nus kyang gda'/ /gzi brjid chen
po nam mkha' gzhal rung gda'/ /shes rab mchog mnga' bde gshegs ye shes stobs/ /tshad gzung dag par nus pa yong ma mchis/ /'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa
thugs su chud/ /skye bo drang rung mi rung btul min pa/ /de dag las kyi rnam pa mngon par mkhyen/ /de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas/ /de dag ci 'dra'i khams
la brten pa dang / /de dag sems rgyud ci 'drar 'byung ba dang / /de dag mos pa ci 'dra ma lus mkhyen/ /de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas/ /'dod chags spyod
dang de bzhin zhe sdang spyod/ /mi yi gti mug spyod pa de bzhin mkhyen/ /phrag dog rnam pa'ang de bzhin mkhyen pa ste/ /de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas/ /'gro ba 'di
dag lam rgyud gar 'khyams pa/ /de dag mtshungs med rnams kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /de la ye shes rgyun du rab 'byung bas/ /de bas mtshungs med
kun tu mtha' yang yas/ /bde bar gshegs pas 'gro kun rab tu gzigs/ /chud za'i lam rgyud gang du 'khyams gyur cing / /byams pa'i stobs las rab tu
nyams gyur ba/ /de dag ma lus khyod kyis rab tu gzigs/ /'gro ba rnams ni ji srid dus gnas shing / /ci 'dra'i sdug bsngal de dag reg 'gyur dang / /lus kyi rnam
pa ci 'dra 'chang ba rnams/ /de dag 'dren pa khyod kyis rab tu gzigs/ /mi yi seng+ges lta ba ci 'dra dang / /gang gis sdug bsngal rnam pa 'thob 'gyur bar/ /gang la
brten cing las rnams bgyid 'gyur ba/ /de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs/ /de dag rgyal ba'i bstan la rab byung ste/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo ni gang zhig
gis| |ci 'dra'i lam la de dag brten bgyis shing / /ci 'dra'i zhi ba 'thob 'gyur khyod kyis mkhyen/ /byis pa gang rnams bde gshegs bstan pa la/ /rab tu
byung zhing 'jig rten mkhas pa yi/ /bstan pa rab phra ji ltar spong 'gyur ba/ /de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs/ /'jig rten phan pa'i bstan la brnyas
bgyis pas/ /dmyal ba chen po ji srid gnas pa dang / /ci 'dra sdug bsngal de dag myong 'gyur ba/ /de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs/ /gang dag rgyal ba rnams la
dad bskyed de/ /rab tu byung nas rgyal ba'i bstan 'dzin cing / /chos kun stong pa nyid du yongs brtags nas/ /mtshan ma thams cad rnam par gzhig bgyis shing / /'gro rgyud kun
tu smon pa rnams spangs te/ /lus 'di sgyu ma 'dra bar rab brtags nas/ /phung po brag ca 'dra bar rtogs gyur te/ /byang chub sems ldan de dag rab tu gzigs/ /mgon po
khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams gang / /mtshungs med khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chud pa/ /de yis bla med sangs rgyas grub par shog /'gro ba kun kyang rang byung thob gyur
cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gnod sbyin bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa
rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ mi yi seng+ges 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa/ /mi yi zla ba rang byung gyur pa ni/ /rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi
mdzad na/ /'dzum pa de yi rgyu ni bka' stsal gsol/ /ston pa'i zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas/ /bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag the tshom 'tshal/ /mgon pos de dag
the tshom bsal du gsol/ /'jig rten 'di dag dga' ba'i yid du 'gyur/ /de ring su zhig rgyal la dad pa bskyed/ /gang gis chos rgya chen po
rnam par rtogs/ /gang gis sems ni bsgul nas gnas par gyur/ /de dag rgyal bas 'gro ba bstan du gsol/ /de ring 'khor rnams the tshom che 'tshal zhing / /kun kyang
rgyal ba'i zhal du blta zhing sdod/ /ci nas the tshom ma mchis kun 'gyur ba/ /de ltar dpa' bos the tshom bsal du gsol/ /de ring 'di ni gang gi rnam 'phrul lags/ /
gang gis brtson 'grus bzang po 'di bstan lags/ /gang zhig khyod dang 'dir mjal don mchis 'gyur/ /de ni legs par 'gro la bka' stsal gsol/ /rgyal ba
'gro ba dag la phan bzhed pa/ /the tshom 'tshal ba yid gnyis legs bsal gsol/ /de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams/ /dga' zhing mgu ba dag kyang 'thob
par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris/ /de ring
'gro ba dag gi don chen byas/ /rang byung 'dzum mdzad rgyu ni dris pas na/ /ston pa'i dgongs pa'ang khyed kyis legs par mthong / /de dag lung bstan ma lus bstan
par byas/ /gnod sbyin tshogs kyi yid ni gzigs gyur nas/ /'gro la phan pa'i don du 'dzum mdzad pa/ /dad pa'i yid kyis rta thul mnyan par gyis/ /rgyal ba'i byang chub
zhi ba shes gyur nas/ /gnod sbyin tshogs kyis mos pa'i sems bskyed de/ /'byung po'i tshogs dbus sangs rgyas bstod byas nas/ /byang chub dam pa mchog tu yid kyang
btang / /chos rnams stong pa nyid du shes bya dang / /mtshan ma thams cad rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ /'gro ba kun tu smon pa rnams spangs shing / /byang chub mchog tu de
dag yid kyang btang / /rnal 'byor stobs kyis phung po rnams bshig cing / /kun rdzob tsam du rig nas mi chags te/ /srid pa kun tu chu la pad+mo bzhin/ /byang chub mchog tu
de dag yid kyang btang / /de dag srid pa gang du chags 'gyur ba/ /stong par bshig ste thams cad legs rtogs pa/ /de nyid rgyal ba'i bla med byang chub ste/ /byang chub phyir ni
dben pa'i brtul zhugs shes/ /skye dang rga shi yong gis stong pa ste/ /de ni rgyal ba'i bla med byang chub yin/ /dngos po'i rang bzhin stong par shes gyur nas/ /zhi ba bla med byang
chub thob par 'gyur/ /phung po'i rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid/ /byang chub rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid/ /gang spyod de yang rang bzhin stong pa ste/ /ye shes ldan pas
shes kyi byis pas min/ /ye shes rang bzhin stong par rig gyur te/ /shes bya'i rang bzhin stong par rig gyur nas/ /shes pa po dang 'dra bar
rtogs gyur na/ /byang chub lam la de dag spyod ces bya/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin stong par shes par bya/ /mtshan ma med pa'ang rang bzhin nyid kyis stong / /smon pa med pa'ang
rang bzhin stong pa ste/ /de ltar spyod na gzhan min spyod pa yin/ /de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams/ /dga' zhing de dag stobs dang ldan par gyur/ /rang byung
chos la de dag yid ches te/ /zhi ba'i gnas shes byang chub yid ldan gyur/ /gnod sbyin tshogs rnams deng mos yid gyur te/ /'di ltar nga la mchod pa rab byas pas//
gnod sbyin rgyud nas shi 'phos blo chen rnams/ /mtho ris dong zhing yun ring dga' bar 'gyur/ /de dag ma 'ongs dus na rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /zhing du dong zhing skad cig gcig
la yang / /blo can de dag rgyal ba bye ba mchod/ /de dag bzod mkhyen rgyal ba gdams ngag ston/ /de dag 'jig rten phyogs bcur rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /mtshan ma med
par spyod cing dong gyur te/ /'jig rten 'di dag sprul pa 'drar shes nas/ /'jig rten chags med mkhas pa spyad pa spyod/ /de ltar bstan pas rgyal ba rab mchod nas/ /
byang chub bla med de yang thob gyur te/ /de dag rnams kyi zhing ni mtha' yas 'gyur/ /sems can mtha' yas pa dag rnam par 'grel/ /sangs rgyas mkhyen pa mtha' yas grags
pa can| |de dag ming ni 'jig rten mkhas zhes bya/ /zhi ba'i blo ldan rgyal ba de dag gi /tshe tshad bskal pa stong ni tshang bar 'gyur/ /de dag nyan thos dge 'dun 'byung ba ni/ /rgyal
sras mang po skar ma'i tshogs rnyed de/ /kun kyang bde bas bsam pa thos par 'gyur/ /'jig rten mkhas pa rnams la sdug bsngal med/ /de skad thos nas lhar bcas 'jig
rten dag /rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis byang chub tshol/ /ngoms par gyur nas brtson pa brtan brtsams te/ /kun kyang brtson 'grus stobs kyis brtan par 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin
lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa mi'am ci bye ba phrag brgyad kyis lha ma yin gyi mchod pa
de dag dang / gnod sbyin gyi mchod pa'i bar dag kyang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas shin tu ngo mtshar thob par gyur to/ /khyod 'di ltar sems can yang mi dmigs
la| srog dang / skye ba po dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / gang zag dang / bdag dang / bdag gi yang gang yang med la/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched
gang la sems can zhes gdags pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de dag kyang mi dmigs/ las gang yod pas rnam par smin pa gdags
par bya ba'i las de yang mi dmigs/ byang chub kyang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyang mi dmigs la/ 'on kyang bcom ldan
'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa mdzad pa 'di ni/ ngo mtshar rmad do/ /ci zhig las dgongs te bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams
sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa mdzad/ ci zhig las dgongs te byang chub sems dpas yang dag par sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang / sems
can yongs su smin pa dang / zhing gi bkod pa dang / der skye zhing yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhing nas zhing du 'dong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mchod
pa dang / mchod pa de'i mthu dang / sems can rnam par dgod pa dang / bskal pa 'di snyed cig gis sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba dang / bskal pa 'di snyed
cig tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos 'dus pa ni/ 'di snyed cig tu
'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba dang / de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos bskal pa 'di snyed cig tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /zhes de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan
pa mdzad/ ci zhig las dgongs te sems can rnams nye bar len pa med pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa mdzad snyam ste/ de
nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa de lta bu'i the tshom skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i
dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ rgyal ba'i gsung ni thos gyur nas/ /shes rab che mnga' bdag dogs skyes/ /stong pa nyid dang lung bstan pa/ /bde gshegs bdag gis ma 'tshal
ba| |gsung ba'i zla ba thos kyi dbyings/ /'gyur ma mchis la stong ba dang / /rang bzhin med gzung ji lta bu/ /mchod pa 'di ni gang zag mchog /skye ba'ang ma mchis byang chub tu/ /
sems bskyed pa ni ji lta bu/ /skyes bu mchog gis bka' stsal pa'i/ /ldem po dag de bdag ma 'tshal/ /mi dbang bdag po ji ltar na/ /'gag pa ma mchis 'chi 'pho gsung / /
de ni yang dag lung bstan pas/ /thub pa bdag gi the tshom khum/ /sgyu ma 'dra la lha skye zhes/ /gsungs pa de ni 'di lta bu/ /ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang / /shAkya seng+ge bdag ma
'tshal| |gnas pa'ang mchis pa ma lags la/ /dge bshes bsten gsum ji lta bu/ /ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang / /skyes bu khyu mchog
bdag ma 'tshal/ /g.yo ba'ang ma mchis bgyi ba rnams/ /rkang gnyis mchog gsungs ji lta bu/ /ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang / /dgra bsal bcom ldan bdag ma 'tshal//
rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang / /rtogs zhes mgon gsung ji lta bu/ /the tshom rnam pa 'di 'dra skyes/ /shes rab dpe med bdag ma 'tshal/ /zhi ba yod ces bka' stsal pa/ /
chos kun zhi gsungs ji lta bu/ /mtshungs med 'di 'dra'i ldem po dag /bdag la rnam par bstan du gsol/ /sku mdzes gyur kyang chos kyi rnams/ /nam mkha' 'drar gsungs
ji lta bu| |chos ni rab tu spangs bgyis na/ /mi mkhas dmyal lhung ji lta bu/ /brtan pa mtho ris 'jig rten dang / /'gro ba gzhan yang gsungs pa dang / /las de bgyis pa ma
mchis la/ /rang las can gsungs ji lta bu/ /bka' stsal tshul 'di rnam pa yang / /zil gyis mi gnon bdag ma 'tshal/ /mgon po de la bdag dogs na/ /bde gshegs
bdag gi the tshom sol/ /dge ba'i tshogs 'gyur ma mchis la/ /byang chub yang dag sgrub pa'ang gsungs/ /dge sbyong rgyal po'i gsung gi tshul/ /de skad bka' stsal bdag
ma 'tshal/ /chos rnams zad pa med gsungs la/ /spong byed las ni zad bstan pa/ /tshad med blo mnga' 'di la yang / /bdag ni yid gnyis the tshom 'tshal/ /yang dag mtha' yang
bka' stsal la/ /ma nor sbyin pa'ang bstan mdzad pa/ /'di yang rab rib bral ba yi/ /spyan mnga' sdig spangs bstan du gsol/ /thams cad gzigs pa ma gtogs pa/ /gzhan
gyis bdag gi the tshom 'di/ /sel nus ma mchis de lta bas/ /bdag ni rgyal ba mchog la dad/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas the tshom dris pa 'di
dag gsan nas de la lan gdab pa'i phyir mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid dang lung bstan pa/ /bdag gis ma 'tshal ces
smras pa| |gal te 'ga' zhig mi ston na/ /rgyal bas de lung bstan mi gsung / /ci'i phyir zhe na 'di lta bu/ /rang gi rang bzhin gnas gyur na/ /'gyur ba med cing ther zug ste/ /de la
'phel med 'grib pa med/ /me long shin tu yongs dag la/ /ji ltar rang bzhin med pa yi/ /gzugs brnyan snang ba de bzhin du/ /ljon pa chos rnams shes par gyis/ /chos kyi dbyings
ni 'gyur med na/ /mchod pa'i yan lag 'gyur gang zhes/ /yan lag rnams la brtags byos la/ /ljon pa mchod pa 'di la spyod/ /chos dbyings rnam pa thams cad du/ /'gyur med skye
bo mkhas pas rtogs/ /byis pa rnams ni 'di la 'khrul/ /blo sbyangs pas ni med par shes/ /skye ba'ang ma mchis sems kyang bskyed/ /de ni ma 'tshal
ces smras pa/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba'i ldem po dag /gzhan du ma sems mnyan par gyis/ /byis pa 'khor bar dga' ba rnams/ /'khor bar mngon dga' sems zhen pa/ /
log pa'i sems dang 'du shes can/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/ /de dag sngon chad ma thos pa'i/ /sems med chos ni ngas bshad na/ /byis pa'i blo dang ldan
pa rnams/ /'di la kun tu rmongs par 'gyur/ /byang chub gzhol ba'i sems nyid dang / /byang chub phan yon thos gyur nas/ /zil gyis ma non rang byung sems/ /rgya chen de ni thob
par 'gyur/ /'gag pa ma mchis 'chi 'pho ba/ /de yang ma 'tshal ces smras pa/ /'chi 'pho yang dag lung bstan gyi/ /gzhan du ma sems mnyan par gyis/ /gang dag rtag
'dzin de dag la/ /'di la mi 'gyur ther zug med/ /dngos po 'di dag mi rtag ces/ /bde gshegs 'chi 'pho rnam par ston/ /sgyu ma 'dra la lhar skyes pa/ /ji lta bu zhes dogs
gyur pa| |mthar phyin ma gyur slob pa dang / /skye bo rnams la mtho ris bshad/ /gnas pa'ang yod pa ma yin la/ /dge bshes bsten ces gang smra ba/ /gnas dang bral bar bya ba'i
phyir| |gnas pa med pa'i dge bshes bsten/ /g.yo ba ma mchis bgyi ba rnams/ /bstan pa ma 'tshal ces smras pa/ /shing rta'i yan lag 'dus pa dang / /shing rta'i bya ba bzhin du
rtogs| |mi gang bdag yid khas len cing / /bya ba'ang bdag gis byas zin pa/ /de dag la ni bya ba dang / /g.yo ba med par bde gshegs bshad/ /rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang / /
rtogs shes nga yis gang smras pa/ /byis pa log pa'i blo can rnams/ /rang bzhin stong par mi shes pa/ /de dag rnams la bstan pa'i phyir/ /rang bzhin stong zhes bde gshegs
ston| |kun tu rtog pa'i rtog pas bskyed/ /yang dag ma yin rtog pas bcings/ /zhi ba yod cing chos kun kyang / /zhi bar mthong zhes smras pa ni/ /mi shes rmongs par gyur rnams
kyi| |kun tu rtog las sred pa skye/ /skom pas ji ltar smig rgyu la/ /kun tu rtog pas skom pa skye/ /mi mkhas de ni rtog pa'i rgyu/ /yod pa min la log par brtags/ /chu yan par ni mthong
gyur kyang / /smig rgyu la ni chu med do/ /de bzhin yongs su rtog pas dkrugs/ /sdug pa min la sdug par rtogs/ /byis pa 'dod chags ldan pa dag /sdug dang ldan pa rang bzhin gyis//
sdug med smig rgyu chu bzhin te/ /smig rgyu la ni chu med do/ /de bzhin gzugs la sdug pa med/ /gzugs de sdug pa ma yin na/ /byis pa log pa'i 'du shes can/ /sdug par rtog pas
bcings par gyur/ /chos rnams nam mkha' 'dra ba dang / /spong ba dmyal ltung zhes smras pa/ /med pa mthong bar ma gyur pa/ /mi mkhas rnams ni skrag
par 'gyur/ /rang bzhin ngo bo nyid stong na/ /bdag zhen dus ni mi shes pa/ /de dag stong zhes thos gyur na/ /bdag med 'gyur zhes skrag pa skye/ /de dag bdag tu mngon zhen te/ /
nam mkha' la ni mdud bor nas/ /stong pa gya nom spong byed de/ /mi mkhas sems dmyal chen por ltung / /mtho ris 'jigs pa ngas bstan dang / /skye ba'i 'gro rgyud gzhan
dag dang / /las kyang ngas ni bstan byas te/ /byed pa po ni rab tu bkag /yang dag tu na 'gro ba dag /rmi 'drar bshad par shes par gyis/ /rmi lam gang la'ang dngos po med/ /
log pa'i blo ldan mngon par zhen/ /ngas ni las kyi rnam pa bstan/ /byed pa phyogs bcu rnams na med/ /shing rnams rlung gis bsgul ba las/ /me 'byung 'gyur ba ji bzhin
no| |bdag cag me 'di bskyed bya zhes/ /rlung dang shing la sems pa med/ /'on kyang me ni 'byung ba ltar/ /las kyi byed po de bzhin no/ /bsod nams tshogs ni yod min la/ /
byang chub yang dag sgrub pa dang / /legs spyad yod ces zer ba ni/ /de tshul yang dag mnyan par byos/ /mi yi tshe tshad lo brgya ste/ /de srid 'tsho zhes brjod mod kyi/ /lo la phung

por spungs pa med/ /sgrub pa de yang de dang mtshungs/ /zad pa med ces gang smras dang / /las zad ces ni ngas smras pa/ /stong pa'i tshul du zad pa med/ /tha snyad tshul du zad par bstan/ /yang dag mtha'
ni ngas bshad pa/ /phyin ci log de'ang yang dag mtha'/ /log pa'i blo can byis pa rnams/ /gang dag mtha' ni mi shes so/ /mtshan nyid thams cad gcig nyid de/ /mtshan nyid med par shes
pa yi/ /ye shes lam du zhugs rnams kyi/ /nges par ljon pa khyod nyon cig /yi ge gcig gis 'jug pa yi/ /byang chub blo ldan rnams la ston/ /chos rnams thams cad ma byas pa/ /
a yi sgo yi gzungs su bstan/ /de ltar spyod pa byed rnams la/ /mtshan nyid mtha' yas ngas bstan te/ /'di 'dra'i tshul la 'jug pa ni/ /a yi sgo yi gzungs su bstan/ /chos
rnams thams cad 'gag med pa/ /a yi chos la 'jug par bstan/ /a yi sgo yi gzungs bstan pa/ /de yang ljon pas shes par gyis/ /chos rnams rnam par rtog med pa/ /de yang
chos la 'jug par gsungs/ /chos kun 'gyur ba med par yang / /a ni chos kun sgo mor bstan/ /a yi sgo yi gzungs 'di dag /ljon pas de ltar shes par gyis/ /mi zad
pa dang zad smras pa/ /chos kun mi zad brjod bya ste/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba thams cad kyis/ /mi zad sgo yi gzungs su bstan/ /chos rnams kun la sgo med de/ /de dag med pas sgo mi 'byung / /
'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /a la brten nas 'jug par bya/ /chos kun bsam gyis mi khyab ces/ /yang dag ji bzhin bde gshegs bstan/ /
a yi sgo yi gzungs bstan pa/ /de yang ljon pas shes par gyis/ /chos kun lus med byang chub ces/ /blo ldan rnams la ngas bstan pa/ /'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /
a la brten nas 'jug par bya/ /chos rnams 'ong ba med pa ste/ /med pas de dag 'ong ba'ang med/ /'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /a la brten nas 'jug par bya/ /chos
rnams gdags pa med pa ste/ /med pas de dag gdags pa med/ /'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /a la brten nas 'jug par bya/ /chos rnams rang bzhin med pa ste/ /med
pas de dag rang bzhin med/ /'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su bstan/ /gzungs kyi sgo mo nga la nyon/ /chos kun yid la bya ba med/ /'di yang
gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su bstan/ /med phyir chos kun sgrib med ces/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bstan mdzad pa/ /'di yang gzungs kyi sgo
yin te| |a la brten nas shes par bya/ /chos kun thogs pa med pa ste/ /thogs par bya ba de mi dmigs/ /'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /a la brten nas 'jug par bya//
chos rnams thams cad ma skyes par/ /mkhas pas mtshan nyid gcig shes bya/ /chos rnams gang dag ma skyes pa/ /de dag ming med shes par bya/ /chos rnams yang dag ma yin te/ /
de dag ma lus rang bzhin med/ /'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /a la brten nas shes par bya/ /gang dag ma skyes ma byung ba/ /de dag mthong med bstan par bya/ /lta ba po ni med pa
dang / /de dag rnams kyang med phyir ro/ /chos kun mnyam med de bas na/ /mtshan nyid gcig cing mtshan gzhi med/ /nam mkha' dang ni 'dra ba ste/ /chos kun yod pa ma yin no/ /
de lta lhag med chad pa med/ /mnyam gzhag med cing gnyis su med/ /gdung med bsil med tsha ba'ang med/ /blta ba'i lam min med phyir ro/ /drang po ma yin yon po min/ /
mun pa ma yin snang ba min/ /mthong ba med cing thos med de/ /med pas gzungs su shes par gyis/ /g.yo med drang po'ang med pa ste/ /chos rnams gsal med g.yo ba med/ /'khrug
pa med cing khro ba med/ /ci yang mi byed nyer zhi byed/ /skye ba med cing gnas kyang med/ /'gro min ldog med 'gro sems med/ /nyal ba med cing mi nyal med/ /sad pa med par shes
par gyis/ /mig can ma yin long ba min/ /lta ba ma yin mun bsgribs min/ /sbas pa ma yin bzhag pa min/ /dul ba ma yin ma dul min/ /rgod pa ma yin zhi ba min/ /'khor
min mya ngan 'das pa min/ /bden min rdzun min de lta bur/ /rgyal ba'i spyod yul shes par gyis/ /'jig rten 'dul ba'i phyir yin gyi/ /'di la the
tshom gang yang med/ /gang gcad bya ba'i the tshom med/ /dam pa'i don du byung ba med/ /de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhus pa lung bstan pa dang /
gzungs nges par bstan pas yongs su tshim par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ khang pa brtsegs pa shing la brten pa dang / pad+ma la brten
pa dang / ri la brten pa dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can rin po che'i gdugs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ gdugs kyi lda ldis mdzes par byas pa/ rgyal mtshan dang /
ba dan gyis brgyan pa/ bla re dang / lda ldis brgyan pa bye ba phrag brgyad mngon par sprul te/ mi 'am ci'i rol mo'i sil snyan bye ba phrag brgyad kyang mngon par sprul nas ri spos kyi
ngad ldang las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pa dang / chu las skyes pa'i me tog thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas mi'am ci'i tshogs dang lhan cig
tu khang pa brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad po de dag tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te thang las skyes pa dang / chu las skyes pa'i me tog de dag gis
bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /de nas khang ba brtsegs pa de dag las babs te rkang pas dong nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzum par blta zhing rnam pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan
rjes su dran par byed cing phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud
nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bde gshegs dri bral spyan mnga' ba/ /rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi
mdzad| |lha mis mchod pa yang dag tu/ /'dzum mdzad rgyu de bka' stsal gsol/ /thams cad mkhyen pa 'dzum mdzad pa/ /'khor gyis mthong nas the tshom 'tshal/ /zla ba tshes la
mi bzhin du/ /smra ba'i zla ba'i zhal du blta/ /bde gshegs mdzes pa deng su zhig /gnyis med chos la shes mchog skyes/ /bdag ni the tshom 'tshal bar gyur/ /mi mchog dam pa
the tshom 'tshal/ /bde gshegs gang gis chos nyid la/ /dad pa thob na bcom ldan 'das/ /ji ltar 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur/ /smra mchog bdag gi the tshom khum/ /thams cad ldan pa'i
'khor 'di yis/ /bcom ldan stan thos yid dga' zhing / /the tshom ma mchis som nyi chad/ /ji ltar bstan bzhin gnas par 'gyur/ /de ltar
rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog /'gro la thugs brtse mdzad pa dang / /the tshom gcad slad ljon pa dang / /mi ci rnams kyi lung bstan gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe
dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal ba/ /skye bo tshogs chen rnams nang du/ /sangs rgyas yon tan bsten 'gyur ba/ /ljon pa'i lung bstan gang dris pa/ /rta
thul khyod kyis legs par dris/ /ye shes mthong ba sgrib med pa/ /bde gshegs ye shes ngo mtshar can /de khyod dang ba'i yid kyis nyon/ /skye med yid kyis nga la nyon/ /
'jig rten phan dang bde ba'i phyir/ /ljon pas the tshom gang dris pa/ /de yi 'bras bu brjod par bya'i/ /the tshom gcad pas nga la nyon/ /ljon pa la sogs mi 'am ci/ /bye ba
phrag brgyad 'dir lhags pa/ /de dag nga la mchod byas nas/ /'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris 'dong / /bskal pa bye ba dgu bcu der/ /mi yi nang na 'khor bar 'gyur/ /
mngon par shes pa lnga bsgoms nas/ /sems la dbang bsgyur dbang ldan 'gyur/ /mi yi seng+ge de dag gis/ /sangs rgyas zhing phrag khrag khrig tu/ sprul bkye rang ni lha gnas
na| |bsam gtan dga' ba'i bde ba myong / /bskal pa bye ba dgu bcur yang / /de dag lha mir 'khor 'khor nas/ /rang rang zhing rnams sna tshogs su/ /byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgyar 'gyur//
rtag tu snang ba'i bskal pa la/ /mi yi seng+ge 'jig rten mgon/ /chags med ye shes mthong dpag yas/ /stobs bcu gzi brjid mtha' yas 'gyur/ /de dag zhing du sems can gang / /
yongs su ma smin 'ga' mi skye/ /nyan thos theg pas gang 'byung ba/ /kun kyang srid pa tha ma pa/ /mi yi seng+ge zhing der ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang skye ba/ /de dag tshe gcig thogs pa
ste| |mi mchog byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /gang dag gtso bor gyur pa rnams/ /bdag cag dpag med sangs rgyas zhing / /yongs su sbyang bar bya'o zhes/ /de 'dra'i bsam pas rab tu
zhugs| |sems can rlabs chen de dag ni/ /smon lam rgya chen yun ring btab/ /de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ /bsam pas rang bzhin rnam pa spyod/ /nyon mongs 'joms pa de dag
gi /zhing gi bkod par 'gyur ba ni/ /dga' ldan gnas kyi longs spyod rnams/ /ngan song kun kyang yongs su dag /de dag zhing du rnam kun tu/ /mi khom gang yang 'byung mi 'gyur/ /zhing rnams
yongs sbyangs de dag ni/ /sems can rnams kyang bde bar 'dren/ /de ltar 'jig rten mgon po yis/ /mi ci rnams kyi lung bstan bshad/ /lung bstan de thos 'khor rnams ni/ /kun
kyang yid ni rangs par gyur/ /mi 'am ci lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas lha phreng ldan glang po can brgyad khris lha
ma yin rnams nas mi 'am ci'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / /lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes
nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mos zhing bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ de dag gis ser skye'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad kyi khor yug
tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad me tog man+dA ra bas pus mo nub tsam du gang bar byas so/ /de nas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas tshigs su bcad pa
dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ zhi ba'i dbang po 'dzum pa'i zhal/ srog chags kun la thugs brtse ba/ /bde bar gshegs pa thugs rje can/ /'jig rten bdag po mi yi stag/
sangs rgyas chos la mos pa yi/ /'khor 'di ji srid 'dir gnas par/ /zhabs mchog mdzes shing dga' ldan par/ /thugs rjes can la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /ji ltar dgung zla nya
ba'i tshe/ /mi rnams zla ba phyag 'tshal dang / /de bzhin lha tshogs 'di rnams kyang / /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du blta/ /dpag tu med pa'i dge spyod pa/ /dpag med ye shes phung po
ldan| |gzi brjid dpag yas phung po can/ /blo mchog khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /stobs bcu mnga' zhing dpal stug pa/ /de bzhin mi bsnyengs dri gsum sel/ /rgyal ba bco brgyad chos
dang ldan/ /the tshom mi mnga' smra ba'i mchog /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' zhing / /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ldan/ /dbang po'i rgyal mtshan mtshungs med thugs/ /bde gshegs
khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshul khrims stobs kyis mthar phyin pa/ /ting 'dzin stobs gnas mi bskyod pa/ /ye shes stobs kyi mtshon cha can/ /bdud stobs bcom thub rgyal ba lags/
ye shes stobs mchog rgyas gyur pa/ /ser sna mi mnga' nyan thos btul/ /zhi ba'i thugs kyis spyod mdzad cing / /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dul/ /skyes bu seng+ge bde gshegs khyod//
gti mug zhi bgyid chos brnyes pa/ /bdag cag rnams kyang stobs bcu yi/ /chos rnams 'dir ni thos par shog /ji ltar thub khyod sems can gyi/ /bsam mkhyen dad mdzad de bzhin
du| |'jig rten snang mdzad bdag cag kyang / /lha mir bcas pa'i 'gro dad bgyid/ /de ltar 'gro ba'i don slad du/ /snying brtse nye bar bzung nas ni/ /'gro ba 'khor ba'i mtshor bying ba/ /
srid pa'i rgyud las bsgral bar bgyi/ /bdag cag lhar bcas 'jig rten gyi/ 'dren dang rab tu 'dren gyur cig/ 'gro ba sdug bsngal rgyas nyen pa/ /srid pa'i rgyud las dgrol bar
bgyid| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha phreng ldan glang bo can rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan
ba rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bde gshegs rnam par 'dren pa po/ /rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad/ /stobs bcu khyod ni 'dzum
mdzad pa'i/ /rgyu gang lags pa bka' stsal gsol/ /rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad pa/ /'gro ba dang bgyid byung mthong nas/ /'khor kun the tshom 'tshal gyur te/ /'dzum
pa'i don ni nyan par 'tshal/ /don chen 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don/ /bka' stsal bka' stsal 'dren pa mchog /dge sbyong rnams kyi rgyal po khyod/ /the tshom chad 'gyur bka'
stsal gsol/ /gang gis rgyal ba mnyes par gyis/ /gang gis deng mchod bla med gyis/ /su zhig de ring gting thob gyur/ /bde gshegs bdag gi the tshom khum/ /de ring
gang gis bdud kyi gnas/ /dkrugs g.yeng kun tu dkrugs par bgyis/ /deng sus lha gnas thams cad kyang / /rab tu dga' yid ldan par gyis/ /rgyal ba thub pa de lung ston/ /
'gro ba'i the tshom myur du khum/ /de thos bde gshegs 'khor 'di rnams/ /kun kyang rab tu yid dga' 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de tshe dang ldan
ba rta thul la slar bka' stsal pa/ phreng ldan glang po can lha yi/ /lung bstan rta thul khyod dris pa/ /dris na 'gro ba mang po yi/ /don chen shin tu deng byas gyur/ /stobs bcu rgyal
ba ma dris par/ /sras mchog byang chub lung mi ston/ /de ni 'gro ba mang don du/ /de ring khyod kyis rgyal la zhus/ /phreng ldan glang po lha tshogs kyis/ /nga la sems dad nga mchod pas/ /
bskal pa grangs med 'das 'og tu/ /nyon mongs pham byas rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ /mthun par mi yi nang skyes te/ /rgyal ba bye ba dpag med la/ /me tog
mchog gi mchod par 'gyur/ /kun tu bde bar gshegs kyi sems/ /bskyed par 'gyur zhing 'phel byed 'gyur/ /rang byung mi yi seng+ge la/ /tshigs su bcad pas bstod par 'gyur//
ma 'ongs dus na 'di kun gyis/ /rgyal ba khrag khrig dpag yas mang / /me tog gis mchod tshigs bcad kyis/ /mi mchog rnams la bstod byas te/ /de dag bde gshegs rnams
mchod cing / /mthu po che yi sku bstod nas/ /rab tu dga' ba'i bskal pa la/ /rnam par 'dren par 'jig rten 'byung / /grags pa ma smad nags rgyu ba/ /brgyad khri bo rnams de dag
kun| |bskal pa gcig la bde gshegs 'gyur/ /me tog rgyal mtshan ldan zhes bya/ /de na dmyal dang dud 'gro dang / /ngan song gshin rje'i 'jig rten med/ /zhing de na ni lha
min med/ /mi khom thams cad rab tu bcom/ /phreng ldan glang po can lha yi/ /longs spyod sum cu rtsa gsum gyi/ /ci 'dra ba ni de 'drar 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i
tshe tshad dpag tu med/ /de tshe mi dge sgra mi grag /mi dge byed pa smos ci dgos/ /de na rnam 'dren mchog rnams kyi/ /skye bo rnams kyang chos can 'gyur/ /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig
phrag /gang+gA'i bye ma rab mang snyed/ /'gro bar byed 'gyur stobs bcu rnams/ /gnas pa med pa'i chos kyang ston/ /grags pa ma smad de dag gi /ring bsrel dag kyang rgyas par
'gyur| |de dag rnams kyi ring bsrel la'ang / /rgyal ba'i sku mang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /grags pa mtha' yas ldan rnams kyi/ /ring bsrel cho 'phrul sku mthong nas/ /srog
chags bye ba khrag khrig mang / /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed 'gyur/ /phreng ldan gling po can rnams kyi/ /lung bstan 'dren pas bka' stsal pa/ /thos shing shes nas 'khor
kun kyang / /de tshe sems ni rab tu dga'/ /phreng ldan glang po can lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha dgu
khris lha ma yin rnams nas phreng ldan glang po can gyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / /lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing /
dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po ba skyed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ kham pa'i gru la zhon pa'i mi zhig chu yi dbus su

phyin na| gru chag tu 'ong zhes tshu rol nas pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po skye ba de bzhin du/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dgu khri po dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid la dad pa
skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po skyes par gyur nas de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol zhing bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur
te| de dag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i bla re bkra ba blta na sdug pa dgu khri mngon par sprul to/ /de dag kyang phal cher mu tig dmar po dang / skar mdog dang / bai
DUR+Ya dang / gser dang / rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go /lha'i rol mo'i sil snyan dgu khri yang mngon par sprul te/ de dag nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi bla re dgu khri po de dag
thogs nas rol mo'i sil snyan dgu khri po de dag byed cing steng gi bar snang las dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing me tog man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang /
many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab
tu gtor te de dag gis mchod pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ rgyal ba'i
yon tan mthong ba yi/ /lha ni dgu khri tham pa dag /'dren pa khyod kyi spyan snga na/ /thal mo rab tu sbyar nas mchis/ /rgod pa ma mchis zhum ma mchis/ /'dod pa ma mchis 'gyod ma
mchis| |mi blun ngo mtshar ma mchis par/ /rkang gnyis mchog la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /khyod ni srid pa'i rgyud rnams bkum/ /mi shes pa ni rnam par sbyangs/ /sred pa'i phur pa rab
tu phyung / /nga rgyal rgyal mtshan khyod kyis bsnyal/ /khyod ni zug rngu phyung ba ste/ /rma la gdug pa khyod kyis spangs/ /khyod ni mkhyen bzhin spyod pa ste/ /'dren pa khyod ni rma rnams
sos| |khyod kyis nyon mongs thams cad spangs/ /bcing ba dag ni thams cad bcad/ /sbyor ba kun dang bral ba ste/ /thub pa chags pa kun las 'das/ /rgyal ba khyod kyi spyod yul
ni| |stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med/ /bcom ldan khyod la smon pa yang / /rnam pa kun tu mi mnga' 'o/ /khyod kyis sred pa drungs nas phyung / /ma rig pas ni thugs kyang byung / /rnam pa bzhi
po'i phyin ci log /rnam pa kun tu yongs su spangs/ /gang du 'jig rten mi chud de/ /ri dwags rngon pas ji bzhin du/ /'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur ba yi/ /yang dag mtha' ni khyod
kyis gzigs/ /sems can 'jig tshogs ltar lhung ste/ /stong pa nyid ni ma 'tshal bas/ /ma rig pa yi mun pas gtibs/ /'khor ba'i brtson rar dga' bar bgyid//
khyod kyis yang dag ji bzhin du/ /'gro de chang bstod 'drar gzigs/ /gang gis rnam dag mig 'gyur ba'i/ /ye shes snang ba rab tu bstan/ /phung po stong par rnam
par bshig /mig dang gzugs kyang gsog 'dra zhing / /khams rnams dang ni skye mched dag /bdag med stong par rnam par bshig /chos gang dang ni ming gang gis/ /chos
gang mngon par brjod bgyi ba/ /chos de chos des stong pa ste/ /thub pa khyod kyis stong par bstan/ /sgyu ma'i mkhan pos med pa la/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen mngon sprul na/ /de la sems can
gdags ma mchis/ /srog dang gang zag ma mchis ltar/ /de bzhin phung po khams rnams dang / /dbang po dag dang skye mched kyang / /yang dag ma yin sgyu ma zhes/ /skyes bu dam pas bstan
pa mdzad/ /ji ltar ri mo mkhan zhig gis/ /bud med gzugs ni rnam bris shing / /mnyam pa dang ni mi mnyam dang / /lci dang yang ba bstan bgyis na/ /byis pa'i mig ni bslus pa ste/ /de la mi
mnyam ci ma mchis/ /de bzhin chos dbyings nyams lags na/ /byis pa rnams ni de la rmongs/ /gang shes khyod kyi bslab pa la/ /legs bslab rmongs par mi 'gyur ba/ /lag mthil
skyu ru ra bzhin du/ /de ni kun mkhyen khyod kyis bstan/ /shes rab chen po khyed kyis ni/ /ye shes sgron ma rab bus te/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas//
sems can rnams la chos bstan pa/ /de ltar bdag cag myur du ni/ /bla med byang chub zhi thob ste/ /de ltar 'dren pa khyod bzhin du/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyi/ /'khor ba'i lam
log 'di dag tu/ /'khyams gyur pa yi sems can la/ /ji ltar 'dren pas bstan pa bzhin/ /bdag cag gis kyang chos myur bstan/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal chen
bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgyu
ma mchis par rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'dren pa 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ /'dzum pa mdzad pa'i 'dzum gyi rgyu/ /dpa' bo chen pos lung bstan gsol/ /skyes bu dam pa 'khor 'di
dag /bde gshegs deng bzhad mthong nas ni/ /yid gnyis chen po 'tshal gyur te/ /kun kyang the tshom 'tshal bar gyur/ /de ring su yis bdud pham bgyid/ /nem nur gang
gis gcod par 'gyur/ /su zhig de ring chos rtogs 'gyur/ /skyes bu mchog gis lung bstan gsol/ /de ring khyod la su yis mchod/ ston pa gang gis bsnyen bkur bgyis//
'gro kun nem nur 'tshal gyur na/ /rnam par 'dren pas lung bstan gsol/ /ji ltar rkang gnyis mchog khyod kyis/ /lung bstan 'di dag thos gyur na/ /'gro ba the tshom chad 'gyur
ba| |'dren pas de ltar lung bstan gsol/ /ci nas rnam pa thams cad du/ /kun mkhyen lam la gnas pa rnams/ /myur du byang chub thob 'gyur ba/ /de ltar 'dren pas bstan
du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ /'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mgon
po la| |'dzum pa'i rgyu rnams dri bya zhes/ /rta thul khyod kyis dris pa legs/ /'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /bstan pa yid du 'ong 'gyur zhing / /nyams dga' byed pa de
bshad kyi/ /dran pa mngon byos mnyan par gyis/ /dgu khri tham pa'i lha rnams kyis/ /mchod pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu/ /de ring de bzhin gshegs pa la/ /shin tu dad pa'i yid
kyis byas/ /sangs rgyas mngon par bstod par byas/ /stong pa nyid kyang shes par 'gyur/ /chos rnams la ni nges pa rnyed/ /nga yi bstan la rab tu gnas/ /sngon yang sangs rgyas
bye ba phrag /brgyad cu dag la 'di dag mchod/ /ma 'ongs dus na'ang sangs rgyas ni/ /bye ba mtha' yas mchod par 'gyur/ /'dren pa de dag ji srid du/ /sangs rgyas bye ba ma mchod
cing / /bsnyen bkur byas par ma gyur pa/ /de srid byang chub 'tshang mi rgya/ /de bas shin tu 'phyi ba na/ /kun kyang gang zag mchog tu 'gyur/ /mtshan ni
'od zer 'chang ba ste/ /'jig rten kun mkhyen thub par 'gyur/ /'jig rten sgron ma de dag gi /nyan thos 'dus par 'gyur ba ni/ /blo yi mchog dang ldan pa dag /'dus pa
brgyad cu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sgrib med gzigs pa de dag gi /mi rnams de yi dus kyi tshe/ /lo grangs bye ba brgyad cu tham/ /srog gi dbang po gnas par 'gyur/ /shes rab
mtha' yas de dag gi /nyan thos 'dod chags bral ba rnams/ /lus kyi tha ma 'dzin pa dang / /bye ba tshad med 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i/ /'jig
rten mgon po dpal ldan rnams/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i ring bsrel yang / /shin tu rgya chen 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mi dbang mya ngan 'das gyur nas/ /rnam par 'dren pa dpal
ldan pa| |rgyal ba'i mchod rten rnams kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams legs rgyas 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyi/ /mchod rten de dag thams cad la/ /
srog chags brgya dang stong rnams dang / /khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod byas nas/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de/ /mya ngan 'das pa thob par 'gyur/ /rang byung mya ngan
'das nas kyang / /de dag dam chos gnas 'gyur ba/ /lo grangs bye ba khrag khrig phrag /brgyad cu tshang bar gnas par 'gyur/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams kyis/ /bzung zhing yongs
su bsrungs par gnas/ /'jig rten thugs brtse mdzad pa dang / /shAkyas yongs su smin mdzad pa/ /rgyal chen bzhi yi ris rnams la/ /'jig rten sgron mas lung bstan mdzad/ /de
thos nas ni skye bo kun/ /kun tu dga' zhing rab dga' ste/ /sems mgu yid kyang rangs gyur nas/ /ston pa la ni mngon par bstod/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/
bcu bzhi pa'o// //bam po drug pa/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin dag dang / nam
mkha' lding dag dang / klu'i bu mo dag dang / klu dag dang / grul bum dag dang / dri za dag dang / gnod sbyin dag dang / mi 'am ci dag dang / phreng ldan glang po can dag dang /
rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la tshim zhing mgul yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba
dang / yid bde ba skyes nas yid byung ba chen po skyes te/ 'dod pa'i tshul gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ de
dag gis rin po che'i khang pa bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can/ mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba dang / bai DUR+Ya'i phreng bas
brgyan pa/ gser gyi phreng ba sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che skar mdog gi phreng bas brgyan pa/ sa gnas rim pa brgya dang / ba gam dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / skar
khung gis brgyan pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi seng+ge'i khris brgyan pa/ bla re chen po dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas
brgyan pa/ lha'i rol mo'i tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i rol mo sil snyan sgra rab tu 'byung ba bye ba phrag brgyad cu mngon par sprul to/ /rta cang shes kyis drangs pa'i
shing rta lha rdzas kyi rnam pas legs par brgyan pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis mdzes par byas pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu yang mngon par sprul to/ /
ser skye'i gnas kyi grong khyer thams cad dang ldan pa'i khor ra khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad me tog man+dA ra ba dang / lha'i mchod pa dag gis rgyas par gang bar
byas so| |glang po che sa srung gi bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu yang mngon par sprul te/ glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag re re zhing yang mgo bo bye ba phrag brgyad cu brgyad cu/ glang po che sa

srung gi bu'i mgo de dag re re zhing yang so drug drug /so de dag re re zhing rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu de dag re re zhing yang pad+ma stong phrag bdun bdun/ pad+ma re re zhing yang 'dab ma brgyad khri
