brgyad khri/ 'dab ma re re zhing yang lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo de dag re re zhing yang 'khor bdun bdun yod pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa sha stag mngon par sprul nas rin
po che'i khang pa de dag mdun du byas te/ dbus su glang po che sa srung gi bu dag btsud nas phyi bzhin shing rta de ltar bshams pa de dag bkye nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas so/ /
rin po che'i khang pa de dag las kyang lha'i tsan+dan dang / a ga ru dang / ut+pa la dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dang / gser phye'i char mngon par bab par gyur to/ /lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba
dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / sprul pa'i me tog
dag gi char yang mngon par bab par gyur te/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gi char
yang mngon par bab par gyur to/ /lha'i bu mo de dag las la la ni/ glu len/ la la ni/ gar byed/ la la ni/ rol mo byed/ la la ni/ lus kyi tshul sgyur zhing lha ma yin gyi mchod
pa lta bu dang / glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag dang / rin po che'i khang pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas de'i 'og tu rta cang shes kyis drangs pa'i shing rta bye
ba phrag brgyad cu la zhon te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas lha'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs mang po yang phul bar gyur to/ /lha'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag
brgyad cu yang bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to/ /shing rta bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag la yang lha'i bu mo gzhan bye ba phrag brgyad cu brgyad cu mngon par sprul te/ lha'i bu mo de
dag kyang la la ni/ glu len/ la la ni/ gar byed/ la la ni/ rol mo byed/ la la ni/ lus kyi tshul sgyur zhing lha ma yin gyi mchod pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas so/ /de
nas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar sprul pa'i lha'i bu mo 'di dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa las na/ chos
thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra ba yin du nges so/ /snyam nas de dag 'di snyam du chos 'di dag thams cad ni/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa de bzhin te/ sprul pa dang
'dra ba yin no/ /snyam du sems par gyur cing / de dag gis chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra bar shes nas chos la the tshom med pa thob par gyur to/ /de dag de ltar the tshom
med cing nem nur med par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de dag
chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra bar rtog cing / bdag cag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong / mchod pa de dag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong / bcom ldan 'das kyang sprul
pa dang 'dra bar mthong nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang bstan pa de dag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar yang dag par shes te/ de dag gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'o/ /zhes
bya bar shes nas the tshom med cing nem nur med par gyur te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ 'gro ba kun gyis mchod pa gang bgyis
dang / /sprul pa'i mchod pa 'di dag gang bgyis dang / /lha rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas mchod byas pa/ /'di ltar chos 'di thams cad sprul pa nyid/ /'dren pas chos kun gsungs pa
gang lags dang / /de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan mtha' dag kyang / /'di dag thams cad sprul pa 'dra'o zhes/ /de ltar lha tshogs de dag blo gros skyes/ /bcom ldan sprul pa 'di dag
ji bzhin du/ /ston pa'ang de bzhin sprul dang 'dra ba ste/ /rgyal bas lung bstan bdag cag 'tshal gyur pas/ /'di la bdag cag the tshom ma mchis so/ /rgyal bas so so'i skye bo rnams mkhyen nas//
byis pa'i sa thob tha snyad gang btags pa/ /de dag kun kyang sprul pa ji bzhin te/ /bde gshegs 'gro ba lung bstan de bzhin no/ /slob pa rnams dang gang
dag mi slob dang / /bcom ldan nyan thos dul ba'i sa thob pa/ /de dag kun kyang bcom ldan sprul dang 'dra/ /bcom ldan bstan la the tshom ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan gang rnams mi smra
lhur len cing / /bse ru lta bur gnyis med nyon mongs spangs/ /de dag rnams kyang sprul 'drar bcom ldan 'das/ /bde gshegs bstan la the tshom ma mchis so/ /gang rnams
'gro ba kun la bde phan phyir/ /rgyal ba'i byang chub spyad spyod bag yod pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' bde gshegs sras dag kyang / /khyad par ma mchis sprul pa 'di dang 'dra/ /bde gshegs
rang byung rnam par 'dren pa mchog /stobs bcu shes rab mtha' yas thugs rje can/ /ye shes stobs 'phags 'jig rten gtso bo dag /sprul pa 'di 'dra de dag rang bzhin
mtshungs/ /'dren pas 'di la chos rnams gang gsungs pa/ /gnas med zhi bsil nyon mongs med gyur cing / /sdug bsngal zhi byed mthar thug grangs med pa/ /de yang sprul pa
'di dag ji bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'di la chos rnams gang dag dag kyang / /sprul pa'i rang bzhin ma lags de ma mchis/ /gang tshe go 'u ta ma'i bstan pa 'di/ /bdag cag rtogs
nas the tshom thams cad spangs/ /sprul pa 'di 'drar chos rnams kun mthong nas/ /bdag cag rnams kyang 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur/ /bde gshegs spyod yul 'di la spyod pa
rnams| |the tshom ma mchis rang byung 'dren par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs
su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gzhal med grags mang mtha' yas gzi brjid can/ /bde
gshegs rnams ni rgyu med 'dzum mi mdzad/ /rnam par 'dren pas 'dir ni 'dzum mdzad na/ /rgyal bas 'dzum pa'i tshig gsungs the tshom khum/ /rang byung bde gshegs zhal nas
'dzum pa 'di/ /byung bar rigs nas 'jig rten the tshom 'tshal/ /'gro ba'i the tshom thub pas bsal du gsol/ /'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis mdzod/ /lha tshogs 'di rnams
rab tu yid dga' bas/ /rgyal ba bstod de lha rdzas rnams kyis mchod/ /bde gshegs de dag don du 'dzum pa mdzad/ /rgyal ba 'khor 'di dga' mdzad bka' stsal to/ /zla 'drar dri
med 'od mnga' mtha' yas gzi/ /ci nas bde gshegs bka' ni 'di thos pas/ /mgon po 'gro ba thams cad dgar 'gyur bar/ /rgyal ba lha tshogs mchod mkhyen bka' stsal
gsol| |bde gshegs lha tshogs 'di yis chos rnams kun/ /sprul pa lta bur rnam par rtogs gyur na/ /stobs bcu mnga' bas don 'di bka'
stsal te| |rab rib bral ba lha yi bslab pa gsungs/ /skye bo 'di dag the tshom bral gyur nas/ /thub pa de ltar byang chub spyod rtsom 'gyur/ /rab tu dpa' ba 'khor 'dis thos gyur
te| |dgongs pa rig nas rgyal chen rtsom par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ lha tshogs 'di dag rab tu
dga' shes nas/ /rta thul khyod kyis dus dang ldan pa'i tshig /smras pa de ni dus la bab pa ste/ /'dzum pa dris pa de ni lung bstan to/ /lha rnams bsam shes 'dzum pa de dris
pa| |des ni khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don chen byas/ /'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de ngas bstan gyi/ /dga' zhing dang ba'i sems kyis nga la nyon/ /lha tshogs rnams kyis chos rnams 'di
dag ni| |ma lus sprul pa lta bur shes gyur nas/ /chags med ye shes mthong ba dpag med cing / /rab rib bral ba'i 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur/ /srid pa'i rgyud na sngon yang
'khor ba'i tshe/ /mi yi gtso bo gang+gA'i bye snyed mchod/ /sring rgyud de na 'di dag thub pa las/ /chos rnams sprul pa lta bur ma mthong ngo / /'di dag nga la mchod mchog 'dir
byas pas/ /chos rnams sprul pa 'dra bar mngon du mthong / /bde gshegs bstan pa 'di la byas pa ni/ /chud zos mi 'gyur bar chad yod mi 'gyur/ /lha tshogs 'di yis nga la mchod
byas te| |chos rnams thams cad sprul pa 'drar shes pas/ /bskal pa pad+ma zhes bya byung ba'i tshe/ /smra ba'i zla ba mi yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /khyu mchog ldan pa'i ming mchog 'gyur ba ni/ /
bde gshegs rab mkhas dbang po'i tog rgyal po/ /chos rnams thams cad sprul pa 'drar ston cing / /'gro ba khrag khrig dpag med 'grol bar 'gyur/ /bde gshegs de dag bstan
la bag yod pa/ /chos rnams 'di dag sprul pa 'dra bar sems/ /zhi gnas de la su brten bag yod pa/ /myur du bla med byang chub mchog zhi thob/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa lung bstan
pa'i le'u ste/ bco lnga pa'o// //de nas de'i tshe 'thab bral gyi lha bye ba phrag bzhi bcus lha ma yin rnams nas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bar du de dag gis mchod pa
yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyang lung bstan pa la thogs
pa mi mnga' bar shes shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ nyams dga' ba ste/ de dag thob na/ ma shes pa'am/ ma mthong ba'am/ ma rtogs pa'am/ mngon du ma byas
pa'am| skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ las sam/ las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yang med do/ /zhes sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa bskyed do//
'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas kun rdzob dang / don dam pa gnyis thugs su chud de/ shes par bya ba yang kun rdzob dang / don dam pa 'dir zad do/ /de yang bcom ldan
'das kyis stong pa nyid rab tu gzigs/ rab tu mkhyen/ legs par mngon du mdzad pas/ de'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o/ /de la kun rdzob ni/ 'jig rten gyi
spyod par de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs so/ /don dam pa gang yin pa de ni/ brjod du med pa ste/ shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ yongs
su shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/ ma thos pa/ thos par ma byas pa/ ma shes pa/ rnam par ma shes pa/ ma bstan pa/ ma mthong ba/ ma brtags
pa| 'dzin du ma bcug pa/ rtogs par ma byas pa/ thob par ma byas pa/ ma thob pa/ nye bar ma bsnyen pa/ ma bor ba/ ma bzhag pa/ ma spangs pa/ bya ba med pa/ byad pa
med pa| rab tu zhi ba med pa/ ma smad pa/ ma bstod pa/ thob pa ma yin pa/ ma thob pa ma yin pa/ bde ba ma yin pa/ sdug bsngal ma yin pa/ snyan pa ma yin pa/ mi snyan pa ma
yin pa| gzugs ma yin pa/ gzugs med pa ma yin pa/ grangs med pa/ bgrang ba med pa/ 'jig rten med pa/ 'jig rten dang bral ba med pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/
rnam par byang ba med pa/ 'gro ba med pa/ ldog pa med pa/ ma brtags pa/ rnam par ma brtags pa/ ma g.yos pa/ ma bsam pa/ ma bskyod pa/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa/
ma spros pa/ spros pa dang bral ba ste/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs
pa| mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi mtshan ma mi
dmigs pa/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba
dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ yid kyi 'dus
te reg pa las byung ba'i chor ba'i bar gyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs kyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ chos kyi bar gyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs
su sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ chos kyi bar du sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ yid la bya ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ sa dang /
chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi
mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di ltar chos gang dang gang brjod pa'i rang bzhin gang dang gang gis brjod
pa'i chos de dang de brjod pa'i rang bzhin de dang des mi brjod pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ de ltar nyams dga' ba yin na/ de byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi
ldan pa mi shes pa rnams kyis thos na/ 'jigs shing sngangs pa dang / skrag par 'gyur te/ des 'jigs par gyur pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las nyams par
'gyur te/ de dag ni/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mya ngan du bya ba ste/ 'khor ba na yod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyun to/ /zhes te/ de dag gis 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos
rnams la 'dod pa bskyed nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi don du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ de dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i mchod pa las
khyad par du 'phags pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod de bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs
gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas 'thab bral gyi lha de dag bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ rgyal ba khyod kyis phung po
dben par gzigs/ /khams dang skye mched rnams kyang de bzhin te/ /dbang po'i grong ni mtshan mas dben pa dag /kun kyang thub pa khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs/ /'jig rten mkhas
pa'i bden pa de gnyis te/ /khyod kyis gzhan las ma gsan rang gis gzigs/ /de ni kun rdzob bden dang don dam ste/ /bden pa gsum pa gang yang ma mchis so/ /gang gis bde
bar gshegs la 'gro ba rnams/ /bde ba'i don du dad pa skye 'gyur ba/ /rgyal bas 'gro ba rnams kyi don slad du/ /'jig rten phan phyir kun rdzob de bstan to/ /sems can tshogs kyi
'gro drug gang bstan pa/ /sems can dmyal dang dud 'gro yi dwags dang / /lha min ris dang mi dang lha yi rnams/ /mi yi seng+ges kun rdzob btags pa mdzad/ /rigs dma' de bzhin
mtho ba'i rigs rnams dang / /phyug po'i khyim dang dbul ba'i khyim rnams dang / /bran gyi tshogs dang de bzhin g.yo gi tshogs/ /bud med tshogs dang skyes pa ma ning dang / /'gro
ba'i khyad par ji snyed gang yang rung / /mtshungs med khyod kyis 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa/ /kun rdzob bden par mkhas pas thugs chud nas/ /'jig
rten phan pas mi la de bstan to/ /de la dga' ba'i 'gro ba 'khor ba ni/ /'gro ba'i chos brgyad de la mi 'byung ste/ /thob dang ma thob snyan dang mi snyan dang / /bstod dang smad dang bde
dang sdug bsngal lo/ /thob pa rnyed na de la chags pa skyed/ /ma thob gyur na des kyang 'khrug par 'gyur/ /gang gzhan ma bstan tshul 'dis shes par bya/ /nad rnams brgyad
kyis de rgyud gnod par 'gyur/ /kun rdzob de la don dam su smra ba/ /de dag nor ba'i blo ldan shes par bya/ /mi sdug sdug dang sdug bsngal bde ba dang / /bdag med rang bzhin bdag tu smra
pa dang / /mi rtag chos la rtag ces smra bgyid cing / /de ltar dga' ste mtshan mar gang gnas pa/ /de dag bder gshegs gsungs ni thos gyur na/ /'jigs shing ji bzhin
mi rtogs spong bar bgyid/ /de dag bde gshegs gsung ni spangs gyur pas/ /sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal mi bzad myong / /de dag tshul min bde ba tshol bgyid
kyang / /sdug bsngal brgyad dag byis pas myong bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten phan pa'i bstan pa su zhig gis/ /ma log blos ni rnam par rtogs gyur na/ /sbrul gyi pags pa rnying ltar rab
spangs te/ /srid pa kun las 'das nas zhi bar 'gyur/ /chos 'di thams cad rang bzhin dben pa ste/ /stong pa mtshan ma med pa don dam zhes/ /gang gis thos nas dga' ba skye
'gyur ba/ /de dag bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /ji ltar bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos/ /de la lha rnams the tshom ma mchis te/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su
dgrol ba'i phyir/ /de dag bla na med pa'i byang chub tshol/ /byang chub blo can rnam dag blo can rnams/ /skyes bu mchog gis dga' ba bskyed du gsol/ /de thos 'gro ba kun la sman
slad du| |bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'thab bral ris kyi lha bye ba phrag bzhi bcu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud
nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/ 'jig rten phan pas 'dzum pa gang mdzad des/ /khyod kyi
'khor ni the tshom 'tshal bar 'gyur/ /mi mchog 'dzum pa'i rgyu de bka' stsal gsol/ /des ni 'khor 'di rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /lha rnams lung bstan de ni thos gyur na/ /'khor
'di shin tu dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur/ /rigs pa ldan pa bstan pa 'di nyid la/ /bde ba nan tan bgyid cing rtsom par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba khyod 'khor 'dir ni mchog ldan te/ /drang
srong chen po sangs rgyas yon tan snod/ /'gro ba 'di rnams bsdu ba mdzad slad du/ /snyan pa'i gsung ni legs par brjod du gsol/ /sangs rgyas
yon tan mthu dag thos gyur na/ /skye rgu kun la rab tu sman par 'gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan de thos na/ /mkhas pa rnams ni tshul bzhin rtsom par 'gyur/ /
mi yi dam pa smra ba'i mchog gis 'dir/ /the tshom 'tshal ba'i nem nur legs par gsol/ /'khor rnams thams cad thos par dga' zhing bstod/ /lha rnams lung
bstan pa ni bka' stsal gsol/ /kun kyang rim gror gus par rna blags te/ /khyod kyi lung bstan rab tu dga' ba la/ /sgrib pa rab tu spangs shing de dag nyan/ /'jig rten
phan phyir skyes bu mchog gis gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten phan phyir mkhas pas
'dzum mdzad pa/ /rta thul khyod kyis dris pa dus dang ldan/ /sangs rgyas yon tan mthu ni thos gyur na/ /skye bo tshogs chen rnams kyi don du 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas yon tan tshogs la
blo zhan cing / /'dod chags blo dang zhe sdang blo ldan dang / /tshe rabs brgyar ni rtsod pa'i blo can dang / /gti mgu blo can dga' ba skyer mi 'gyur/ /gang rnams rgyal bas bstan la
dga' ba dang / gang gis rgyal ba rnams la sngon dris dang / /gang rnams snying rje che dang ldan pa dag /de kun sangs rgyas yon tan ldan par 'gyur/ /gang gis 'gro ba gnod zin mthong
gyur te| |mi yi seng+ge snying rje skyed byed pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas yon tan 'di thos na/ /ut+pal phreng bzhin mgo la khyer bar 'gyur/ /nga yi 'khor 'di rab tu dga' gyur pa/ /sngon gyi
rgyal la bsnyen bkur sngon byas te/ /de dag sangs rgyas yon tan yid 'ong 'di/ /me tog phreng bzhin de dag yang dag lta/ /'thab bral lha rnams sngon gyi rgyal kun la/ /bsnyen
bkur byas shing chags pa spangs pa ste/ /nyon mongs smad cing sangs rgyas blo ldan 'gyur/ /snying rje ldan zhing nyon mongs med blo ldan/ /rgyal ba mi yi seng+ge gang+gA yi/ /bye snyed kun la
sngon chad bsnyen bkur byas/ /byang chub bla na med par smon byed cing / /dge ba mtha' yas 'di dag kun gyis byas/ /sems can nyon mongs 'dam bying rig gyur nas/ /sdug bsngal
gyur pa rnams la snying rje bskyed/ /de dag mi mchog sems can yang mdzad la/ /chos tshul mtha' yas yongs su dris par gyur/ /gang thos nas ni rnam par 'dren gyur pa/ /rnam 'dren
chos la 'jug pa 'chad par gyur/ /mi yi nyon mongs spyod pa rab mkhyen nas/ /de dag rnams la rgya chen chos kyang 'chad/ /rnam 'dren skyes bu dam pa'i mchog de dag /rang bzhin med
pa stong pa nyid kyang 'chad/ /de dag rgyal ba'i gsung de thos gyur nas/ /'gro ba thams cad stong par rab tu rtogs/ /cis stong zhe na mtshan ma'i rnam
pas stong / /rang bzhin med cing mtshan ma med pa smra/ /rgyal ba'i chos rnams de ltar shes gyur nas/ /kun kyang sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la gnas/ /de dag nga la mchod pa
rgya chen byas/ /bdag gis chos bzhin du ni lung bstan nas/ /skar tshogs mnyam pa'i bskal ba dam pa la/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /bde gshegs
mnyam pa med pa bye ba phrag /nyi shu nyi shus yongs su gang bar 'gyur/ /blo gros dag ces bya ba'i grangs su 'gro /sems can bsam yas yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur/ /
'thab bral 'khod pa'i lha yi bsam pa rnams/ /rta thul gyis ni yongs su zhus byas pa/ /rgyal ba dgra rgyal drang srong chen po yis/ /lung bstan lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten
dga'| |'thab bral ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu drug pa'o// //de nas dga' ldan ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas 'thab bral gyi
ris kyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i chos de gang zhig /ci gzugs sam/ 'on te tshor ba'am/ 'on te 'du shes sam/ 'on te 'du byed dam/ 'on te rnam par shes pa zhig bcom
ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan snyam nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gzugs ni|bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs kyang ma skyes pa/ byang chub kyang ma skyes pa na/ ji ltar ma skyes pas ma skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par
'tshang rgya bar bya/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa/ byang chub kyang ma skyes pa na/ de la ji ltar ma skyes pas ma skyes pa mngon
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ gzugs kyang 'gag pa med pa/ byang chub kyang 'gag pa med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang 'gag pa med pa/ byang chub kyang 'gag
pa med pa/ gzugs kyang spros pa med pa/ byang chub kyang spros pa med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang spros pa med pa/ byang chub kyang spros pa med pa/ gzugs kyang gnyis
su med pa/ byang chub kyang gnyis su med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang gnyis su med pa/ byang chub kyang gnyis su med pa/ gzugs kyang g.yo ba
med pa| byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang g.yo ba med pa/ byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa/ gzugs kyang dmigs su med pa/ byang chub kyang dmigs
su med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang dmigs su med pa/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med pa na/ ji ltar 'gag pa med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / gnyis su med pa
dang / g.yo ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pas 'gag pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa'i bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ de ltar chos thams cad mi
dmigs na/ 'di la sangs rgyas ni/ gang / byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gang / byang chub ni/ gang / lung bstan pa ni/ gang / gzugs ni/ gzugs kyis stong / tshor
ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ rnam par shes pas stong / sangs rgyas ni/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong / byang chub sems dpa' ni/
byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong / byang chub ni/ byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong / lung bstan pa ni/ lung bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ de ltar chos thams cad
rang bzhin gyis stong pa la gzugs zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang / lung bstan pa'i bar zhes bya ba de dag ni/ tha snyad tsam/ ming
tsam| brda tsam/ kun rdzob tsam/ brjod pa tsam/ gdags pa tsam ste/ de la mkhas pa rnams kyis mngon par zhen par bya ba'i mi cha'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi zhig nyal ba'i
rmi lam na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing rtse rtse ba las/ de la nyal ba las sad na/ 'dod pa'i yon tan de dag mi mthong ste/ de rjes su dran na yang mi rnyed cing / de ltar ma rnyed
pa'i phyir sdug bsngal du 'gyur ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyang byang chub tshol na/ de dag byang chub dang phrad par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub
ma rnyed cing ro ma myong bas sdug bsngal du 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni/ rmi lam lta bu nor ba ste/ chos de dag gi don ni/ rnam pa gzhan la/ so so'i skye bo
de dag kyang rnam pa gzhan du zhen to/ /chos de dag ni/ de ltar shes par bya ba yin na/ de la chos gang zhig sangs rgyas yin/ gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin/ gang zhig byang chub
yin| gang zhig lung bstan pa yin/ /de ltar chos thams cad dmigs su med de/ so so'i skye bo yang dmigs su med de/ so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang dmigs su med/ nyan thos kyang
dmigs su med/ nyan thos kyi chos kyang dmigs su med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang dmigs su med/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang dmigs su med
byang chub sems dpa' yang dmigs su med/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang dmigs su med/ sangs rgyas kyang dmigs su med/ sangs rgyas kyis chos kyang dmigs su
med/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang dmigs su med do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de la ni/ bdag cag the tshom ma mchis/ yid gnyis ma
mchis so/ /zhes gsol nas dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i bu de dag chos de dag la the tshom med cing nem nur med par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir
brtson par gyur nas de dag gis 'thab bral gyi mchod pa las khyad par du 'phags pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag
gis mngon par bstod pa/ gang dag sangs rgyas yon tan rab gnas pa/ de dag 'jug pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /rnam thar sgo gsum de ni rnyed gyur pas/ /mtshungs
pa med pa'i spyod yul spyod par 'gyur/ /gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes ma mchis te/ /sems dang bsam pa de bzhin ma mchis pa/ /chags med blo mnga' rnams kyi spyod
yul lags/ /mi yi seng+ge phung po dben la dgyes/ /skyes bu dam pa mkhas pa de dag gi /byang chub sems kyang nam yang 'byung ma mchis/ /phung po dben pa'i yon tan myong
gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas dgongs la nem nur spangs blo ldan/ /de dag byang chub smon pa ma mchis shing / /byang chub sems la'ang de dag mi smon de/ /dga' dang zhum par 'gyur
ba ma mchis par/ /bde gshegs sras rnams spyad pa spyod byed pas/ /bde gshegs rnams kyis chos rnams mnyam par gzigs/ /de la rgyal sras 'jigs dang bral ba rnams/ /
yang dang nyid du sangs rgyas legs spyod cing / /mkhas pa de dag 'jig rten 'di na spyod/ /gzugs kyi mtshan ma rnam par gzhig bgyis shing / /mtshan ma'i rnam pa thams
cad rab spangs te/ /srid pa gsum la de dag yong mi smon/ /dngos po stong par smon lam de dag bgyid/ /phung po 'di dag ma skyes rtogs gyur cing / /lung bstan bde gshegs
nyid kyang ma skyes la/ /byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyang ma skyes/ /de ltar gang 'tshal de la rmongs ma mchis/ /skye bo'i chos dang sangs rgyas yon tan rnams/ /de dag
kun dang bde gshegs ma skyes te/ /mi yi seng+ge de ltar gang 'tshal ba/ /de ni khyod sras khyod ni de yi yab/ /gang zhig phung po 'gag pa ma mchis shing
khams dang skye mched de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos/ /byang chub rgyal ba de bzhin lung bstan pa/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di kun 'gag med 'tshal ba dang / /gang rnams byang chub 'tshal
cing spyod bgyid pa/ /'jig rten mkhas pa de dag 'gag ma mchis/ /'gro ba thams cad 'gag med blor gyur na/ /de 'dra'i blo can byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ /phung po skye mched
dag dang khams rnams dang / /byang chub rgyal ba rgyal las mi g.yo bar/ /gang gis 'tshal ba de dag rgyal sras te/ /de dag rgyal ba'i chos 'di 'dzin pa lags/ /phung po
sems med de bzhin skye mched dang / /khams dang byang chub rgyal ba rgyal sras dang / /lung bstan de bzhin sems dpa' ma mchis par/ /gang gis 'tshal ba de dag rgyal
ba'i sras/ /rang byung phung po dngos nyid stong pa ste/ /khams dang skye mched dag dang rgyal ba dang / /byang chub dang ni lung bstan rgyal sras rnams/ /ngo bo nyid kyis stong par gang
spyod dang / /phung po spros 'dra de bzhin khams rnams dang / /skye mched rkang gnyis mchog dang byang chub dang / /lung bstan spros pa med par gang spyod cing / /de ltar gang 'tshal de
dag rgyal ba'i sras/ /gnas pa ma mchis mi gnas ma lags te/ /mchis pa ma lags ma mchis yod ma lags/ /'dus byas ma lags 'dus ma byas ma lags/ /de ltar gang
'tshal de dag rgyal ba'i sras/ /rgyal dang 'gro 'di de ltar yongs mthong zhing / /ston pa'i dgongs pa de ltar 'tshal gyur la/ /de ltar bgyis na gang zag mchog mchod cing / /'dren
pa 'khor dang bcas la bsnyen bkur lags/ /rnam par 'dren pa bstod pa'i bsod nams gang / /ji snyed 'jig rten phan mdzad mkhyen pa yi/ /dge ba 'di yis 'gro ba rang byung
pa| |rgyal ba mtshan mchog ldan par 'grub par shog /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan ris kyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /
de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'dren pa rgyu yi stobs ni gang zhig gis/ /stobs chen brnyes pa 'di ltar 'dzum mdzad pa//
'dzum pa'i rgyu de 'dren pas bka' stsal gsol/ /des ni 'jig rten 'di dag dga' bar 'gyur/ /shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad pa/ /'gro ba 'dis mthong the tshom 'tshal
gyur te| |nyan par 'tshal zhing gzhan du mi sems par/ /kun kyang 'jig rten phan pa'i zhal du lta/ /'di ltar dper na nad pa nad skyo ba/ /sman pas bsgo ba bzhin du 'dzin bgyid pa/ /de
bzhin 'khor 'di lung bstan thos 'tshal zhing / /rkang gnyis dbang po bde gshegs zhal du lta/ /'khor 'di thams cad rgya chen ldan pa ste/ /sangs
rgyas dgongs la zhen pa'i yid dang ldan/ /rgyal bas lung bstan de dag thos 'tshal te/ /kun kyang bde gshegs zhal du lta zhing sdod/ /de la rgyal bas thugs rje che bskyed cing //
ci nas 'khor 'di rab tu dga' 'gyur dang / /sangs rgyas dgongs la bsam pa gzhog 'gyur bas/ /ye shes stobs kyis the tshom gcad du gsol/ /mi yi khyu mchog lung
bstan dus la bab/ /the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom bsal du gsol/ /sangs rgyas slar bsdo'i dgra ni mi mnga' na/ /rtog ge'i tshogs kyi sde ni gzhig tu gsol/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul khyod kyis 'jig rten sgron mdzad la/ /'dzum pa'i don dris de ni dus dang ldan//
de ltar 'jig rten mkhas la dris pas na/ /de ring 'gro ba 'di yi don chen byas/ /'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa/ /gang gis chos rab 'di dag shes gyur te/ /
nga la mchod pa rgya chen 'di byas pa'i/ /dga' ldan lha yi bsam pa mkhyen nas mdzad/ /'gro ba yang dag rtogs pa bzhin du mthong / /rgyal ba'i dgongs pas chos nyid brnyes
par gyur/ /gang la 'gro ba thams cad rmongs gyur pa'i/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum rab tu rtogs/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag bya byas/ /bsam pa gcig gis zhu ba legs
par zhus/ /de nyid du ni stong nyid legs par bsgoms/ /sngon chad byas pa de ni 'dir yang bstan/ /de dag de bzhin gshegs dang deng phrad cing / /skyes bu mchog dang 'grogs
pa thob gyur nas/ /stong pa nyid kyis 'dren pa bstod byas pas/ /de ring 'gro ba'i don chen shin tu byas/ /'gro ba thams cad skye med ji bzhin du/ /byang chub rgyal ba de bzhin lung bstan
dang / /gang dag zhi ba thob nas spyod pa dang / /byang chub de bzhin de dag skye ba med/ /'gro ba kun gyi chos nyid de 'dra ba/ /de shes byang chub thob par 'gyur ro zhes/ /lha rnams gang yang
de la the tshom med/ /byang chub sems kyis rtag par de ltar spyod/ /de bzhin 'gro ba 'gag med ji bzhin du/ /lha tshogs 'di dag rtog pa'i blo ldan te/ /mkhas pa 'di dag nem nur
med pas na/ /de phyir 'di dag rgyal ba rang byung 'gyur/ /gnas pa med pa la ni nges gyur nas/ /g.yo ba med pa de la nem nur med/ /'gro ba kun la sems pa yod min pa/ /de la'ang
lha rnams the tshom yod med do/ /chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med/ /byang chub sems dang de bzhin byang chub kyang / /thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med/ /de la'ang lha rnams
the tshom rnam par dag /blo mchog ldan pa'i dga' ldan lha 'di rnams/ /kun kyang gnas med de la rab gnas te/ /de phyir lha rnams byang chub rnyed mi
dka'| |rang byung nyid ni myur du thob par 'gyur/ /'dren pa skar ma 'dra ba'i bskal pa la/ /'gro ba mtha' yas rnam par 'grol bar 'gyur/ /rgyal ba de dag mtshan du
'gyur ba ni/ /rang byung chos la rnam nges rgyal po'o/ /de ltar rgyal bas dga' ldan lha rnams kyi/ /bsam pa mkhyen te 'gro la bstan mdzad pa/ /de thos nas ni lhar bcas
'jig rten yang / /yi rang gyur cing stobs kyang thob par gyur/ /dga' ldan pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu bdun pa'o// //de nas de'i tshe rab
'phrul la sogs pa 'phrul dga' ba bye ba phrag bdun cus lha ma yin rnams nas dga' ldan ris kyi bar gyi lha de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / /lung bstan pa yang thos
nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas shing / de bzhin nyid la the tshom med par gyur
nas stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag cag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ chos thams cad ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i
mtha' dang / mtha' yas pa'i mtha' dang / mi gnas pa'i mtha' dang / mi zad pa'i mtha' dang / mi gnyis pa'i mtha' ste/ mtha' ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de
la ma nor ba'i slad du yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i slad du mtha' yas pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o/ /chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i
mtha' zhes bgyi'o/ /ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du mi gnas pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o/ /'byung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du mi zad pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o/ /ro gcig pa'i slad du mi
gnyis pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o/ /ma mchis pa'i slad du mtha' ma mchis pa zhes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni/ thams cad kyi rjes su song ba lags
te| chos gang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /byang chub ces bgyi ba 'di ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ byang chub
gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis pa ni/ byang chub lags par rig par bgyi'o/ /tha na mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub bo/ /de ci'i
slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub ni/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ mtshams med pa rnams kyang rang bzhin ma mchis pa lags pas/
de'i slad du mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub ces bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ mtshams
med pa rnams kyang de'i rang bzhin no/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad ni/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings te/ mtshams
med pa rnams kyang de'i rang bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang su dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'tshal ba de dag ni/ gnod par 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ de ci'i
slad du zhe na/ gal te 'khor bar zhugs pa zhig mchis na ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la ni/ 'khor bar zhugs pa gang
yang ma mchis na/ de mya ngan las 'das pa ci zhig tshol bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ni/ gnyis su ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de la bdag
cag som nyi ma mchis/ the tshom ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /gang la la zhig chos 'di la nem nur dang / the tshom ma mchis na/ de ni/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe
lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag bdun cu po de dag rang gis rang lung bstan pa gsan nas 'gro ba thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe
'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'jig rten phan par bzhed pas 'dzum pa mdzad/ /'dzum pa'i rgyu ni khyod
kyis ma bstan te/ /rang byung skyes bu dam pa gang dag kyang / /rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad pas/ /khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum pa de mdzad pa/ /mthong nas lhar bcas 'jig rten
the tshom 'tshal/ /'dzum pa'i rgyu de gang lags rang byung gsungs/ /the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom bsal du gsol/ /khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu de thos gyur na/ /'khor 'di thams
cad ngo mtshar thob par 'gyur/ /byang chub mchog ni yongs su bsgrub slad du/ /de dag lam mchog shin tu rnam dag 'gyur/ /the tshom 'tshal ba dag ni nam du yang / /byang chub yid
bzhin bde bar mi 'grub ste/ /the tshom som nyi bsal nas mkhas pa rnams/ /byang chub mchog gi rgyu dang skal ldan 'gyur/ /rkang gnyis dbang po khyod kyi 'khor 'di dag /sdig pa yongs
spangs byang chub sems dang ldan/ /lha rnams lung bstan de dag thos gyur na/ /rgyal ba'i go 'phang rgya chen thob par 'gyur/ /de bas rgyal ba thugs rje
che bskyed cing / /the tshom 'tshal ba rnams la thugs brtse bas/ /lha tshogs 'di dag thams cad lung bstan cing / /'gro ba 'di dag thams cad dga' bar mdzod/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ ngas ni 'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa mdzad/ /rta thul khyod kyis zhu ba de zhus
pa| |lung bstan de ni khyod la ma lus par/ /bstan par ngas bya'i dang bas kun kyang nyon/ /'phrul dga'i ris kyi lha tshogs 'di rnams kyis/ /thams cad mkhyen par bdag
cag lung bstan te/ /mu stegs tshogs kyi bsam pa zil mnan nas/ /'khor 'dir seng+ge'i nga ro chen po bsgrags/ /gnam du rdo 'phangs sa la lhung ba ltar/ /de la the tshom za
bar mi 'gyur te/ /de ltar the tshom med pa'i tshul thob pa/ /bdag cag nyid ni stobs bcur 'gyur bar shes/ /nyi ma nub gyur nam sros gyur pa'i tshe/ /mi rnams zla ba myur du
'char bar shes/ /de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras po tshul thob dag /bdag cag nyid ni stobs bcur 'gyur bar shes/ /skar tshogs dbus na zla ba gnas pa ni/ /sems can mtshungs
par 'di la the tshom med/ /de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras po tshul thob dag /bdag cag thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur bar shes/ /ji ltar nyi ma nub par gyur pa'i tshe/ /nyi ma mi mthong sems
can de dag shes/ /de bzhin bde gshegs sras po tshul shes pa/ /ye shes dam pa thob par 'gyur du shes/ /chu klung ji ltar gzhol bar 'bab 'gyur zhing / /rgya mtshor 'bab par
mkhas pa rnams kyis shes/ /de bzhin bde gshegs sras po tshul shes pa/ /byang chub rgya chen thob par 'gyur bar shes/ /ji ltar gnam du bong ba 'phangs pa ni/ /sa la ltung
bar 'gyur du the tshom med/ /de bzhin rgyal sras mkhas pa de dag kyang / /'jig rten mkhas par myur 'gyur ye shes 'jug /gang thos nas ni the tshom med 'gyur zhing / /sangs rgyas
yon tan gnas par bdag shes la/ /rang gi sar nye lag stong ma yin par/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis chos nyid rab tu mthong / /gal te bdud kyi tshogs ni bye ba dag /sangs rgyas gzugs
bsgyur bar chad smra byas kyang / /chos la mkhas pa chos nyid rab mthong ba/ /de dag byang chub las ni bzlog mi nus/ /de ltar sangs rgyas yon tan rab gnas shing / /bdag gis
bdag nyid lung bstan rjod byed pa/ /de la 'dren pa chog tshul mkhyen pa/ /mi dbang lung bstan de la yi rang mdzad/ /de ltar lha tshogs 'di dag tshul 'di la/ /gzhan gyi dring la mi
'jog mngon shes shing / /de bas bde gshegs 'gyur zhes rang smra la/ /'jig rten mkhas pa rjes su yi rang mdzad/ /rta thul de bas mkhas pa gang
gi rnams/ /bla med byang chub thob par byar sems pa/ /de dag tshul 'di shes par gang gyur ba'i/ /'phags pa'i skye bo mkhas la bsten par bya/ /gang dag tshul la 'jug par rab
mthong zhing / /mkhas pa gang dag bde gshegs bsnyen bkur ba/ /de dag byang chub lag mthil 'dra bar gsal/ /tshul shes de dag rang gis rang 'byung 'gyur/ /gang gis
bskal pa stong du dka' thub spyad/ /sha khrag pags la mi lta byas pa bas/ /gang gis tshul 'di skad cig rtogs gyur na/ /de ni khyad 'phags dka' thub de lta min/ /'das pa'i
rang byung gang rnams byung ba dang / /ma 'ongs sems can phan bzhed gang 'byung dang / /da ltar dus na 'dren pa gang bzhugs pa/ /kun kyang tshul gyis bde bar gshegs pa thob/ /rab
'phrul lha tshogs thub pa'i tshul shes pa/ /'di dag nga la mchod pa mchog byas shing / /'dren pa thams cad bsnyen bkur rab byas nas/ /tshul gyis su ni rang byung thob par
'gyur| |'jig rten mkhas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa/ /de yis rgyal ba rang byung gnas pa'i rnams/ /de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i spyod yul pa/ /tshul thob rnams kyis sngon
bsten myur du thob/ /de la rta thul sangs rgyas sras rnams ni/ /sangs rgyas gnas pa de la nem nur med/ /sangs rgyas tshul la sems can rnams rtse ba/ /tshul shes pa dag ston pa'i lam
la spyod/ /de ltar tshul la dang ba'i yid byas te/ /brtsam par bya yi sdug bsngal spyod la min/ /rtag tu dge bshes mkhas pa bsten byas na/ /bla med byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur//
bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung mchog thos nas ni/ /'khor kun rgyal ba'i byang chub yid rangs te/ /rjes su yi rang the tshom med gyur nas/ /mthar phyin blo gros la ni zhugs par gyur/ /
'phrul dga' ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bco brgyad pa'o// //bam po bdun pa/ de nas de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi
ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas 'phrul dga'i lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / /lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu
dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes gang
smras pa de la bdag cag gis ni/ yang dag pa yang ma dmigs na/ de'i mtha' lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig gis yang dag pa
dmigs na ni/ mtha' yang des dmigs par 'gyur te/ de ni/ gnyis kyis spyod pa'o/ /de lta bu de ni/ theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i
rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi spyod yul ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la chos rnams ni/ gnyis
su med do/ /zhes mi spyod ma mos na/ de 'di snyam du bdag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ /snyam du sems su lags kyang de ni/ lam log par zhugs
par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang 'di byang chub tu smon pa de ni/ lam log par zhugs pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos 'ga' zhig dmigs par gyur na/ byang chub
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos ni/ 'das pa ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa lags/ da ltar byung ba ma lags/ 'dus byas ma
lags| 'dus ma byas ma lags/ dngos po ma lags/ dngos po ma mchis pa ma lags/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags/
spang bar bgyi ba ma lags/ bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub ces bgyi ba de yang chos gang gi gnyen po yang ma lags
la| chos gang yang chos de'i gnyen po ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos de ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags/ rnam par byang ba ma lags te/ gang gis chos gzhan
gyi gnyen por gyur pa'i chos de yang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs la/ gang chos de'i gnyen por gyur pa'i chos gzhan de gang yang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i slad du
zhe na| bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad ni/ mtshan ma dang bral ba ste/ de dag ni/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ spang bar
bgyi ba ma lags/ bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs ni/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du
shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o/ /gzugs kyi skye ba'i mtshan ma nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi skye ba gang lags
pa de yang skye ba'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o/ /gzugs kyi 'gag pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi 'gag pa gang lags pa de yang 'gag pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o/ /bcom ldan
'das| 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba yang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang bral ba'o/ /'dus byas kyang
'dus byas kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o/ /'dus ma byas kyang 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar ji tsam du phung pos bzung ba'am/ skye ba
dang 'gag pas bzung ba'am/ 'das pas bzung ba'am/ ma 'ongs pas bzung ba'am/ da ltar byung bas bzung ba'am/ 'dus byas kyi bzung ba'am/ 'dus ma byas
kyis bzung ba de dag ni/ rnam pa thams cad du mi dmigs te/ de ltar mi dmigs pa de ni/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma
lags| spang bar bgyi ba ma lags/ bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag de ltar zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu
dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha de dag gis ji ltar
shes pa'i chos de ltar lung bstan nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bcom ldan srid pa mthar phyin legs par gsungs/ /
'dren pas srid pa'i snying po ma brnyes na/ /skye bo mi mkhas de dag 'jigs pa yis/ /'khor ba'i pha rol bgrod phyir rab tu zhugs/ /phung po rnams ni kun tu mi dmigs te/ /phung
po'i mtshan mas phung po stong pa nyid/ /chos gang gang gi gnyen por 'gyur ba ni/ /mtshan mas stong ste gang yang ma mchis so/ /ngo bo nyid kyis stong phyir dngos po gang / /yongs
shes bya dang spang bsgom mngon bya ba/ /gang yang ma mchis gang du'ang mi dmigs te/ /dngos po rnams ni dngos med rang byung gsung / /byang chub gang yang mtshan mar mi
dmigs te/ /byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams de bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas gang yang mtshan mar mi dmigs te/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtshan mas rtogs mi 'gyur/ /mi mkhas
gang dag mtshan mar mngon zhen pa/ /de dag byang chub 'tshang rgyar sems bskyed kyang / /mtshan mar spyod cing spyod yul lag pa ste/ /blo gros ngan pas byang chub lam mi spyod/ /
mtshan ma sus spangs sangs rgyas spyod yul la/ /spyod pa de dag sangs rgyas bstan la mkhas/ /mtshan ma de bzhin mtshan ma med spangs te/ /stong dang mi stong de bzhin dmigs
med pa| |mkhas pa de dag byang chub lam la spyod/ /de dag byang chub dam pa zhi ba 'thob/ /phas kyi rgol ba kun gyi spyod yul min/ /gnas de nyan thos rnams kyis bgrod bya min//
rang rgyal rnams kyang de la mi 'gro ste/ /rnam grol sems ldan zag med tha ba med/ /dgra bcom bstan pa 'di la gang brtson dang / /de bzhin rang rgyal
skyob par gyur pa dag /mkhas pa'i spyod yul de la spyod yul med/ /go 'phang de ni mtshan ma spyod pa dang / /nyi tshe'i stong pa nyid la sgom pa dang / /gang rnams stong pas stong zhes
stong smra dang / /chos kun rang bzhin yod smras 'thob mi nus/ /sangs rgyas ma smad rnams kyi bslab pa la/ /slob dang rnam bral slob pa slob pa'i rnams/ /mkhas te rtogs pa med
pas byang chub rtogs/ /ston pas bstan pa bzhin du dgyes byed lags/ /sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bo bstod pas na/ /bdag cag bsod nams mi chung gang thob des/ /
'gro ba byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgya zhing / /mi shes ston mdzad sangs rgyas grub par shog /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul
dbang byed kyi ris kyi lha khrag khrig brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas skye bo phal po che de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad
do| |de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha yi bsam mkhyen nas/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod
kyis 'dzum mdzad la/ /thub pas 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni ma gsungs na/ /rgyal ba 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni bstan du gsol/ /'dren pa rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad ces/ /rgyal ba khyu mchog dam
pas de skad gsungs/ /'jig rten don slad 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu/ /'dren pa bka' stsol the tshom bsal du gsol/ /drang srong chen po'i zhal nas 'dzum rig nas/ /thub
chen khyod ni 'khor rnams the tshom 'tshal/ /gau tam rgyal ba 'dren pas de dag la/ /'jig rten sman slad 'dzum rgyu lung bstan gsol/ /'di dag 'khor ba'i rgyud la rgyab phyogs te//
mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyis thal sbyar sdod/ /'khor 'di yangs pa'i sems ldan the tshom 'tshal/ /don yod grags mnga' som nyi bsal du gsol/ /bde gshegs bstan
la the tshom ma mchis te/ /phyir zhing dad bskyed rim gror cher bgyid de/ /the tshom mi 'tshal sems ni grol 'gyur bar/ /rgyal bas skye bo'i the tshom legs par khum/ /bde
gshegs bstan la 'di dag bder gnas shing / /gang lam rang byung rgyal ba gshegs gyur pa/ /lam de nas ni the tshom ma mchis mchi/ /de bas skye bo'i the tshom gcad du
gsol| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ skye bo tshogs chen don dbang brten byas nas/ /tshigs su bcad de dus su
gang smras shing / /'dzum pa'i don gyi rgyu ni yongs zhus pa/ /khyod kyi tshig ni dus dang ldan pa yin/ /rta thul dri ba de yi don dris pas/ /skye bo tshogs
chen 'di yi don byas gyur/ /khyod kyis de dris skye bo tshogs chen don/ /byang chub mchog tu yang dag zhugs par 'gyur/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bsam pa ngas mkhyen
te| |rta thul 'dzum pa de ni ngas bstan to/ /'jig rten mkhyen pas bstan pa'i lam de nas/ /don du gnyer ba 'di dag de bzhin 'dong / /gang gis 'gro ba 'di dag mtshan
med par/ /smig rgyu la ni ji ltar chu bzhin mthong / /byis pa rmongs pa mkhas pa'i tshul bzhin te/ /de dag rjes su byang chub 'dod pas bslab/ /mtshan ma'i 'du shes spang
phyir mi rnams gang / /rtag tu mtshan ma mngon dga' 'jig 'gyur zhing / /mtshan ma'i 'du shes log pa'i lam du 'dong / /mtshan ma med pas byang chub mchog thob
'gyur| |med pa'i rtog ldan mtshan mar rnam brtags nas/ /ji ltar brtags pa de ltar 'ching ba yin/ /mtshan ma stong par rnam mthong mkhas pa yi/ /zhi ba dag ni
grags ldan dam pa 'thob/ /'du shes mtshan can mi mnyam sems rgyud kyis/ /sdig pa brgya dag mi mkhas de dag byed/ /'gro ba kun tu sdug bsngal mi chung myong / /de ltar
mi mkhas mtshan mar brtag pa byas/ /mtshan mar 'du shes pa ni phung po dang / /sangs rgyas byang chub byang chub sems dpa' 'thob/ /de ltar mtshan ma med cing stong mthong na/ /byang chub
gzhal med bla na med pa 'thob/ /'du shes mtshan ma can la nyon mongs 'phel/ /mtshan ma med pa kun tu sbyor ba spong / /mtshan ma las ni kun sbyor gzhan med de/ /kun tu sbyor ba de
nyid mtshan med yin/ /gang rnams byang chub 'thob par bya rtog pa/ /rtog pa de nyid mi mkhas par chad yin/ /mkhas pa'i longs spyod rnam par thob byed na/ /longs spyod de nyid
mtshan ma med par 'gyur/ /chos rnams gang yang rang bzhin nyid kyis med/ /rnam par rtogs pas chos 'byung kun kyang stong / /rtog pa med pas mtshan ma med par 'gyur/ /de nyid
byang chub gzhan du mkhas mi smra/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa de dag thos gyur nas/ /mi 'jigs ldan pa'i 'khor ni the tshom bsal/ /dper na tsam pa'i phreng ba 'dzin pa ltar/ /mkhas
rnams thub pas gsungs la legs zhes 'dzin/ /'jigs pa med pa'i lha tshogs 'di dag gis/ /mchod pa 'phags pa bla na med byas shing / /rgyal ba'i spyod yul chos kyang rnam
shes nas/ /'gro ba rnam par 'dren pa kun mkhyen 'gyur/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas tshangs ris kyi lha bye ba phrag
drug cus lha ma yin rnams nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing
mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / bsam
pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan la mi 'dod pa skyes shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'di la ni/ snang ba thob ste/ chos zab mo la bzod
pa thob par gyur nas de dag gis chos thams cad byas pa yang ma yin/ ma byas pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar shes par gyur to/ /de bzhin du skyes pa yang ma yin/ ma skyes pa
yang ma yin/ /byung ba yang ma yin/ ma byang ba yang ma yin/ grub pa yang ma yin/ ma grub pa yang ma yin/ 'gag pa yang ma yin/ ma 'gag pa yang ma yin /
gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yang ma yin/ rnam par byang ba yang ma yin/ rjes su chags pa yang ma yin/ khong khro ba yang
ma yin| rmongs pa yang ma yin/ ma rmongs pa yang ma yin/ shes pa po yang ma yin/ shes pa po med pa yang ma yin/ mthong ba po yang ma yin/ mthong ba po med pa
yang ma yin/ tshor ba po yang ma yin/ tshor ba po med pa yang ma yin/ ston pa po yang ma yin/ ston pa po med pa yang ma yin/ yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin/
dngos po yod pa yang ma yin/ dngos po med pa yang ma yin/ dmigs pa yang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa yang ma yin/ 'gro ba yang ma yin/ 'ong ba yang ma yin/ song
ba yang ma yin/ ma song ba yang ma yin/ stong pa yang ma yin/ mi stong pa yang ma yin/ mtshan ma yod pa yang ma yin/ mtshan ma med pa yang ma yin/ smon pa yod pa
yang ma yin/ smon pa med pa yang ma yin no/ /zhes bya bar shes par gyur to/ /de dag de ltar chos thams cad la yang mi gnas pa'i yid kyis de dag ming la mi gnas/ tha
snyad la yang mi gnas/ brjod pa la yang mi gnas te/ de dag ni/ brjod pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ brjod du med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ bya ba'i 'du
shes can yang ma yin/ bya ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /
so so'i skye bo'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos
ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can
yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang
ma yin| rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa'i
'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin /
sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas ma yin
pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ 'khor
ba'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ 'khor ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin te/ de ltar thams cad kyi thams cad du rtog pa med pa'i blo can nam mkha' bzhin du dag
cing gos pa med par gyur nas de rnams dag pa dang gos pa med pa'i phyir de'i tshe de dag zhi bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ zhi la zhi ba'i
thugs mnga' zhi ba spyad cing zhi ba'i pha rol byon/ /zhi ba bsten par mdzad cing 'gro la zhi ba ston pa rjes su ston/ /zhi ba'i spyod yul dgyes shing byang chub zhi la dri bral 'khrug ma mchis//
khyod kyis 'chi med zhi ba 'gro rgyud thams cad zad pa myur du brnyes/ /zhi ba thob par bgyid pa'i zhi ba'i lam mchog zhi ba yang dag bsten/ /yan lag brgyad pas nyon mongs klong rnams
zhi mdzad 'gro ba thams cad bton/ /sngon gyi rgyal bas bsten pa'i byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba de la 'god/ /de ston sangs rgyas 'phags pas bsten pa'i grong khyer zhi bar deng
zhes gsung / /'dren pa de ltar 'gro ba 'di la rgyal bas bsten pa'i bslab pa bstan/ /gal te bslab pa de slob 'gro ba 'di dag byang chub gzhal yas 'thob/ /bslab nas zhi
zhing yid zhi zhi ba'i lam dong dbang po zhi ba dag /'jig rten mkhas pa 'gro ba zhi byed mthu chen zhi ba shes par 'gyur/ /'dren pa khyod kyi sras mchog zhi ba 'gro ba zhi bgyid gang
dag gis/ /'chi med zhi ba mtshan ma thams cad zad pa rnam par rtogs gyur pa/ /de dag 'dren pa tshul la mchod pa'i mchod pa mchog gis mchod par 'gyur/ /nyon mongs zhi zhing
mtshan ma kun spangs zhi ba rtag tu ston par 'gyur/ /'gro ba thams cad zhi zhing mtshan ma bral ba de nyid mya ngan 'das/ /thub pa gang dag zhi las
zhi 'dod sems pa de dag nyon mongs 'gyur/ /rgyal ba khyod kyi byang chub dang ni 'gro kun chos kun bsam mi khyab/ /thub pa blo ldan 'dam las rgal ba de la bdag cag dogs
ma mchis/ /gang dag phung po bor te byang chub zhi tshol de la zhi bar rtogs/ /phung pos 'jigs pa de dag shAkya thub pa'i bstan la dga' ma lags/ /dben pa'i blo gros ldan
pa zhi tshol de dag blo 'khrugs gyur pa ste/ /chos kyi mtshan ma spyod yul 'di dag byis pa zhes ni ston pas gsungs/ /thams cad mkhyen pas zhi dang mtshan ma'i 'ching ba
'di dag rab tu gsungs/ /thub pa gang dag phung po rnams la rnam pa kun tu mtshan mi rnyed/ /de dag shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa mdzes byed gang dag mtshan med dga'/ /de
dag byang chub skyon bral zhi ba mkhas pa'i spyod yul thob par 'gyur/ /bdud kyi rtsod las rgyal nas nyon mongs zhi ba thams cad mkhyen pa thob/ /rnam 'dren zhi ba mdzad la
bstod pas bdag cag bsod nams gang rnyed pa/ /chags med thugs mnga' bde bar gshegs pas 'di tsam zhes ni mkhyen gyur pa/ /des ni 'gro ba thams cad lam
mchog thams cad mkhyen pas bsten gyur pa/ /zhi byed zhi ba bsten nas mkhas pa mchod pa'i rang byung sdig med shog /de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas tshangs pa rnams dang
lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod par rig nas bdag nyid kyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ mi dbang
khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad ni/ /log par rmongs byed chang pa stong 'dra zhing / /ston gyi sprin 'dra mig 'khrul 'dra bar mkhyen/ /rgyal bas 'dod pa'i yon tan med par mkhyen//
ji ltar mi zhig rmi lam bkres gyur pas/ /kha zas ro brgya zos kyang ma 'grangs pa/ /de la bkres med zas med sems can med/ /rmi lam de 'drar chos rnams thams cad gzigs//
skom pa'i mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na/ /chu bsil dang zhing rnyog med 'thungs gyur kyang / /ngoms med tsha ba zhi bar mi 'gyur te/ /de bzhin khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad gzigs//
'di la byed med tshor med sems can med/ /byas pa de bzhin med cing rnam smin med/ /'bras bu myong bar 'gyur pa de med ces/ /'di 'dra'i chos mkhyen the tshom yong mi mnga'/ /
mi zhig yid du 'ong ba'i tshig smra na/ /dga' bar 'gyur yang tshig la 'pho ba med/ /tshig nyid med cing dgar 'gyur dngos med kyang / /de mkhyen de la the tshom yong mi mnga'/ /
pi wang sgra snyan mnyan na rnar snyan te/ /sgra de rang bzhin gang yang yod ma yin/ /de ltar mkhas pas phung po 'di gzigs na/ /phung po'i rang bzhin gang yang
dmigs mi mnga'/ /nor bu rin chen rang bzhin gsal dag pa/ /gos gyi drung bzhag sna tshogs tshon du 'gyur/ /de ltar rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang / /log pa'i rnam
par rtog pas de ltar 'gyur/ /tsan+dan dri med skyon dang bral ba yang / /rkyen dang sbyar na dri zhim gzhan du 'gyur/ /de ltar rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang / /so sor rang gis
brtags pa'i rnam pa bzhin/ /ji ltar mi yi dung gi sgra thos te/ /sgra 'di ga las byung zhes brtags byas kyang / /rang bzhin stong pa'i dngos po de mi dmigs/ /mi dbang khyod kyis
de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ /ji ltar mi zhig bsod pa'i kha zas la/ /yan lag srog phan ji ltar 'gyur brtags na/ /dngos med yan lag srog kyang de bzhin te/ /drang srong
chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ /ji ltar mi zhig nam mkha'i 'ja' mthong na/ /yan lag gzhigs brtags rang bzhin med cing stong / /nam mkha'i 'ja' bzhin khyod
kyis yan lag stong / /drang srong chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ /grong khyer mchog kyang yan lag rnam gzhigs na/ /grong khyer rang bzhin de bzhin ming mi dmigs/ /grong
khyer ji bzhin de ltar yan lag stong / /mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ /skyes bu dga' bar rnga zhig brdungs bgyis na/ /dga' ba skyed kyang sgra yi rang bzhin stong / /ji ltar
sgra bzhin de ltar yan lag stong / /mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ /skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe/ /sgra ni phyogs su mi 'gro 'byung ba med/ /phyogs su de
bzhin 'gags par mi 'gyur te/ /mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ /skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe/ /thogs pa med cing snyan pa'i rang bzhin te/ /khyod kyi
yan lag rnga sgra de dang 'dra/ /mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ /skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe/ /sgra de 'jig rten dga' bar rtog pa med/ /ji ltar sgra bzhin
khyod kyis yan lag stong / /mi dbang khyod kyis chos kun de ltar gzigs/ /skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe/ /g.yo ba med cing zhi ba'i dngos kyang med/ /ji ltar rnga bzhin
khyod kyi yan lag stong / /mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ /skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe/ /sgra de yan lag ma byung rang dbang min/ /ji ltar sgra bzhin
khyod kyi yan lag stong / /mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs ris kyi lha de dag dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa de'i lhag pa'i
bsam pa thugs su chud cing zhi gnas dang ye shes mthong ba'i bstod pa des de ltar bstod pas/ 'khor de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par gyur par gzigs
nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad dri med dag mthong
nas| |lhar bcas mir bcas klu dang gnod sbyin bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun/ /skyob pa'i 'dzum mthong thams cad ldan pa'i 'gro ba the tshom 'tshal/ /bde gshegs zhal
bzang de la blta zhing thos par dga' ste sdod/ /rgyal ba 'dzum mdzad legs par bka' stsol the tshom dgum du gsol/ /rnam par 'dren pa thub mchog kun mkhyen sangs
rgyas 'dren pa rnams/ /rgyu ma mchis par 'jig rten don byed 'dzum mdzad ma mthong na/ /bde gshegs khyod kyis gang slad 'dzum mdzad the tshom rgyu de gsungs/ /rgyal ba
'dzum mdzad rgyu thos 'gro ba rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /'khor 'di the tshom 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te khyod la sems/ /bde gshegs thub pa'i gsung mchog the tshom
gcod pa nyan 'tshal na/ /rnam 'dren thub pa 'dzum mdzad rgyu de de dag rnams la gsungs/ /thos nas 'gro ba dga' zhing the tshom ma mchis 'phel bar 'gyur/ /
'khor 'di snying po ldan zhing rnyog med sangs rgyas yon tan 'tshal/ /ston pa khyod kyi zhal mdzes zla ba mdzes pa 'dra la blta/ /'dren pa chags med rdzogs pa tshangs pa 'dra ba'i
gsung bsgrag gsol/ /de thos 'khor rnams the tshom chad cing chos la gnas par 'gyur/ /khyod kyi tshangs pa'i gsung mchog don ldan 'jig rten 'das rig nas/ /skye bo dga'
zhing mgu ba'i yid ldan thams cad mkhyen pas tshim/ /de dag dogs bsal sbyangs pa'i yid kyis thams cad mkhyen du sgrub/ /brtson 'grus stobs chen bskyed nas 'dun pa stobs
ldan rtsom par bgyid/ /de lta lags pas 'jig rten 'dren pa phan mdzad gsung bsgrag gsol/ /rkang gnyis dam pa'i gsung mchog mi g.yo thos nas de yis ni/ /dge ba thob
pa'i 'khor 'di thams cad mkhyen du sems 'gyur bar/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba 'gro ba kun la phan pa lags par dgongs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la
tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul nga yis phan ched 'dzum pa 'gro ba kun la gang bstan pa/ /rtse gcig yid kyis snyan cing bsngags pa mdzes pa de ni mnyan par byos/ /
de thos 'gro ba yon tan bsags pa myur du 'jig rten don byed pa/ /phan dang ldan pa'i bya ba sangs rgyas bka' stsal de la brtson 'grus rtsom/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor 'di dag dga'
zhing chos rnams la ni the tshom med/ /bskal pa khrag khrig gang+gA'i bye ma snyed du dge ba legs par spyad/ /kun tu rnam par dge la ma chags yid
gyur 'du shes mkha' 'dra ste/ /de ltar gyur kyang bde gshegs byang chub rdzogs par 'tshang rgya sems ma bskyed/ /'di dag ma 'ongs dus na bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag gzhal
yas pa| |gang+gA'i bye ma snyed na rdul bsal thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs la gnas/ /de dag phyi nas bde bar gshegs pa tshe ldan sangs rgyas 'dren che ba/ /sred pa sel cing
'gro ba stong par ston pa'i bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur/ /skyob pa de dag ji ltar spyod pa sku tshe'i tshad kyang de ltar 'gyur/ /bde gshegs mtha' yas grags ldan 'jig rten
sdug bsngal 'grel cing gnas par 'gyur/ /de dag rnams kyi sangs rgyas zhing ni zhing gi 'byor pa gzhal yas te/ /'dren pa chen po rnams kyis bskal pa khrag khrig rnam pa du
mar ni| |sangs rgyas mtha' yas rnams kyis gsungs kyang de dag bkod pa zas mi nus/ /de tshe de dag ye shes stobs ldan zhes bya'i rgyal bar mthun par 'gyur/ /g.yo ba med
cing sems med mi gnas chos ni 'gro la ston par 'gyur/ /de dag zhing mchog rnams su skyob pa'i thams cad mkhyen lam ma sbyangs pa'i/ /sems can gcig kyang mi 'byung
srid pa de la phal cher mya ngan 'da'/ /de dag na ni de tshe 'gro ba de dag sdug bsngal gcig shes te/ /mi rtag 'du byed sdug bsngal rab tu 'jigs pa sems can yid 'byung ba'o/ /
de na 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang ni sdug bsngal sdug bsngal yod mi 'gyur/ /de dag thams cad blo mthun 'gyur zhing sla yi lam la myur bar 'gyur/ /de na mi rnams dag gi sgra
skad rang bzhin gzhan ni 'byung mi 'gyur/ /mi sdug mi rtag de bzhin nyid dang sdug bsngal de bzhin bdag med dang / /zhi ba stong nyid mtshan med 'chi med mya ngan 'das dang byang chub zhi/ /sgra
skad de dag yang dang yang 'byung de dag rna la gnas par 'gyur/ /sgra gang thos nas de dag 'khor ba grol gnas thob par mi 'gyur ba/ /de 'dra'i sgra de shing ngam rtsig pa dag dang
gang na'ang yod mi 'gyur/ /bla gab med dang mkha' dang gtsug lag khang dang gnas dang gnas khang rnams na med/ /de tshe sangs rgyas mthu yis yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i
sgra dbyangs 'byung / /de tshe 'dren pa'i nyes pa med cing 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang dang / /gti mug dag gis gzir ba rnams kyi rnar ni dge ba'i sgra grag 'gyur/ /'gro ba thams
cad 'khor ba las ni 'byung zhing mya ngan 'das 'gror 'gyur/ /de tshe zhing mchog stong pa thams cad dga' ba'i skye bos gang bar 'gyur/ /skyes bu dam pa de dag bskal ba khrag khrig byang
chub brtson byas nas/ /drang srong chen po de dag smon lam gyis ni 'byor pa 'di brtsams te/ /zhing mchog de na sems can tshogs gang yod pa de
kun bde gshegs 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i smon lam yangs pa rgya cher zhi ba 'gro bas mthong gyur na/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas bka' stsal bzhin du tshangs pa'i tshogs kyis
bsten gyur pa/ /de la bslab nas 'gro ba thams cad thogs pa med pa'i 'dren par 'gyur/ /de dag rgyal ba thob nas 'gro ba 'di kun dngos po med ces ston/ /de lta bas na
tshul kun 'jug la mkhas pa'i spyod pa bsten par gyis/ /tshangs pa lung bsten pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu pa'o// //de nas 'od gsal gyi lha bye ba phrag lnga bcu
rtsa brgyad kyis lha ma yin rnams nas tshangs pa'i bar gyi lha dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga'
ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal
mo sbyar ba btud nas bco ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpas tshul la 'jug pa'i slad du gang la bslab pas chos thams
cad snang bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ des chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa rtogs par bgyid do/ /de rtogs pas bsam gyis
mi khyab pa'i spobs pa dang / thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa'i spobs pa dang / sna tshogs kyi spobs pa dang / 'jam pa'i spobs pa dang / dge ba'i
spobs pa dang / rig pa'i spobs pa dang / grol ba'i spobs pa dang / nye bar gyur pa'i spobs pa dang / /zab pa'i spobs pa dang / phra ba'i spobs pa dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i spobs
pa can du 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di la byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa'i slad du rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa thams cad yid la mi bgyid de/ de 'di snyam du chos
thams cad ni/ rnam par rtog pa med de/ rnam par rtog pa yongs su chad pa'o/ /gang rnam par mi rtog pa de ni/ thams cad du song ba ste/ chos gang yang rnam par rtog par
nus pa ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de la ji ltar rnam par rtog par 'gyur zhes chos thams cad
la rnam par mi rtog par a la 'jug pa'i spobs pa rab tu thob cing / /de dag a'i sgo la zhugs pas spobs pa mtha' yas par 'gyur te/ a zhes
bgyi ba ni/ mtha' yas pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ ma bgyis pa/ mngon par 'dus ma bgyis pa/ yongs su ma grub pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa/ mi gnas pa/ mi g.yo
ba| 'dus pa ma mchis pa/ 'phro ba ma mchis pa/ rtog pa ma mchis pa/ rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa/ ma bsgrubs pa/ yongs su grub pa ma mchis pa/ ma brtags pa/
gzugs ma mchis pa/ bstan du ma mchis pa/ bltar ma mchis pa/ ma mthong ba/ bsam du ma mchis pa/ rnam par mi gnas pa/ ma shes pa/ rnam par ma shes pa/
ma smos pa/ ma bstan pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam du ma mchis pa/ song ba ma mchis pa/ 'ong ba ma mchis pa/ nye ba ma lags pa/ ring ba ma lags pa/ ma
btags pa/ gdags pa ma mchis pa'i chos can/ ming ma mchis pa/ tha snyad ma mchis pa/ gnyen po ma mchis pa/ sgrib pa ma mchis pa/ 'pho ba ma mchis pa /
'khrug pa ma mchis pa/ brtag tu ma mchis pa/ mi zad pa/ gnyis su ma mchis pa/ ma byung ba/ rdzun pa ma lags pa/ bden pa ma lags pa/ sho be ma lags pa /
ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ sbyangs pa ma lags pa/ sbyang bar 'os pa ma lags pa/ gdags su ma mchis pa/ mtshan mas ma bskyod pa/ ma bzung ba/ ma bor ba/ 'dzin pa
ma mchis pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa/ gtan du ma mchis pa/ yongs su gtan du ma mchis pa/ ma btang ba/ yongs su ma btang ba ste/ a zhes bgyi ba ni/ sus kyang
ma bgyis pa/ chos gang gi byed pa po yang ma lags so/ /a ni/ ma skyes pa ste/ chos gang yang skye bar bgyid pa ma lags so/ /a ni/ /a ni/ ma skyes pa ste/ chos gang gi skye ba'i rgyur
'gyur ba'ang ma lags so/ /a ni/ ma 'gag pa ste/ chos gang gi 'gag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'ang ma lags so/ /a ni/ ma 'gag pa yang ma lags te/ chos gang gis mi 'gag
pa'i rkyen du 'gyur ba ma lags so/ /a ni/ gnas pa yang ma lags/ mi gnas pa yang ma lags/ a ni/ btags pa yang ma lags/ ma btags pa yang ma lags/ a ni/
spangs pa yang ma lags/ ma spangs pa yang ma lags/ a ni/ shes pa yang ma lags/ ma shes pa yang ma lags/ a ni/ dmigs pa yang ma lags/ mi dmigs pa
yang ma lags/ a ni/ stong pa yang ma lags/ mi stong pa yang ma lags/ a ni/ dmigs su mchis pa yang ma lags/ dmigs su ma mchis pa yang ma lags/ a ni/
mtshan ma yang ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa yang ma lags/ a ni/ smon pa yang ma lags/ smon pa ma mchis pa yang ma lags te/
bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar na/ chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ni/ a'i tshul lo/ /chos thams cad ni/ tshul gcig pa ste/ a'i tshul lo/ /chos thams cad ni /
'gro ba gcig pa ste/ a'i 'gro ba'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ 'jug pa gcig pa ste/ a la 'jug pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ gdags pa gcig pa ste/ as
gdags pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ tha snyad gcig pa ste/ a'i tha snyad do/ /chos thams cad ni/ brjod pa gcig pa ste/ as brjod pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/
chos gang ma skyes pa de dag ni/ rtogs par bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o/ /chos gang ma byung ba de dag ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs
par bgyi'o/ /chos gang ma grub pa de dag ni/ ma grub pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o/ /chos gang ma 'gags pa de dag ni/ 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis
rtogs par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos gang mngon par 'du ma bgyis pa de dag ni/ 'dus ma bgyis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyis te/ de ni/ chos
thams cad kyi tshul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos gang ma skyes pa de dag gi tha snyad ji ltar rtogs par bgyi zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rmi lam na bya ba sna tshogs 'byung ba de bzhin
du chos thams cad blta bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ rmi lam gyi bya ba ni/ ma skyes pa/ ma byung ba/ dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ 'on kyang de dag la
gdags par gsungs so/ /de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi byed pa yang 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ brag ca la tha snyad mchis pa bzhin du
chos thams cad kyi tha snyad kyang blta bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la gdags pa ma mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi gdags
par blta'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ smig rgyu la chab tu gdags pa'i tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad blta bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan
'das| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me long gi dkyil 'khor la bud med kyi gzugs sam/ skyes pa'i gzugs kyi tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad blta bar bgyi
ste| bcom ldan 'das/ byis pa rnams dga' bar bgyi ba'i slad du rmi lam gyi bya ba tha snyad du bgyi yi/ rmi lam gyi bya ba de dag ni/ ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin
du byis pa dga' bar bgyi ba'i slad du mig yor dang / smig rgyu dang / brag ca'i bya ba dag kyang tha snyad du bgyi ste/ brag ca la bya ba ma mchis so/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni/ chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi
ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de skad ces gsol nas 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bde gshegs
khyod kyis tshul gcig mkhyen te 'on kyang gzhan dang gzhan du gsungs/ /thub pa 'jig rten mkhas pa'i sras rnams rnam par rol pa'ang de bzhin no/ /de la 'jig rten
blo med bdag tu lta ba rnams kyis khong mi chud/ /bdag gi don de phyogs bcur ma mchis bdag nyid kyis ni 'gro ba stong / /sgyu ma gsog dang smig rgyu chu ma mchis la chab
kyi 'du shes can/ /byis pa de dag blo log de bzhin 'khrul te bdag tu sbyor ba bgyid/ /de dag yang dag ma 'tshal mi mkhas gnas min dngos la brten kyang 'tshal/ /de
bzhin byis pa'i skye bo smig rgyu 'dra ba'i phung po yong ma 'tshal/ /'khor bar dga' bas zug rngus zug cing sdug bsngal de yis dbang po 'das/ /gang la mi mkhas nges par sdug
bsngal myong ba de la dngos ma mchis/ /blo stor yid nor sdug bsngal rnams la bde bar 'du shes nor pa la/ /nyon mongs 'jigs pa che dang dug gsum rnams kyang rjes su 'gro
zhing 'brang / /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dug chen nyon mongs mtshungs med rjes su 'brang / /blo stor de dag sdug bsngal gang gis sdug bsngal gyur ba'i sdug bsngal ba/ /de rnams
de dag rjes 'brang byis pa mi mkhas gnod pa khur yang khyer/ /de dag rgyal ba'i tshul sgo thar par bgyid pa stong pa 'di thos nas/ /skyes bu ngan pa blo zhan de dag bstan dag bde ba
nyid kyis 'jigs/ /bde gshegs khyod kyis a yi yi ge tshul chen sgo gcig de ltar bstan/ /de la yang dag blo can sa las shing skye bzhin du yid bskyed cing / /bdud rnams bye
ba dpung dang bcas btul byang chub zhi ba mngon 'tshang rgya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i grur bcas skye bo nyon mongs rgya mtsho che las sgrol/ /bde bar gshegs pa cang mkhyen nges pa
rnams ni tshul gyi dam pa des/ /myur du nyon mongs dug bsal byang chub dpag yas zhi ba thob 'gyur zhing / /grol nas dug med gyur pa skye bo gzhan mthong nges pa'i mkhyen brnyes
nas| |pha rol myur phyin dug med bde zhing gdug pa thams cad 'joms par mdzad/ /bde gshegs thams cad stong yang bdag tu rtog rnams tshul dang tshul min rtog /'gro ba
kun gyi nang nas mkhas pa tshul dang tshul min bslab pa dag /grol nas 'gro ba kun la chags med yid kyis ngo bo nyid kyi chos/ /de yi tshul
mthong tshul la mkhas pa de dag mthu chen mgon por 'gyur/ /'ching dang bcings pa med cing bde bar gshegs pa chos rnams chos nyid med/ /de bzhin nyid dang ma nor
de bzhin nyid zhi mi dga' nyon mi mongs/ /nyon mongs mtshan ma med cing zhi byed med la nyon mongs rnams kyang med/ /gang gis tshul chen dam pa 'di mthong de dag thams
cad mkhyen du 'gyur/ /grol zhing 'grol mdzad zhi ba'i chos can zhi mdzad ngo mtshar 'gyur mi mnga'/ /bcom ldan 'das lhar bcas 'jig rten dpyid kyi smig rgyu bzhin du 'khrul
ba de| |kun rtogs bdag nyid zil gnon bdag dang gzhan med skyes pa bud med rtog /'gro ba sdug bsngal de na sna tshogs kyis bskyed sems kyis sems kyang ni/ /las dang
'bras bu med cing de myong gang gyur de yang med/ /bde gshegs de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul tshul ni bdag cag 'tshal/ /des na de ltar bde gshegs zhi thugs
dbang po zhi zhing nges pa ste/ /dge ba'i blo mnga' dgra gtsang dri med chos kyis rab tu mchod par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'phags pa'i gtso bo bstod pas bsod nams
gang byung ba/ /ji snyed dpal stug rkang gnyis gtso bo rnam smin yongs su mkhyen gyur pa'i/ /bdag cag dge rtsa de yis 'gro ba 'di kun kun mkhyen nyid thob shog /bsod nams 'di
kun 'gro ba kun gyi don bsngo kun kyang rgyal bar shog /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gsal gyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang / /tshul gyi rjes su
'gro ba'i spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang thugs su chud la/ 'khor de dag gis kyang khyad par thob par 'gyur bar mkhyen nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan
pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'jig rten don mdzad rnam par 'dren mchog kun mkhyen thams cad zil gnon pa/ /bde gshegs
thugs rje ldan rnams rgyu ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na/ /rgyal ba dpal stug rkang gnyis mchog gis 'jig rten thugs brtses bka' stsal gsol/ /'jig rten 'das
khyod ci slad 'dzum mdzad de rgyu bdag cag rnams la gsungs/ /gtso bo de thos 'gro ba 'di dag yid ni rab tu dang 'gyur zhing / /rnam par 'dren pa nges 'byung las dang 'bras bu gzhan
yang bgyid par 'gyur/ /des ni lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'khor bar sdug bsngal nyam thag 'di/ /'phags lam yan lag brgyad bstan srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'di las sgrol
bar 'gyur/ /drang srong chen po'i gsung mchog yan lag brgyad ldan bzang po 'di thos nas/ 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas nyid 'tshal dge la
brtson zhing dga' bar 'gyur/ /the tshom bral gyur rnam dag yid kyis brtson 'grus drag po'i stobs bskyed cing / /bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa bzhin bgyid khyod dang mthun
'byung sras su 'gyur/ /'khor rnams 'di dag rten pa gzhan ma mchis par khyod kyi zhal du lta/ /'gro ba'i rtsa lag rtog pa yid gnyis bsal zhing lung bstan bka' stsal
gsol| |bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag khyod kyi zham ring gnas shing nyan par 'tshal/ /gsung rab legs brjod bdud rtsi'i char phob gang dag skom pa 'tshal bar
'gyur| |'dren pa chen po khyod kyi 'khor 'di dag cing sangs rgyas yon tan 'tshal/ /ring du song ba'i ma la bu lta bzhin du khyod kyi zhal du lta/ /bde gshegs lha rnams
lung bstan bka' stsal bzhad pa'i don kyang bstan du gsol/ /skyob pa'i gsung mchog thos na 'jig rten don chen shin tu thob par 'gyur/ /thub pa de ring su zhig dge ba
'phel cing grags pa don du gnyer/ /su zhig 'dren pa'i yon tan gter rnyed 'gyur pa bdag cag de nyan 'tshal/ /rgyal ba'i 'khor rnams khyod kyis gsungs pa de dag thos
shing dag gyur nas/ /tshul 'di ston cing ting 'dzin stobs ldan shes rab la yang sgom par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad
de slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul khyod kyi spobs pa legs par dus ldan skyes pa shin tu legs/ /bde gshegs rnam par sprul bzhin de ltar khyod kyi blo gros 'byung 'gyur zhing / /
spobs ba che 'byung de phyir gang dang gang dag khyod kyis dris gyur pa/ /de dag lung bstan ngas bshad kun kyang dbang po zhi bas mnyan par gyis/ /'od gsal ba yi lha rnams blo dag
sngon gyi rgyal ba mthong ba ste/ /'jig rten mgon med yid can dag mthong byang chub yang dag zhugs/ /byang chub nges 'byung lam mchog yang dag rgyal bas spyad pa spyod/ /byang
chub 'gro 'dod gang tshe ston med lam stor rnams la ston par 'gyur/ /tshul gyi dam pa shin tu gsal sgra thun mong ma yin 'di thos nas/ /sangs rgyas yon tan don gnyer blo
sbyangs de dag byang chub zhi thob 'gyur/ /de dag stobs skyes tshul dang tshul min mkhas shing byang chub yid nges gyur/ /bu skyes ma bzhin dga' bas byang chub mchog tu de dag smon
lam btab/ /'od gsal lha rnams 'di dag byang chub 'dod la tshul gyi sgo bstan te/ /bskal pa khrag khrig brjod du med par phra ba'i tshul 'di bstan byas nas/ /sems can skar
ma'i grangs pas ches mang ba dag byang chub dga' byas te/ /de yi 'og tu 'jig rten mkhas pa rang byung skyon bral kun mkhyen 'gyur/ /de dag zhing
mchog brjod du med pa zhing rnams bye ba brgya bgrangs par/ /yangs shing shin tu dga' la mtha' dag bkod pa rnams kyis brgyan pa ste/ /kun gyi zhing du ngan song rnams dang de
bzhin mi khom yong mi 'byung / /bde bar gshegs rnams thugs brtses sems can thams cad rang byung mdzad par 'gyur/ /zhing rnams de dag gang na'ang nyan thos theg pa
ston par mi 'gyur te/ /sems can thams cad rang byung nyid du mngon phyogs 'phrog pa med par 'gyur/ /de na rang byung sangs rgyas nyid ston mdzad pa 'jig rten mkhas rnams
kyi| |sku tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bye ba brgya grangs gang+gA'i bye snyed 'gyur/ /rta thul 'jig rten khrag khrig khams kyi nyan thos mya ngan bzlas pa bas/ /gang yang skyes pa'am bud med
gcig cig byang chub yang dag dga' byas na/ /bsod nams de la snga mas grangs sam dper yang bya bar mi nus so/ /de bas byang chub zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa byang chub dga'
bar gyis/ /rta thul 'di la 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'byung ba rnyed sla min/ /de ni u dum wa ra'i me tog 'dra zhes sangs rgyas mtha' yas blo mnga' gsungs/ /de phyir bla
na med pa'i zhi bde byang chub mi gang 'dod pa yis/ /shin tu blo phra bsten bzang mkhyen pa tshul mkhas 'dren la brten par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi zhal nas don byed gsungs dge
de 'dra thos gyur nas/ /'khor rnams thams cad yi rang mchog tu dga' zhing yang dag dga' bar gyur/ /khrag khrig lha rnams nam mkhar 'khod nas gos kyi g.yab mo 'dor
bar byed/ /dga' nas sangs rgyas dbang phyug khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes sgra yang phyung / /zhi ba thugs zhi skye bo nyon mongs rgod pas rgod gyur zhi bar mdzod/ /bdud rtsi ston cing
dug gsum zhi mdzad sems can dug ni skyug tu gsol/ /khyod kyi ye shes thos nas skye rgu'i dug med 'gyur zhing dgra med 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal rnams kyi 'dren las tshul thos
mi zad srid pa'i rgyud las 'grol/ /'od gsal ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu gcig pa'o// //bam po brgyad pa/ de nas dge rgyas kyi ris kyi lha khrag
khrig phrag bcu gnyis kyis lha ma yin rnams nas 'od gsal ba'i lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab
tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / /yid bde ba skyes nas bdag cag tshul phun sum tshogs par gyur pa yang brjod cing / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob pas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po dmigs pa'i dngos po thams cad la bde ba'i tshor ba sha stag myong bar 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi myong la/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba
yang ma lags pa yang mi myong ste/ sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang / mi'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis
kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang / lag pa bcad dam/ rkang pa bcad dam/ rkang lag bcad dam/ rna ba'am/ sna'am/ rna ba dang / sna gtubs kyang bde
ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / sba lcag gis bzhus sam/ spa lcag phyed tshal lam/ lcag gis bzhus kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par
'gyur ba dang / btson rar bcug gam/ lcags sgrog dang / shing sgrog tu bcug gam/ btson chad ma po la rgyas btab bam/ byis pa'i gtsug phud ltar bcings sam/
dugs kyi snod ltar gdugs sam/ bu ram shing brdung ba ltar brdungs sam/ 'dam bu bcom pa ltar bcom mam/ 'bru mar gyi mar me ltar 'bar bar byas sam/ mar
gyi mar me dang / zho bskol ba ltar 'bar bar byas kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / me'i nang du bor ram/ seng+ge'i khar bstabs sam/ stag gi khar
bstabs sam/ skam ril bya ba ltar dril tam/ byi ba'i chad pa lta bus bcad dam/ nyes pa byung ba bsgrags pa ltar bsgrags sam/ kaR+sha pa Ni tsam du gtubs sam/ 'bras phye
