btso ba ltar btsos sam/ glang po che rnams kyis bcom yang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / mig phyung ngam/ gsal shing gi rtse mo la bzhag gam/ bsad
pa'i gnas su khrid de rnam pa thams cad du mgo gcod kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ bde ba yang ma lags mi bde ba yang ma lags pa'i 'du shes rnam
pa thams cad du mi 'byung ngo / /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yun ring po nas spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe smon lam 'di ltar btab ste /
gang gis bdag la kha zas byin pa de dag nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig /gang gis bdag la sgom blud pa de dag dang / gang gis bdag la rim gro byas pa dang / bkur
stir byas pa dang / bsti stang du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa de dag thams cad kyang nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig /gang yang bdag la gshe ba dang / mi bde bar
byed pa dang / brdeg pa dang / mtshon gyis 'debs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du srog gcod pa'i bar du byed pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub
kyi bde ba thob cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig /ces smon lam btab ste/ de yid la bya ba de dag dang ldan
zhing / de lta bu'i las dang / de lta bu'i smon lam dang ldan pas sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i bde ba'i 'du shes la brten cing bsnyen la sgom zhing mang du byed
de| de las de'i rnam par smin pas chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob bo/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro
ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur pa de'i tshe bdud kyi las thams cad kyis mi 'phrog cing mi 'khrugs par 'gyur te/ de'i tshe 'di ltar tshe la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang /
las la dbang ba dang / rnam par rtog pa la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba ste/ dbang lnga thob par rig par bgyi'o/ /de 'tshal na/ tshe brjes ma thag tu byang chub
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de 'tshal na/ bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gnas so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
de theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs shing byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'dzin pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad rab tu bsal ba dang / 'gro
ba drug po kun tu skyes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la bslab pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan
pa dang / bdud kyi las las rnam par rgyal ba dang / chos thams cad khong du chud par rig par bgyi ba'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang gis byang chub sems dpa' chos
thams cad la nges pa'i rtogs pa thob par 'gyur ba thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/ /de nas dge rgyas ris kyi lha rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di brjod nas de'i tshe
tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ dge rgyas lha tshogs 'di dag thams cad chos la mthar thug gyur pa ste/ /ston pa dbang po zhi zhing zhi ba
mkhyen la mgo bos skyabs su mchi/ /de dag mkhas pas mchod pa'i sangs rgyas don mkhyen 'khor ba brgal gyur pa/ /thub pa mi yi 'dren pa tshul mkhas rgyal ba 'dren pa 'dren la
bstod| |'di na rang bzhin nges pa'i thub chos gnas pa gang na'ang ma mchis te/ /sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma ji bzhin khyod kyis thub pa legs par mkhyen/ /yan lag sna tshogs sgra
brnyan ri khrid 'byung ba mkhas pas rtogs pa ltar/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i drang srong khyod kyis lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten gzigs/ /'di ni
sems can srog dang shed bu gso ba gang zag ma mchis te/ /mi mchog khyod kyis 'du shes rnam par bshag cing stong par rnam bzhag la/ /rkang gnyis dam pa sems can
gtso bo byams pa gzhal yas sgom pa'ang mdzad/ /rgyal ba sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'di ni 'gro ba kun gyis rtogs par dka'/ /byams pa dge sgom sems can dmigs pa
yin zhes 'dren pas bka' stsal la/ /sems can rnam par bshig cing 'gro ba thams cad sems can med par mkhyen/ /de ltar rkang gnyis dam pa rnyog pa mi mnga'
the tshom bral thugs ldan/ /des na bde gshegs pa rnam brtags blo mnga' mchod 'os khyod la mchod par 'tshal/ /bde bar gshegs pa sdug bsngal phyogs bcur gnas pa kun tu mi dmigs
kyang / /lha yi lhar gyur khyod kyis sems can rnams la snying rje bgyi bar gsungs/ /de ltar rgyal mchog bdag cag rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ji bzhin kun tu 'tshal/ /des na
rkang gnyis gtso bo mi mchog mchod 'os khyod la mchod par 'tshal/ /thub pa khyod kyis sems can dang ni bsal bgyi sdug bsngal mi gzigs la/ /dgyes pa skyes
nas rab tu dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mi dgyes rnam par bsal/ /de ltar sangs rgyas tshul ni bsam gyis mi khyab tshul 'di ji bzhin 'tshal/ /des na mi mchog khyod la mchod
nas brnyes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi/ /skyon bral khyod kyis 'gro ba kun tu sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das ma dmigs/ /'on kyang 'khor bar sems can gzigs shing don
mdzad stobs dang ldan pa bskyed/ /sems can sdug bsngal 'gro dang thub dang mya ngan 'das dang gnas ma mchis/ /sangs rgyas tshul 'di rtogs nas thub pa mchod 'od khyod la
mchod par 'tshal/ /'dren pa tshad med bzhi po gzigs shing de yang gnyis su med par bstan/ /gang zhig der rdul ma gzigs gang yang tshad med gnas pa de ma gzigs/ /
thub pas bag med gang yang ma gzigs bag yod mi yang ma gzigs te/ /sangs rgyas tshul 'di 'tshal nas thub pa ston pa khyod la mchod par bgyis/ /thub pa sku ni rnam par
spangs pas sku btsal mdzad na ma brnyes kyang / /de ltar 'dren pa dran pa ma gsung ma lags bsnyel ba yong mi mnga'/ /bde bar gshegs pas lus la song ba'i sgom pa
sgom par gyis zhes gsungs/ /sangs rgyas tshul 'di ni gnas bde bar gshegs pa skyob la mchod pa bgyis/ /'dren pas tshor ba'i rang bzhin btsal ba mdzad na brnyes par ma
gyur la| |tshor ba tshor bar bgyid pa'ang thub pas yongs su btsal na ma brnyes te/ /de ltar gang zhig dran sgom de ni sangs rgyas kyis kyang yong ma
gzigs/ /sangs rgyas tshul 'di 'tshal nas ston pa la ni bdag cag mchod pa bgyis/ /thub pas sems dang sems las byung ba dgongs te btsal na ma rnyed la/ /gang gi
nye bar bzhag pa de yang dran pa med par rab mkhyen kyang / /thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis sems 'dus dran pa sgom par gyis zhes gsungs/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i dgongs
pa 'di 'tshal nas ni ston la mchod par bgyis/ /'jig rten phan par bzhed pas chos dang chos la gang spyod de ma gzigs/ /sgom par gang gsungs dran pa de yang
'di na rang bzhin ma mchis la/ /thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis chos 'dus dran pa sgom par gyis zhes gsungs/ /sangs rgyas tshul bzhi po 'di rab tu 'tshal nas skyob la
mchod pa bgyis/ /gnas gcig mchis pa ma lags gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi lta ga la mchis/ /gang gi gnas su brjod pa'i dran pa de yang gang na'ang ma mchis
te| |de bas gang gi bde ba'am sdug bsngal yang dag gang na'ang de ma mchis/ /ston pa'i tshul 'di 'tshal nas des na bdag cag khyod la mchod pa 'tshal/ /ston pa'i tshul
mchog bzhi po 'di rnams dge slong gang dag 'dzin bgyis na/ /'di dag thar pa nyid kyi lam ste 'khor ba las ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de ltar de ni tshul 'dir ma bcings ma
grol byang chub 'dren pa min/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis btags pa ma bshig des na khyod la mchod par 'tshal/ /thar mdzad slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis lam zhi rdzu 'phrul
rkang pa gsungs/ /'di dag bsgoms na mi rnams dbang po dul zhing mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /yang dag tu ni rdzu 'phrul dang ni rkang pa sgom pa mi dmigs te/ /chad par mi 'gyur
bya ba'ang ston cing byed pa po yang mi dmigs la/ /thams cad mkhyen gyi bstan 'dir lha tshogs the tshom gang na'ang ma mchis te/ /de dag de na nem nur ma mchis de bzhin som
nyi ma mchis 'gyur/ /'di na mchod pa bzang po mchog ces mchod 'os sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/ /des na bde gshegs dpe med spyod mnga' mchod 'os khyod la
mchod pa 'tshal/ /thar par mdzad slad 'jig rten mkhas pas nges 'byung dbang po lnga yang gsungs/ /rtag tu bag yod byos la mya ngan 'das 'gro'i lam 'di sgoms zhes
bstan| |thub pa dbang po dang ni sgom pa po dang thar pa'ang mi dmigs te/ /'di la lha 'khor the tshom ma mchis de slad khyod la mchod pa 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya
ngan 'das par 'gro ba'i drang lam stobs lnga po/ /de dag nyon mongs zad bgyid thar par bgyid ces ston pa thub pas gsungs/ /de dag rang bzhin
ma mchis nyon mongs ma mchis rgyal ba ma mchis te/ /thub pa bdag cag gang la'ang the tshom ma mchis de slad khyod la mchod/ /byang chub yan lag bdun po 'di dag dge
ba lam gyi dam pa ste/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan 'das 'gro'i drang lam mchog ces thub pas gsungs/ /'ching ba mchis pa ma lags grol ba ma mchis bcings
pa'ang ma mchis te/ /sems can dkon mchog 'di la bdag cag the tshom ma mchis khyod la mchod/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis bzhi phrag gnyis lam sems can
rnams la bstan/ /brtson 'grus ldan par 'phags lam sdug bsngal mthar mar 'byin pa sgoms zhes gsungs/ /mi mchog lam dang de bzhin nyon mongs 'di
gnyis g.yo ba ma mchis te/ /'di la lha tshogs the tshom ma mchis gyur pas mchod 'os khyod la mchod/ /'dod chags gnyen por zhi gnas bka' stsal zhe sdang
gnyen por byams pa gsungs/ /gti mug gnyen por lhag mthong thub pa mchog gis sems can rnams la bstan/ /'di dag thams cad g.yo ba ma mchis skad cig dag
min nyon mongs min/ /'di la lha tshogs the tshom ma mchis thub pa mchod slad rtag tu brtson/ /sdug bsngal zhi bya phyir ni zhi gnas lhag mthong lam yang sgoms zhes gsungs//
bcom ldan gang gis 'gro ba nyon mongs bag chags bcas dri de dag zhi/ /thub pa zhi gnas lhag mthong de bzhin dri ma thams cad stong pa ste/ /'di la lha tshogs gang du'ang
the tshom ma mchis skyon bral khyod la mchod/ /stobs bcu sems can rnams la dge ba bcu yi las lam bstan mdzad de/ /gsod dang 'khrig dang ma byin phra ma rdzun dang zhe
gcod kyal tshig dang / /gnod sems dang ni mi rigs 'dod dang de bzhin log par rtog pa rnams/ /mi dge'i las lam 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can rnams la
bstan| |sems can mi dmigs gsod pa ga la mchis te lhag ma de dang 'dra/ /gnyen po dge ba ma mchis de ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/ /bde gshegs thub pa zag pa mi
mnga' rnams kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong / /rnam 'dren the tshom som nyi ma mchis de slad khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas sras po dge ba'i blo can gang zhig spyod pa 'di bstan
pa| |mkhas pa kun tu dge ba nyid myong sdug bsngal myong bar yong mi 'gyur/ /bcom ldan bde gshegs ye shes des ni tshul 'di bde bar thob par bgyis/ /'di la lha tshogs
the tshom ma mchis mchod 'os khyod la mchod par 'tshal/ /de ltar dge rgyas kyis lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas cang
mi zer bar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge rgyas kyi lha rnams cang mi zer bar 'khod pa yang mkhyen/ de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pas bsgrubs pa yang thugs su chud nas 'dzum
pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/ skye bo 'di kun bcom ldan khyod kyi mkhyen pa'i zil gyis zil mnan
nas| |bde gshegs rgyal ba mchog khyod kyis ni 'dzum pa mdzad 'di 'jig rten bstan/ /rgyu ma mchis par chos kun mkhas pa rnams ni 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ /'dzum
rgyu don gnyer mi mig med rnams la 'jig rten mkhas pas bka' stsal gsol/ /ma lus 'di dag thams cad gzhan du mi sems khyod 'dzum re zhing 'khod/ /dpal
stug khyod la bstod pa bgyid cing nyan pa 'tshal ba'i yid kyis gnas/ /sangs rgyas gsung gi dbang phyug thos nas yid ni rab tu rangs gyur te/ /chos rnams kun la
nges pa'i blo dge ldan pa'i ston par skye bar 'gyur/ /bde gshegs mi mchog dge ba'i thugs can de ring su zhig blo gros bskyed/ /de ring gang gis 'chi med zhi ba rtogs
shing phyogs rnams snang bar bgyis/ /su zhig 'jig rten thugs brtse rgyal ba 'dren pa dpag tu med 'gyur ba/ /de dag bka' stsol drang srong 'khor 'di legs par gsungs pas
tshim par mdzod/ /rgyal ba khyu mchog dge sbyong dam pa deng su btsun la dad pa skyes/ /bdud kyis mi 'phrog blo ldan gang zhig chos la yang dag yongs su gnas/ /sangs rgyas sras
po tshul mkhas gang zhig de ring nges pa thob par 'gyur/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag bka' stsol 'gro 'di the tshom ma mchis mdzod/ /bde gshegs deng su 'gro la dad bskyed skye rgu
rnams la byams gyur cing / /byang chub mthar phyin blo gros brtan zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas/ /gang la 'dzum pa deng bstan bde gshegs bstan pa 'dzin pa de
gang lags/ /bsod nams brgya yi mtshan mnga' de dag bka' stsol bdag gi the tshom khum/ /'dren pa khyod gsung yan lag brgyad ldan legs par bka' stsal thos gyur na/ /
bde gshegs gsung gis thog mar bdag cag 'dong zhing 'gro ba gzhan yang 'dren/ /de ltar gyur na bde gshegs bstan rab 'di ni sras la gnas par 'gyur/ /'jig rten
'di dag yid ni myur du bde gshegs rnams la gnas par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ nga yi 'jig
rten don byed 'dzum mdzad rta thul khyod kyis mthong gyur cing / /skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis dus su dris te 'gro ba'i don byas pa/ /khyod kyi bsod nams
'phel ba brjod du med de de ni zad mi 'gyur/ /de ni khyod la bstan gyi khyod dang 'gro ba 'di dag dga' bas nyon/ /dge rgyas lha tshogs 'di dag nga yi chos nyid la ni the tshom med//
kun kyang yi rang rab zhi yid kyis tshigs bcad dag gis nga la bsngags/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong grangs mchod 'os mchod byas te/ /the tshom med pa'i yid kyis
tshul dris kun tu som nyi med par gyur/ /de ltar sngon gyi rgyu des 'dir yang tshigs su bcad pas nga la bstod/ /bskal pa bzang po'i rgyal ba bstod 'os kun la'ang 'di dag
bstod par 'gyur/ /'di dag bskal pa ut+pal la la rgyal ba dgra rgyal mthu chen 'gyur/ /'di dag sems can khrag khrig bsam yas yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar byed/ /sangs
rgyas drang srong chen po de dag yid 'ong mtshan du gang 'gyur ba/ /de yang bstan gyi dang ba'i yid kyis sems kyi tha ba spangs te nyon/ /rgyal ba de kun chos kyi tog ces bya ba'i 'dren pa
gzhal yas 'gyur/ /'di dag re res kyang ni khrag khrig bsam yas mya ngan zlo bar 'gyur/ /de yi tshe na bde gshegs kun gyi ring bsrel shin tu rgyas 'gyur te/ /de tshe zhing rnams
kun tu rgyal ba'i mchod rten me tog rgyas par 'gyur/ /thub pa grags chen de dag yongs su mya ngan 'das par gyur pa na/ thub pa skyob pa de dag kun gyi ring bsrel rgyas pas don
chen 'gyur/ /sems can khrag khrig bsam yas rnams kyis de'i tshe ring bsrel mchod byas te/ /ring bsrel de dag mchod nas mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba 'chi med 'thob/ /thub
pa rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag grags pa rgyun chad mi 'gyur te/ /slob pa khrag khrig bsam yas rnams kyang de tshe rgyal ba'i drung du 'du/ /ji ltar bye ba brgya grangs nga la legs par
spyad pa byas nas su/ /byams pa blta phyir rgya chen yid kyis byams pa'i 'khor du 'dong 'gyur ba/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i nyan thos slob tshogs de dag rgyal nas rgyal 'khor du/ /rkang
gnyis gtso bo de dag kun gyi ring bsrel mchod pa bya phyir 'dong / /bde gshegs gsung snyan 'gro ba thams cad ngo mtshar gyur pa des thos shing / /dge rgyas ris kyi lha yi
bdag nyid chen po de tshe thos gyur nas/ /'khor rnams thams cad rab tu dga' ste phal cher byang chub sems kyang bskyed/ /bdag nyid chen po de tshe shes nas thub pa'i zhabs
la mgo bos rab tu gtugs/ /dge rgyas ris lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas de'i tshe 'bras bu che ba'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus lha
ma yin rnams nas dge rgyas kyi lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing
mgu ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas tshul gcig la zhugs pa dang / chos re re las kyang chos kyi sgo mtha' yas pa 'byung bar yang dag par mthong zhing tshul la 'jug pa
thams cad las kyang mtha' yas pa'i spobs pa dang / mi chod pa'i spobs pa dang / rig pa'i spobs pa dang / grol ba'i spobs pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa
dang / nye ba'i spobs pa dang / phra ba'i spobs pa dang / zab pa'i spobs pa dang / sna tshogs kyi spobs pa dang / 'jam pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dag kyang
'byung bar shes nas bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba skyes te chos nyid brjod cing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sgo'i tshul mtha'
yas pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te/ de la brtson par bgyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa thob cing mi chod pa'i spobs pa thob par
'gyur ba dang / dmigs pa dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la rmongs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de la dmigs pa gang yang gzugs lags par ma 'tshal ba'i
tshul gyis sgrib par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ni/ phung po la 'jug pas kyang sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/ khams la 'jug pa dang / skye mched la 'jug pa
dang / dbang po la 'jug pa dang / bden pa la 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa dang / sems can la 'jug pa dang / sems can ma mchis pa la
'jug pa dang / dngos po la 'jug pa dang / dngos po ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / dmigs pa la 'jug pa dang / dmigs pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / bdag la
'jug pa dang / stong pa la 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma la 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / smon pa la 'jug pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa
dang / gnas pa la 'jug pa dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / 'dus byas la 'jug pa dang / 'dus ma byas la 'jug pas kyang sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa'i
gzungs thob par 'gyur te/ thams cad la thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de ni/ phung po la 'jug pas kyang 'di lta ste/ phung po zhes bya ba'i chos
'di ni| yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /zhes gzungs rab tu thob bo/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzugs ni/ gang yang yongs su grub pa ma mchis te/ sa ni/ sar yongs su ma grub/ de bzhin
du chu dang / me dang / rlung ni/ rlung du yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sa ni/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang la yang rang bzhin ma
mchis pa de ni/ yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /chu dang / me dang / rlung ni/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang la yang rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni/ yongs su ma grub
pa'o| |de ltar yongs su ma grub pa'i gzugs ni/ 'das pa zhes gdags par mi bgyi/ ma 'ongs pa zhes gdags par mi bgyi/ da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par mi
bgyi'o| |de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o/ /gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de
la 'gag pa ma mchis te/ gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni/ gdags su ma mchis pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pas kyang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar
byung ba'i gzugs gang ci yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad gcig du bsdus nas gzugs kyi phung po'o/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni/ dmigs su ma
mchis na/ 'das par lta ga la 'gyur/ /ma 'ongs bar lta ga la 'gyur/ da ltar byung bar yang lta ga la 'gyur te/ de bas na/ gzugs kyi phung po ni/ dmigs su
ma mchis pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnams kyang de bzhin te/ de'i slad du phung po rnams ni/ dmigs su ma mchis so/ /
phung po dmigs su ma mchis pas/ gzungs dmigs su ma mchis te/ de ltar phung po la 'jug pas gzungs la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs de yang ming tsam dang / tha
snyad tsam dang / brda tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam dang / gdags pa tsam ma gtogs par gzungs la 'jug pa mi dmigs te/ 'di la phung po yang mi dmigs
gzungs kyang mi dmigs/ 'jug pa yang mi dmigs/ gzungs kyang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang 'di phung po zhes bgyi ba de ni/ ma bgyis pa'i
chos te| chos gang yang ma bgyis pa de la spungs pa yang ga la mchis te/ phung po ni/ spungs pa'i slad du phung po zhes bgyi'o/ /dper na/ khyim dang / khang bzang dang / bsil
khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / skar khung khol ma dang / ba gam dang / dra ba dang / stegs bu dang / kha khyer dang / skar khung dang / rta babs dang / ra ba dang / shing thags
dang / 'obs dang / chos mang po bsags pa la grong khyer zhes bgyi ba bzhin du phung po zhes bgyi ba'ang de bzhin te/ gzugs de yang ngo bo nyid kyis mi dmigs na/ de la spungs
pa lta ga la mchis/ spungs pa ma mchis pas na/ gzugs kyang ma mchis/ gzugs kyi phung po yang ma mchis so/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin gyis dmigs su ma mchis na/ de la spungs pa lta ga la mchis te/ spungs pa ma mchis pa'i slad
du rnam par shes pa yang ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po yang ma mchis so/ /de ltar phung po la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur/ gzungs thob pas spobs
pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de la skye mched la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur ba ni/ mig gi skye mched ces bgyi ba ni/ ci'i skye mched ces bgyi na/ sdug bsngal gyi
skye mched do/ /de la mig gang zhe na/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ba ste/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang ba'o/ /de la sa'i
khams dang ba ni/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang gis rang bzhin mi dmigs pa de ni/ yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /de bzhin du chu'i khams dang ba dang / me'i khams
dang ba dang / rlung gi khams dang ba ni/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang gi rang bzhin mi dmigs pa de ni/ yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /de ltar yongs su ma grub pa'i
mig gi skye mched de ni/ 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na /
'di ltar mig gi skye mched ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o/ /gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis pa
ste| gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni/ gdags su ma mchis pa'o// /de ltar mig kyang ma skyes ma 'gags/ skye mched dang sdug bsngal yang ma skyes ma 'gags
ba'o| |gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni/ ming tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / brda tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam ma gtogs par gdags su ma mchis pa ste/
ming de yang ming gis ma mchis pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos gang la mig ce'am/ skye mched ce'am/ sdug bsngal zhes gdags par bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang
dmigs su ma mchis te/ ming yang ming du brjod du ma mchis so/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya
dang / chos rnams kyang de bzhin te/ de'i slad du skye mched la 'jug pas gzungs thob/ gzungs la 'jug pas spobs pa thob bo/ /de la khams la 'jug pas gzungs thob
pa ni| mig ni/ mig gis ma mchis pa/ khams ni/ khams kyis ma mchis pa ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mig ni/ mig gi rang bzhin dang bral
ba| khams ni/ khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'i slad du ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ /gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de
ni| yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /gang yongs su ma grub pa de la ni/ skye ba ma mchis so/ /gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis so/ /gang ma skyes ma 'gag pa de ni/
ming tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / brda tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam ma gtogs par 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang /
da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/ /ming de yang ming gis ma mchis/ brjod pa'i bar de yang brjod pas ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin
ma mchis pa de ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ /gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni/ yongs su ma grub pa ste/ yongs su ma grub pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o/ /gang la
skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis so/ /gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni/ 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes gdags
par bgyi ba ma lags so/ gang dus gsum du gdags par bgyi ba ma lags pa de ni/ ming ma mchis pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ tha snyad ma mchis
pa| brda ma mchis pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa/ 'dris pa ma mchis pa/ brjod du ma mchis pa/ 'ong ba ma mchis pa/ 'gro ba ma mchis pa/ ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/
mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ dkar po ma lags pa/ nag po ma lags pa/ gnas ma lags pa/ rten ma lags
pa| thob pa ma lags pa/ thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rtogs pa ma lags pa/ rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mngon du bgyis pa ma lags pa/ mngon du bgyi ba ma
lags pa/ so so'i skye bo'i sa ma lags pa/ nyan thos kyi sa ma lags pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ma lags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa ma lags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sa ma lags
pa ste| sa yang ma lags/ sa ma lags pa yang ma lags so/ /de ni/ de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma lags pa de bzhin nyid dang / zhi ba dang mtshan nyid
ma lags pa ste/ tha snyad tsam du btags pa'o/ /des tha snyad du de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ste/ don dam par ni/ ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang la de bzhin gshegs
pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos de mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos
kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du rgya cher khams kyi chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi dbyings ni/ phung por
btags kyang chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor/ khams dang / skye mched dang / dbang po dang / bden pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar btags kyang chos kyi dbyings
nyid mi 'dor te/ chos kyi dbyings de ming gang dang gang gis btags kyang de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa'i
khams ni/ ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyis kyang de dang des sa'i khams nyid mi 'dor ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang ming gang dang gang
gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang /
nam mkha'i khams ni/ ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang de sa chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha'i khams nyid mi 'dor ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de
bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor te/ de ltar na/ khams la 'jug pas gzungs thob/ /gzungs la
'jug pas spobs pa thob bo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de la dbang po la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa ni/ dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis te/ 'di lta ste/ mig gi dbang po
dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / sna'i dbang po dang / lce'i dbang po dang / lus kyi dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / mo'i dbang po dang / pho'i dbang po dang / srog gi dbang po
dang / bde ba'i dbang po dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang / yid bde ba'i dbang po dang / yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang / dad pa'i dbang po dang /
brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun
shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ste/ de la mig ni/ mig gis ma mchis/ dbang po ni/ dbang pos ma mchis pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mig
ni| mig gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ /gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni/ yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /gang
yongs su ma grub pa de ni/ mi skye ba/ gang mi skye ba de ni/ mi 'gags pa/ gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni/ 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma
lags| ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/ /gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni/ mig ma lags/ dbang po ma lags so/ /gang
mig ma lags shing / dbang po ma lags pa de'i tha snyad ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chad pa stong pa ni/ rdzun pa yang dag pa ma lags pa ma mchis
pa ste| 'di ltar ming du gdags par bas kyi/ don dam par ni/ stong pa yang mi dmigs/ chad pa yang mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du mig dang dbang po yang chad pa stong pa
ltar rdzun zhing ma mchis la yang dag pa ma lags pa ste/ /gsob/ gsog/ log pa/ slu ba'i chos can/ byis pa 'drid pa/ glen pa rmongs par bgyid pa ste/ 'di ltar ming
du gdags par bas kyi/ don dam par ni/ mig kyang mi dmigs/ dbang po yang mi dmigs na/ de ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes nas
ji tsam du phyin ci log la gnas pa'i sems can rnams gzud pa'i slad du dbang po zhes btags kyi/ don dam par ni/ ma lags so/ /dbang po ni/ rang bzhin dang bral zhing dbang po'i
ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/ chos gang chos gang gis stong pa de la des tha snyad du bgyi ba ni/ rdzun pa/ gsob/ gsog/ log pa/ slu ba'i chos can/ byis pa 'drid pa/ glen pa rmongs
par bgyid pa/ rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de ni/ mi skye mi 'gag go /gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni/ 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar
byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/ /gang dus gsum du ma mchis pa de ni/ ming ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma mchis pa/ rdzun pa mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ gdags
su ma mchis pa/ gdags pa ma lags pa/ ma shes pa/ shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnam par ma shes pa/ rnam par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thos pa/ thos
par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnam par ma rig pa/ rnam par rig par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rtogs pa/ rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thob pa/ thob par bgyi ba ma lags
pa| ma mthong ba/ mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rnyed pa/ rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ma mchis shing mchis pa ma lags pa'i slad
du'o| |'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi zhig rmi lam na rgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtses pa dang / dga' mgur spyad pa dag nyal nyal ba las sad de rjes su dran pa de dran yang rnyed
par mi 'gyur/ 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rmi lam na yang mi des rgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtses pa dang / dga' mgur
spyad pa de dag ma thob ma rnyed na/ nyal ba las sad pa'i tshe lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ thob pa dang rnyed par bgyi ba de'i gnas ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin
du dbang po rnams ni/ rmi lam lta bu ste/ ji ltar rmi lam ni rgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtses pa dang / dga' mgur spyad pa de dag dmigs su ma 'tshal ba de bzhin du chos
thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid kyis dmigs su ma mchis pa ste/ de dag ni/ 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes gdags
par bgyi ba ma lags so/ /gang dus gsum du dmigs su ma mchis pa de dag ni/ brjod du ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ste/ dbang po thams cad kyang de bzhin du rig par bgyi'o/ /
de ltar na/ chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pas chos thams cad la 'jug par bgyi/ chos thams cad la 'jug pas kyang chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi'o/ /de la ji ltar
na| bden pa la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi zhe na/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ bden pa ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam me/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos thams cad ni/ stong pa ste/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gang zag med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /zhes bka'
stsal te| de la bdag cag the tshom ma mchis/ som nyi ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de la sems can ma mchis pa'i slad du sdug bsngal ma mchis par rig par
bgyi'o| |de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang la sems can ma mchis pa de la sdug bsngal yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sdug bsngal ma mchis pa'i slad du kun 'byung
yang ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang la 'bras bu ma mchis pa de ni/ rgyu ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ kun 'byung ba ma mchis
pa'i slad du 'gog pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ kun 'byung ba ma mchis pa la spangs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'gog
pa ma mchis pa'i slad du lam ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang spong bar mi bgyid pa de ni/ lam ma lags te/ lam gyi 'bras bu ni/ 'gog pa
ma lags la/ gang spang ba'i 'gog pa'i nyon mongs pa de ni/ mi dmigs te/ 'gog pa dmigs su ma mchis na/ lam du 'thad pa ma lags te/ 'bras bu ma mchis pa'i
lam yang ma mchis pas/ de ltar na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag ni/ brtags pa rnam par bsgrubs pa ste/ gang brtags shing
rnam par bsgrubs pa de ni/ ma mchis pa'o/ /gang ma mchis pa de la ni/ 'das pa zhes tha snyad du bgyi ba ma mchis so/ /ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes tha
snyad du bgyi ba ma mchis so/ /gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ ma brtags
pa| gdags par mi bgyi ba/ ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/ bstan par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rab tu bstan par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma brjod pa/ brjod
par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mngon par ma brjod pa/ mngon par brjod par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma mthong ba/ mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma shes pa/ shes
par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ khong du ma chud pa/ khong du chud par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rtogs pa/ rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rnyed pa/ rnyed par bgyi ba
ma lags pa/ ma thob pa/ thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thos pa/ thos par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma mthong ba/ mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma bsgrubs pa/
bsgrub par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mngon du ma bgyis pa/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags pa/ dkar po ma lags pa/ nag po ma lags pa/ snang ba ma lags pa/ mun pa ma lags
pa| 'gro ba ma lags pa/ 'ong ba ma lags pa/ gsal ba ma lags pa/ zab pa ma lags pa/ 'khrugs pa ma lags pa/ dang ba ma lags pa/ 'jig pa ma lags
pa| bde ba ma lags pa/ 'ching ba ma lags pa/ grol ba ma lags pa/ rjes su chags pa ma lags pa/ khong khro ba ma lags pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags
pa| rnam par byang ba ma lags pa/ ye shes ma lags pa/ rnam par shes pa ma lags pa/ lam ma lags pa/ lam gol ba ma lags pa/ 'jig pa ma lags
pa| rnam par 'jig pa ma lags pa/ gzung ba ma lags pa/ mi gzung ba ma lags pa/ dor ba ma lags pa/ rab tu dor ba ma lags pa/ dmigs pa ma lags pa/
dmigs su ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ sems can ma lags pa/ sems can ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ srog ma lags pa/ srog ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ gang zag
ma lags pa/ gang zag ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ bdag ma lags pa/ bdag ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ dngos po ma lags pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ stong
pa ma lags pa/ mi stong pa ma lags pa/ mtshan ma ma lags pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ smon pa ma lags pa/ smon pa ma
mchis pa ma lags pa/ gnas pa ma lags pa/ gnas pa ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ 'dus byas ma lags pa/ 'dus ma byas ma lags pa/ chad pa ma lags
pa| rtag pa ma lags pa/ log pa ma lags pa/ yang dag pa ma lags pa/ bden pa ma lags pa/ rdzun pa ma lags pa/ mngon par zhen pa ma lags pa/ mngon
par zhen pa ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ rten ma lags pa/ rten ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ gzhi ma lags pa/ gzhi ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ mngon par shes
par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ spang ba ma lags pa/ bsgom pa ma lags pa/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnyed pa ma lags
pa| rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ 'khor ba ma lags pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa ma lags pa/ sangs rgyas ma lags pa/ 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ so
so'i skye bo'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ 'phags pa'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ nyan thos kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ byang
chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ spyod yul yang ma lags pa/ spyod yul ma lags pa yang ma lags pa/ bgyis pa
pa ma lags pa/ ma bgyis pa ma lags pa/ dag pa ma lags pa/ dag par bgyi ba ma lags pa ste/ de ltar bden pa la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur/
chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur/ gzungs thob pas spobs pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de la ji ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pas chos
kyi dbyings la 'jug ce na/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa nas de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar
'gyur ro/ /zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ste/ 'di ni/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de la ma rig pa ni/ ma rig pas ma mchis pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/
'di ltar ma rig pa ni/ rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ /gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni/ yongs su ma grub
pa'o| |gang yongs su ma grub pa de ni/ mi skye ba'o/ /gang mi skye ba de ni/ mi 'gag pa'o/ /gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni/ 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma
'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/ /gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni/ ming ma mchis pa/
mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ gdags su ma mchis pa ste/ gzhan du na ming tsam dang / brda tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam
dang / brjod pa tsam dang / gdags pa tsam du sems can rnams gzud pa'i don du bgyi ba ma gtogs par ma rig pa de ni/ don dam par dmigs su ma mchis so/ /
chos gang don dam par dmigs su ma mchis pa de ni/ gdags su ma mchis pa/ tha snyad du bgyir ma mchis pa/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang
ming tsam zhes bgyi ba nas gdags pa tsam gyi bar de dag kyang yang dag pa ma lags pa/ rdzun pa/ log par brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs pa/ yongs su brtags
pa| rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par dpyad pa/ ma zhi ba/ rab tu spros pa'o/ /ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bgyi ba yang chos gang gi ngo bo nyid kyis ma mchis
pa de 'du byed bskyed par yang ji ltar 'gyur te/ de bas na/ ma rig pa ni/ ma mchis pa'o/ /de ltar na/ ma rig pa ma mchis pas 'du byed rnams kyang ma skyes pa'o/ /gang
ma skyes pa de ni/ rga bar mi 'gyur/ na bar mi 'gyur/ 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ shi 'pho bar mi 'gyur/ skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos
gang yang ma skyes pa de la rga ba ga la mchis te/ gang la rga ba ma mchis pa de ni/ na bar mi 'gyur/ 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ shi 'pho bar mi 'gyur/ skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'di
ni| 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste/ ming tsam du bas kyi/ don dam par ni/ ma lags so/ /ma rigs
pa gang lags pa de nyid byang chub bo/ /de bzhin du srid pa'i yan lag thams cad kyang shes par bgyi ste/ de ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings
la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ ma skyes pa ste/ chos thams cad kyang ma skyes pa'o/ /de bas na/ chos thams cad ni/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ ma 'gag pa ste/ chos thams cad kyang ma 'gag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du de bzhin
gshegs pa ni/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ dmigs su ma mchis pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa/ rjes
su chags pa ma mchis pa/ khong khro ba ma mchis pa ste/ chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ chos thams cad
kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'o/ /de'i slad du chos thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar na/ chos gang dang gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs
pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dang de dag gis chos thams cad ma mchis te/ de'i slad du chos thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la
zhig 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /zhes mchi na/ de dag
thams cad ni/ lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ gnyis su ma mchis pa ste/ byang chub kyang gnyis su ma
mchis pa lags pas gnyis su ma mchis pas ni/ gnyis su ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du gang la la zhig
'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to/ /zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad ni/ lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ /de ci'i slad
du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ bzlog pa'am bskor bar mdzad pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas sems can
tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las bzlas so/ /zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad ni/ lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos
thams cad ni/ sems can ma mchis pa ste/ de la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa gang yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs
pas sems can tshad med pa'i don mdzad do/ /zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad ni/ lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin
gshegs pa ni chos gang la yang phan pa'am gnod pa'i rnam par nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs
pas tshe'i 'du byed bor ro/ /zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad ni/ lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi dbyings ni/
ci'ang 'dor ba'am/ len pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad ni/ lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe
na/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi dbyings ni/ 'khor ba'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig 'di lta bu'i
chos la nges par gyur na/ de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi dbyings la ni/ 'gyur
ba ma mchis kyang gda'i/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur mi
gda'o|| ||bam po dgu pa/ de nas 'bras bu che ba'i lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyid la nges pa 'gro ba brjod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang de'i tshe bcom
ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bde gshegs mthu chen 'dren pa tshul dang tshul min mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba kun la thugs
brtse thub pa yang dag ji bzhin ston mdzad pa/ /'dren pa tshul mkhas khyod kyis tshul ni yang dag nyid du yang dag bstan/ /mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon
par 'phags la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /khyod kyis byang chub nges par 'byung ba'i drang lam gcig pu bgrod pa bstan/ /khyod kyis byang chub dam pa gzhal yas zhi ba shis pa mi
g.yo brnyes/ /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyam thag 'grol mdzad pa/ /mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par 'phags la mgos phyag
'tshal| |phung po rnams ni ngo bo nyid stong shin tu phung po rnams dang bral/ /byis pa rmongs byed rnams ni rab tu bral bar khyod kyis yongs su brtags/ /shes pa mi ldan skye bo phal
chen 'dir bcings rnyong la spre 'u thogs pa bzhin/ /grol ba mkhas pa rnams ni mkha' la rlung bzhin chags pa med par 'dong / /khams rnams khams kyi rnam pa kun tu stong
par thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs/ /dper na brag ca rnam pa kun tu shin tu sgra dang bral ba 'dra/ /des ni mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin mi shes mang po bcings/ /grol
ba mkhas pa yang dag rtogs pa rnams ni khams gsum chags ma mchis/ /skye mched ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu stong zhes thams cad mkhyen pas bstan/ /yang dag ma lags rdzun
zhing byis pa bslu ba chad pa stong ba 'dra/ /mi mkhas skye bo chos la gcig tu ma nges mang po de la chags/ /dper na 'gron po rgya mtsho chen por
'khyams pa bzhin du 'khor bar lhung / /'dren pa dbang po 'di dag dbang po nyid kyis shin tu stong pa ste/ /thub pa me long nang gi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor lta bur shin tu
stong / /mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ma 'tshal mang po dag ni de la chags/ /bya dang mtsho yi nya dang srog chags dag ni rgya la thogs pa bzhin/ /sems can sems can
nyid stong sems can bral zhing ngo bo nyid kyis stong / /thub pa sems can ri mo mkhan gyis gzugs bris bzhin du ma mchis na/ /mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin
ma 'tshal mang po de la chags/ /mkhas pa yang dag rtogs rnams sgo nga'i sbubs nas byung ba'i bya bzhin grol/ /rten 'byung chos rnams de dag skad cig pa ste stong
zhing dmigs ma mchis/ /rmi lam dga' ba bzhin du gzung du ma mchis byis pa rmongs bgyid pa/ /mi shes rtog pa'i slad du des kyang mi mkhas skye bo mang po bcings/ /
mkhas pa yang dag rab tu rtogs rnams gzeb nas thar pa'i bya bzhin grol/ /thub pas chos nyid bsam yas ji bzhin chos rnams thams cad bsam mi khyab/ /thub pa
zhi ba mya ngan 'das pa ji bzhin chos kun mtshan nyid bral/ /thub pa khams gsum mi chags bzhin du chos kun gnas pa ma mchis te/ /de slad tshul gcig 'di 'tshal gyur na 'gro
kun bde bar gshegs par 'gyur/ /thub pa bdag dang gzhan du mi mkhyen lta bur chos kun g.yo ba med/ /thub pa'i ye shes rgyal ba'i bstan pa ji bzhin chos kun bsam mi khyab/ /
thub pa byis pa'i spyod yul ma lags ji bzhin chos kun brtags ma lags/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul 'di ni rab gsal de bzhin shes par gyis/ /mi mkhas gang
dag rgyal bas byang chub gzhal yas brnyes zhes smras pa dang / /gang dag rgyal bas 'khor lo dam pa gzhal yas mchog bskor smra ba dang / /gang dag bde gshegs skyob pas
srog chags khrag khrig mya ngan 'das smra ba/ /de dag thams cad yang dag ma 'tshal lta ba thibs pos yongs su dkris/ /gang dag bde bar gshegs pas tshe yi 'du byed btang
bzung smra ba dang / /gang dag stobs bcu 'gro ba'i don mdzad yongs su mya ngan 'das smra ba/ /de dag thams cad lta bar song la yid chags bdud kyi lag tu mchis/ /chos kyis
de bzhin nyid ma 'tshal te 'dren pas mkhyen bzhin 'tshal bar bgyi/ /gang dag tshul dang tshul min 'di la mkhas pa de dag 'dren pa 'tshal/ /de dag rkang gnyis gtso bos dpal
stug 'jig rten thugs brtse rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin nyid 'di 'gyur ba'i dbang dang ldan te de nyid chos nyid lags/ /de ltar 'di 'tshal
gyur nas tshul la mkhas pa mi yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /de ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lha tshogs chos rnams nges par rtogs gyur pa/ /ston pa'i spyan sngar brjod de lhag pa'i bsam
pa de yang bstan byas nas/ /kha cig yi rang dogs med yid kyis sangs rgyas nyid du bdag mthong nas/ /'dren sras de dag tshul 'di nyid kyis bdag gis bdag lung
bstan par gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras bu che ba'i lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / chos rnams nges par rtogs pa thugs su chud nas
sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ dpal
stug 'dren pa rnams ni rgyu zhig gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad lags te/ /rgyu med mi mdzad bka' stsal bdag gis bde gshegs mngon sum de skad thos/ /'di ltar
'dren pa khyod kyis zhi ba bde ba bsil ba'i 'dzum mdzad na/ /rgyal ba lha mi lha min bla ma 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de gsungs/ /de ring 'di ltar 'dren pa khyod kyis zhal nas 'dzum
mdzad bsil mthong nas/ /'gro ba 'di kun the tshom 'tshal te bde gshegs khyod kyi zhal du blta/ /mi mchog thugs rje ldan pa khyod kyis 'dzum rgyu de ni myur du gsungs/ /de
thos gyur nas rgyal mchog 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis 'gyur/ /'dren pa dam pa lha tshogs gang dag rang gis rang la lung bstan pa/ /de dag su zhig gang gis ci thob
mtha' bcas rnam par 'phrul ba gsungs/ /mi mchog tshangs pa'i gsungs dbyangs bsgrags te the tshom kun tu bsal du gsol/ /de thos rgyal ba'i 'khor 'di rab tu
dga' zhing mchog tu mgu ba 'thob/ /bde gshegs rgyal mtshan mthon po de dag thams cad gzhan du mi sems par/ /'dren pa'i sras rnams byang chub gzhal yas zhi
ba dam pa sems shing mchis/ /thub pa 'dren mchog the tshom 'tshal ba de dag rnams kyi the tshom khum/ /des ni ye shes stobs ldan tshul dang tshul min mkhas kun rgyal
bar 'gyur/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo'i yan lag brgyad ldan gsung thos gyur nas rab dga' ste/ /bde gshegs bstan pa bzhin du bgyid cing gsungs pa'i rjes 'jug mkhas
par 'gyur/ /de dag don gyi dbang la brten nas bde gshegs 'dren pa bka' stsal gsol/ /des ni yid rangs gyur te 'gro ba chos kyi mtha' mar phyin par 'gyur/ /'dren pa
chen po lha de dag gi sngon gyi spyod pa thos gyur cing / /rgyal ba'i gsung thos gyur nas brnag pa yongs rdzogs zhi zhing rab dga' ste/ /tshul la
zhugs shing tshul la mkhas rnams myur du thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur/ /'gro ba rab tu 'grol mdzad ji bzhin yang dag ston par mdzad par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ lha tshogs rnams kyi ched du nga yis 'dzum pa 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa/ /rta thul khyod
kyis dus dang tshod shes nga la dris pa shin tu legs/ /gang phyir nga yis 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di yi tshul dang rgyu/ /de khyod bstan gyi khyod dang 'gro brtse gcig yid kyis
nyon| |thams cad mkhyen pa rnams ni rgyu yi 'bras bu rnam pa gsum gzigs shing / /rgyu la gzigs nas rkang gnyis dam pa dpal stug rnams ni 'dzum pa mdzad/ /kha
cig blo zhan bdag cag nyan thos 'gyur zhes mya ngan 'das zhugs dang / /kha cig kha rog 'dug la dga' zhing rang rgyal byang chub 'dod zhugs dang / /kha cig bdag cag
'jig rten 'dren pa mthu bo cher ni 'gyur byas te/ /skye bo sdug bsngal lhung ba 'grol zhes zhugs pa'i bsam pa mkhyen gyur nas/ /'dzum pa chung mdzad gang byung nyan thos
don du mdzad par shes par bya/ /'dzum pa 'bring mdzad gang byung rang rgyal don du mdzad par rig par bya/ /'dzum mchog ngas gang mdzad pa 'di ni 'dren pa'i don du shes
par bya| |rab 'bring tha ma rnam pa 'di gsum 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyur gsungs te/ /kha cig thar pa don gnyer lam gsum zhugs pa'i 'jig rten 'di mkhyen nas/ /des na
'jig rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren pa dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad/ /rta thul de la nyan thos don du 'dzum mdzad zhal du nub par 'gyur/ /rang rgyal don du 'dzum pa gang mdzad sku
yi dbus su nub par 'gyur/ /'dren pa stobs bcu'i don du 'dzum pa mdzad pa gtsug tu nub par 'gyur/ /de ltar rta thul khyod kyis 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni rnam gsum shes par gyis/ /
rgyal ba mchog rnams don du gang 'dzum de kun nga yi gtsug tu nub/ /sdig pa gzhom pa'i tshul du de ltar 'dzum pa ngas bstan shes par gyis/ /'dren pa rnams kyi 'dzum pa
gang yin de rgyu rnam gsum yang bshad kyi/ /kun kyang rtse gcig yid byos de ni nga las legs par nyan par gyis/ /dang po'i don du 'dren pa 'dzum pa ngas mdzad myur du
thog mar nub/ /'bring gi don ni dus tshod cung zad bsdad cing phyi nas nub par 'gyur/ /blo mchog ldan phyir 'dzum pa rgyal ba ngas mdzad shin tu ring du gnas/ /rta thul nyan thos
don du gang gnas 'dzum de theg pa'i dbang gis mdzad/ /gzhan yang 'dzum rgyu rnam gsum bshad kyi rta thul khyod kyis nyan par gyis/ /gang dag rgyal
ba drang po stobs bcu po la bskor ba byed pa ni/ /de dag nga la skyen par bskor nas myur du shin tu mkhas par 'gyur/ /'bring don phyir ni srab cing che la dal gyis bskor ba byed
par 'gyur/ /dal gyis g.yas phyogs bskor ba byas nas rgya cher 'gyur zhing mnan par 'gyur/ /gang dag gser rgyan la dkar steng bzhag 'dra ba'i bde gshegs mthong
gyur na| |de ni rkang gnyis dam pa thub pa'i sku kun khyab par gnas par 'gyur/ /thams cad mkhyen pas 'dzum bstan 'di ni zhing gi dbang du shes par bya/ /gang tshe gdugs
'dra mtha' yas mig ldan pas ni 'dren de 'gebs pa dang / /gang tshe me tog 'dra la 'dren pa'i steng gi mkha' la lding ba dang / /gang tshe sgo mo 'dra zhing bde bar gshegs
la lan gsum bskor byed pa/ /de ni 'jig rten 'das pa tshe yi dbang du 'dzum mdzad shes par bya/ /bde gshegs rgyal ba rnams kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu ni rnam gsum de
tsam bstan/ /rta thul khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu rnam gsum po de dag shes par gyis/ /des na 'jig rten don bstan bzhed nas 'jig rten rnam 'dren 'dzum pa mdzad/ /de thos gyur
nas thams cad mkhyen gyi stan la the tshom med par gyis/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha tshogs bye ba brgyad cu tham pa 'di dag ni/ /zhing rnams dag tu chos tshul shin tu rgya chen smra ba'i
rgyal bar 'gyur/ /mkhas pa de dag dpag med tshe ldan bskal pa mang por gnas par 'gyur/ /de'i phyir bde bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa rgya chen mchog gi cha 'di bstan/ /de dag
sngon gyi bskal pa sum cu drug gi rgyal ba rnams kyang mthong / /bskal pa sum cu drug tu thams cad mkhyen pa bsnyen bkur spyad pa spyod/ /da dung tshul mkhas 'di dag bskal pa
grangs med sum cu rtsa drug tu/ /gang zag chen po 'di dag rgyal ba khyu mchog mchod pa byed cing gnas/ /thams cad du yang phun sum tshul rtogs rgyal ba'i mchog la mchod pa
byed| |rkang gnyis gtso bo mchod de byang chub zhi ba yongs su btsal byas nas/ /de dag de yi 'og tu dpal stug rkang gnyis dam pa skyes bu mchog /'dren pa mthu chen yon tan
ldan par gser gyi rgyal mtshan bskal la 'byung / /rgyal ba de dag sna tshogs zhing na gnas shing rang rang zhing sbyangs te/ /sems can dam pa de kun nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
dpal zhes bya/ /de tshe yon tan ldan pa de dag rnams kyi 'dus pa grangs med de/ /de tshe thub pa re re'i nyan thos 'dus par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ /gal te bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu stobs
bcus nyan thos de bgrangs kyang / /legs mdzad rnams kyi nyan thos 'dus pa dag ni mthar phyin bgrangs mi 'gyur/ /'dus pa de dag thams cad
grangs med 'dus pa des ni ci 'dra ba/ /de las nyis 'gyur de tshe byang chub tu ni yang dag zhugs par 'gyur/ /de tshe rgyal bar zhugs kyi rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin//
de dag thams cad yongs dag zhing du spyad nas kun kyang rgyal bar 'gyur/ /bde gshegs de dag spyod pa gang yin pa de dag rnams kyi'ang de nyid 'gyur/ /'jig rten mkhas pa
de dag mya ngan 'das par gyur nas dam pa'i chos/ /de tshe sras kyis bzung zhing bskal pa bye ba brgyad cur gnas par 'gyur/ /de dag 'das nas ston pa'i gsung rab de la byang
chub sems bskyed pa/ /gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bas kyang shin tu mang ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de dag 'das nas ston pa skyob pa rnams kyi gsung rab de la ni/ /nyan thos rgya mtsho kun
gyi bye snyed dpag yas mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /de ltar 'jig rten don rnams mdzad pa rang byung de dag thams cad kyi/ /bstan pa gang yin de ni chos dang yongs su legs
par ldan gyur cing / /yang dag shar bar 'gyur te de ni bstan pa rnams kyi chos nyid yin/ /mi mchog de yi gsung rab de thos 'gro ba ma lus dad gyur nas/ /rkang gnyis dam pa
gzhal yas 'jig rten don byed bdag cag 'gyur zhes te/ /thams cad dga' nas rgyal ba'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal skye bo rab tu dga'/ /bde bar gshegs la dga' ba gzhal
yas bskyed nas chos kyis bsnyen bkur byas/ /de lta bas na dga' bar byos la mgo la 'bar bzhin spyad spyod de/ /rtag tu shes rab pha rol phyin dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten
byos la| |yang dag mthong ba'i spyod pa dge ba 'di la kun tu bsten byos te/ /dge slong khyed cag rkang gnyis gtso bo 'jig rten thugs brtser 'gyur bar gyis/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha
lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis de'i tshe sems can dpag tu med pa byang chub tu yang dag
par zhugs par rig cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la the tshom med par gyur par rig nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas
bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis so so nas mngon par bstod do/ /de nas lha'i bu sbyin pa la mos pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis sdug pa'i sras
rnams dang / /btsun mo dang ni srog phangs btang / /rgyal srid btang ba ci smos te/ /sbyin mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu tshul khrims la mos pas gsol pa/ khyod kyi
tshul khrims rnams sbyangs pa/ /rnam pa kun tu bsnyengs mi mnga'/ /shin tu bslab pas mthar phyin pa/ /khrims mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal//
lha'i bu bzod pa la mos pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis bzod pa bsten mdzad pas/ /yan lag gtubs pa'ang bzod par mdzad/ /zab mor sgyid lug ma lags te/ /bzod
mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu brtson 'grus la mos pas gsol pa/ brtson pa ma btang brtson 'grus te/ /stobs chen brtson 'grus ldan gyur pas/ /rdzogs
pa'i byang chub mchog brnyes pa/ /brtson mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu bsam gtan la mos pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis bsam gtan bsten mdzad pa/ /de
la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed/ /dus gsum mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ /bsam gtan mthar phyin phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu gzi brjid dang ldan pas gsol pa/ dpa' bos
shes rab pha rol phyin/ /yang dang yang du bsgoms pas na/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pa/ /shes rab mthar phyin phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu khams kyi blo gros
kyis gsol pa/ sbyin pa dag dang ngag snyan dang / /don spyad mthun pa'i don dag gis/ /'jig rten 'di dag khyod kyis btul/ /'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i
bu dge ba'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ byams chen thugs rje chen po dag /yun ring dus nas bsgoms mdzad de/ /sems can dpag yas yongs su bsgral/ /gdos 'dzin khyod la
phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu dag pa'i sems kyis gsol pa/ nyon mongs med pa'i mthar phyin cing / /thub chen dul ba'i sems mnga' bas/ /ma thul thams cad dul mdzad pa/ /
kha lo sgyur la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu blo gros dri ma med pas gsol pa/ sems dag mnyen pa'i sems mnga' ba/ /sems dul dbang po zhi mnga' ba/ /sems can kun gyis
sems mkhyen pa/ /sems mkhyen khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu blo gros rnam par dag pas gsol pa/ shes rab ldan pa'i blo gros can/ /blo gros mchog la rab tu
zhugs| |thugs gsal phun sum tshogs pa'i blo/ /mi mkhas rtogs mdzad phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu sems rgyan gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis sems ni rnam par sbyangs/ /sangs
rgyas zhing yang rnam dag mdzad/ /sems can blo yang rnam sbyangs pa/ /kun dag khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu pham pa med pas gsol pa/ dgongs pa pham pa mi mnga' ba/ /khyod
kyis bdud kyi dpung yang bcom/ /khyod kyis lha tshogs thams cad kyang / /rab tu dga' ba'i yid du bsgyur/ /lha'i bu myur du byed pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis chos rnams myur bar
mkhyen| |sems can myur bar rnam par sbyangs/ /zab cing blta dka'i chos dag la/ /myur du mdzad la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu brtson 'grus brtan
bas gsol pa/ bral gyur yongs su bral gyur pa/ /chu bo rgal te zag pa spangs/ /pha rol phyin cing thang la bzhugs/ /brtson 'grus brtan la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu spyod
lam dang ldan pas gsol pa/ 'dod chags spangs shing zhe sdang spangs/ /gti mug spangs pa zag med pa/ /sbyin gnas bsod nams zhing gyur pa/ /'jig rten mchod
'os phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu shin tu brtan pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis dam chos shin tu bstan/ /'jig rten gsum du rab tu mchod/ /gcig pu bgrod pas bde ba
brnyes| |de phyir khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu mi 'khrugs pas gsol pa/ lhun stug gcig tu gyur pa'i ri/ /rlung gis bskyod par mi nus te/ /de bzhin bstod dang smad
pa yis| |bde gshegs bskyod par mi nus so/ /lha'i bu mnyam pa nyid thob pas gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen po zab cing mnyam/ /mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis can/ /shes rab
zab mo blo ldan pa/ /rgyal ba mdzes la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu zab pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ sku chen khyod la sku mi mnga'/ /de bzhin nyid la rab tu zhugs/ /yang dag
mtha' yang rab tu ston/ /khyod mtshungs gang zag yong ma mchis/ /lha'i bu blo gros dang bas gsol pa/ gnyis su med pa yang dag ston/ /dpa' bo dpa' bos rnam par gnon/ /
gang zag zab la zhum ma mchis/ /de dag khyod chos pha rol phyin/ /lha'i bu rab tu dga' bas gsol pa/ mchog tu dga' yid brtan pa dag /khyod kyi slob la bslab pa'i rnams//
sprul rnams bags pa rnying 'dor bzhin/ /srid pa gsum po 'di dag 'dor/ /lha'i bu zhi ba'i yid kyis gsol pa/ ji ltar mar me mar zad cing / /snying po zad pas zhi gyur bzhin/ /
khyod kyi bstan pa myur thos na/ /shes rab chen po mya ngan 'da'/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas la gnas pas gsol pa/ gang gis kun mkhyen khyod mthong ba'i/ /mi rnams 'dod chags bcings
pa yang / /shes rab mtshon gyis mkhas pa dag /'dod chags zhags pa gcod par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas mang gis gsol pa/ zhi ba'i sems mnga' zhi la spyod/ /cho ga spyod
yul rab tu zhi/ /nyon mongs thams cad zhi gyur pa/ /dgra rnams zhi la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas 'jigs med kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis zhi gnas bslab pa yi/ /
byang chub sems dpa' grags chen dag /zhi gnas nyid kyis 'byung 'gyur zhing / /sems zhi de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas zas kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams kun
gyi zhi ba ni/ /dpa' bo khyod kyis rab tu bstan/ /shes rab chen pos de 'tshal na/ /de dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu rtag tu rnam par
blta bas gsol pa/ khyod kyis sems can rtag tu gzigs/ /mkhas pa khyod ltar slob pa rnams/ /ye shes mchog gis mnyam bzhag cing / /byang chub mchog kyang thob
par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu snang 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ shes rab pha rol phyin gyur pa/ /thub chen khyod las gang slob pa/ /de dag 'jig rten snang 'dzin cing / /sgrib pa med par
gzigs par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu 'od byed kyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten sgron ma khyod kyi gsung / /ye shes rgya mtsho de thos nas/ /de dag dri med bde ba 'thob/ /bsam gyis mi
khyab 'od kyang 'byung / /lha'i bu dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad rnam mi rtog /thabs la mkhas pas de dag gsungs/ /de 'dra'i ye shes
ston bgyid pa/ /de dag gang zag mchog tu 'gyur/ /lha'i bu rab tu mi gnas kyis gsol pa/ gnas ma mchis shing blang ma mchis/ /chos rnams thams cad sems ma mchis//
bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam 'gyur ba/ /de dag khyod kyis de bzhin mkhyen/ /lha'i bu gnas med blo gros kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad gzhi med par/ /rnam par 'dren
pa khyod kyis gzigs/ /de dag khyod kyis lugs bzlog ste/ /sems can rnams la bstan pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu mi rten blo gros kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad rten ma
mchis| |sems can ma mchis phan tshun min/ /lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin/ /yang dag ji bzhin khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu bar snang rgyu bas gsol pa/ bde gshegs
khyod kyis chos kyi rnams/ /bar snang lta bur snang ba ste/ /skye dang 'gog pa med par gzigs/ /de slad 'jig rten chags mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu ngar 'dzin med pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis
'gro ba 'di dag kun/ /lus kyi ngo bo nyid kyis ni/ /g.yo ba med cing ngar 'dzin med/ /spyod med rtsol ba med par gzigs/ /lha'i bu blo gros rnam par bsgoms kyis gsol pa/ sgyu
ma sna tshogs lags bgyis pa/ /sgyu ma'i mkhan pos bstan gyur na/ /de bzhin ma lags de bzhin gda'/ /thub pa de ltar mnyam ma mchis/ /lha'i bu rab tu sad pa'i ngang tshul
gyis gsol pa/ gzugs brnyan ji ltar me long la/ /gda' yang de ltar ma mchis pa/ /de bzhin chos rnams khyod kyis gzigs/ /de bas 'jig rten rmongs mi mnga'/ /lha'i
bu yid bzhin rnam par 'jig gis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams/ /de bzhin khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad/ /de ltar 'gro ba kun
kyang mkhyen/ /lha'i bu spobs pa thogs med kyis gsol pa/ chos nyid la ni khor yug tu/ /spobs pa rab tu 'byung 'gyur zhing / /chos nyid de yang
brnyes pas na/ /de slad khyod ni spobs pa ldan/ /lha'i bu chags med blo gros kyis gsol pa/ khyod yis chos 'di thams cad ni/ /rang bzhin mtshan nyid ma mchis par/ /yang
dag ji bzhin rab tu mkhyen/ /de bas thub pas rab rib bsal/ /lha'i bu mya ngan bral gyis gsol pa/ mya ngan med cing nyer len med/ /spros pa med cing rnyog pa med/ /chos
rnams kun tu nyon ma mongs/ /de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ chos rnams yang dag ma lags te/ /'gro dang 'ong
ba ma mchis pa/ /de dag khyod kyis yang dag mkhyen/ /de bzhin rab tu bstan pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu blo gros mchog gis gsol pa/ lhun gyis grub cing blang med pa/ /rmongs pa
med cing shes pa med/ /chos rnams ci yang mi bgyid pa/ /khyod kyis rang bzhin thugs su chud/ /lha'i bu sgrib med thob kyis gsol pa/ snang ba ma mchis mun ma mchis//
gzugs med ma lags gzugs can min/ /bzung ba ma mchis grol ma mchis/ /khyod kyis rang bzhin thugs su chud/ /lha'i bu mig dpas kyis gsol pa/ yul dang
phyogs na mi gnas pa/ /yod dang med pa ma lags par/ /rmi lam 'dod pa ji bzhin du/ /de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu mig mi 'dzum gyis gsol pa/ byis
pa rnams kyis blo rmongs pa/ /ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa/ /bar na'ang gnas pa ma mchis pa/ /de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pas
gsol pa/ gang zag sems can ma mchis pa/ /ma mchis tha snyad ma mchis pa/ /bstan pa'i slad du brjod bgyi ba/ /de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu mtshan
ma med pa la gnas pas gsol pa/ gang gis tha snyad gdags pa yi/ /mtshan ma de dag ma mchis te/ /chos kun mtshan ma mchis par/ /rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis
gzigs/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pa la gnas pas gsol pa/ ji ltar mtshan ma stong gyur cing / /smon pa dmigs su ma mchis dang / /su la smon lam mchis gyur pa/ /de yang
de lta'i tshul du mkhyen/ /lha'i bu ting 'dzin la gzhol bas gsol pa/ rnam thar sgo la brten bgyis shing / /gang zhig dgrol 'gyur de ma mchis/ /de bzhin kun nas nyon
mongs pa/ /de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu ma smad pas gsol pa/ khyod ni sdig pa kun spangs shing / /bsod nams thams cad bsags gyur te/ /bde gshegs
khyod la smad mi mnga'/ /su smod de dag mkhas ma lags/ /lha'i bu glog gi sprin gyis gsol pa/ ji ltar glog bcas sprin gyi tshogs/ /char gyis sa
chen ngoms par bgyid/ /de bzhin 'dren pas chos char gyis/ /'jig rten rnams ni ngoms par mdzad/ /lha'i bu bsam pa don yod kyis gsol pa/ thub mchog gsung ni don
mchis te/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /shin tu brtags te mdzad pas na/ /de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan/ /lha'i bu blo gros phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ chos
rnams thams cad dngos nyid kyis/ /ma skyes 'gags pa ma lags te/ /de dag bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen/ /gzhan yang de bzhin rtogs par mdzad/ /lha'i bu seng+ge nga ros
gsol pa/ khyod kyis stong pa nyid bstan te/ /seng+ge'i nga ro bsgrags mdzad pas/ /mu stegs can kun rab 'jigs pa/ /seng+ges ri dwags phra mo bzhin/ /lha'i bu bag yod las
kyis gsol pa/ bag yod sngon du btang mdzad de/ /khyod kyis spyod pa spyad bgyis pas/ /sangs rgyas chos la 'dren pa khyod/ /bag yod pas ni nges par byung / /lha'i bu bag
yod rab gnas kyis gsol pa/ bag yod pa la rab gnas te/ /khyod kyis nyid kyi chos kyang spel/ /stobs bcu gzhal yas sangs rgyas chos/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rab tu
spel| |lha'i bu bag yod skyes kyis gsol pa/ bag yod pa la brtson rnams ni/ /byang chub phyogs rnams yang dag skyes/ /thub chen rang yang grol gyur nas/ /de dag rnams ni
'jig rten 'grel/ /lha'i bu bag yod nges par 'byung gis gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dag /ji snyed thar la brten pa'i rnams/ /kun kyang khyod la bslab pa ste/ /ngag
yod pas ni nges par 'byung / /lha'i bu bag yod gnas pas gsol pa/ bag yod yongs su ma btang bas/ /rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras/ /'gro ba 'di la ma chags par/ /thams
cad mkhyen du nges par 'byung / /lha'i bu bag yod srung gis gsol pa/ byang chub lam la brten mdzad cing / /khyod ni bag gis bsrungs pas na/ /thugs rje chen po mkhas pa
yi/ /byang chub dam pa brnyes par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu bag yod brtson gyis gsol pa/ bag yod pa la rab brtson zhing / /mtshan nyid gcig po rtogs bgyis pa/ /dpa' bo chen po
khyed kyi sras/ /yab kyi dkor kyang thob par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu bag yod mngon par dga' bas gsol pa/ bag yod dga' ba'i brtan pa rnams/ /de dag sangs rgyas ye shes
kyis/ /dpa' bo nyon mongs ri 'jigs pas/ /nga rgyal ri yang de bzhin bsnyil/ /lha'i bu bag yod 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas ye shes tshol mdzad tshe/ /khyod ni bag gis
bzung ba na/ /bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ /khyod kyi thugs ni skyor ma gyur/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas brtson gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams de dag rang
bzhin zhi/ /de ni sangs rgyas spyod yul lags/ /byang chub yang dag gang zhugs dang / /thams cad mkhyen pa der mi 'jigs/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas la yang dag par gnas pas
gsol pa/ sangs rgyas zhi gnas bzhugs pa ste/ /'on kyang de la chags mi mnga'/ /sems can nyon mongs zhi bar mdzad/ /rdul 'thul ba la char ba bzhin/ /lha'i bu zhi
gnas la rab tu gnas kyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas zhi la rab tu zhugs/ /sus kyang mi bskyod ri bo bzhin/ /khyod la gnod bgyir mi nus te/ /sems zhi khyod la phyag kyang
'tshal/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas dul gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyi sras rnams ma smad pa/ /zhi gnas kyis ni yongs su dul/ /bdud rnams bye bas mi tshugs te/ /'dod chags
kyis ni gnod mi 'gyur/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas nges par 'byung gis gsol pa/ zhi ba'i yid mnga' zhir gnas la/ /dpa' bo chen po sgrol mdzad pas/ /ci la gnas te bsam
gtan mdzad/ /sus kyang khyod kyi tshul ma 'tshal/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas sngon du 'gro bas gsol pa/ ston pas sangs rgyas chos rnams kyi/ /sngon du zhi gnas 'gro zhes
gsungs/ /gang gis byang chub 'grub 'gyur ba'i/ /chos gzhan de yi rjes su 'brang / /lha'i bu zhi gnas rjes su 'brang gis gsol pa/ 'jig rten sgron mas zhi gnas
ni| |sems kyi rnyog pa dang bar bgyi/ /zhi ba'i sems ldan rnams kyi 'ching / /de khyod mtha' yas dbang du mdzad/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams kun gyi spyod
yul ni| |zhi gnas yin zhes 'dren pas gsungs/ /de la chags med spyod pa ni/ /rnam par 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas brlan gyis gsol pa/ bsam gtan
gyis ni mngon brlan te/ /shes rab kyis ni sems bsgoms pas/ /de phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes/ /de bzhin skye bo rnams kyang 'dren/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas lhur len gyis gsol pa/
sangs rgyas chos rnams gang la yang / /lam gzhan dag gis ma mthong ste/ /zhi gnas ye shes che thob na/ /rang byung nyid du nges par 'byung / /lha'i bu lhag mthong mngon dgas
gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen po lhag mthong ni/ /chos rnams thams cad ston pa ste/ /de la khyod kyi sras spyod cing / /rang byung nyid ni thob par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong 'byung gis
gsol pa/ shes rab pha rol phyin gnas shing / /rnam par 'dren pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sman pa'i rgyal po ston pa ste/ /de bas lhag mthong dge ba lags/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong
rab gnas kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad btsal bgyis te/ /yang dag ji bzhin mthong gyur na/ /brtan pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub
thob| |byang chub nyid la gnas par 'dong / /lha'i bu lhag mthong nges 'byung gis gsol pa/ gang zag mchog rnams ye shes kyis/ /byang chub mchog tu nges par
byung / /rdzogs pa'i byang chub ye shes kyis/ /brnyes pa'i dran pa skye mi 'gyur/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong mngon dgas gsol pa/ yang dag ji bzhin yang dag tu/ /chos
rnams rnam par gzigs pas na/ /byang chub gzhal yas brnyes gyur te/ /de bas rnam 'dren sangs rgyas lags/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong la mngon par brtson pas
gsol pa/ mkhas pa ye shes gang brtson zhing / /dka' ba mang po spyod bgyid pa/ de dag rgol tshogs thams cad kyis/ /pham par bgyi bar yong mi nus/ /lha'i
bu lhag mthong 'byung gis gsol pa/ chos rnams rnam mthong bgyi slad du/ /rgyal sras gang dag zhugs pa'i rnams/ /chos rnams ngo bo nyid 'tshal zhing / /rang byung
nyid ni thob par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong la brten pas gsol pa/ rnam 'dren khyod kyis yun ring du/ /ye shes la ni brten mdzad pas/ /thams cad mkhyen
pa brnyes nas ni/ /srog chags bye ba grol bar mdzad/ /lha'i bu khyad par ldan gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas mkhyen pas thams cad mkhyen/ /'dren pa dam pa mngon par
'phags/ /srid pa'i rgya mtshos khyer ba yi/ /'jig rten de yis sgrol bar mdzad/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong gnas kyis gsol pa/ lhag mthong la ni gnas mdzad cing / /chos
kun rnam par gzigs pas na/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams 'phel 'gyur te/ /sa bzang n+ya gro d+ha skyes 'dra/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong dang ma bral bas gsol pa/ rnam par 'dren pa khyod
kyi sras| |ye shes kyis ni yongs bzung ste/ /byang chub mchog ni thob bgyis shing / /skye bo mang po 'grol bar bgyid/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong la rnam par rtse bas gsol pa/
sangs rgyas mkhyen pas rnam par rol/ /chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'/ /zhum pa ma mchis dngang mi mnga'/ /thub pa 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen/ /lha'i bu lhag
mthong la yang dag par 'jug gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen pos chos kun ni/ /lhag mthong nyid du yang dag 'du/ /rang bzhin med par rnam mthong na/ /de ni rang byung byang
chub lags/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong snying pos gsol pa/ sangs rgyas lhag mthong snying po ste/ /chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'/ /'jig rten sdug bsngal 'di gzigs
shing / /thugs rje chen po shin tu bskyed/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong 'gros kyis gsol pa/ byang chub phyir ni shes 'grol ba'i/ /'jig rten mkhas
pa nges par 'byung / /de dag byang chub mchog kyang thob/ /grol nas skye rgu 'di dag 'grel/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid la rton gyis gsol pa/ stong pa nyid kyi chos bsten pa'i/ /
mkhas pa byang chub 'tshang rgya ste/ /sems can bcings las grol bgyid cing / /'ching ba thams cad rnam par gcod/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid la mos kyis gsol pa/
stong pa nyid la mos gyur pas/ /'gro ba 'di dag srog med gzigs/ /dmigs med ngo bo nyid med pa/ /de ltar srog chags rnams la ston/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyi
spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ni/ /chos rnams rang bzhin stong pa ste/ /srog chags rnams la thugs brtse bas/ /dpa' bos de la spyad
par mdzad/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyi bsam pas gsol pa/ skyon dang bral zhing bcings med la/ /'jigs skrag thams cad rab tu spangs/ /chos rnams kun la mi
gnas shing / /nam mkha'i rlung bzhin spyod pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid la mngon par dga' bas gsol pa/ stong nyid chos la brten bgyid cing / /sangs rgyas
spyod yul gang mos pa/ /de dag ston pa mchod pa ste/ /mchod pa de ni bla na med/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par 'phags kyis gsol pa/ gang gis 'dren pa
'phags gyur pa'i/ /de ni yang dag 'phags zhes gsungs/ /stong nyid chos la brten bgyid pa/ /ma smad de dag sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis 'dren gyis
gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen po chos rnams kyang / /mya ngan 'das min ston pa mchis/ /kun kyang mya ngan 'das par 'dren/ /drang srong chen po'i byang chub lags/ /lha'i bu
stong pa nyid kyis yang dag shar gyis gsol pa/ stong nyid zhi la brten nas ni/ /khyod kyi slob ma yang dag shar/ /stong pa nyid la gang brten pa/ /de dag rim gro bgyid pa lags/
lha'i bu stong pa nyid la brten gyis gsol pa/ /gang rnams stong pa nyid brten pa/ /mkhas pa de dag rmongs mi 'gyur/ /nyon mongs med cing lta med rnams/ /byang chub rdul med
'thob par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ gang rnams stong nyid brten bgyid pa/ /sangs rgyas chos kun phun sum tshogs/ /rang byung pham pa
med par 'gyur/ /'jig rten don kyang bgyid par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid la yang dag par zhugs pas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos la zhugs gyur te/ /stong pa nyid
la gang brten pa/ /de la bdud rnams bye ba phrag /stong gis dkrugs par mi nus so/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la dga' bas gsol pa/ mtshan
ma med la mngon dgyes te/ /dngos po thams cad rnam bshig nas/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten rnams nas byung / /mtshan ma rnams la chags mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma
med la gnas pas gsol pa/ mtshan ma med la spyod gyur cing / /zhi ba zhi la spyod pa rnams/ /mtshan ma rnam par bshig rnams kyis/ /tshul ni bdud kyis shes mi nus
lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul la/ /'dren pa khyod ni spyod mdzad de/ /mtshan ma mi mnga' rtogs dka' zhing / /zhi spyod khyod
la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas skom gyis gsol pa/ thub pa'i 'khor 'di thams cad ni/ /mtshan ma med pas skom gyur te/ /yab kyi dkor ni 'tshal gyur
nas| |de bzhin gshegs la bkur sti bgyid/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la spyod pas gsol pa/ mtshan ma med la nyin mtshan du/ /gang zag mchog ni spyod mdzad pa/ /lha
dang dri za mi dag kyang / /khyod kyi tshul ni ma 'tshal to/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas rnam par grol gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad rnam bshig cing / /dpal chen 'jig
rten sgron ma khyod/ /mtshan ma med la gnas par mdzad/ /de bas khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la rnam par rtse bas gsol pa/ thub chen dpa' bo chen
po khyod| |mtshan ma med la rnam par rol/ /'gro rnams yongs su smin mdzad cing / /sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la zhugs/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas yongs grub kyis gsol
pa| gang gis mtshan ma spangs gyur pa/ /de dag byang chub grub pa ste/ /yab kyi chos kyi brtul zhugs can/ /de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la
dga' bas gsol pa/ gang gis mtshan ma rnam bshig pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas chos la dga'/ /bla ma'i gnas la gnas pa ste/ /sems can kun kyi mchod rten lags/ /lha'i
bu mtshan ma med pa la brten pas gsol pa/ zhi la spyod cing rnam grol ba/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten bla na med/ /'byung po kun gyi skyabs dang rten/ /dpung gnyen de bzhin gnas
kyang lags/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la mos pas gsol pa/ mtshan ma med la mos gyur cing / /zhi bas dgra las rgyal gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas brgal ba 'gro sgrol ba/ /de
dag tshad ni ga la mchis/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pa rtogs kyis gsol pa/ mgon po gang dag smon lam ni /rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs pa/ /de dag 'jig rten bral ba ste/ /sangs
rgyas 'jig rten nang nas byung / /lha'i bu smon pa med pa la brten pas gsol pa/ zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan pa khyod/ /srid pa rnams su smon mi mdzad/ /srid
pa yongs su chad pas na/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten yongs mi gos/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pas skyes kyis gsol pa/ gang gis sred pa yongs bcom pa/ /de dag gzi mchog
bskyed pa ste/ /de dag 'jig rten mgon po'i sras/ /rang gi yab la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pas skyes kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyi sras rnams ma smad pa/ /sred
pa yongs su bcad pas na/ /srid pa 'jigs bgyid srid pa la/ /de dag smon pa mi bgyid do/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pas yongs su grol bas gsol pa/ gang dag smon pa mi
bgyid pa/ /gzi ldan khyod kyi sras kyi rnams/ /re ba btang zhing bcings grol ba/ /de dag yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pas byung gis gsol pa/ gang gis sred
pa rab bcom pa/ /de dag mya ngan dgon pa rgal/ /de dag mi skom zang zing med/ /dpal chen khyod la deng phyag 'tshal/ /lha'i bu smon pa med la nges pas gsol pa/ gang gis
srid dang sdug bsngal dang / /bde ba dngos po med bsgoms la/ /mgon khyod de dag rnams kyi yab/ /de dag khyod kyi sras kyang lags/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pa'i 'khor gyis
gsol pa/ srid pa'i sdug bsngal sus mthong ba/ /de dag khyod kyi bstan la dul/ /kha lo bsgyur zhing srid sel ba/ /sems dul khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pas
byung gis gsol pa/ srid pa'i dgon las byung ba rnams/ /bde ba thob cing zhi gnas te/ /nyon mongs dgra rnams pham mdzad pa/ /'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal/ /lha'i
bu smon pa med pas ya mtshan du gyur pas gsol pa/ g.yul las rgyal bar gyur pa ste/ /khyod ni rnam rgyal pham mi mnga'/ /bdud kyi dpung rnams pham mdzad cing / /srid pa
kun tu smon mi mdzad/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pa stobs ldan gyis gsol pa/ thar pa'i chos la stobs ldan pas/ /bdud kyi zhags pa yongs bcad cing / /khyod kyi sras rnams bdud
dag la/ /bskyab pa'i 'du shes mi bgyid do/ /lha'i bu lus rnam par brtags kyis gsol pa/ lus med 'chi ba med tshul du/ /lus 'di gang gis mthong gyur pa/ /de dag sangs
rgyas spyod yul dga'/ /'dren pa khyod kyi rjes su zhugs/ /lha'i bu lus nges par sems pas gsol pa/ mi gtsang rul pa'i rnag zag pa/ /lus 'di mi zad nges bsam ste/ /yang
dag ji bzhin 'tshal gyur nas/ /rnam 'dren khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu lus rtogs kyis gsol pa/ lus la mi gtsang brtags bgyis te/ /lus la dran pa rnam dpyad cing //
lus kyi sdug bsngal rnam grol nas/ /nges pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu lus yongs su gtong gis gsol pa/ sprul gyi pags pa rnying
bzhin du/ /rnag can lus 'di spangs nas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sku bo che/ /sku mi mnga' la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu lus la smod pas gsol pa/ mi gtsang dri nga
rnag zag cing / /rul pa'i lus la rtag smad de/ /mi gtsang gang ba rnam spangs nas/ /'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu lus kyis yongs su skyo bas gsol pa/ gang
dag rul pa'i lus skyo zhing / /rgyal sras gtsang ba 'tshal ba rnams/ /chos kyis rab tu bskyed pa'i sras/ /de dag sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal 'gyur/ /lha'i bu lus kyis skrag
pas gsol pa/ 'byung ba chen po sprul gdug 'dra/ /gang gis shin tu rtogs gyur pa/ /de dag lus las 'das pa ste/ /rkang gnyis gtso la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu lus
kyi skyon mthong bas gsol pa/ lus kyi skyon la mngon sum ste/ /ye shes gzigs pa'i spyan mnga' ba/ /sangs rgyas mkhyen pa mkhas pa dag/ srid gsum thams cad yongs
su gzigs/ /lha'i bu lus la 'dod chags dang bral bas gsol pa/ lus kyi 'du shes 'dod chags bral/ /chos kyi 'du shes mi gnas pas/ /kun sbyor kun las
'das pa ste/ /rnam 'grel sangs rgyas phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu srid pa'i dgra'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ srid par srid pa 'joms mdzad pa/ /khyod kyis dgra yi 'du shes
mkhyen| /khyod kyi sras rnams sgom bgyid cing / /mkhas pa byang chub mngon 'tshang rgya/ /lha'i bu srid pa sel bas gsol pa/ srid pa kun gyi nyes dmigs mthong / /mya ngan 'das
la 'jigs med mthong / /khyod kyi sras rnams 'gro phan phyir/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod pa bgyid/ /lha'i bu srid pa rnam par spangs kyis gsol pa/ gang gis srid pa rnam spangs
shing / /'jig la mngon par mi dga' ba/ /bral bar gyur cing sems dag pa/ /mkhas khyod zhabs la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu srid pa bsal gyis gsol pa/ mi yi
dam pa khyod kyi sras/ /srid par khrid pa rab bsal te/ /khyod kyi bslab la bslab pa dag /stong gsum 'di na rnam par mdzes/ /lha'i bu srid pa las brgal bas gsol pa/
srid pa'i mtsho las brgal ba yi/ /'jig rten mgon mchog skyob rnams la/ /grangs kyi rgyud du bgrang ba yi/ /grangs ni 'jig rten 'di na med/ /lha'i bu srid pa 'joms kyis
gsol ba/ /srid pa thams cad yongs bcom ste/ /gang dag rtag tu dran spyod pa/ /de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod/ /srog chags rnams la chos kyang ston/ /lha'i bu srid pa
las rab tu grol bas gsol pa/ srid pa'i rgyun las rab tu grol/ /rnam par 'dren pa srid pa rgal/ /srid pa mthar 'byin sangs rgyas te/ /srid pa
sel la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu srid pa rab tu zhi byed kyis gsol pa/ srid par khrid pa rab zhi zhing / /srid pa pham par mdzad nas gshegs/ /bstan pa srid pa mthar
'byin pa/ /khyod la do zla ma mchis so/ /lha'i bu srid pa'i mthar 'gro bas gsol pa/ srid pa'i mthar phyin rab zhi ba/ /mgon po khyod kyi srid pa'i mtha'/ /srid par phyir
log thams cad mkhyen/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten rtogs par mdzad/ /lha'i bu srid pa tha ma'i lus 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ srid pa'i rgyu ni rnam spangs te/ /srid pa tha ma
'dzin mdzad pa/ /gang gis srid pa len gyur pa'i/ /khyod kyis kun tu sbyor ba mthong / /lha'i bu srid pa rab tu zhi ba thob kyis gsol ba/ khyod kyis srid pa stong mkhyen te/ /srid
pa'i rgyu yang de bzhin no/ /zhum dang rab tu zhum mi mnga'/ /mnyam nyid gyur la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu srid pa'i pha rol tu 'gro bas gsol pa/ srid pa'i pha rol brgal
ba ste| |srid par khrid pa yang dag bsal/ /rnam par 'dren pa thugs brtse bas/ /skye bo gzhan ni sgrol ba mdzad// //bam po bcu pa/ lha'i bu tshor bas mnar gyis gsol pa/
tshor ba bdag tu bgyi ma mchis/ /sems pa ma mchis rtsol ma mchis/ /bsam gtan mdzad pa che khyod kyis/ /tshor ba chu bur lta bur mkhyen/ /lha'i bu tshor ba ston pas gsol
pa| ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med par/ /tshor ba khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /rmi lam sdug gu'i dga' 'dra ba/ /de la so so'i skye bo chags/ /lha'i bu tshor ba la yongs su rtog pas gsol
