pa| shes rab bcas pas yongs brtags na/ /tshor ba 'gro bar ma song zhing / /'ong ba med la dngos med par/ /de ni thub chen khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu tshor ba dang bral bas
gsol pa| tshor ba dang ni tshor ba po/ /rang bzhin med par khyed kyis gzigs/ /zab mo bstan dka'i tshig de yang / /khyod kyis sems can rnams la bstan/ /lha'i bu tshor ba'i
rgyud la nges pas gsol ba/ tshor ba de ni kun rdzob tsam/ /don dam nyid du mi dmigs te/ /khyod kyis sems can der btul bas/ /'gro ba the tshom ma mchis 'gyur/ /lha'i bu
tshor ba la mkhas pas gsol pa/ tshor ba'i phung po mkhas pa po/ /mkha' la rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /byis pa'i blo can rmongs bgyid na/ /de ni khyod kyis yang dag gzigs/ /
lha'i bu tshor ba mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ tshor ba'i phung po mngon mkhyen pa/ /rig cing rig pa'i mthar byon pa'i/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog khyod kyis/ /tshor ba bdag med
rab tu gzigs/ /lha'i bu tshor ba las brgal bas gsol pa/ rkang gnyis gtso bo dam pa khyod/ /brgal dka' tshor ba'i mtsho las brgal/ /
'dam las brgal cing sdig med pa/ /byang chub mchog 'di sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /lha'i bu tshor ba las byung gis gsol pa/ rnam par 'dren pas 'jig rten du/ /tshor ba
rnams ni 'byung mkhyen nas/ /tshor ba'i phung po rab brgal te/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten chags mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu tshor ba rig pas gsol pa/ mi rnams dag la gang
'ching ba'i/ /tshor ba thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen/ /nyon mongs zhags pas 'ching 'gyur ba/ /de yi rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu sems la mkhas pas
gsol pa/ khyod kyis sems kyi nyon mongs pham/ /bdud rnams kyang ni spa bkong ste/ /sems de rang bzhin ma mchis par/ /thub pa chen po khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu
sems yongs su shes pas gsol pa/ ji ltar sgyu ma'i mkhan po yis/ /sgyu ma sna tshogs sprul pa bzhin/ /sems ni bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen/ /de phyir khyod la
'jig rten mchod/ /lha'i bu sems la yang dag par rtog pas gsol pa/ sgyu ma mkhan nam slob ma bzhin/ /gang gis 'gro ba 'di bcings pa'i/ /sems de khyod kyis yang
dag brtags/ /de ni khyod kyis ji bzhin mkhyen/ /lha'i bu sems kyi spyod yul la spyod pas gsol pa/ sems kyi spyod yul khyod kyis mkhyen/ /rnam par 'dren pa rmi lam na/ /ji ltar
tshogs kyi grangs bzhin du/ /byis pa'i sems rmongs bgyid par gzigs/ /lha'i bu sems kyi dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ dul gyur las su rung ba yi/ /sems kyi rang bzhin rtogs
med pa| |gang la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed/ /mtshan nyid brtan pa khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu sems la dpa' bas gsol pa/ gang gis sems la sems med shes/ /mkhas
pa sgyid lug mi 'gyur zhing / /bdud sde rab tu 'dul bgyid pa/ /de dag 'dir ni dpa' zhes bgyi/ /lha'i bu sems kyis yang dag 'phags kyis gsol pa/ gang dag sems la
sems med shes/ /de dag sangs rgyas sras lags te/ /dpa' chen sangs rgyas chos rnams la/ /skyes bu de dag yang dag 'phags/ /lha'i bu zhi ba'i sems kyis gsol pa/ gang
gis sems la dbang bgyis pa/ /sems can de dag zhi rab zhi/ /bdud kyi zhags las rab grol bas/ /de dag bdud kyi dbang mi mchi/ /lha'i bu sems mnyen pas
gsol pa/ mi rnams gang dag sems mnyen zhing / /bsnyen par dka' dang dpa' ba dang / /khyod kyi bstan la gang mos pa/ /de dag 'dod par zhum mi 'gyur/ /lha'i bu sems
dag pas gsol pa/ sems dag las rnams gtsang gyur cing / /yang dag rtogs pas spyod bgyid pa/ /de dag rgyal ba'i bstan thos na/ /zab mo
rnams la zhum mi 'gyur/ /lha'i bu chos nyid la gnas pas gsol pa/ gang gi yid ni chos nyid la/ /rab tu dga' zhing thogs med pa/ /de dag mi dbang sras po ste/ /zhi
ba'i sar ni phyin pa lags/ /lha'i bu chos la sems pas gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad chos dbyings su/ /'dren pa de la bslab pa rnams/ /chos nyid la ni gang sems
pa| |de dag spyod yul ma yin med/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings las nges par byung gis gsol pa/ mi mchog khyod kyi sras kyi rnams/ /chos kyi dbyings la nges 'byung
ste| |'dren pa khyod kyi sras de dag /mtshan nyid gcig gis nges byung lags/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams kun gyi spyod yul ni/ /
chos kyi dbyings zhes rgyal bas gsungs/ /dpa' bo khyod ni gang spyod pa'i/ /ye shes de ni bsam mi khyab/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pas gsol pa/ chos kyi
dbyings la gang zhugs pa/ /de dag ye shes bsam yas te/ /sangs rgyas chos la the tshom med/ /sems can bsam la de dag mkhas/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la bab
gyis gsol pa/ gang dag chos kyi mtshan nyid gcig /chos kyi dbyings la bab pa rnams/ /de dag spobs pa'i stobs bskyed pa/ /bsam gyis mi khyab thob par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu
chos kyi dbyings la 'jigs pa med pas gsol pa/ gang la de dag gnas pa yi/ /'jigs pa med pa thob med pas/ /de dag rnams kyi spobs dang stobs/ /de la mtshungs pa
med pa 'byung / /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pas gsol pa/ khyod ni chos dbyings mkhas pa ste/ /chos rnams kun la shin tu mkhas/ /lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin//
chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par ston/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la gnas pas gsol pa/ chos rnams rang bzhin med gzigs pas/ /khyod ni chos kyi dbyings la zhugs/ /mi
gnas zhum pa ma mchis te/ /gzung ba ma mchis btang ma mchis/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la spyod pas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas spyod yul gang lags pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings
la khyod spyod de/ /bar snang mkha' dang 'dra ba yi/ /'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la rton pas gsol pa/ gang dang gang gi sgo dag nas/ /skyes
bu dam pa ston mdzad pa/ /de yi sgo nas chos dbyings ston/ /de phyir rtags dang gzugs ma mchis/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la brtson pas gsol pa/ mngon par brtson pas
chos kyi dbyings/ /skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ /brtson pas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /ye shes pha rol phyin par gyur/ /lha'i bu
chos kyis tshim gyis gsol pa/ dpa' bo khyod kyis skye bo 'di/ /chos kyis rab tu tshim par mdzad/ /chos kyi dbyings ni rnam mkhyen pas/ /'dren pa byang chub mchog la zhugs
lha'i bu chos nyid kyi gting rnyed pas gsol pa/ gting rnyed gyur pa'i 'gro ba kun/ /'dren pa khyod kyi zhal du lta/ /chos dbyings rnam par mkhyen pa yi/ /'dren pa khyod la
phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu gnas shes pa la rab tu gnas pas gsol pa/ mi mchog 'dren pa sangs rgyas kyi/ /ye shes gnas 'di chos dbyings te/ /rnam par 'dren
pa stobs bcu po/ /gang la spyod pa de lags so/ /lha'i bu gnas la gnas pas gsol pa/ chos kyi dbyings ni gnas chen te/ /thams cad mkhyen pa bzhud pa'i lam//
de ni chos rnams thams cad kyang / /mtshan nyid gcig par shes pa lags/ /lha'i bu gnas mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ khyod ni chos dbyings mngon par mkhyen//
mtshan nyid gcig la mkhas pa ste/ /sems can kun gyi bsam pa yang / /rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu gnas nas nges par byung gis gsol pa/ rnam
par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras/ /gnas su bya ba chos dbyings zhes/ /gsal bar 'tshal ba'i mkhas pa rnams/ /rang byung nyid du nges par byung / /lha'i bu gnas la bslab pas gsol
pa| chos kyi dbyings la gang bslab pa'i/ /skyes bu de dag byang chub zhugs/ /rang byung nyid du gnas rnyed pas/ /de dag rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur/ /lha'i bu gnas med pa la
mkhas pas gsol pa/ gnas med pa ni gang 'tshal ba/ /de dag bde gshegs dgongs la mos/ /bdud rnams bye ba stong gis kyang / /de dag rmongs par yong mi nus/ /lha'i
bu gnas med pa la mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ gnas med gang gis rig gyur pa/ /de dag bdag cag bdud kyi tshogs/ /bye bas byang chub mi bskyod ces/ /mkhas pa de
dag shin tu dga'/ /lha'i bu gnas med pa'i dgongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ gnas med 'du shes mkhas pa ni/ /chos nyid la ni rab gnas te/ /sdig can bdud rnams
bshal ba ni/ /ji ltar rta yis shing rta bzhin/ /lha'i bu gnas med pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ mtshan nyid gcig la mkhas pa po/ /chos kyi dbyings la bgegs bgyid
pa'i| |bdud kyi las ni gnas med de/ /gnas med do zhes rgyal bas gsungs/ /lha'i bu gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rtogs pas gsol pa/ gnas dang de bzhin gnas min
pa| byis pa'i blo can rnams la bstan/ /rang gis de ni thugs chud nas/ /sems can rnams la khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu sbyin pa la mkhas pas
gsol pa/ sngon chad rgyu ni gang dag dang / /las 'dra 'byung ba ma 'tshal ba'i/ /rgyu de khyod kyis thugs su chud/ /las kyi gnas kyang rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu las la mkhas
pas gsol pa/ chags dang zhe sdang gti mug ni/ /las kyi rgyu zhes khyod kyis mkhyen/ /gang gis rgyu yis bgyid de yang / /gang zag mchog gis thugs su chud/ /lha'i
bu ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ ma 'ongs pa yi dus dag na/ /mi rnams las gang bgyid 'gyur ba/ /de yi rgyu dang len pa dang / /gnas dang las kyang khyod
kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu da ltar byung ba la lta bas gsol pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 'di dag gi /sems can rnams dang rgyu dang las/ /gnas dang las kyi len pa
rnams| |kun kyang 'dren pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ mi dbang khyod kyis ma gzigs pa'i/ /las dang rgyu dag ma mchis te/ /gnas
dang skye ba'ang ma mchis so/ /de bas khyod ni gang zag mchog /lha'i bu stobs la mngon par dga' bas gsol pa/ las dang rgyu dang de bzhin gnas/ /dus la rnam smin rnam
gsum dang / /ji ltar de yi len pa yang / /khyod kyis mkhyen pas de slad mchod/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi blo gros kyis gsol pa/ rgyu dang las dang len pa dang / /rnam par smin dang
rkyen dang gnas/ /rang bzhin bral bar khyod kyis mkhyen/ /de phyir rgyal ba mnyam pa med/ /lha'i bu stobs kyis byung gis gsol pa/ rgyu dang las dang len pa dang / /gnas
dang rkyen dang rgyud rnams dang / /rnam smin so so yang dag rig /thams cad stong pa rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu stobs la dga' bas gsol pa/ rgyu dang las dang len pa dang / /
gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud kyi rnams/ /khyod nyid rang gis mngon mkhyen te/ /rang bzhin med par bstan pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu stobs kyis rnam par rtse bas gsol pa/ rgyu dang las
dang len pa dang / /gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud kyi rnams/ /'pho med dbang phyug med pa ste/ /rten cing 'byung bar khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu stobs kyis 'phags kyis gsol pa/ rgyu
dang rkyen dang las rnams dang / /rnam par smin pa brten pa rnams/ /de kun rang bzhin stong ngo zhes/ /seng+ge'i nga ror khyod kyis gsungs/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi rjes su 'brang bas gsol
pa| 'jig rten las ni gang zhig gis/ /khams ni gang zhig spel gyur pas/ /de dag rkang gnyis gtso bos mkhyen/ /de bas khyod ni do zla med/ /lha'i bu stobs dang ldan gyis
gsol pa/ khams gang la ni brten bgyis shing / /gang gis mngon par las bgyis dang / /de yi rnam smin ci 'dra ba/ /de kun spyan dang ldan pas mkhyen//
lha'i bu stobs yang dag 'phags kyis gsol pa/ khams gang la ni brten bgyis shing / /ci 'dra'i rang bzhin gyur pa yi/ /sems can thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen/ /phyag gi
sor mo lnga dang 'dra/ /lha'i bu stobs la spyod pas gsol pa/ khams gang la ni brten bgyis shing / /bshes gnyen ci 'dra rnyed gyur nas/ /'du 'dzi ji 'dra bgyid gyur
pa| |de kun bla na med pas mkhyen/ /lha'i bu stobs kyis byin gyis brlabs pas gsol pa/ stobs kyi byin gyis brlabs mkhyen cing / /'dren pa de yi khams dang ni/ /'du
'dzin bshes gnyen tshogs kyi rnams/ /de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu khams nges pas gsol pa/ khams de dang ni de len dang / /bshes gnyen de
dang de 'grogs pa/ /de la khyod kyi mkhyen pa nges/ /de phyir the tshom yong mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu khams la brten pas gsol pa/ sems can gang na gnas gnas pa'i/ /
'khor ba de dang khams de dang / /spyod dang skad dang 'gro ba rnams/ /mi mchog khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu khams la mkhas pas gsol pa/ ye shes gang gis
khams de ni/ /'dren pas mngon par mkhyen pa yi/ /mkhyen te mkhyen pas stong ngo zhes/ /blo mchog mnga' bas yang dag bstan/ /lha'i bu khams na nges par byung gis
gsol pa/ khams gang la ni brten bgyis na/ /'dus byas dag la ji srid gnas/ /de ni khyod kyis ji bzhin mkhyen/ /khyod la do zla ma mchis so/ /lha'i bu khams kyi rjes su
song bas gsol pa/ khams gang la ni brten bgyis pa/ /yon tan ji snyed bskyed pa dang / /rnam par smin dang 'bras bu dag /de dag ma lus khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu
khams la yang dag zhugs pas gsol pa/ khams gang la ni brten bgyid cing / /'gro ba ci 'dra 'dod bgyis pa/ /de yang khyod kyis thogs med mkhyen/ /de phyir khyod ni
mkhas pas mchod/ /lha'i bu lam mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ khams gang la ni brten bgyis pas/ /'gro ba ci 'drar mchis pa yi/ /sems can rnams kyi lam
dag kyang / /ye shes mkhas pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu lam la mi 'jigs pas gsol pa/ sems can log pa nyid nges shing / /mya ngan 'das 'gro skal med pa/ /
phung po gsum po de dag la/ /khyod kyis ye shes nges par 'jug /lha'i bu lam gyis nges par byung gis gsol pa/ sems can yang dag nyid nges te/ /ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i skal
med pa| |de la 'jig rten sgron ma khyod/ /rtogs pa thogs pa med par 'jug /lha'i bu lam la mos pas gsol pa/ ma nges phung por gyur pa la/ /
gang zag gang rnams gnas pa rnams/ /de la ngan song ngan 'gro dang / /mya ngan 'das pa'ang khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi brdas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas brda tsam nyid
lags te/ /de bzhin stobs dang ye shes dang / /mi 'jigs bzhi yang de bzhin du/ /kun rdzob ces ni thub pas gsungs/ /lha'i bu yang dag pa mthong bas gsol pa /
sangs rgyas sangs rgyas chos rnams mos/ /ye shes gnas pa gzhan yang med/ /don dam nyid du bstan to zhes/ /de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu stobs
la gnas kyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos la stobs gnas pas/ /des na de la 'jigs med de/ /rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs kyi sras/ /ji ltar 'dod rgu rnam par
'phrul| |lha'i bu chos la 'jigs med kyis gsol pa/ kun rdzob dang ni don dam dang / /de dag rab tu bstan mchis kyang / /kun rdzob dang ni don dam dang / /brda yang dmigs
su ma mchis so/ /lha'i bu ye shes lhur len gyis gsol pa/ brjod pa thams cad rnam pa gzhan/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa gzhan/ /mtshan nyid ma mchis brjod ma
mchis| |khyod kyis chos kyi mtshan nyid gzigs/ /lha'i bu lam la brtson pas gsol pa/ nges par gyur pa'i sems can rnams/ /gzhan gyi rgyud mchi'i gnas ma mchis/ /
log par nges rnams kun tu 'gror/ /drang srong chen po khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu mos pa'i stobs kyis gsol pa/ khams gang la ni brten bgyis te/ /gang rnams ci 'drar mos
'gyur zhing / /'dod chags khams la sdug bsngal ba/ /de dag thub chen khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu mi sdug pa las nges par byung gis gsol pa/ ma mchis yongs su
brtags pas na/ /'dod chags khams ni rab tu byung / /de la mos pa nges 'byung ba/ /de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs/ /lha'i bu byams pas nges par byung gis
gsol pa/ ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na/ /zhe sdang khams ni rab tu byung / /de la mos pa nges 'byung pa/ /de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs/ /lha'i bu rkyen gyis
nges par byung gis gsol pa/ ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na/ /gti mug khams ni rab tu byung / /de la mos pa nges 'byung ba/ /de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs /
lha'i bu gtong bas nges par byung gis gsol pa/ mtsho med 'jigs pa rnyed pa dag /ser sna mngon du 'phel 'gyur te/ /de la mos pa nges 'byung ba/ /de dag thub chen khyod
kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nges par byung gis gsol pa/ sdig pa'i grogs dang 'grogs pa na/ /mthun
pa'i khams ni rab tu byung / /de la mos pa thob 'gyur ba/ /de dag 'dren pas rnam par mkhyen/ /lha'i bu rnam par shes pa snying por 'dzin pas gsol pa/ 'khor
ba na ni 'khor rnams kyis/ /ci 'dra'i khams la brten pa dang / /mos pa de mthar phyin pa dag /khyod kyis ma lus rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu nan tan snying por byed pas
gsol pa/ 'khor ba na ni 'khor rnams kyis/ /gang gis rgyu 'byung nan tan dang / /mos pa de las 'byung ba yang / /smad pa med pa khyed kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu dbang
po la mos pas gsol pa/ sems can gang gis khams gang la/ /brten na ji ltar 'gyur ba yi/ /rgyu de khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /des na khyod ni dga' bar mdzad/ /
lha'i bu dbang po la spyod pas gsol pa/ sbyor ba gang gis skye ba dang / /gang gis rgya chen skye ba dang / /dmigs pa dang ni zhing rnams dang / /dbang po khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen//
lha'i bu dbang pos nges par byung gis gsol pa/ 'dod pa'i sdug bsngal gnod gyur dang / /srid par mngon pa 'jug pa dang / /sred pa zhi bar bgyid pa'i don/ /de dag smra
ba'i mchog gis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dbang po'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ dbang po nyam chung rnam dag ni/ /gzugs kyi 'dod chags dben par 'tshal/ /sred pa rnam par
gzhig pa yang / /rkang gnyis dam pas bsten pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu dbang po rnam par rgyal bas gsol pa/ dbang po rtul po dur khrod bsten/ /rang gi 'dod chags zhi bar
bgyid| |rkang gnyis gtso bo'i zhal mthong nas/ /sred dang bcas pas khyod la blta/ /lha'i bu dbang po rtogs kyis gsol pa/ 'dod chags can dang 'dod chags dang / /
zhi dang shes dang mi shes dang / /sred pa zhi dang dbang po rnams/ /rnam par gzigs la mngon mi dmigs/ /lha'i bu dbang po la gnas pas gsol pa/ zhe sdang gnyen por
gyur pa yi/ /gnod sems med dang dben pa dag /dbang po rtul po bsten pa'i tshe/ /khyod kyi 'gro ba'i bsam pa gzigs/ /lha'i bu dbang po la brtson pas gsol pa/ zhe
sdang gnyen por byams pa gsungs/ /sems can shes pa rjes su skye/ /zhe sdang khams ni zhi bar bgyid/ /de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dbang po tshol bas
gsol pa/ gnod sems med dang byams pa dang / /zhi ba'i ngo bo nyid ma gzigs/ /dgra dang nyon mongs ma dmigs te/ /des na 'jig rten khyad par 'phags/ /lha'i bu dbang
po rjes su 'brang gis gsol pa/ log par rnam par rtog pa dang / log pa nye bar ston pa yang / /nyon mongs dam phyir kun sbyor te/ /ldog
pas thar bar 'gyur ba gzigs/ /lha'i bu ye shes yang dag shar gyis gsol pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /dngos la 'dzin pa mun pa ste/ /ldog pas
snang ba chen por 'gyur/ /de ni grags chen khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu ye shes 'dod chags chad pas gsol pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /mun pa snang
ba dngos po rnams/ /rang bzhin nyid kyis ma mchis te/ /de ni rkang gnyis gtso bos gzigs/ /lha'i bu snang ba 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ sems can gang gis shes
pa gang / /ji tsam yongs su bsgrubs bgyis dang / /snod du gang rung ji snyed pa/ /de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dbang po dang zhe 'gras pas gsol pa/
nyon mongs spang phyir shes gang gis/ /shes pa de la rtog bgyid pa/ /de yang ston pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ /de bas khyod la mngon par dga'/ /lha'i bu dbang po la dga'
bas gsol pa/ yul dang dus dang gnas dag dang / /spyod pa rnam par sgom pa dang / /nyon mongs nyon mongs rnam dag pa/ /thub pa khyod kyis stong par gzigs/ /lha'i
bu ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/ dbang po rno rtul 'bring dag dang / /gang zag gang gi bsam pa dang / /bcings dang thar dang zad pa'ang shes/ /g.yo ba med par khyod
kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dbang po'i rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/ dbang po rab 'bring rtul ba dang / /nyon mongs ye shes tshor ba dang / /gdul dang 'dul bar bgyid pa dag /khyod
kyis mtshan nyid med par gsungs/ /lha'i bu dbang po rnam par brtags kyis gsol pa/ sems can rnams kyi bsam gtan dang / /rnam thar kun nas nyon mongs dang / /snyoms

'jug ting 'dzin ldan pa dang / /rnam byang thub pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi shugs kyis gsol pa/ zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsten te/ /chos kun ngo bo nyid kyis ni/ /rang bzhin med par khyod
kyis mkhyen/ /des na thams cad mkhyen zhes bgyis/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi go chas gsol pa/ chos rnams gang dag rang bzhin gang / /chos gang gis ni brjod bgyis pa/ /yang
dag ji bzhin thugs su chud/ /des na dus gsum chags mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu stobs 'dod kyis gsol pa/ log par brtags pas kun nyon mongs/ /rnam pa bzhi ni skye
bar 'gyur/ /las las skyes par de dag mkhyen/ /des na khyod ni do zla med/ /lha'i bu stobs shes kyis gsol pa/ nyon mongs rnams dang las rnams kyi/ /gnyen po rnam par
byang ba dang / /bstan pa'ang khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /des na khyod la do zla med/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi 'od kyis gsol pa/ bsam gtan rnam thar
ldang ba dang / /snyoms par 'jug dang ting 'dzin dang / /kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang dag /ming tsam mo zhes khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu stobs las byung gis gsol pa/
bsam gtan rnam thar rnam byang dang / /snyoms par 'jug dang ting nge 'dzin/ /bag yod pa las byung ba ste/ /de la khyod kyi ye shes 'jug /lha'i bu stobs rnam par
spel bas gsol pa/ dpa' bo khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni/ /bsam gtan la sogs de dag dang / /ldan dang rnam par byang la 'jug /de ni rlung ltar chags pa med/ /lha'i
bu sngon gyi mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ /srid pa 'di na sngon bzhugs tshe/ /srid pa'i skyon dang yong ma 'dres/ /des na khyod la do zla
med| |lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la gnas pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ /byang chub gzhal yas tshol mdzad cing / /'dren pas yongs su spyad pas na/ /
des na khyod ni dpa' bo lags/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la rtog pas gsol pa/ sngon mthar sbyin pa sna tshogs dag /blo mchog gsung tshe gsol bas na/ /spobs pa sna
tshogs rab mnga' bar/ /rnam par 'dren pa de nges byung / /lha'i bu sngon mtha' la byang bas gsol pa/ sngon chad 'khor bar spyod pa'i tshe/ /tshul rnams la ni tshul mkhas
pa| |'jig rten sgron rnams khyod kyis gzigs/ /des na khyod ni tshul la mkhas/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' tshar phyin pas gsol pa/ sngon mthar chos rgyal mang po la/ /dpa'
bos sngon chad spyod mdzad pas/ /thams cad mkhyen du nges par byung / /sems can mkhas la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/
byang chub mchog ni btsal ba'i phyir/ /bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ /sangs rgyas bye ba mtha' yas pa/ /de la khyod kyis sa bon btab/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul la nges pas
gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba brtags mdzad pas/ /chos kun sems can med pa zhes/ /chos rnams thams cad nges par mkhyen/ /'du 'phrod tsam du rgyal bas gsungs/ /
lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la sems pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ /gnas dang gnas min rab mkhyen par/ /rnam par 'dren pa spyod mdzad pas/ /des na
'jig rten rmongs mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la spyod pas gsol pa/ gnas dang gnas min bsten bgyis nas/ /las dang rgyu rnams dpyad pas na/ /khams dang
dbang po mos pa dang / /bsam gtan sngon gyi mtha' yang mkhyen/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la yongs su rtog pas gsol pa/ khyed kyis
sngon mtha' yongs brtags pas/ /stobs kyi ye shes rnam bcu po/ /dpa' bo chen pos rnam par spel/ /des na 'jig rten 'di la gzigs/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha'i
spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ dpa' bos sems can thams cad kyi/ /sngon gyi mtha' yi spyod pa dang / /dge dang mi dge'i rgyu ba rnams/ /mkhyen pas 'jig rten gso
ba mdzad/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa la so sor rtog pas gsol pa/ thub pas sngon gyi sems can gyi/ /sngon mtha'i spyod pa rab mkhyen cing / /khams dang mos
pa mkhyen pas na/ /de phyir sems can gso ba mdzad/ /lha'i bu mos pa'i stobs can gyis gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas su/ /sngon gyi mtha' la brtags
bgyis kyang / /khyod kyi dgongs pa chags mi mnga'/ /des na mgon la bdag mos lags/ /lha'i bu ye shes la mos pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med
du| |sngon mtha'i srid pa bsam bgyis kyang / /rkang gnyis gtso bos yon tan gyi/ /pha rol phyin nus 'ga' ma mchis/ /lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa/
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 'di dag gi /skye rgu sna tshogs las ldan pa/ /shi 'pho skye bar 'gyur ba dag /khyod kyis sangs rgyas spyan gyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' las
nges par byung gis gsol pa/ rgyu gang gis ni las gang zhig /bgyis shing rgyud drug mchir 'gyur pa/ /de dag thams cad rgyal bas mkhyen/ /des na thams cad mkhyen ces
bgyi| |lha'i bu shi 'pho dang skye ba mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ khams gang gi ni sems can gang / /bsgos par gyur cing las bgyis pa'i/ /bag chags las dang
sems can dag /khyod kyis g.yo ba med par mkhyen/ /lha'i bu shi 'pho dang skye ba rig pas gsol pa/ bshes gnyen ji 'dra bsten bgyis shing / /las gang mngon par
'dus bgyis pa/ /'gro ba gang du mchis 'gyur ba/ /thub pa khyod kyis de yang mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dgongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ las de yi ni bgyis pa gang / /dgos
pa khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /gang gis slad du las bgyis pa'i/ /de yang ma lus rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dngos po la mkhas pas gsol pa/ dngos po gang dag dmigs pa
dang / /las gang mngon par 'du bgyis pa/ /thams cad mkhyen pas de mkhyen te/ /de ni sangs rgyas spyod yul lags/ /lha'i bu dngos po la rig pas gsol pa/ sems
can rnams kyi bsam mkhas pa/ /dngos de ji ltar chags pa dang / /de ni ji ltar grub pa yi/ /las de khyod kyis mngon par mkhyen/ /lha'i bu
shes pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ shes pa gang gis dngos po de/ /brtags par gyur pa rab tu mkhyen/ /de la ji ltar chags gyur pa'ang / /thub pa khyed kyis
shin tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu mngon par 'du byed pa la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ chags pa gang gis las de rnams/ /nyon mongs gang gis 'du bgyis pa'i/ /nyon mongs
de dag yang dag mkhyen/ /de bas khyod ni bdag gi mgon/ /lha'i bu 'gro ba la mkhas pas gsol pa/ 'gro ba gang du las gang gis/ /mchi zhing sgrib pa gang rnyed nas//
'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ba/ /de kun spyan ldan khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dmigs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ 'gro ba dag tu skyes rnams kyi/ /gang gi las rnams
smin gyur pa'i/ /dmigs pa khyod kyis rab mkhyen te/ /de la khyod kyi blo gros 'jug /lha'i bu bag chags la mkhas pas gsol pa/ 'gro dang 'gro bar mi rnams kyis/
sngon chad bgyis pa'i sdig las dang / /de bzhin dge ba'i las rnams kyi/ /bag chags khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu las la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ 'gro bar
'byung po thams cad kyi/ /rnyed dang gser dang slad ma dang / /las rnams gsum po khyod kyis mkhyen/ /de la so so'i skye bo 'khrul/ /lha'i bu rnam par smin pa la mkhas
kyis gsol pa/ chung zhing rnam smin che ba dang / /che zhing rnam smin chung ba dang / /chung ngam che 'am mnyam pa'ang rung / /de la mu stegs can rnams rmongs/ /lha'i bu las
la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ /tshe 'di'i las rnams gang lags dang / /skyes pa'i las rnams gang lags dang / /lan gsum gzhan gyi gang lags pa/ /de dag spyan ldan
khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu tshe 'di la myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ tshe 'di la ni gang bgyis pa'i/ /las kyi rnam smin mi gang dag /myong bar 'gyur ba
gang dag la/ /so so'i skye bo rmongs pa mkhyen/ /lha'i bu skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ gang gis las gang bsags gyur te/ /skyes nas rnam
par smin gyur pa/ /gang la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed/ /shes rab chen pos de yang mkhyen/ /lha'i bu lan grangs gzhan na myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol
pa| las gang bskal pa bye ba yi/ /phyi dus rnam par smin 'gyur zhing / /dus gzhan dag ni yang 'byung ba/ /de dag yang dag nyid du mkhyen/ /lha'i bu yongs su ma smin pa
myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ las rnams gang zhig bgyis gyur pa/ /yongs su smin par ma gyur na/ /de srid 'bras bu
mi 'byin pa/ /rkang gnyis mchog gis de yang mkhyen/ /lha'i bu yongs su ma smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba la rtog pas gsol pa/ las gang dang ni ldan pas na/ /sems
can 'di ni skyer 'gyur ba/ /pham pa med pas de mkhyen te/ /yongs su brtags nas rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu yongs su smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas pas
gsol pa/ las ni ji ltar yongs smin na/ /'bras bu dkar bar 'gyur ba mkhyen/ /de la stong par rnam par mkhyen/ /de la khyod kyi ye shes 'jug /lha'i bu yongs
su smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba la nges pas gsol pa/ thams cad mkhyen pas las kyi rnams/ /lci dang yang ba rab tu mkhyen/ /sems can bsam pa thugs su
chud| |de slad bcom ldan bdag gi bla/ /lha'i bu lci yang la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ las gang gis ni sems can rnams/ /ngan song mchi bar 'gyur ba dang / /
lci ba dang ni yang ba gzigs/ /de shes mkhyen pas rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu sems can gyi spyod pa la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ sems can spyod pa nyer bzung zhing / /
las kyi lci dang yang ba dag /dpa' bo khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /mu stegs can rnams de la rmongs/ /lha'i bu sems can gyi spyod pa la spyod pas gsol pa/ sems can
spyod pa spyad mdzad cing / /las kyi rnam par smin pa bstan/ /phor bu'i chu dang gang+gA'i chu/ /lan tshwas rnam par bstan pa bzhin/ /lha'i bu las la mkhas kyis gsol
pa| slob dang mi slob rnam par smin/ /rkang gnyis dam pa ston mdzad cing / /kun nas nyon mongs las myong nas/ /las ni zad par 'gyur ba bstan/ /lha'i bu sangs
rgyas kyi ye shes la reg par byed pas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas spyan gyis khams gsum na/ /las kyi 'bras bu bstan pa na/ /byis pa dag dang mkhas pa gzigs/ /
phra gzigs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha'i bu las zad par byed pas gsol pa/ 'jig rten dag na rnam 'dren khyod/ /sems can rnams kyi shi 'pho dang / /skye ba kun
la ye shes 'jug /mkhyen pas 'jigs med phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu dmigs pa med pa la spyod pas gsol pa/ 'chi 'pho ba dang skye dang las/ /'gro dang de bzhin
sems can dang / /rnam smin rmi lam 'drar bstan pa/ /'dren pa rkang gnyis mchog gis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu nyon mongs pa la rtog pas gsol pa/ /ji ltar rmi lam skom pa
zhi| |shin tu bsil ba'i chu 'thungs bzhin/ /rkang gnyis mchog khyod 'dod chags dang / /zhe sdang gti mug rnams kyang zad/ /lha'i bu yongs
su rtog pa dang bral bas gsol pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /yongs su rtog las skyes pa ste/ /rmi lam dga' bar rtse ba bzhin/ /smra mchog khyod
la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu yongs su rtog pa zhi bar byed pas gsol pa/ yongs su rtog pa rab zhi bas/ /nyon mongs zad pa rab bstan te/ /rmi lam na ni
sprin med ltar/ /mi mchog khyod kyis rab tu bstan/ /lha'i bu zag pa la rtog pas gsol pa/ rmi lam char chen 'bab pa ltar/ /de bzhin zag pa rnams
'byung bar/ /zag pa 'byung ba mkhas pa po/ /dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu rmi lam rtog gis gsol pa/ rmi lam char chen 'bab pa ltar/ /de
bzhin zag pa rnams 'byung ste/ /nor ba rnams la zag 'byung bar/ /dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pas gsol pa/ ji
ltar bu mo'i rmi lam na/ /bu zhig byung la shi 'phos na/ /dga' dang sdug bsngal tshor 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin 'gro ba khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu rmi lam
rtog pas gsol pa/ rmi lam dag na mgo bcad bzhin/ /khyod kyis zag pa zad pa gzigs/ /de ni mkhas pa rnams la bstan/ /thams cad gzigs la phyag kyang 'tshal//
lha'i bu blo gros nges par rtogs kyis gsol pa/ chos kun mkhyen pa khyod kyis ni/ /ji ltar rmi lam mdza' phrad dang / /bral ba yang dag ma mchis gzigs/ /'gro ba ji bzhin
tshim par mdzad/ /lha'i bu ye shes yid kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis dam pa'i chos ston pa/ /thos nas yid ni dga' 'gyur te/ /rmi lam dag na rmi bstan bzhin/ /de ltar rgyal
pas bstan par mdzad/ /lha'i bu yongs su dga' ba'i yid kyis gsol ba/ me long gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin/ /'gro ba mtha' dag gzigs pas na/ /bsam gtan
mnga' ba khyod la ni/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten yid kyang dga'/ /lha'i bu blo gros nges pas gsol pa/ thub pa pi wang sgra 'dra ba'i/ /khyod kyi dam chos thos gyur na/ /lha'i bu rnams
kyang the tshom bor/ /rgyal ba mchog la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu sgyu mas tshim gyis gsol pa/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma dag /byis pa rmongs byed yongs bstan na/ /mi mkhas
de la rmongs par 'gyur/ /sgyu ma bzhin du khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu sprul pa la sems kyis gsol pa/ ji ltar rmi lam sgyu mthong ba/ /de ltar khyod kyis 'gro ba gzigs/ /
mgon po'i bstan pa de thos nas/ /bdag cag the tshom ma mchis so/ /lha'i bu sgyu ma las nges par byung gis gsol pa/ sgyu ma'i mkhan
pos sgyu sprul kyang / /sgyu ma lags par 'tshal bas na/ /de la rmongs par 'gyur ma mchis/ /de bzhin khyod kyis 'gro ba gzigs/ /lha'i bu rtogs pa'i rjes su rtogs
kyis gsol pa/ ji ltar brtson pas rmi lam na/ /sangs rgyas sku gzigs brtags pa bzhin/ /de ltar rtog pas 'jig rten bskyed/ /rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs
lha'i bu kun tu rtog pa 'joms gyis gsol pa/ kun rtog 'dod chags rgyu las te/ /'dod chags dngos pos bskyed ma lags/ /rtog pa ngan las 'dod chags byung / /de
ni rnam 'dren khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas gsol pa/ ri sul dag na sgra byung ba/ /brag ca sems can sgra ma lags/ /de bzhin 'jig
rten khyod kyis gzigs/ /de slad 'jig rten chags mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu ston pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ sgra ni gang yang ma mchis te/ /sgra ni brag ca 'dra ba lags/ /'on
kyang mi dbang khyod kyis bstan/ /byis pa mang po rab tu btsud/ /lha'i bu nan tan la mkhas pas gsol pa/ chos rnams don ni gzhan lags kyang / /byis pa rnams kyis
gzhan du brtags/ /nan tan chos las shes par gyis/ /de la bdag ni the tshom chad/ /lha'i bu don gyi rjes su 'brang bas gsol pa/ chos don yang dag gang lags pa/ /de ni
sus kyang ma rtogs shing / /sus kyang ma bstan 'tshal ma gyur/ /de skad thub pa'i mchog gis gsungs/ /lha'i bu chos kyi brda rtogs pas gsol pa/ zag dang dri ma nyon mongs
dang / /bag chags dang ni rtogs dang rtog /kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag pa/ /thub pa brda yi tshig kyang lags/ /lha'i bu kun tu rtog pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ kun nas
nyon mongs rnam dag dang / /zag pa dag dang nyon mongs dang / /ngag dang bshad dang nye du dang / /ston pa 'di kun ming tsam lags/ /lha'i bu mi gnas pa'i blo gros kyis gsol
pa| khams gsum rnams la ma chags te/ /nam mkha' 'dra ba'i thugs mnga' ba/ /bral bar gyur cing sbyin pa'i gnas/ /zhi ba'i sems la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu ma
gos pas gsol pa/ thub pa khyod kyis thugs yid ni/ /gzugs dang gzugs med mi gnas shing / /'dod dang mya ngan 'das pa la/ /gnas pa ma mchis bar snang 'dra/ /lha'i
bu re ba med pas gsol pa/ 'dod pa'i khams la re ba spangs/ /gzugs dang gzugs med gnyi gar min/ /'du 'dzi dag dang bral gyur ba/ /sred zad khyod la phyag kyang
'tshal| |lha'i bu sred pa byung bas gsol pa/ 'byung ba dag dang 'jig pa la/ /khyod kyi sred pa yang dag chad/ /khams gsum kun la
chags mi mnga'/ /rnam par 'dren la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu sred pa zil gyis gnon gyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten 'di dag zil mnan nas/ /khyu mchog dam pa
spyod mdzad cing / /sems can 'jig rten sgrol mdzad pa/ /thugs brtse khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu sred pa dang bral gyis gsol pa/ kun tu sbyor dang bral ba
ste| |yang srid bas pas zhir gyur ba/ /dag pa'i bdag nyid dag pa'i sems/ /dus dang bral la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha'i bu ji lta ba bzhin du rig pas gsol pa/ chos
rnams thams cad dngos med pa/ /ji bzhin dpa' bo khyod kyis mkhyen/ /bcings pa ma mchis grol ma mchis/ /yang dag gzigs la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu
'dam las brgal bas gsol pa/ 'dod pa'i 'dam las brgal ba ste/ /srid pa'i 'dam las de bzhin brgal/ /gzigs pa mi mnga' len mi mnga'/ /yang srid
brgal la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu zang zing spangs kyis gsol pa/ zang zing spangs shing dri ma spangs/ /re ba spangs shing sdig pa'ang spangs/ /sangs rgyas sgrib pa
rnams spangs pa/ /don rtogs khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu re ba spangs kyis gsol pa/ don dang don ma lags pa spangs/ /chags pa mi mnga' nges rtogs pa/ /bdud
kyi zhags las rnam 'das pa/ /len med khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu phan par 'dod pas gsol pa/ bdag nyid dang ni gzhan rnams kyi/ /lam gang nyon mongs
rim med pa/ /sgrib pa med par gzigs pa po/ /dpa' chen khyod kyis de yang gzigs/ /lha'i bu grags pa thob kyis gsol ba/ 'dren pa 'jig rten rnam grags pa/ /
khyod kyis mkhyen la brtson pa rnams/ /ji skad bstan bzhin rab rtog na/ /nyon mongs rnams ni nub par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu 'jigs pa med pas gsol pa/ chos rnams
kun la nges pas na/ /bsngo ba gang yang yong ma gzigs/ /ye shes rgya mtsho mi bsnyengs par/ /seng+ge'i sgra ni sgrog par mdzad/ /lha'i bu gang nas kyang 'jigs pa med pas
gsol pa/ 'jigs pa kun las yang dag brgal/ /zug rngu thams cad kun tu ston/ /bsnyengs pa mi mnga' zhum mi mnga'/ /thams cad zil gnon phyag kyang 'tshal/ /
lha'i bu gnas med kyis gsol pa/ lha rnams dang ni dri za dang / /bdud dang tshangs par bcas pa yis/ /khyod kyi chos la brgal mi nus/ /de bas khyod la bsnyengs mi mnga'//
lha'i bu seng+ge'i rtsal gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad yongs mkhyen pas/ /sangs rgyas gyur la 'jigs mi mnga'/ /bdag la chos
kyis sus rgol zhes/ /bde gshegs khyod la dogs mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu skrag med kyis gsol pa/ seng+ge ri sul gnas pa ni/ /'jigs pa ma mchis skrag ma mchis/ /
ri dwags phra mo yongs btul te/ /spa bkong gnas na nga ro sgrog /de bzhin thams cad mkhyen pa yang / /mu stegs can rnams yongs skrag ste/ /lha klu dri za'i 'jig rten na/ /
mtshungs med gzigs nas gsung yang sgrog /lha'i bu thams cad zil gyis gnon gyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten rnam 'dren 'jig rten na/ /sangs rgyas nyid la bsngo
bgyid pa/ /'jig rten gsum na ma mchis te/ /des na rgyal ba bdag gi skyabs/ /lha'i bu seng+ge'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs//
chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'/ /khyod 'dra 'jig rten ma mchis te/ /cis mi bsnyengs la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu rjes su mthun par skyes kyis gsol pa/
sangs rgyas nyid du dam bcas na/ /'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/ /'jig rten 'dren pa chos kyis ni/ /khyod la gang rgol de ma mchis/ /lha'i bu mdzod 'dzin gyis
gsol pa/ seng+ge'i nga ro gsung bsgrags te/ /khyod kyi chos kyi mdzod bzung bas/ /srog chags bye ba stong dag gis/ /byang chub mchog tu sems kyang skyes/ /lha'i bu brtul zhugs
rjes su mthun gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas rjes mthun brtul zhugs can/ /dpal chen de dag thob chen thob/ /byang chub mchog tu sems btud cing / /gang zag mchog tu
de dag 'gyur/ /lha'i bu rjes su mthun pa'i chos la dga' bas gsol pa/ khyod kyi bstan pa sus thos te/ /byang chub mchog tu sems btud pa/ /de dag 'jig rten sems
can che| |gang zag mchog tu de dag 'gyur/ /lha'i bu sems dag pas gsol pa/ 'jig rten dag na rgol med pa'i/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsung thos nas/ /srog chags
bye ba stong dag gis/ /byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed/ /lha'i bu sems rgyun yongs su dag pas gsol pa/ yun ring dus na mi dbang gis/ /sangs rgyas bslab
la legs bslab pas/ /de slad khyod ni thugs rgyud dag /mtshan rab sum cu gnyis dang ldan/ /lha'i bu zag pa med pa'i yid kyis gsol pa/ zag pa zad pa'i sangs
rgyas kyis/ /seng+ge'i nga ro bsgrags mdzad de/ /dam bcas pa la mngon bzhugs na/ /rgol ba 'di na yong ma mchis/ /lha'i bu de kho na'i rjes su song bas gsol pa/ khyod kyi
gsung la smra 'gyur ba'i/ /lha dang lha bu mi dag ni/ /'jig rten gsum na ma mchis te/ /des na thub pa stobs dang ldan/ /lha'i bu zag pa
zad pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ dge sbyong dam pa'i zag pa ni/ /ma lus yongs su bas pa ste/ /'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/ /des na sangs rgyas bdag gi pha/ /lha'i
bu rtag tu brtson gyis gsol pa/ khyod la nyon mongs lus so zhes/ /mi dbang khyod la gang rgol ba/ /rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs te/ /des na sangs rgyas bsnyengs mi
mnga'| |lha'i bu sems zhi bas gsol pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang zhi ba ste/ /gti mug bag chags bcas par zhi/ /nyes spyod las kyang zhi bas na/ /sems zhi khyod la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha'i bu rnal 'byor spyod pas gsol pa/ rnal 'byor gang gis nyon mongs gang / /bas par 'gyur ba lta ba'i tshe/ /de la khyod kyis mkhyen kun 'jug /
des na khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu rnal 'byor la mkhas pas gsol pa/ 'dren pas gang la bslab pa yi/ /rnal 'byor tshogs ni mtha' yas te/ /thams cad
mkhyen pa de slad du/ /nyon mongs thams cad ma lus bsal/ /lha'i bu rnal 'byor blo gros kyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten sgron ma khyod kyi blo/ /rnal 'byor las ni nyams
ma mchis/ /des na khyod kyis nyon mongs kun/ /bag chags bcas par yongs su btsal/ /lha'i bu zhi ba rig pas gsol pa/ nyon mongs thams cad zhi gyur nas/ /bag
chags ma lus yongs su bsal/ /bsnyengs pa mi mnga' rgyal sras dang / /cis kyang mi bsnyengs spyod pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu zad pa la rtog pas gsol pa/ thub pa thams cad
mkhyen pa khyod/ /nyon mongs bag chags bcas par bas/ /'jig rten sgron ma khyod la ni/ /mtshungs pa gang yang mi dmigs so/ /lha'i bu bag la nyal phyung gis gsol
pa| khyod kyis bag chags ma lus bsal/ /khyod la skyon dri yong ma mchis/ /de slad sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen/ /lha rnams kun gyi thub pa'i thub/ /lha'i bu mtha' la gnas
pas gsol pa/ zag pa rnams ni spangs pas na/ /skye ba yang skye ma lags te/ /thub khyod skye ba tha ma pa/ /des na mgon po bsnyengs mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu tshad srung gis gsol
pa| dpa' bo khyod kyis sa bon spangs/ /sdug bsngal myu gu tshig par gyur/ /mya ngan 'khri shing rnam par bskams/ /gdung ba med la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu shing thags
bton gyis gsol pa/ thub pa thams cad mkhyen pa khyod/ /ma rig shing thags rnams kyang bsal/ /sangs rgyas spyod pa rnam par sbyangs/ /de bas tshon pa bsnyengs mi
mnga'| |lha'i bu srid pa'i pha rol tu song bas gsol pa/ srid pa'i mtsho las yang dag brgal/ /rnam par 'dren pa bya ba byas/ /khyod kyis snang
ba yang dag phyung / /'jigs med khyod ni don kyang grub/ /lha'i bu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro bas gsol pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa zhir gyur pa/ /nyon mongs thams
cad rab tu bshig /bag chags rdul tsam yong mi mnga'/ /mgon po khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis chos kyi rgyal
mtshan bsgrangs/ /nga rgyal rgyal mtshan rab tu bsnyal/ /chos kyi lam srang mtha' yas pa/ /dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu chos kyi 'byung gnas kyis gsol
pa| sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas so/ /thub pa chos rnams kun mkhyen pa/ /sems can kun gyi dge bshes gnyen/ /ye shes gtso la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i
bu chos kyi gos can gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyi sras po 'jigs med pa/ /seng+ge'i nga ro rnam sgrog kyang / /rgyal sras de dag chog med cing / /sangs rgyas chos kyi don gyis
bsgom| |lha'i bu chos don du gnyer bas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos rnams don gnyer bar/ /khyod kyis sras rnams sems bskyed cing / /khyod kyis mi 'jigs thos
gyur nas/ /mkhas pa de dag byang chub tshol/ /lha'i bu chos kyis skom gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis mi 'jigs thob gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams btsal ba'i phyir/ /srog chags
bye ba skom gyur te/ /brtson 'grus brtan pa rab tu brtson// //bam po bcu gcig pa/ lha'i bu chos kyi 'phags kyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos kyis mngon 'phags shing / /'jigs
pa med par 'dul mdzad pa'i/ /gsung ba'i mchog gyur khyod mthong nas/ /brtul zhugs mchog can byang chub tshol/ /lha'i bu chos 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ thub pa zab
cing blta dka' ba'i/ /chos ni khyod kyis rab bstan pa/ /khyod kyi sras kyis thos gyur nas/ /de dag bla med byang chub tshol/ /lha'i bu lta ba med pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis
seng+ge'i gsung thos nas/ /khyod kyi sras po dpa' nges pa/ /lus dang srog la mi lta bar/ /byang chub don du gnyer bar bgyid/ /lha'i bu gzhan du mi sems pa'i blo gros kyis
gsol pa/ thub pa bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/ /khyod kyi dam chos 'dir thos nas/ /gzhan du sems pa ma mchis par/ /brtul zhugs mchog can byang chub tshol/ /lha'i bu
gzhan du mi 'gro bas gsol pa/ mi dbang khyod kyi gsung thos nas/ /theg pa gnyis po spangs bgyis shing / /lam gzhan du ni mi mchi bar/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub tshol//
lha'i bu nye bar gnas kyis gsol pa/ seng+ge'i nga ro 'di bsgrags pa/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis thos gyur nas/ /byang chub mchog la nyer gyur
cing / /de dag rkang gnyis dam par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu spobs pa nye bar gyur pas gsol pa/ grags chen khyod kyis gsung brjod pa'i/ /spobs pa de ni thos gyur nas/ /sangs
rgyas chos la khyod kyi sras/ /kun kyang dga' ba rab tu skyes/ /lha'i bu spobs pa thob pas gsol pa/ 'jigs med khyod kyis gsung bsgrags pa/ /ma smad sras kyis thos
gyur na| |de dag spobs pa nam du yang / /sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog /lha'i bu rtag tu rab dgas gsol pa/ 'jigs med khyod kyis gsung bsgrags pas/ /stobs
chen khyod kyi sras kyi rnams/ /rtag tu rab tu dga' gyur cing / /ma smad de dag byang chub tshol/ /lha'i bu yid zhum pa med pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis gsung bsgrags thos
gyur nas/ /rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyi sras/ /dga' zhing zhum pa ma mchis par/ /byang chub mchog ni tshol bar bgyid/ /lha'i bu thogs med yid kyis gsol pa/ khyod
kyis gsung bsgrags thos pas na/ /sems rangs gyur cing yid dga' ste/ /de dag yid ni nam du yang / /byang chub nyid du thogs ma mchis/ /lha'i bu chos la bar chad
med la mkhas pas gsol pa/ chos rnams gang la brten bgyis kyang / /dkar po'i phyogs dag mi 'grib cing / /de yi bar chad mi 'gyur ba'i/ /gnas ni thub pa khyod kyis
mkhyen| |lha'i bu chos nges par bstan pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ dkar po'i phyogs la spyod pa la/ /bar chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / /gnas kyang med par thub pas
mkhyen| |des na ston pa bsnyengs mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas pas gsol pa/ dge la kun nas nyon mongs pa/ /nag po'i phyogs kyi rang bzhin te/ /khyod kyi
thugs ni des mi gos/ /gnas kyang med par thub pas mkhyen/ /lha'i bu rigs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ nag po'i chos ni nam du yang / /dkar po'i chos dang mi 'grogs
par| |rigs par bcom ldan khyod kyis gsungs/ /des na bcom ldan bdag gi bla/ /lha'i bu dge ba dang mi dge ba rig pas gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad ma 'dres pa//
dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis mkhyen/ /kun nas nyon mongs brtags pas na/ /dkar po'i phyogs las 'grib par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu lam la mkhas pas gsol pa/ kun nas
nyon mongs spyod pa la/ /dkar po'i phyogs ni mi 'byung ste/ /de ltar 'tshal bar ma gyur la/ /bar chad du ni 'gyur bar gsungs/ /lha'i bu thar pa 'dod kyis gsol pa/ nag
po'i phyogs la brten bgyid na/ /thar par 'dod pa mang po yi/ /bar du gcod par 'gyur zhes gsungs/ /des na rgyal khyod thams cad mkhyen//
lha'i bu dag pa'i sems kyis gsol pa/ sems grol bgyi bar gang 'tshal bas/ /kun nas nyon mongs shes bya zhes/ /dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis gsungs/ /de khyod
'jig rten mchod rten lags/ /lha'i bu nyon mongs mthong gis gsol pa/ kun nas nyon mongs spyod bgyid pa/ /kun nas nyon mongs ma 'tshal na/ /dam pa'i chos ni
shes mi nus/ /de skad bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/ /lha'i bu sdig mthong gis gsol pa/ sdig pa rnams la brten byas kyang / /dge ba mi 'grib gang smra ba/
de ni thar chos skal med ces/ /rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyis gsungs/ /lha'i bu gdul bar bya bas gsol pa/ chags pa gdul bar gang 'dod dang / /zhe sdang gti
mug gdul 'dod pas/ /thub pa'i spobs pa ci 'dra ba/ /de lta bu ni nan tan bgyi/ /lha'i bu kun nas nyon mongs pa dag pas gsol pa/ dag dang kun nas nyon mongs pa/ /mi
mkhas gang rnams mi shes pa/ /de dag ston pa sangs rgyas min/ /de skad drang srong mchog gis gsungs/ /lha'i bu thar pa la brtson pas gsol pa/ nyon mongs 'grib
par 'gyur ba'i chos/ /rgyal ba yis ni gang bstan pa/ /de brten nyon mongs mi zad ces/ /khyod la rgal ba yong ma mchis/ /lha'i bu thar pa la mngon par phyogs pas gsol
pa| chos gang nyon mongs gang gi rnams/ /zad 'gyur thub pas bstan pa la/ /yang dag brtson byas mi zad ces/ /rgol ba 'di na yong mi dmigs/ /lha'i bu rnal 'byor la
brtson pas gsol pa/ rgyal ba khyod kyis nyan thos la/ /gang gi don du chos bstan pa/ /de brtson bgyis pas mi thob ces/ /'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/ /lha'i bu mi 'jigs
dpal gyis gsol pa/ 'dod chags spang phyir mi sdug pa/ /bstan la yang dag brtson bgyis na/ /'dod chags zad par mi 'gyur zhes/ /khyod la rgol ba yong ma mchis/ /
lha'i bu 'gro ba med pa rab tu shes kyis gsol pa/ shin tu bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/ /zhe sdang spang phyir byams gsungs pa/ /de bsgrubs sel bar mi 'gyur zhes/ /dgra
'joms khyod la rgol ma mchis/ /lha'i bu mig rnam par dag gis gsol pa/ /shes rab gti mug spang ba'i phyir/ /gsungs pa de la brten bgyis kyang / /gti mug sel
bar mi 'gyur zhes/ /'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/ /lha'i bu rnam par rtog pa 'joms kyis gsol pa/ rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen por ni/ /dbugs 'byung rngub pa dran
gsungs pa/ /de la brtson bgyis mi zhi zhes/ /'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa lhur len pas gsol pa/ nga'o
snyam pa spang slad du/ /stong nyid khyod kyis bka' stsal te/ /des ni de zhi mi 'gyur zhes/ /'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/ /lha'i bu nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal spangs kyis
gsol pa/ nga snyam nga rgyal spang slad du/ /mtshan ma med pa khyod kyis gsungs/ /bstan kyang zhi bar mi 'gyur zhes/ /'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/ /lha'i bu sems
rgyud rnam par dag pas gsol pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa yis/ /nyon mongs thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ /des ni nyon mongs mi zad ces/ /'di na khyod
la rgol ma mchis/ /lha'i bu 'du shes rnam par bshig gis gsol pa/ phyogs dang gnyen po'i rnam pa dang / /nyon mongs lam dang lam 'jug pa/ /'jigs
pa med par rgol ba na/ /thub pa chen po ma mthong ngo / /lha'i bu tha snyad shin tu shes pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan phyogs dang phyogs min dang / /zad dang ma zad tha snyad
tsam| |'jigs pa ma mchis rgol bgyid pa/ /thub pa de ni ming tsam mo/ /lha'i bu lus kyi las dul bas gsol pa/ mkhyen pas yongs su mkhyen gyur nas/ /khyod kyi
sku yi 'phrin las 'jug /thams cad ma lus mkhyen pas na/ /des na 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen/ /lha'i bu lus kyi las yongs su shes pas gsol pa/ sems can
rnams la thugs brtse bas/ /dpa' khyod sku yi 'phrin las ni/ /mtha' dag shin tu nges pa lags/ /'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu lus kyi las shin
tu nges pas gsol pa/ sku yi 'phrin las rab nges par/ /lus can kun la sman slad du/ /'jig rten sgron ma khyod mdzad de/ /des na khyod ni gang zag mchog /lha'i bu
lus kyi las kyi mtha' shin tu mthong bas gsol pa/ sems can kun la sman slad du/ /'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni/ /sku yi 'phrin las dag pa dang / /legs par
yongs su brtags dang ldan/ /lha'i bu lus kyi las kyi mtha' shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas gsol pa/ shin tu mnyam par bzhag sku dang / /sku yi 'phrin las dag pa
dang / /ldan par sems can bde don du/ /gang zag mchog ni spyod pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu tshig grub kyis gsol pa/ snyan cing yon tan ldan pa dang / /rtsub pa yongs su spangs
ba'i gsung / /mkhyen pas shin tu yongs brtags shing / /mgon po khyod ni gsung ba mdzad/ /lha'i bu dus su smra bas gsol pa/ dus su don dang ldan pa dang / /don
med yongs su spangs pa'i gsung / /gzung bar 'os dang blang 'os pa/ /'dren pa khyod ni gsung ba mdzad/ /lha'i bu sdums byed blo gros kyis
gsol pa/ dbyen du 'gyur ba yongs spangs te/ /'dum par 'gyur dang yid 'ong ba/ /dbyen med 'bras bu rnam par smin/ /sngon chad khyod kyis gsung du brjod/ /lha'i bu
mi slu bas gsol pa/ srog gi don du'ang khyod kyis ni/ /srid pa rnams su rdzun ma gsungs/ /de bas khyod kyi grags pa kun/ /'jig rten dag na thogs ma mchis/ /lha'i
bu yang dag par smra bas gsol pa/ 'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyang / /sangs rgyas chos rnams btsal slad du/ /thub pa'i gsung la bstod pa ni/ /yang dag gsungs
ba'i rgyu mthun lags/ /lha'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha' las nges par byung gis gsol pa/ mi mchog khyod kyi bden pa yis/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di bsgrubs te/ /
chos kyi yang dag rang bzhin yang / /rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu yang dag pa la brtul bas gsol pa/ 'dus byas dag ni chos kyi rnams/ /yang dag
ji bzhin lta ba dang / /chos rnams yang dag mtshan nyid kyang / /mi yi dbang bos rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu las la rtog pas gsol pa/ ye shes yongs su dag pa yis/ /
bdag nyid dang ni gzhan dag gi /tshig gi las kyang rab tu mkhyen/ /des na rgyal ba mnyam ma mchis/ /lha'i bu yid la rtog pas gsol pa/ mi yi dbang po'i thugs kyi
las| |ji snyed gang dag 'jug pa ni/ /de dag 'gro ba thugs rjes 'jug /'gro phan khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu yid kyi rnam par rtog pa la mkhas pas gsol pa /
'gro ba thugs rje bskyed nas ni/ /gang la khyod ni spyod mdzad pa/ /de la thugs ni dul bar byung / /'gro phan khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu thabs la mkhas pas gsol
pa| 'gro ba'i bsam pa rnam dpyod nas/ /rnam 'dren thugs kyi 'phrin las 'jug /thub pa ye shes sna tshogs ni/ /mkhyen bzhin kun tu rab tu 'jug /lha'i bu yid rnam par
bshig gis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas sa dang yid kyi las/ /sems can thugs rjes gzigs pas 'byung / /sangs rgyas nyid la ye shes thabs/ /rang bzhin med par
rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu 'das pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang / /brtson 'grus bsam gtan dag la yang / /gang gis gang la mngon
spyad pa| |sngon gyi dus kyang rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu 'das pa la rtog pas gsol pa/ byang chub mchog ni tshol mdzad cing / /gang drung khyod kyis sngon spyad pa/ /sngon gyi spyod pa
yongs brtags nas/ /sangs rgyas bye ba rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba grangs
med du| |gang du khyod kyis sngon spyad pa/ /sngon gyi tshul ni dgongs mdzad kyang / /khyod kyi thugs yid thogs mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul la yongs su rtog pas
gsol pa/ sangs rgyas mang las byung ba yi/ /ting 'dzin mngon par bsgrub bya ba/ /sangs rgyas bye ba grangs med la/ /rnam pa 'dren pa khyod kyis zhus/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi
sbyor ba las nges par byung gis gsol pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas drung dag tu/ /grangs med dpag tu med pa yi/ /ting 'dzin sgo dag 'dren pa yis/ /zhus shing sgom pa
mdzad par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi gnas la rtog pas gsol pa/ 'khor ba'i nyes pa rab mang dang / /bkur sti rnam pa sna tshogs dag /gzigs pas sems can
rnams la ston/ /sems can long ba rnams kyang 'grel/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi dus na 'phrul pas gsol pa/ gzhan dang gzhan dag zos shing 'tshal/ /rtse zhing rab tu dga'
ba bgyis/ /gnod pa mi zad bgyis pa dag /gzhan dang gzhan yang khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi spyod pas yang dag par byung gis gsol pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa
'gro rtogs pa/ /khyod kyi ye shes 'das dus kyi/ /las dang bsam gtan snyoms 'jug dang / /'gro ba rnams la thogs ma mchis/ /lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' la mkhas pas
gsol pa/ 'dren pa khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni/ /ma 'ongs dus kyi 'chi 'pho dang / /skye dang las kyi rnam smin la/ /thogs par 'gyur ba ma mchis so/ /lha'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i spyod
yul gyis gsol pa/ brtan pa 'gro ba mkhas khyod kyi/ /mkhyen pa phyi dus sems can gyi/ /bsam dang las kyi 'bras bu dang / /'gro ba rnams la thogs ma mchis/ /lha'i
bu srid pa las bskyod kyis gsol pa/ khams rnams gsum po 'di dag dang / /dus gsum kun la mkhas khyod kyi/ /ye shes mchog ni mi chags te/ /srid pa'i spyod yul
khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu tha snyad la spyod pas gsol pa/ las dang sems can 'gro ba dang / /rnam par smin pa myong ba dag /de dag thams cad ming tsam du/ /rkang gnyis
dam pa bstan pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu da ltar byung ba la yang dag par rtog pas gsol pa/ dpa' bo khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni/ /da ltar byung ba thogs ma mchis/ /grangs med
sangs rgyas zhing rnams ni/ 'jig rten mgon po rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu da ltar byung ba la rnam pa dpyod pas gsol pa/ mi yi dbang pos rnam dpyad nas/ /byis pa'i blo gros rmongs
bgyis pa/ /dus gsum dngos po ma mchis par/ /nges par mnyam pa nyid du gzigs/ /lha'i bu mi gnas pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/
dus gsum gnas pa ma mchis shing / /ngo bo nyid la mi gnas te/ /dngos po thams cad dngos med par/ /rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu dus
gsum mngon par bskul bas gsol pa/ 'das pa dag dang ma 'ongs dang / /da ltar byung ba'i phung po rnams/ /ma mchis dngos po ma mchis par/ /skyes bu dam pas bstan
pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu chags med yid kyis gsol pa/ dus gsum sems can thams cad la/ /snying po mchis par ma bstan te/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu mig yor dang / /brag
ca lta bur khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu dus gsum dpog gis gsol pa/ 'dren pa khyod kyis mkhyen pa ni/ /dus gsum po dag kun tu yang / /sgyu ma lta bur mkhyen pa na/ /
khyod kyi dbang po chags mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu mos pa yongs su rig par byed kyis gsol pa/ gang gi nub mo dpa' khyod kyis/ /byang chub mngon du bgyis gyur pa/ /de dus tshun chad
mos pa la/ /bri bar gyur par yong mi gda'/ /lha'i bu mos pa yang dag thob kyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten sgron ma'i mos pa ni/ /rab tu rgyun chad mi 'gyur te/ /rtag par
khyod kyi mos pa des/ /khyod kyi sras rnams mos pa che/ /lha'i bu mos pas mngon 'phags kyis gsol pa/ chab las pad+ma ji bzhin du/ /khyod ni mos pas mngon du 'phags/ /
'jig rten dag gis mi gos te/ /pad+mar chab kyis ji bzhin no/ /lha'i bu mos pas yongs su grol gyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten mgon dang mos pa ni/ /chos kyi dbyings zhes
brjod pa ste/ /gnyis med gnyis su bgyir ma mchis/ /smad pa med pa khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu brtson 'grus yang dag thob kyis gsol pa/ gzi brjid chen po brtson
'grus kyis/ /byang chub yang dag brnyes par gyur/ /mdzad pa mdzad kyang mgon po khyod/ /brtson 'grus btang ba yong ma mdzad/ /lha'i bu dran pa phun sum tshogs pas
gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen po'i dgongs pa ni/ /thams cad kun tu rjes su 'jug /mdzad pa mdzad kyang mgon po khyod/ /dgongs pa bri ba yod ma mchis/ /lha'i bu sems
mnyam par bzhag pas gsol pa/ mgon po rtag tu mnyam bzhag ste/ /sems can rnams kyi spyod pa mkhyen/ /'dren pa spyod pa'i dbang gis ni/ /sems can rnams la
chos kyang ston/ /lha'i bu shes rab lhur len gyis gsol pa/ /'jig rten sgron mar gyur khyod kyis/ /ye shes rgya mtsho'i mtha' ma ni/ /bskal pa bye bar brjod bgyid kyang / /sangs
rgyas rnams kyis bshad mi spyod/ /lha'i bu rnam par grol ba la mkhas pas gsol pa/ rnam par grol dang ma grol ba/ /gang slad khyod
kyis ma brnyes pas/ /mtshungs pa med pa khyod la ni/ /rnam grol yongs su nyams mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu rnam par grol ba'i ye shes la brtson pas gsol pa/ thub
pa khyod ni rnam grol nas/ /ngo bo nyid med mkhyen pas na/ /rnam grol ye shes gzigs pa ni/ /yang dag mkhyen pa nyams mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi srid pa rnam
par spyod kyis gsol pa/ mar me mdzad pa tshun chad du/ /dpa' bo yang dag gzigs khyod kyis/ /spyod la 'khrul pa mi mnga' ste/ /des na sangs rgyas lags zhes
bstod| |lha'i bu zab mo la spyod pas gsol pa/ srog chags gzhan dag ji bzhin du/ /bde gshegs khyod la chags mi mnga'/ /chos kyi rang bzhin mkhyen pas na/ /
rang bzhin de la rmongs mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu blo gros yangs pas gsol pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa khyod la ni/ /rnam pa kun tu bsnyel mi mnga'/ /mgon po dgongs pa
nyer bzhag pas/ /thub pa 'bru mar snod dang 'dra/ /lha'i bu sems g.yeng ba med kyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten sgron ma khyod la ni/ /mnyam par ma bzhag sems mi
mnga'| |ma 'dres sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams/ /srog chags kun gyis shes par dka'/ /lha'i bu ye shes la rab tu gnas kyis gsol pa/ bde bar gshegs pa khyod
la ni| |ma brtags btang snyoms mi mnga' ste/ /mi yi dbang po'i sangs rgyas chos/ /ma 'dres pa ni bsam mi khyab/ /lha'i bu thams cad zil gnon gyis gsol pa/ skyes
bu khyu mchog khyod la ni| |'jig rten gsum na mtshungs ma mchis/ /thams cad mkhyen pa ma pham pa/ /khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad mkhyen/ /lha'i bu snying po blangs
pas gsol pa/ sems can snying po bla na med/ /chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam brnyes pa/ /sangs rgyas byang chub phyag 'tshal lo/ /
gnas gtsang ma'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de nas de'i tshe gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa can dang / kun tu rgyu drug khris lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
lding dang / klu'i bu mo dang / klu dang / grul bum dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi 'am ci dang / phreng ldan glang po che can dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang / sum cu rtsa
gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs pa dang / 'od gsal dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che
ba'i lha dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha dag gis bstod pa brjod pa yang thos nas ngo
mtshar thob par gyur te/ chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa 'di thos nas 'di ltar sngon chad ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshul thos pas yid gnyis su gyur/ nem nur dang the tshom
za bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye gau ta ma/ sngon chad ma thos pa'i chos bstan pa 'di thos nas bdag cag ni/ kun tu rgyu'i gnas
kyang mi 'tshal/ khyim gyi gnas kyang mi 'tshal bar gyur cing / 'di ltar sngon chad ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas chos 'di la nem nur dang the tshom du gyur
te| sems dang bar yang ma gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang dge sbyong gau ta ma khyod la bdag cag yid ches pa mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar dge sbyong gau ta ma
khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'di lta bu mngon par mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par mdzad pas bdag cag gis lha'i 'khor
rgya chen po 'di dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor phal cher gau ta ma khyed kyis legs par gsungs pa 'tshal cing yid rangs par gyur pa mthong ste/ des na/ bdag cag
dge sbyong gau ta ma khyod la dad pa mchis par gyur to/ /kye gau ta ma/ gang 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis chos thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /zhes smras pa de la ji
ltar chos thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa snyam du bdag cag the tshom cher 'tshal lo/ /dge sbyong gau ta ma/ khyod ni/ ci nas bdag cag legs par bshad pa'i don de
rtags nas mun pa med par gyur te stan 'di las ldang bar 'gyur ba de ltar bdag cag la chos ston spyod do/ /snyam ste/ bdag cag dge sbyong gau ta ma khyod la de ltar mngon
par dag par gyur to/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa can dang / kun tu rgyu rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
kun tu rgyu dag /de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri'i/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lan thob cig /dge sbyong gau ta ma/ legs so/ /zhes gsol te/ kun tu rgyu de dag bcom
ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun tu rgyu dag /khyod kyis ji ltar mngal du 'jug pa shes sam /de dag
nas gsol pa/ kye gau ta ma/ bdag cag gis bstan bcos las thos na gsum 'dus nas mngal du 'jug par 'gyur te/ gang 'di pha dang ma gnyis kyang tshogs pa
dang / chags par yang gyur pa dang / chags nas kyang 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis rnam par brtags pas/ 'dod chags kyang
'byung ba de'i tshe mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /zhe'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu rgyu dag /'di la ji snyam du sems/ pha dang ma gnyis rnam
par rtog pa'i tshe 'dod chags de ma'i sems las byung ngam/ gsol ba/ kye gau ta ma/ ma lags so/ /ma'i rnam par rtog pa las byung ngam/ kye gau ta ma/ ma lags
so| |pha'i sems las byung ngam/ kye gau ta ma/ ma lags so/ /pha'i rnam par rtog pa las byung ngam/ kye gau ta ma/ ma lags so/ /kun tu rgyu dag /'di la ji snyam du
sems| pha'i 'dod chags gang yin pa de ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye gau ta ma/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /kun tu rgyu dag /'di ji snyam du sems/ pha'i sems
gang yin pa de ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye gau ta ma/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /kun tu rgyu dag/ 'di la ji snyam du sems/ pha'i kun tu rtog pa de ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/
kye gau ta ma/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /kun tu rgyu dag /'di la ji snyam du sems/ mngal na gnas pa de lha las 'chi 'phos te ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye gau ta ma/ ma 'tshal
to| |kun tu rgyu dag /'di la ji snyam du sems/ mngal na gnas pa mi dang / lha ma yin dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
rten nas shi 'phos te ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye gau ta ma/ ma 'tshal lo/ /kun tu rgyu dag /'di la ji snyam du sems/ mngal na gnas pa de gzugs yod pa'am /
gzugs med pa zhig ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye gau ta ma/ ma 'tshal to/ /kun tu rgyu dag /'di la ji snyam du sems/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye gau ta ma/ ma 'tshal to/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan mu stegs
can kun tu rgyu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun tu rgyu dag /chos 'di ni/ zab cing phra ste/ mkhas pa shes pa blo dang ldan pas rig par bya ba yin te/ brtag
tu med cing brtag pa'i yul ma yin la blta dka' zhing shes par dka' bas de ni/ khyod yun ring por gzhan du bltas pa/ gzhan du mos pa/ gzhan du dad pa/ gzhan du
brtson pa/ gzhan gyi lta ba'i gnas la gnas pa rnams kyis shes par mi nus mod kyi/ kun tu rgyu dag /'on kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag tshul dang 'dra ba'i dge ba'i
bshes gnyen la brten nas chos zab mo rnams la mig skye bar 'gyur te/ kun tu rgyu dag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi mig gi dbang po
nyams pa ni/ de'i tshul dang 'dra ba'i gso ba byed pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten na/ tshe 'di nyid la mig yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ mig des kyang tshe 'di nyid
la gzugs rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /kun tu rgyu dag /de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi mig nyams par gyur pas kyang tshul dang 'dra
ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten na/ shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag par 'gyur te/ des kyang chos zab mo rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /kun tu rgyu dag /khyed
kyang yun ring po nas gzhan du bltas pa/ sngon log pa'i gdams ngag gis bslus pa/ chos ma yin pa la chos su 'du shes pa/ thar pa ma yin pa la thar par
'du shes pa/ 'byung ba ma yin pa la 'byung bar 'du shes pa/ chud zos pa rnams kyis chud gzan pa yin te/ kun tu rgyu dag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ long ba'i
dmigs bu long bas byas na gang 'di bkri ba dang / khrid pa de gnyi ga yang tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/ /kun tu rgyu dag /de bzhin
du dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze gang la la ston pa ma yin par bdag cag ni/ ston pa yin no/ /zhes khas 'che ba dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin par
bdag cag ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin no/ /zhes khas 'che ba dang / 'byung ba la mkhas pa ma yin par bdag cag ni/ 'byung ba la mkhas pa'o/ /
zhes khas 'che ba dang / 'byung ba mthong ba ma yin par bdag cag ni/ 'byung ba yin no/ /zhes khas 'che ba dang / mu stegs byed pa ma yin par bdag cag ni/ mu
stegs can byed pa yin no/ /zhes khas 'che ba yin te/ de dag ston pa ma yin par ston pa'o/ /zhes khas 'che zhing gang rjes su ston pa de ni/ log par rjes su ston
par 'gyur/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin par gang khong du chud par byed pa de ni/ log par khong du chud par byed par 'gyur/ gang 'byung ba la
mkhas pa ma yin par gang 'byin pa de ni/ log par 'byin par 'gyur/ 'byung ba mthong ba ma yin par gang 'byung ba ston pa de ni/ log par ston par 'gyur/
mu stegs byed pa ma yin par gang sgrol ba de ni/ log par sgrol bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni/ tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ro/ /kun tu rgyu dag/ 'di
lta ste| dper na/ ba lang rdzi rab ka la mkhas pa ma yin pas rab ka ma yin par ba lang bsgral na/ de'i ba lang de dag gis pha rol dang tshu
rol gyi 'gram mi rnyed par 'khyil te/ de nyid du tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ba lang rdzi de rab ka la mi mkhas pa'i
phyir ro| |kun tu rgyu dag /de bzhin du gang la la mu stegs byed pa ma yin par mu stegs byed par khas 'che zhing gang sgrol ba de ni/ tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal
thob par 'gyur ro/ /kun tu rgyu dag /nga ni/ ston pa nyid yin la ston par khas 'che bas nga gang rjes su ston pa de yang dag par rjes su ston pa yin/ yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid yin la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su khas 'che bas nga gang khong du chud par byed pa de yang dag par khong du chud par byed pa yin/
'byung ba la mkhas pa nyid yin la 'byung ba la mkhas par khas 'che bas nga gang 'byin pa de dag yang dag par 'byin pa yin/ 'byung ba mthong ba nyid yin la
'byung ba ston par khas 'che bas nga gang 'byung ba ston pa de yang dag par ston pa yin/ mu stegs byed pa yin la mu stegs byed par khas 'che bas nga gang sgrol ba
de yang dag par sgrol ba yin te/ ston pa'i chos rab tu shes nas ni/ rjes su ston/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu shes nas ni/ khong du chud par byed/ 'byung ba rab tu shes
nas ni| 'byin pa yang dag par mthong nas ni/ ston/ mu stegs rab tu shes nas ni/ sgrol te/ gang sgrol ba de yang mu stegs bde bas rab tu sgrol ba yin no/ /
'di lta ste/ kun tu rgyu dag/ khyed kyang thar pa 'dod pa yin la nga yang ston pa sngon du bzhugs pa yin te/ yang dag par ston pa/ yang dag par khong du chud par byed
pa| 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa/ 'byung ba mthong ba yang dag pa'i mu stegs byed pa yin gyi/ de'i phyir rna ba blags te mos pa bskyed la dran pa nye bar bzhag ste yid
'dun par gyis la ma thob pa'i chos rnams thob par bya ba dang / sngon ma phyin pa'i lam du 'gro bar bya ba dang / sngon ma song ba'i phyogs su 'gro bar bya ba dang / sngon ma
'grogs pa'i lam grogs dang 'grogs par bya ba dang / sngon ma btsal ba'i lam btsal bar bya ba dang / sngon ma thob pa'i chos kyi mdzod thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson
'grus yang dag par rtsoms shig /kun tu rgyu dag /chos gsum mngon du gyur pas mngal du 'jug ces gang smra ba de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
mngal du 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyed la ngas bshad do/ /kun tu rgyu dag /de la ma zhes gang smras pa de ni/ sngon
gyi las bsags pa'i rkyen du gsungs so/ /pha zhes bya ba de ni/ sngon gyi las bsags pa'i rgyur gsungs so/ /dri za zhes bya ba de ni/ rnam par shes pa las kyis
'phangs pa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /mer mer po zhes bya ba de ni/ las kyis 'phangs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i gnas dang gzhi'o/ /ma'i mngal zhes bya ba de ni/ rnam
par shes pa las kyis 'phags pa'i gzhi ste/ 'di ltar ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa ni/ skye ba dang / 'phel ba dang / rgyas par 'gyur ra ro/ /kun
tu rgyu dag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa chen po la gnas na/ rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dag skye zhing 'phel ba dang / rgyas par 'gyur
ro| |de bzhin du ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa yang skye ba dang / 'phel ba dang / rgyas par 'gyur te/ 'phel nas skye bar 'gyur ro/ /btsas nas
rnam par 'phel lo/ /'phel nas spyod pa snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba gang dang gang nas shi 'phos nas de dang der skyes nas de dang 'dra ba'i spyod pa de dag spyod par 'gyur
te| de dag kyang mkhas pas shes par bya ba yin gyi/ glen pas ni/ ma yin no/ /yun ring po nas 'grogs 'grogs pas shes par bya ba yin gyi/ yun thung ngus ma yin
no| |yang dag par sems pas shes par bya ba yin gyi/ mi brtson pas ma yin no/ /kun tu rgyu dag /de la sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags
mkhas pas shes par bya ba ni/ 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ skad sha sha po yin/ skad gyo dum gyi sgra lta bu yin/ skad brtag dgos pa yin/ skad che ba yin/
skad lhang lhang po yin/ rtag tu dngang pa yin/ rtag tu 'dar ba yin/ rtag tu spu zing zhes byed pa yin/ rmi lam na me'i phung po 'bar ba mthong ba yin/ ri rgyug par mthong
ba yin| me mdag 'bar ba mthong ba yin/ lcags zangs kyi nang du btso ba mthong ba yin/ lag na dbyig pa thogs pa'i mi dag mthong ba yin/ srin po dag gis bdag
'phangs par mthong ba yin/ bdag nyid gson por gsal shing gis gzugs par mthong ba yin/ khyi dag gis bdag 'brad par mthong ba yin/ khyi dag gis bdag
bskor bar mthong ba yin/ bdag nyid glang po che dang sbrul gyis gtses par mthong ba yin/ phyogs bzhir bros na phyogs mi shes pa yin/ sems can kun la yid mi
rton pa yin te/ kun tu rgyu dag /rnam pa nyi shu po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag tu rig par bya'o/ /kun tu rgyu
dag /de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni/ 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ rmugs shing gnyid che ba yin/ le lo che ba yin/ mang
du za ba yin/ sa la 'drud pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa med pa yin/ mi gsal bar smra ba yin/ glen pa la dga' ba yin/ mun pa la dga' ba yin/ 'dam rdzab la dga'
pa yin| yang dang yang sos rtswa gcod pa yin/ rgyun du rkang pa'i mthe bos sa rko ba yin/ yang dang yang mgo la sbrang ma 'du ba yin/ yang dang yang nam mkha' la sos
'debs pa yin/ kun tu bskums te nyal ba yin/ sa la nyal ba yin/ mi gtsang bas mi 'dag pa yin/ yang dang yang nam mkha' la snam pa yin/ yang dang yang
ma smin pa za ba yin/ gzhan du smra zhing gzhan du byed de g.yo byed pa yin/ bab bab tu spyod pa yin/ rmi lam na bdag rdzab kyis gos par rmi ba yin/ rmi lam na bdag
nags su song ste rtswa za bar rmi ba yin/ sbrul gdug pas bdag bskor bar mthong ba yin/ bdag nyid ri khrod du zhugs par mthong ba yin te/ kun tu rgyu dag /de dag la sogs
bdud 'gro'i skye gnas nas 'chi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma rnam pa du mar shes par bya ste/ de dag ni/ bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag par brjod kyang zad
par mi nus so/ /kun tu rgyu dag /de la gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni/ 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ skra ser ba yin/ mig wa'i mig
'dra ba yin/ rtag par bkres pa yin/ rtag tu skom pa yin/ ser sna cha ba yin/ 'dod chen che ba yin/ thob pa mi rnyed pa yin/ gzhan gyi la re ba yin/ khro ba yin/ mig
dmar ba yin/ bza' ba thams cad la sred pa yin/ bdog pa thams cad la chags pa yin/ sbyin pa'i gnas dag mthong bar mi 'dod pa yin/ dngos po kun la yang
de rku ba'i sems yod pa yin/ dngos po ngan pa rnams la yang dga' ba yin/ thob pa la mos pa yin/ zas skom mi gtsang ba la dga' ba yin/ gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs
pa la phrag dog byed pa yin/ gzhan gyi longs spyod la sred pa bskyed pa yin/ gzhan gyi longs spyod gang yin pa de dag la bdag gi snyam du sems pa yin/ zas gtod na
sems mi dga' ba yin/ tshong 'dus kyi srang dag nas kyang shing tog len pa yin te/ kun tu rgyu dag /gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags kyi bye brag
ni| de dag la sogs pa mtha' yas par shes par bya'o/ /kun tu rgyu dag /de la lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni/
'di dag yin te/ /'di lta ste/ khengs pa yin/ 'thab bkrol che ba yin/ 'khon du 'dzin pa yin/ nga rgyal che ba yin/ lus che ba yin/ mig che ba yin/ mig
dkar ba yin/ mche ba snang ba yin/ mthu dang ldan pa yin/ 'thab mo'i blo can yin/ dbyen la dga' ba dang / bya ba thams cad la nga rgyal che ba yin/ /so snang
ba yin| 'jig rten thams cad la brnyas pa'i 'du shes can yin/ mtshon cha rno ba yin/ tshig na ba yin/ bdag gzengs bstod pa can yin/ mi shes pa'i
stobs can yin/ nyon mongs pa'i stobs can yin te/ kun tu rgyu dag/ de dag la sogs pa ni/ lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan mar shes
par bya'o/ /kun tu rgyu dag /de la mi las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni/ 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ ngo mtshar du 'dzin pa can yin/ 'phags pa dang
bsten pa yin/ 'phags pa ma yin pa la smod pa yin/ dge ba byed pa yin/ mngon rtags 'dod pa yin/ grags pa 'dod pa yin/ snyan pa 'dod pa yin/ bzo
la dga' ba yin/ shes pa la dga' ba yin/ nyon mongs pa chung ba yin/ khrel yod cing ngo tsha shes pa yin/ rigs kyi bu'i tshul phun sum tshogs pa yin/ byas pa
gzo ba yin/ mdza' bo la gdung pa yin/ yongs su gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/ bye brag shes pa yin/ byas pa dang ma byas pa la rtog pa yin/ tshig gi mthu yod pa
yin| gros gzung bar bya ba'i mthu yod pa yin/ 'dum par bya ba dang / 'thab mo bya ba la mngon par mkhas pa yin/ pho nya nus pa yin/ skad thams cad 'dzin pa'i
mthu yod pa yin/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mngon par shes pa yin te/ kun tu rgyu dag /de dag la sogs pa ni/ mi las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags
yin no| |kun tu rgyu dag /de la lha las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags ni/ 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ mdzes pa yin/ gtsang sbra che ba yin/ phreng ba la dga'
ba yin| spos la dga' ba yin/ bdug pa la dga' ba yin/ glu len pa'i ngang tshul can yin/ byug pa la dga' ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan ngan ngon gyis mi mgu zhing rgya
chen pos dga' ba yin/ rol mo'i sgra thams cad la dga' ba yin/ /glu thams cad la dga' ba yin/ skye bo rgya chen po dang 'grogs par dga' ba yin/ khang pa dang /
khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khyim dang / longs spyod rgya chen po la dga' ba yin/ /de'i sems byams pa sngon du 'gro ba yin/ rgod pa'i
ngang tshul can yin/ 'jam par smra ba yin/ dga' ba la mkhas pa yin/ rgyan la dga' ba yin/ che ba'i ngang tshul can yin/ 'gro ba'i ngang tshul can yin/
lus kyi shugs 'byin pa'i ngang tshul can yin/ /chags pa'i mtshan ma dang / mi chags pa'i mtshan ma shes pa yin/ phan par bya ba la mkhas pa yin
te| kun tu rgyu dag /mtshan ma de dag la sogs pas mtho ris nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag tu shes par bya'o/ /kun tu rgyu dag /de la mtshan ma de dag las
yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag mtshan ma de dag las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir
chos ston par byed pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsten par bya/ bsnyen par bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /de la sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos
pa'i gang zag gis ni/ sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe zhe sdang la yongs su brten pas des zhe sdang las byung ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas pas de las des sems can
dmyal bar skye ste/ de'i phyir de sems can dmyal bar gnas pa rnyed nas sems can dmyal ba'i spyod pa can du gyur pas de mi'i nang du skyes te spyod pa'i rtags 'di dag
thos nas bdag ni/ sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'o/ /zhes bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing / des sems can dmyal ba'i las kyi rgyu spang ba'i phyir dge ba'i
bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/ de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag zhe sdang gi gnyen por byams pa ston to/ /byams pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
rnams dang / byams pa dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to/ /des kyang de'i zhe sdang gi bag la nyal spong bar 'gyur te/ byams pa chen po bsgoms pas pha
rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /kun tu rgyu dag /de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni/ sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe gti
mug la yongs su bsten pas des gti mug las byung ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas pas de las des dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes te/ de'i phyir dud 'gro'i skye gnas na
gnas pa rnyed nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi spyod pa can du gyur pas/ de dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos te mi'i nang du skyes kyang dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi spyod pa de dag nyid spyod
par 'gyur te/ des spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas/ shi 'phos nas mi'i nang du skyes so/ /zhes bdag nyid kyis
shes par bya zhing / de dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi las de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/ de dag la dge
ba'i bshes gnyen de dag gti mug spang ba'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ston to/ /des kyang de'i gti mug gi bag la nyal spong bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ston te/ des de'i gti mug de ni/ rang bzhin med pa'o/ /zhes bya bar shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na
de la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ston te/ des de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs shing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /kun tu rgyu
dag /de la gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni/ sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe ser sna la kun tu brten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas/ des ser sna
dang ldan pa bag chags las byung ba'i las mngon par 'du byas pas de las byas pa dang / bsags pa dang / zin par byas pa dang / rdzogs par byas pa dang / blangs pa
des gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ de dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten na gnas pa des gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i spyod pa can du gyur pas/ de dag gshin rje'i 'jig
rten nas shi 'phos te mi'i nang du skyes kyang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/ des spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas
shi 'phos pa'o/ /zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing / des spyod pa de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar
bya ste| de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag ser sna spang ba'i phyir gtong ba ston te/ des kyang de'i ser sna'i bag la nyal spong bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na de la gtong ba dang
ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ston/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ de bsgoms pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /kun
tu rgyu dag /de la lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni/ sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dag kyang mngon par 'du byas la/ nga rgyal la yang
yongs su brten pas de nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i las byas pa dang / bsags pa dang / zin par byas pa dang / rdzogs par byas pa dang / blangs pa des lha ma yin du skye ste/ lha ma
yin du skyes te lha ma yin gyi gnas na gnas pa des lha ma yin gyi spyod pa can du gyur pas/ de lha ma yin nas shi 'phos te mi'i nang du
skyes kyang lha ma yin gyi spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/ des spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni/ lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'o/ /zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis shes
par bya zhing / des spyod pa de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/ de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag nga
rgyal spang ba dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gzhom pa'i phyir skye mched rnams stong to/ /des kyang de'i nga rgyal spong bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na de la stong pa nyid ston te/
des de'i nga rgyal gyi bag la nyal spong ba dang / bdag rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /yang na ji ltar bya ba 'byung ba sna tshogs pa las 'byung ba'i tshul ston te/
ngas de'i nga rgyal gyi bag la nyal spong bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na de la chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gcig pa ston te/ des de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / de bsgoms pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /kun tu rgyu dag/ de la mi las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni/ sngon
mir gyur pa'i tshe'ang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la kun tu brten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas des las de byas pa dang / bsags pa dang / zin par byas pa dang /
rdzogs par byas pa dang / blangs pa des mir skyes te/ mi'i nang na gnas pa des mi'i spyod pa can du gyur pas/ de mi'i nang nas shi 'phos te mi'i nang du skyes kyang mi'i
spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/ de spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni/ mi'i nang nas shi 'phos pa'o/ /zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing / des mi'i spyod pa
de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/ de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag mi rtag pa'i 'du shes ston te/ des
kyang de'i spyod pa bag la nyal dang bcas par spong bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na de la 'khor ba'i mi bsngags pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsngags pa ston te/ des de
'khor ba la mi dga' zhing mya ngan las 'da' ba don du gnyer bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na de la pha rol tu phyin pa drug ston te/ de thos pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de la thabs mkhas pa yang ston te/ des de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag bzung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ro/ /kun tu rgyu dag /de la mtho ris nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni/ sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe tshangs par
spyod pa mchog tu bzung ste spyad pa dang / sbyin pa mchog tu bzung ste byin pa dang / tshul khrims mchog tu bzung ste bsrungs pas las de byas pa dang / bsags pa
dang / zin par byas pa dang / rdzogs par byas pa dang / blangs pas lha'i nang du skyes te/ de lha'i nang na gnas pa des lha'i spyod pa can du gyur pas/ de lha las shi
'phos te mi'i nang du skyes kyang lha'i spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/ des spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni/ lha'i nang na shi 'phos pa'o/ /zhes bdag nyid kyis shes
par bya zhing / des spyod pa de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/ de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag tshangs par
