byed cing 'khrul pa tshol ba can/ /su la 'khrul yod gang la gleng bya snyam/ /de dag nga yi bstan pa 'di las ring / /de dag yon tan sdang zhing ngan song gzhol/ /de
dag rgyal ba'i bstan pa bor nas ni/ /ngan song shin tu mi zad 'bar bar 'gro/ /de dag rnams kyi sdig pa'i spyod pa dang / /chos min ldan 'gro rab sdig 'dir thos nas/ /
rtag tu 'khor mor byang chub lam la sbyor/ /ngan 'gror skyes shing gdung bar gyur ta re/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan pa drang srong che/ /bskal pa bye mang brgya lam 'byung bar
'gyur| |de ltar dal ba dam pa rnyed pa la/ /gal te thar 'dod bag med spang bar gyis/ /yul 'khor skyong / gang zag bzhi po 'di dag ni/
byang chub sems dpas bsten par mi bya ba ste/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong / byang chub sems dpas sdig pa'i bshes gnyen gyi gang zag bsten par mi bya ba
dang / yul 'khor skyong / byang chub sems dpas dmigs par lta ba can gyi gang zag bsten par mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong / byang chub sems dpas dam pa'i
chos spang pa'i gang zag bsten par mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong / byang chub sems dpas zang zing la brkam pa'i gang zag bsten par mi bya ba ste/ yul 'khor
skyong / gang zag bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpas bstan par mi bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /gang
dag sdig pa'i bshes gnyen rnam spong zhing / /gang dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen sten byed pa/ /de dag rtag tu byang chub lam la 'phel/ /dper na mkha' la zla ba yar ngo
bzhin| |dmigs par lta la rtag tu zhen pa dang / /bdag dang srog dang gso bar zhen pa dang / /de dag dug phyis bzhin du rtag tu spang / /gang dag sangs rgyas ye shes don mi
gnyer ro| |gang dag mi mchog rnams kyi zhi ba'i chos/ /'dod chags bral ba'i bdud rtsi mthun spong ba/ /de dag dper na ngan skyug ji bzhin spang / /gang zhig byang chub dam
pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod/ /zang zing dag dang chos gos ltung bzed chags/ /rtag tu khyim la 'dris par byed brtson pa/ /de dag rnams dang 'dres par mi bya ste/ /de dag me yi
'obs bzhin spang bar bya/ /gang zhig bdud ni gdul bar bya ba dang / /'khor lo dam pa bla med bskor ba dang / /de ltar sems can don yangs byed 'dod pa/ /des ni sdig pa'i
bshes gnyen spang bar bya/ /gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod/ /de yis rnyed dang sdug dang mi sdug dang / /grags dang mtshang 'dru phrag dog nga spangs te/ /
sangs rgyas ye shes rtag tu btsal bar bya/ /yul 'khor skyong / bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos te/ /bzhi
gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong / shes pas mngon par rlom sems su byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor
skyong / phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa'i sems byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong / ma mos pa byang
chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong / yongs su ma dag pa'i shes pa dang / bzod pa'i longs
spyod yongs su tshol ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong / bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /gang dag sa la chos ni 'dzin gyur cing //
'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang mchod 'gyur ba/ /de la mi shes pas ni brnyas byed na/ /des na de ni sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnyed/ /yang bas ni gang zhig longs spyod tshul/ /
shes pa ma dag rtag tu 'dun cing 'dod/ /gang zhig rtag tu nga rgyal khengs gyur la/ /bla ma 'phags pa'i skye bo mi 'dud cing / /sangs rgyas la yang mos pa yod min
la| |chos dang tshogs la de ni mos pa med/ /bslab dang sbyangs pa rnams la de mi mos/ /sdig pa'i blo can ngan song gsum phyogs pa/ /de ni mi nang 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ /
las kyi dbang gis mi mkhas rnam par rmongs/ /dmyal ba'am 'on te dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ /yi dwags 'gro ba rnams su sdug bsngal rnyed/ /gang zhig 'jig rten
sgron 'gyur blo ldan zhing / mi yi dpa' bo sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa/ /de yis ngan song lam rnams rab spangs te/ /byang chub lam ni rtag tu bsten par bya// //bam po gnyis
pa| |yul 'khor skyong / bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol la brnyes pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
'ching ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i thabs kyis bsgom pa la sbyor ba dang / mtshan ma'i 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / kun 'dzin pa'i sems
dang ldan pa dang / ye shes dang bral ba dang / bag med pa la brten par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / phyir 'brang ba'i sems kyis khyim la 'dris par byed pa
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong / bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /rtag tu gzhan dag la ni brnyas byed cing / /rtag tu 'jig rten pa yis bsam gtan sgom/ /ltar gyur 'di dag gis
ni de bcings te/ /glang po lus ring 'dam du song ba bzhin/ /khyim la 'dris byed 'ching dang ldan pa dang / /gang zhig bag med rtag tu kun 'dzin sems/ /ye shes spangs
shing blo gros rmongs gyur pa/ /mi rigs spyod pa 'di dag rnams kyis bcings/ /gang zhig sdug bsngal 'jig pa 'di dag dang / /skye rga
na 'chi la sogs las grol 'dod/ /brnyas par byed dang rlom sems bor nas ni/ /byang chub lam la rtag tu brtson par 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal mtha' yas ma
lus bzod bya ste/ /bde ba kun la chags pa med gyur nas/ /sdug dang mi sdug gnyen pa ma lus btang / /brtan pa dag ni sdig bral sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /pha rol
phyin drug sa dang yon tan dang / /stobs dang dbang po dag dang shes la sbyor/ /yon tan kun dang rtag tu ldan gyur nas/ /'gro ba'i dra ba grol ba'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /
bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab sngon spyad tshe/ /sems can phan phyir byang chub mchog don du/ /sbyin dang dul dang de la rtag tu spyad/ /gnyen pa spangs nas bde bar gnas par
'gyur| |bas mtha'i nags su rtag par nga dga' ste/ /byang chub ched du bsam pa rnam par sbyang / /brgya lam na yang brtson 'grus nyams ma gyur/ /skyes chen rnams kyi ye shes
de 'dra'o/ /srid pa'i brtson rar 'gro ba lnga 'khyams pas/ /sems can 'khyams pa'i 'gro ba mthong nas ni/ /sngon chad 'dir ni snying rje rgya chen bskyed/ /'gro ba'i
don du byang chub dam pa bsgrubs/ /bskal pa mang por byang chub mchog tshol zhing / /rang gi bu pho bu mo chung ma sdug /phangs pa'i srog dang shin tu 'byor pa dang / /grong khyer nor
dang 'bru rnams mang po btang / /me tog 'bras bu chu 'byor nyams dga' ba'i/ /nags su thub pa nga ni bzod dgar gyur/ /sum mtshan rgyal pos lag pa rkang pa bcad/ /de tshe
nga ni sdang ba'i yid ma gyur/ /nags dang sul na sngo bsangs zhes bya ba'i/ /thub pas bla ma rgos pa gso ba na/ /mi yi dbang pos sra ba'i mdas bsnan kyang / /yid ni yongs su
gnod par sems ma gyur/ /legs par gsungs pa'i ched du g.yang sa nas/ /lus la ma bltas rab tu mchongs par gyur/ /nga ni byang chub mchog gi rgyu yi phyir/ /lus dang
srog la bltas par ma gyur to/ /stag mo bu dang bcas pa'i srog gi phyir/ /lus btang nas ni stag mi tshim par byas/ /nam mkha' las ni lha yi tshogs rnams kyis/ /skyes
chen brtson 'grus bstan pa legs zhes bsgrags/ /gang tshe sngon chad srid par spyod pa na/ /sbyin la rab dga' bram ze khye'ur gyur tshe/ /rin chen ched du rgya mtsho bskams
nas ni| |nor bu rnyed nas sems can bde bar byas/ /rgyal bo zla nga'i bu zhes byar gyur te/ /brjod pa grags shing nga ni spyod pa'i tshe/ /nga yis bden pa'i tshul gyis rgyal po
brgya| |bsad par byas pa myur du thar par byas/ /dbul zhing sdug bsngal ba yi mi mthong nas/ /nga yis phangs pa'i lus ni btang byas
te| |nga yis nor rnyed de ni phyug por byas/ /de tshe nga ni kun spyin rgyal por gyur/ /nga 'dir mi yi rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe/ /skyabs su 'ongs pa'i phug ron mthong
nas ni| |rang gi lus las sha yang bcad byas te/ /rang lus ngas btang 'jigs pas phongs ma btang / /rgyal po ral pa can zhes sngon gyur tshe/ /sman pa
mchog gis nga yi ched du ni/ /mtshungs med sman rnams ma lus sbyar ba yang / /srog btang nas ni de dag gzhan la byin/ /'gro ba'i don phyir sngon chad spyod pa
na| |rgyal bu mche ba bzang zhes byar gyur tshe/ /chung ma ma dris khyo las mi 'phyo ba/ /bur bcas bu mo ma chags ma bltas btang / /gang tshe brtson 'grus 'bar
zhes byar gyur tshe/ /nga sngon lo ni stong du tshang bar yang / /bya dka' brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bzod par byas/ /nor dang dpal yang sngon chad ngas btang ngo / /rgyal bu
gzi brjid dri ma med gyur tshe/ /nga yis rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod rten bdun/ /mchog tu gus pas lus la me btang ste/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba rnams la
mchod pa byas/ /nga ni rgyal po zla 'od gyur ba'i tshe/ /mi bzad mig can khros par gyur na ni/ /de yis nga yi mgo bo bslangs pa na/ /de tshe nga yis mgo bo bcad de
byin| |nga ni bsod nams mnyam zhes byar gyur tshe/ /grong dang grong khyer dag dang lam srang sgo/ /thams cad du yang rgya cher sman gyi rnams/ /de dag sems can don
phyir ngas bzhag go /srid pa rnams na spyod pa gang gi tshe/ /nga sngon rgyal po dge bar gyur pa na/ /bud med gzugs bzang gser dang mu tig gis/ /lus brgyan stong dag
ngas ni btang ba byas/ /gang tshe nga sngon mi yi rgyal po ni/ /rin chen gtsug phud gyur tshe me tog dang / /spos mchog rnams dang gser gyis brgyan pa yi/ /cod pan dpal
ldan dam pa ngas btang ngo / /nga sngon rgyal po mos ldan gyur pa'i tshe/ /shing bal 'dab ma 'jam pa lta bu dang / /pad+ma'i 'dab mnyen lta bur 'jam gzhon pa'i/ /lag
ba rkang pa dag kyang ngas btang ngo / /ded dpon seng+ge 'dzin du gyur pa na/ /snying rje med cing mi bzad rab gtum pa/ /srin mo brgya dag shin tu tshar bcad nas/ /rgya shug
gling du mi rnams bkod par gyur/ /gang tshe mig bzang zhes byar gyur pa na/ /byis pa 'dod dang ldan zhing yid rmongs pa/ /srin mo dag la na chung 'du shes pa/ /tshong pa
lnga brgya de dag thar par byas/ /gang tshe bsod nams 'od zer gyur pa na/ /lha yi bu mo lta bu'i gzugs ldan pa'i/ /bud med bye ba phrag
bzhi spangs nas su/ /rgyal ba'i bstan pa la ni rab tu byung / /sems can don phyir nga ni spyod pa na/ /dri med dag pa'i gser gyi mdog can gyi/ /rgyal por gang tshe
nga ni gyur pa na/ /sor mo dra bas 'brel ba rgya chen btang / /rgyal po ut+pal mig ces byar gyur tshe/ /pad+ma sngon po bzang po'i mdog 'dra'i mig /yid du 'ong zhing snying
du sdug gyur pa/ /'gro ba'i don du nga yis btang ba byas/ /sman pa'i rgyal po skra 'drar gyur pa'i tshe/ /sdug dang bral bas nyen pa mthong nas ni/ /bud med cha byad
gzugs dang blo nyams pa/ /ngas ni snying rjes yongs su thar par byas/ /sngon gyi srid par kun mthong gyur pa na/ /nad kyis btab pa nad pa'i mi mthong nas/ /nga yis rang
gi khrag kyang byin gyur te/ /mi de ngas ni nad dang bral bar byas/ /rgyal po me tog bzang zhes bya gyur tshe/ /nga yis lus las rus pa phyung nas ni/ /nad kyis rid par gyur
la rkang byin te/ /ngas ni nam yang sems can ma btang ngo / /rgyal po don grub ces byar sngon gyur tshe/ /rang gi mdzod rnams thams cad ngas btang zhing / /phangs shing yid
du 'ong ba'i srog btang ste/ /phongs par gyur pa'i mi ni thar par byas/ /rgyal po phyogs kyi tog tu gyur pa'i tshe/ /byang chub 'dod nas 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir/ /'khor lo'i
mtshan can pad+ma lta bu yi/ /lag pa phrugs kyang mi blta rab tu byin/ /rgyal po thams cad mthong du gyur pa'i tshe/ /snying rje ldan zhing 'gro don phan 'dod de/ /skyes pa bud med
dag gis rgyas pa yi/ /gling bzhi pa yang ngas ni btang bar byas/ /rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes ldan gyur tshe/ /'jam zhing mnyen la dri med dkar ba'i brla/ /dga' zhing mgu
ba'i yid kyis bcad nas ni/ /rang gi sha dang khrag kyang ngas byin no/ /bud med gzugs ldan zhes ni byar gyur tshe/ /bud med bkres skom nyam thag ngas mthong nas/ /
gser ltar ser zhing shin tu gzhon pa yin/ /nu ma snying du sdug pa gnyi ga btang / /rgyal po dpal grags zhes byar gyur pa na/ /shin tu nyams dga' ba yi rgyan mchog
dang / /rin chen du ma gos dang shing rta bzhin/ /gtang bar dka' ba rnam pa du ma dang / /rgyal po byas pa gzo bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /rgya mtsho las ni byas pa mi gzo bsgral/ /
rin chen phyir ni de yis nga mig phyung / /'on kyang nga la khros pa'i sems med do/ /srog chags go d+har sngon srid gyur pa'i tshe/ /grog sbur dag ni 'chi bar gyur dogs
nas| |lus kyi dam pa ma bltas btang bar byas/ /de tshe nga yi sems ni g.yo ba med/ /spyad pa spyod tshe bya sreg gyur pa na/ /rgan la bsnyen bkur bya bar rtag dga' ste/ /nga
ni rim gro gus la rab tu dga'/ /nga rgyal ldan pa ma yin khengs pa med/ /skyabs su 'ongs pa'i don phyir nga yis ni/ /snying rje bskyed pa byas nas lus btang ste/ /gdol pa mi yis mda' rnams bsnun

kyang ni/ /spre'u gyur ngas ni mi de ma btang ngo / /rgyal po dbang du gyur tshe nga yis ni/ /glang po bla ma rgan dran lus bskams te/ /shin tu yid 'ong zas kyang ngas ma zos/ /de tshe glang po bdag nyid thar bar gyur//
bgrod dka' gangs can ri la dred dbang gyur/ /nga yis zhag bdun bar du bsrungs pa'i mi/ /de yis gsod pa nga la btang byas kyang / /ngas ni de tshe khong khro byas pa med/ /kha ba kun da 'dra
ba'i glang por gyur/ /byang chub mchod rten sangs rgyas yon tan tshol/ /dug dang bcas pa'i mda' yis bsnun kyang ni/ /mche ba dam pa byin gyi khros pa med/ /dum bu'i gling du nags tshal spyod
yul ba/ /sreg pa'i phrug gu byams la gnas gyur tshe/ /mthong ba tsam gyis me de zhi gyur nas/ /lha tshogs dag gis me tog rnams kyang gtor/ /ri dwags gyur tshe gang+gA'i
rlabs shugs kyis/ /khyer ba zhig ni nga yis bsgral byas pa/ /de yis gsod phyir nga gan khrid de 'ongs/ /'on kyang nga ni de la yid ma khros/ /rgya mtsho'i dbus su son te
mgon med pa/ /tshong pa lnga brgya dag ni bsgral byas nas/ /bkres pa de dag rnams kyis bsad gyur tshe/ /rus sbal skye gnas gyur kyang byams dang ldan/ /nga ni byang
chub spyad pa spyod pa na/ /sngon chad chu na rgyu ba'i nyar gyur tshe/ /sems can phan phyir nga yis lus btang ste/ /srog chags brgya stong dag gis zos par gyur/ /srog chags
nges par gang tshe gyur pa na/ /nad brgyas gzir ba'i 'gro ba mthong nas ni/ /lus ni sman lta bur yang bsgyur byas te/ /sems can bde zhing nad kyang med par byas/ /
ri dwags rgyal po seng+ger gyur pa'i tshe/ /mthu stobs ldan par gyur cing snying rje ldan/ /mda' yis bsnun kyang khros pa'i sems med de/ /de tshe gsod la nga yis byams pa
byas| |dung dang ba mo lta bu'i rta rgyal du/ /nga sngon rgya mtsho'i dogs su gyur pa'i tshe/ /srin mo'i nang du song ba'i tshong pa rnams/ /nga yis snying brtse snying rje bskyed nas bsgral/ /
'gro ba'i don du byang chub spyad spyod tshe/ /'dab chags kun lar ni nga gyur tshe/ /'dod pa'i yon tan nyes pa mang spangs nas/ /bud med dbang du nga ni song ma gyur/ /gel
ba'i nags gnas ri bong gyur pa'i tshe/ /legs spyad ri bong tshogs gyur de la bstan/ /thub pa gnas la gnas pa bkres phongs pa/ /de yi ched du ngas ni lus kyang
btang / /sdong po me tog 'bras rgyas ne tso'i tshe/ /sdong po bskams kyang ngas ni de ma btang / /de tshe brgya byin byas gzos sang mthong nas/ /sdong po de
ni lo 'bras rgyas par byas/ /nga ni spra yi rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe/ /mi yi rgyal po klu yis yul bcom ste/ /spra yi tshogs la gnod pa byung mthong nas/ /rgyal
po'i 'jigs las de dag ngas bton no/ /nga sngon ne tsor gyur te pha ma'i phyir/ /sA lu blangs tshe mi yis bzung nas ni/ /ne tso ci phyir nga yi sA lu len/ /lo tog
smin 'di ma rungs byar sems sam/ /ne tso des smras bzang po gsan du gsol/ /bdag ni rku bas khyod kyi 'bras mi len/ /pha ma rgan rgon gnyis ni gso ba'i phyir/ /de
la snying rjes bdag gis sA lu blangs/ /gang tshe thog ma sa bon 'dabs pa'i tshe/ /'gro ba kun la cha shas sbyin no zhes/ /de skad tshig smras de ni bdag thos te/ /des na bdag
ni rku ba gzhar mi 'gyur/ /ne tso legs so sA lu ci dgar khyer/ /sri zhu 'di ni mi yi nang na dkon/ /khyod ni mi yin nga 'dir dud 'gro yin/ /legs so khyod ni dul
zhing yang dag bsdams/ /byang chub rdul bral dam pa tshol ba na/ /sngon chad spyod pa de la sogs pa rnams/ /spyad pa'i tshe na dka' ba brgya la yang / /nga yi yid ni
skyo bar gyur pa med/ /nang gi dag gam 'on te phyir yang rung / /nga yis dngos po ma btang gang yang med/ /tshul khrims bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang / /bsam gtan thabs
dang shes rab ngas spyad do/ /sha dang pags pa de bzhin rkang dang khrag /de dag rang gi lus las sbyin pa byas/ /bas mtha' dag dang phug na rgyu ba'i tshe/ /ngas ni de tshe lus ni bskams
bar byas/ /gang la sbyar na rgyal bar 'gyur ba yi/ /sbyangs pa gang dag rgyal bas bstan mdzad pa/ /sbyangs pa de la rtag tu rab brtson te/ /sngon spyad tshe na nga ni rtag tu 'jug /spyod
pa'i tshe na nga yis gang bsten pa/ /brtul zhugs rgya chen de 'dra de dag dang / /spyod pa 'di thos nas ni de dag rnams/ /tshig gcig la yang 'dun par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di thos
gyur nas de yi tshe na ni/ /bstan pa 'di nyid la ni 'phya bar 'gyur/ /de dag zas dang 'khrig pa lhur len cing / /rtag tu gnyid non khab ltar g.yo ngan 'gyur/ /rtag tu 'phags
pa ma yin chos la sdang / /bstan pa sun 'byin byed cing yon tan nyams/ /zhi ba'i chos 'di thos par gyur pa na/ /'di ni rgyal bas gsungs pa min zhes 'dzer/ /nga yi slob
dpon thos pa rgya mtshor gyur/ /mang du thos pa smra ba'i gtso bo yi/ /de yis 'di ni rnam pa ji ltar yang / /sangs rgyas bka' ma yin zhes dgag pa byas/ /pha rol las kyang rgan
par gyur de yi/ /bla ma de ni dpag med yon tan chung / /des kyang 'di ni blang ba ma byas kyi/ /'di lam 'jug pa 'di ni nor ba yin/ /gang la
bdag yod ma yin srog med dang / /rnam pa cis kyang gang zag med bstan pa/ /tshul khrims sbyor dang sdom pa'i bya ba la/ /gang 'bad de yi ngal ba don med 'gyur/ /
gal te rdeg pa chen po yod na ni/ /'di la bdag dang sems can shed skyes med/ /gang la bdag dang sems can mi dmigs pa/ /de la bdag gis ngal byas don
med 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i blo dang mu stegs ngan mtshungs pas/ /rang gi blo yis rang bzo byed pa ste/ /dge slong 'khor gyi nang du rgyal ba ni/ /tshig 'di gsung bar
nam yang mi 'gyur ro/ /ngo tsha khrel dang 'dzem dang bral ba dang / /khwa ltar spyi rtol che la rgod gtum zhing / /phrag dog nga rgyal rgyags pas tshig pa yi/ /dge slong dag
ni nga yi bstan la 'byung / /lag pa dang ni rkang pa rdob byed cing / /chos gos gra rnams kyang ni dkyog par byed/ /chos gos thogs shing chang dang rgyags myos nas/ /
grong dang khyim dag tu ni rnam par rgyu/ /de dag sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni/ /khyim na gnas pa'i skye bo sten par byed/ /bstan pa yon tan phung po 'di spangs
nas| |de dag rtag tu 'phrin yig 'khyer bar byed/ /de dag ba lang rta dang bong bu dang / /de dag phyugs dang bran mo bran pho bsrel/ /zhing gi las dang tshong gi sbyor pa la/ /brtson
yid ldan zhing rtag tu 'phags ma yin/ /de dag 'phags min tshigs kyang mi smra med/ /bya ba ma yin pa yang gang yang med/ /de dag rnams la mchod rten nor dang ni/ /dge
'dun gyi dang gang zag nor dang mtshungs/ /dge slong yon tan 'byor pa mthong nas ni/ /de dag la yang mi snyan rjod byed de/ /tshul khrims 'chal pa slu ba zhugs nas ni/ /bud
med 'jigs byed mi bzad rab ces brjod/ /rab tu byung ba de dag brkam pa ltar/ /khyim pa 'dod pas brkam pa de lta min/ /khyim pa mtshungs pa de dag chung ma dang / /bu
dang bu mo dag kyang yod par 'gyur/ /gang gi khyim du de dag chos gos dang / /lus dang longs spyod dag gis bsnyen bkur bya/ /de yi chung ma la ni yongs chags shing / /nyon
mongs dbang 'gro rtag tu 'phags pa min/ /'dod pa 'di dag bsten bya ma yin te/ /dud 'gro yi dwags dmyal bar lhung byed ces/ /de dag khyim pa rnams la rtag smra zhing / /
de dag bdag nyid ma dul nyer zhi min/ /ji ltar de dag bdag nyid ma dul ba/ /de dag slob ma tshogs kyang rab ma dul/ /kha zas dag kyang 'khrig pa'i gtam rnams la/ /de
dag nyin dang mtshan du bgro bar byed/ /bstan pa'i phyir gyi yon tan phyir min te/ /de dag la ni de dag bsdu ba sbyin/ /'gro las rtag 'dir
mchod pa thob snyam nas/ /rang gi slob ma'i tshogs kyis bdag kyang bskor/ /de dag skye bo rnams la smra ba ni/ /bdag gis snying rjes 'di dag sdud byed kyi/ /slob ma'i tshogs
de dag las nam yang ni/ /rim gro don du gnyer ba med ces smra/ /de la nad kyis non dang mdze can mang / /lus la sha kra can dang gzugs mi sdug /rtag tu 'phags
min mi dag kha cig kyang / /'ongs shing lhag pa rab tu 'byin par 'gyur/ /lung nod pa dang sdom pa rnam par nyams/ /de dag dge slong yon tan rtag mi brtson/ /de dag
khyim pa ma yin dge slong min/ /de dag spangs pa dur khrod shing dang mtshungs/ /de dag so sor thar dang bslab pa dang / /'dul ba la yang gus par byed mi 'gyur/ /de dag
rang nyams rang dbang 'gro ba ste/ /lcags kyo btang ba'i glang po'i dbang po 'dra/ /de dag nags su gnas par gyur kyang ni/ /sems ni grong du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ste/ /
nyon mongs me yis rtag tu rab gdungs la/ /de dag sems kyang gnas pa med par 'gyur/ /de dag sangs rgyas yon tan thams cad dang / /bslab dang sbyangs dang thabs
kyang brjed nas ni/ /rgyags dang nga rgyal grags pa yongs rgyas te/ /de dag mi zad mnar med lhung bar 'gyur/ /de dag rgyal po'i gtam la rtag dga' zhing / /kun po'i gtam
brjod pa la'ang rtag tu dga'/ /nye du bsten la'ang rab tu dga' ba ste/ /de dag nyin dang mtshan du sems par byed/ /bsam gtan dang ni kha ton btang nas su/ /rtag tu
gtsug lag khang gi las la brtson/ /gnas la bkram zhing khro gnyer 'byin par byed/ /de dag slob ma 'khor kyang ma dul ba/ /nga ni gtsug lag khang gi lag gi bla/ /bdag
gi ched du 'di ni ngas byas te/ /dge slong gang dag nga yi rjes mthun pa/ /gtsug lag khang 'dir de dag gnas yod do/ /gang dag tshul khrims ldan zhing yon tan ldan/ /
chos 'dzin skye bo'i don la mngon brtson la/ /dul zhing yang dag sdom la rtag brtson pa/ /de dag rnams ni sdug par mi byed do/ /'di ni nga yi gnas su bskos pa ste/ /
'di ni nga yi lhan gcig gnas pa yin/ /'di ni nga yi dga' bar byed pa yin/ /khyod kyi gnas ni gang yang med kyi song / /'di ni dge slong dag kyang mang bkod de/ /mal
cha rnams kyang ma lus bgos zin la/ /'di na rnyed pa 'byung ba yod ma yin/ /'dir ni ci zhig spyod kyi dge slong song / /de dag la ni mal stan bgo bya ba/ /nam du'ang srid
par 'byung ba ma yin te/ /de dag khyim pa lta bur gsog 'gyur zhing / /'tshog chas rnams dang g.yog 'khor mang bar 'gyur/ /phyi ma'i dus
na nga yi bu de dag /kun tu smad pa byas par gyur pa ni/ /de dag nga yi tshig ni dran 'gyur te/ /bas mtha' dag dang nags su de tshe gnas/ /kye hud rnyed pas zil non yon
tan sdang / /dge slong mang po gang du byung gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dam pa yi ni bstan pa dag /ring por mi thogs par yang 'jig par 'gyur/ /phyi dus tshul khrims yon
tan ldan pa dag /rtag par yongs su brnyas par 'gyur ba ste/ /de dag grong dang yul 'khor grong khyer rnams/ /spangs nas dgon pa nags su gnas par 'gyur/ /
'byed dang zur zer 'thab mo dga' ba dang / /yon tan nyams la rtag tu bsti stang byed/ /de dag skye ba'i ston par grags gyur te/ /de dag nga rgyal rgyags pas tshig
par 'gyur/ /'dir ni nga yi bstan pa yon tan gter/ /yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog dga' ba/ /'di ni tshul khrims nyams dang phrag dog dang / /rgyags
pa'i skyon rnams kyis ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /ji ltar rin chen 'byung gnas bsubs pa dang / /pad+ma'i rdzing bu yongs su bskams pa dang / /rin chen mchod sdong chag par
gnas pa ltar/ /phyi ma'i dus na bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur/ /phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe na dam pa'i chos/ /rnam par 'jig 'gyur shin tu mi bzad tshe/ /dge slong dul pa ma yin de
'dra ba| |de dag nga yi bstan 'di 'jig pa yin/ /spyod pa 'di la brten par dga' ba rnams/ /de dag bzang 'gro ga la yod de ring / /'di nas shi 'phos yi dwags 'gro ba dang /
dud 'gro'i 'gro dang sems can dmyal bar gnas/ /lo brgya du mar sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa/ /mi bzad drag po nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ /ci ste de yis mi yi lus rnyed
kyang | |rtag tu sdug bsngal mya ngan ldan par 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i spyod pa 'di dag rtag bsten pa/ /long ba'am 'on pa'am zhar bar skye bar 'gyur/ /lus la rtag tu sha bkra
'byung bar 'gyur/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs can mthong na 'jigs par 'gyur/ /gang zhig ya nga'i spyod pa bsten pa ni/ /de dag su yang yid rton mi 'gyur te/ /de yi tshig la
yid ches mi 'gyur zhing / /de ni rtag tu sma 'bab par yang 'gyur/ /de dag nad dang sdug bsngal brgya yis gdungs| /mtshon dang shing dang bong ba rnams kyis bsnun/ /bkres dang
skom pa'i 'jigs pas yongs su gdungs/ /yang na de ni rtag par rab tu brnyas/ /sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa dag thos nas ni/ /nges pa rnams kyi sdig pa'i spyod bor la/ /lag
pa'i spyod la rtag tu brten par gyis/ /'di nas phyin chad 'gyod par gyur te re/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas tshogs dang 'phags tshogs dang / /bslab dang
sbyangs pa'i chos la dga' gyur pa/ /gnyen dang rnyed dang grags brjod spang byos la/ /de ltar rtag tu mngon par brtson par gyis/ /'dus byas 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu dang / /'jig par
'gyur dang rmi lam lta bu dang / /sdug pa kun dang mi ring 'bral 'gyur zhing / /'di la rtag pa gang yang med rtogs la/ /pha rol phyin dang sa dang stobs rnams la/ /rtag tu rab tu
sbyor zhing 'bad par gyis/ /ji srid byang chub mchog sangs ma rgyas pa/ /de srid brtson 'grus nam yang nyams mi bya/ /gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ dang po'o// //
yul 'khor skyong / /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag phal cher la skyon de dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ mi brtson pa dag ni mi brtson pa dag la mchod par 'gyur/
g.yo dang ldan pa dag ni/ g.yo dang ldan pa dag la mchod par 'gyur/ mi shes pa dag ni/ mi shes pa dag la bsti stang byed par 'gyur/ zang zing la
dga' bar 'gyur zhing / chags pa mang ba dang / khyim la ser sna byed pa dang / g.yo dang ldan pa dang / bya khwa ltar mu cor smra ba dang / tshul 'chos pa dang /
nye du lhur len par 'gyur/ phan tshun bsngags pa smra bas rnyed pa sgrub par 'gyur/ rnyed pa yongs su btsal ba'i phyir de dag grong du 'jug gi /sems can yongs su smin par
bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir ma yin par 'gyur/ de dag mi shes bzhin du ji ltar na bdag la pha rol gyis mang du thos pa dang / dge ba'i chos dang
ldan par shes par 'gyur snyam du bdag shes pa dang ldan par khas 'che bar 'gyur/ ji ltar 'dir mi brtson pa de bzhin du zhe sa med par 'gyur/ snod chag pa bzhin du
'gyur/ gcig la gcig 'khrul pa tshol ba dang / sbyor ba nyams pa dang / mi shes pa dang / le lo can dang / phan tshun mi mthun pa'i chos 'gro ba skyed pas ye shes la mi rtog pa mang
ba dang | rang dgar byed pa dang / shar gnyer ba dam pa dang / gnod sems kyis rgyas pa dang / rigs pa ma yin pa'i 'khor gyi skye bo dang 'gro ba byed pas bstan pa 'di la spyod par
'gyur| yongs su mi 'dri ba'i ngang tshul can dang / chos mnyan pa don du mi gnyer bar 'gyur/ mi rigs pa'i spyod pas dbul po'i khyim rnams su skye ba yongs su 'dzin par
'gyur| de dag dbul po'i khyim nas rab tu byung nas rnyed pa tsam gyis bstan pa 'di la dga' ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de dag la nyes pa bshags pa yang med par 'gyur na/
ye shes mngon par rtogs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams bor nas shes kyi khe dang rnyed pa tsam gyis bdag
dge sbyong ngo / /zhes bdag nyid khas 'che bar 'gyur te/ yul 'khor skyong / nga ni/ gang zag de lta bu de dag la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa yang mi smra na/ sangs rgyas kyi
ye shes lta ga la zhig /de dag la ni bde 'gro yang ring na/ byang chub lta smos kyang ci dgos/ yul 'khor skyong / gang zag de lta bu de dag la byang chub kyi bar chad byed
pa'i chos brgyad yod par smra ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ ngan song gsum du skye ba dang / mtha' 'khob pa'i mi'i nang du skye ba dang / dbul po'i khyim du skye ba dang / rigs
dma' bar skye ba dang / mdog ngan cing rtogs pa zhan pa dang / sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang / nang mang ba dang / ya nga ba ma spangs pas 'chi ba'i dus byed
par 'gyur ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong / chos brgyad po de dag ni/ byang chub kyi bar chad byed par brjod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong / tshig gis khas 'che
ba la nga byang chub ces mi smra'o/ /tshul 'chos pa la spyod pa yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /g.yo byed pa la byang chub kyi spyod pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /zang zing lhur
len pa la sangs rgyas la mchod pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal can la shes rab yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /shes rab 'chal pa la the tshom gcod pa zhes
nga mi smra'o/ /ser sna can la bsam pa yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /mi brtson pa mang ba la gzungs thob ces nga mi smra'o/ /yang dag pa'i yon tan ma yin pa yongs su tshol
ba la bde 'gro thob ces nga mi smra'o/ /khyim la ser sna byed pa la lus yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /spyod lam bcos ma can la sangs rgyas dang phrad pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /
khyim la chags pa la ngag yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /ma gus pa la sems yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /tshod mi shes pa la chos 'dod pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /lus
dang srog la lta ba dang bcas pa la chos yongs su tshol ba zhes nga mi smra'o/ /yul 'khor skyong / ji ltar skyes bu blun po de dag la smad pa ltar ston pa drug la de ltar nga mi smod
do| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni/ gzhan du smra la gzhan du byed pa'o/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la slu ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcas pa
'di dag bka' stsal to/ /yang dag ma bsdams rgod cing khengs pa can/ /ma gus nga rgyal ldan zhing chags shas che/ /nyon mongs zil non tha ba nyon mongs bcas/ /de 'dra
dag la byang chub mchog rab ring / /chags bas zil gyis non na le lo 'phel/ /le los zil gyis non na dad pa nyams/ /dad pa nyams na
tshul khrims rab tu nyams/ /tshul khrims 'chal bar gyur na bzang 'gro nyams/ /dbul por gyur pas rab tu byung gyur te/ /mchod pa rnyed nas dbul las grol par
gyur| |de dag gser gyi khur ni bor nas su/ /gso ma'i khur ni len par byed dang mtshungs/ /rnyed pa don du gnyer bas dgon par 'gro/ /der song nas kyang gos dang
nye du tshol/ /mngon shes rig dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs/ /bor nas de ni phyir yang nye du 'dzin/ /rmongs nas nga rgyal dbang gis ngan song sa/ /mi khom 'gro ba rnams
dang dbul po dang / /dma' ba'i rigs su skye dang long ba dang / /mdog ngan pa dang mthu chung de dag 'dzin/ /de dag tshul dang spyod pa yongs nyams dngos/ /bag med rnyed
nas dran pa rab tu nyams/ /g.yang sa chen po mi bzad lhung bar 'gyur/ /de nas bskal pa bye bar thar pa med/ /gal te 'dir ni 'thob pas byang chub na/ /de phyir lhas
sbyin gyis kyang byang chub 'thob/ /rnam par 'thor rlung gis ni bya lhung ltar/ /chags pas kyang ni de ltar mi rigs so/ /bsod nams nyams shing gzhan gyi chung mar
chags| |tshul khrims ma dag dge ba rnams las nyams/ /byang chub sems kyis ye shes gang ma thob/ /de dag bstan la mi dgos dur shing bzhin/ /byang chub don
gnyer sangs rgyas chos tshol ba/ /dper na thar pa de bzhin mi gnas so/ /de ni rnyong gis spre'u la dam byas ltar/ /nga rgyal zil non byang chub de 'dra'o/ /byang chub don
du gnyer bas chos tshig phyir/ /nga yi rang gi srog ni phangs pa'ang btang / /chos de btang nas brtson dang mi ldan pa/ /don med gyur nas bstan las lhung bar 'gyur/ /nga ni
sngon chad legs par bshad don phyir/ /g.yang sa chen po me lce 'bar bar mchongs/ /de thos nas ni sdug dang mi sdug pa/ /thams cad rnam par spangs te nan tan gnas//
bstan pa sna tshogs yon tan 'byor thos la/ /de dag nam yang 'dod pa mi skye na/ /chos min 'dod la byang chub ga la yod/ /dper na long ba lam sel med dang mtshungs//
yul 'khor skyong / sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/ rgya che ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ dpag tu med
pa| tshad med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs
pa| 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
don grub blo zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /yul 'khor skyong / de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo / /yul 'khor skyong / rgyal po 'od
zer ldan ni/ 'dzam bu'i gling dpag tshad khri drug stong la rgyal srid byed do/ /yul 'khor skyong / de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling de na grong khyer nyi khri dang khyim
bye ba phrag stong yod do/ /yul 'khor skyong / rgyal po 'od zer ldan de rgyal po pho brang gang na gnas pa rgyal po 'od zer ldan de'i grong khyer rin po che snang ba zhes bya
pa shar nub tu chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ lho byang du rgyar dpag tshad bdun yod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir ra ba rim pa bdun dang / mig mang ris su bris
pas mdzes par byas pa yod do/ /de'i tshe sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni/ lo bye ba phrag bcu thub par gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong / rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyi bu
bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ de btsas ma thag tu rin
po che sna bdun gyi gter stong byung bar gyur to/ /rgyal po'i khang bzang gi nang du yang rin po che sna bdun gter gyi mi bcu'i tshad tsam byung bar gyur te yul 'khor skyong / rgyal bu
gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer de btsas ma thag tu 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad yid rangs par gyur to/ /sems can gang dag brtson ra na 'khod pa de dag kyang
brtson ra nas thar par gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong / rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer des nyi ma bdun gyis 'jig rten pa'i sgyu rtsal ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rtogs
par gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis nam gyi gung gi dus la bab pa dang / rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la gzhon nu/
khyod bag yod par gyis shig /mi rtag par so sor brtag pa la mkhas par gyis shig /gzhon nu/ mi rnams kyi srog ni/ chen po med pa ste/ tshe 'pho bar 'gro ba yin gyi/ 'jig
rten pha rol la 'jigs par blta bar bya zhing las dang bya ba dang mi 'gal bar gyis shig /ces bskul te/ de'i tshe lha'i bu de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras
so| |gzhon nu bag med par ni gyur ta re/ /bag med dbang du song bar gyur ta re/ /bde bar gshegs pas bag yod rab bstod cing / /bde gshegs rnams kyis bag med rnams
kyang smad/ /nges pa gang dag 'di na bag yod cing / /legs sdom dga' la ser sna byed pa dang / /sems can kun la snying rje byams yid ldan/ /de
dag ring por mi thogs mi mchog 'gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pa gang dag 'das pa dang / /'di na da ltar dag dang gang ma byon/ /de dag thams cad dge ba rnams kyis 'phags
bag yod lam nyid la yang shin tu gnas/ /bza' dang btung dang gos dang kha zas dang / /gser dang dngul dang nor bu mu tig dang / /bskal pa bye bar de dag rnams kyis
btang | |byang chub dam pa 'di ni don du gnyer/ /rkang pa lag pa de bzhin rna ba sna/ /slong ba rnams la rab tu dgos byin na/ /byang chub yon tan kun gyis bsam rdzogs nas//
de dag ring por mi thogs mi mchog 'gyur/ /rgyal srid bde dang sdug pa'i bud med dang / /nor rnams thams cad du yang rnam spangs te/ /'dus byas gang la blta dang sgyu ma
'dras| |'dod pa med par dgon par gnas par gyis/ /srog ni brtan pa med de rtag tu g.yo/ /'dzim pa'i bum pa lta bur 'jig pa can/ /brnyan ma 'dra zhing rtag tu
ther zug min/ /gzhon nu 'di lta rtag med dge ma yin/ /ngan 'gror lhung ba'i tshe na 'di na ni/ /pha dang ma yang 'dzin par byed pa med/ /de yis dge dang mi dge gang byas
ba| |de ni rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i rgyu yis bskal mang rgya mtshor ni/ /don med par yang gcig gis gcig bsad de/ /khyod kyis mi phan ma byas ci yang med/ /
don med nyid du ngal ba bsten par gyur/ /da ltar khyod kyis 'gro phan byang chub zhi/ /mtshungs med go 'phang dam pa btsal ba'i phyir/ /rkang dang sha dang pags pa de bskams kyang / /da lta
na yang khyod ni ngal ma sems/ /bde bar gshegs pa 'byung ba rnyed par dga'/ /zhi ba'i chos thos pa yang shin tu dka'/ /bsgrim pa byas te bdud kyi phyogs bsal na/ /sangs rgyas
ye shes ring por mi thogs thob/ /bshes gnyen bzang la rtag tu yongs brten cing / /sdig pa'i bshes gnyen yongs su spang bar gyis/ /de dag rtag tu bzang lam khrid par byed//
lam gol las kyang rtag tu zlog par byed/ /brtson 'grus shin tu brtan pa legs byos te/ /lus dang srog la 'dod pa rnams spangs nas/ /rdo rje lta bu snying gi bsam gtan
par| |sangs rgyas lam 'di nyid la gnas par gyis/ /sngon gyi mi mchog dam pa 'od byed pa/ /kun kyang go 'phang dam pa bla med pa/ /tshol ba'i tshe na spyod yul dgon par
dga'| |khyod kyang de dag spyod pa'i lam du phyogs/ /dgon par gnas la rtag tu dga' bar gyis/ /pha dang ma dang bu dang sdug pa'i gnyen/ /skye bo snying du sdug pa kun spongs
la| |lus dang srog la sred par ma byed par/ /bde gshegs ye shes rgya chen btsal bar gyis/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal bu
gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis de nas bzung ste lo bcu'i bar du nam yang rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyis non par ma gyur/ nam yang rgod par ma gyur/ rtses par
ma gyur| dga' ba byed par ma gyur/ yongs su spyad par ma gyur/ nam yang skyed mos tshal du ma song / nam yang grogs po mthong nas ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin/ nam
yang glu la dga' bar ma gyur/ rgyal srid dang / nor dang / khyim dang / grong khyer rnams la 'dod pa bskyed par ma gyur te/ de ltar dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar
gcig pur sems shing gnas par gyur to/ /nang du yang dag 'jog lhur len cing 'jig rten la snying po med pa dang / 'jig pa dang / dbugs 'byin pa med pa dang /
mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang / sdug pa dang bral ba dang / byis pa 'drid pa dang / 'khor ba la dga' ba ro bro ba med pa dang / rgyal srid kyi bde ba slu ba'i chos can dang /
srid pa la mngon par dga' bas chog mi shes pa dang / so so'i skye bo nyid rtag tu mi mthun par rnam par sems shing / bdag ni/ byis pa'i skye bo mi brtson pa'i nang
na gnas kyi/ bdag gis cang mi smra bas 'da' bar bya'o/ /snyam nas de phyogs gcig tu cang mi smra bar gyur te/ bag yod pa la sems shing sdug pa dang bral bar gcig
bu gnas par gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir sa phyogs shig tu grong khyer dga' mchog ces bya ba byas te/
lho dang byang gi ngos su lam srang bdun brgya bdun brgya byas so/ /rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas bres pa/ mu tig gi dra ba dang / rin po che'i srog
shing bla re dang ldan pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor to/ /lam srang thams cad kyi sgor yang rin po che'i srog shing stong btsugs so/ /rin po che'i srog shing thams
cad kyang rin po che'i skud pa drug khris sbrel to/ /rin po che'i skud pa thams cad kyang phyogs bzhi nas shing ta la'i phreng ba bye bas sbrel to/ /de dag rlung gis bskyod de
bskul na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rol mo'i sil snyan brgya stong gi sgra snyan pa lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo / /lam srang gi sgo thams cad na bu mo glu mkhas pa/ gar mkhas
pa| dbang po dar la bab pa/ skye bo thams cad kyis spyad pa'i 'os su gyur pa lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do/ /de dag thams cad la rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis khyed nyin mtshan
du glu dang / gar dang / rol mo'i sgras gang dag phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par dga' bar bya zhing / ci nas
gzhon nu dga' bar bya ba'i sems bskyed par bya ba ma gtogs par gtam gzhan ma byed cig /sems can gang la yang yid du mi 'ong ba ma smra zhig /ces
bsgo'o| |lam srang de dag thams cad kyi sgor yang bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la ni/ bza' ba/ btung ba 'dod par nams la ni/ btung ba/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni/
bzhon pa nas gos dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mal dang / rgyab rten dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams dang / gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang /
bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul sil ma dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / ba lang dang / nor dang / rgyan thams cad
byin zhing / skye bo thams cad kyi yongs su spyad pa'i phyir rin po che'i phung po yang bzhag par gyur to/ /de'i tshe grong khyer gyi dbus su gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir khyim khor
yug tu dpag tshad tsam yod pa/ rin po che na bdun mig mang ris su bris pa/ rta babs brgyas rab tu brgyan pa byas so/ /de'i nang du khang bzang zhig byas te/ der gzhon
nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir mal bye ba phrag bzhi bshams so/ /de'i dbus su skyed mos tshal byas te me tog gi shing ljon pa thams cad dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa thams cad
dang | rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyis khyab par bkod do/ /yul 'khor skyong / skyed mos tshal de'i dbus su rin po che thams cad kyi rdzing rin po che sna bzhi'i them skas
dang ldan pa byas pa 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel lo/ /gang nas spos chu 'bab pa'i seng+ge'i kha brgya rtsa brgyad btsugs so/ /rdzing de'i seng+ge'i kha brgya rtsa
brgyad po de nas kyang chu 'bab bo/ /me tog ut+pal dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po rnams rtag par rgyun du rgyas so/ /khor yug tu rin po che'i shing ljon pas yongs su
bskor to/ /dus thams cad pa'i me tog dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis kyang yongs su rgyas so/ /rdzing de'i 'gram du rin po che'i shing ljon pa brgyad brgyad bskyed de/
rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyang rin po che'i skud pa rnams kyis sprel cing thams cad du yang shing ta la'i phreng ba bye bas sbrel to/ /de dag kyang rlung gis bskyod cing
rlung gis bsgul na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rol mo'i sil snyan brgya stong blangs pa lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo / /gzhon nu'i lus la sa dang rdul gyis reg tu 'ong ngo / /zhes rdzing de'i
steng rin po che'i dra bas bkab par gyur to/ /de'i tshe khang bzang der rin po che sna bdun gyi khri bye ba phrag bzhi bshams te/ khri thams cad kyi steng
du yang ras bcos bu lnga brgya lnga brgya bting bar gyur to/ /gang du rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer 'dug par gyur pa'i khri rin po che sna bdun las byas pa 'phang du
mi bdun tsam yod pa bshams pa dbus ma der ras bcos bu bye ba khrag brgyad cu rtsa bdun bting bar gyur to/ /khri thams cad kyi drung du yang pog por nas a ga rus
bdugs shing / nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du me tog 'grem par byed do/ /gser gyi lda ldi bres so/ /gser gyi pad+ma rab tu dpyangs so/ /mu tig dang nor bu'i dra bas
bres so| |nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyis snang bar byas so/ /rin po che'i dra ba brgyad khri rab tu dpyangs so/ /rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad la yang ba dan brgya brgya dpyangs so//
skyed mos tshal kun tu yang nor bu rin po che'i 'od dpag tshad tsam yod pa 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu bzhag par gyur te/ de dag gi 'od kyis 'jig rten thams cad snang bar
gyur to| |yul 'khor skyong / skyed mos tshal de na bya'i tshogs mi'i skad du smra ba ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khrung khrung dang / khu byug dang / rma bya dang / ngang pa dang / ngur pa dang /
kun la dang / ka la ping+ka dang / shang shang te'u rnams 'khod do/ /de dag skad 'byin cing sgra sgrog pa na dga' tshal gyi lha rnams rgyags par 'gyur pa lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo / /gzhon
nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir ro'i rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa ro rnam pa lnga brgya ba'i kha zas rnams rtag par rgyun du bshams par gyur to/ /de'i tshe gzhon nu lo bcu
drug lon pa nyi shu lon pa'i shed dang ldan pa dag grong khyer thams cad nas bsdus nas grong khyer der btsud do/ /thams cad kyang bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas kyi
bya ba shes pa/ thams cad kyang 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba dang / 'tshog chas kyi bya ba shes pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu grong khyer der btsud par gyur to/ /pha ma gnyis kyis de
la bu mo bye ba byin no/ /nye du'i tshogs kyis bye ba dang / grong rdal ba'i mis bye ba dang / rgyal po thams cad kyis bu mo bye ba byin par gyur te/ de dag thams cad gzugs
bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang na tshod lo bcu drug lon pa glu mkhas pa/ rol mo'i sgra mkhas pa/ gar mkhas pa/ rgod mkhas pa/
skyes bu'i gan du 'gro mkhas pa/ drang ba/ gzhon pa/ mnyen pa/ yan lag 'jam pa/ gsong por smra ba/ bzhin 'dzum pa/ tshul mkhas pa/ sgyu rtsal thams cad kyi bya
ba la mkhas pa/ ha cang yang mi ring ba/ ha cang yang mi thung ba/ ha cang yang mi skem pa/ ha cang yang mi sbom pa/ ha cang yang mi dkar ba/ ha cang
yang mi sngo ba/ kha nas me tog ut+pa la'i bsung 'byung ba/ lus rnams las tsan+dan gyi dri 'byung ba/ lha'i bu mo ltar gsal ba/ shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i tshul dang ldan pa/
glu dbyangs len pa de dag gi nang na rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gnas so/ /glu dbyangs dang rol mo'i sgra de la kye ma'o bdag dang mi mdza' ba'i tshogs chen po
dang / bdag gi dge ba'i chos yongs su nyams par byed pa byung ste/ blta bar mi bya'o/ /snyam pa'i sems bskyed do/ /de de'i tshe 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gsad par bya ba'i mis
gshed ma mthong na/ ngo mtshar gyi sems mi bskyed pa de bzhin du rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer yang bud med de dag mthong na/ ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin to/ /grong khyer
de la yang grogs dang lhan gcig ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin to/ /lo bcu po de dag gi bar du bdag nam zhig na mi mdza' ba'i tshogs rnams pa 'di lta bu'i nang nas thar par 'gyur
snyam pa dang / bdag nam zhig na bag yod pa'i spyad pa spyod cing des bdag thar par 'gyur zhig gu snyam pa de lta bu'i sems 'jug pa ma gtogs par nam yang gzugs
kyi mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur te/ de bzhin du sgra'i mtshan ma dang / dri'i mtshan ma dang / ro'i mtshan ma dang / reg gi mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur to/ /de nas bu mo de dag gis
rgyal po 'od zer ldan la lha/ gzhon nu ni/ mi rol to/ /dgyes par mi mdzad do/ /dgyes rgur mi spyod do/ /zhes smras so/ /bam po gsum pa ste/ tha ma/ yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal
po 'od zer ldan rgyal po brgyad khri dang lhan cig tu rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer ga la ba der song ste phyin nas gdong las mchi ma 'dzag cing lus 'dar te mya
ngan gyis sa la 'gyel to/ /de sa las langs nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bu gcig rin chen dam pa nga la ltos shing smros//
nga ni mya ngan gzir te khyim nang sa la 'gyel/ /su yis khyod mi dga' byas de myur nga la smros/ /de 'dir de'u re chad pa chen pos gcad par bya/ /khyed kyi ched du ngas 'dir
yid kyis gang smras pa/ /lha yi khyim ltar nyams dga' grong khyer der ltos shig /'di la yan lag ma tshang ci yod de myur smros/ /brgya byin lta bu'i 'byor pa de ring khyod
la bstan/ /pad+ma'i mig can mig mdzes mya ngan nyam thag pa/ /lha yi bu mo lta bu'i bud med tshogs smra ltos/ /mya ngan thul te de dag rnams dang de ring rtses/ /ci phyir zug
rngus zug bzhin lus dman sems shing 'dug /de dag rab dga' tshul mkhas dbyangs kyi yan lag snyan/ /glu dbyangs pheg rdob dus kyi
rnam par nges pa shes/ /khyod dga' dus la deng bab mya ngan ma byed cig /pad+ma rnying pa lta bur ci phyir deng lus dman/ /me tog 'bras bu yal ga 'dab rgyas skyed
mos tshal/ /sna tshogs stong bzhag lha yi sna tshogs shing rta 'dra/ /soms shig khyod kyi na tshod 'di ni thog ma yin/ /dga' ba'i dus la bab kyi deng 'dir bu dga'
gyis| |khyod kyi khrus chen rdzing 'di lha rnams kyi yang 'dra/ /ut+pa la dang pad+ma dag gi tshal gyis gang / /pad+ma rnams kyang bung ba rgyags pa mchog gis brgyan/ /de la
bu soms su zhig 'di la dga' mi byed/ /ngang pa rma bya ne tso khu byug ri skegs dang / /ka la ping+ka shang shang te'u dang kun la/ /yid 'ong sgra ldan gang nye spos ngad ldang
'dra ba| |thos nas mi gang 'di la dga' ba thob mi 'gyur/ /gzhal med khang dag mu tig dra ra bcas nor bu btsugs/ /gser dang bai DUR+Ya spras rnam rgyal khang pa
'dra| |rin chen khri mchog dam pa rnams kyang rab bting ba/ /gser dril g.yer ka ta la'i phreng ba sgra snyan pa/ /zab cing brtan pa mchog gi sil snyan sgra bsgrags
pa| |khyod kyi ched du srang rnams su yang sbyin rgya che/ /bu mo stong dag glu mchog snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa/ /dga' tshal lha yi bu mo rnams kyi 'dra ba sgrog /mtho ris 'dra ba'i
gnas yid 'ong la ci yi phyir/ /rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems kyis 'di la dga' mi byed/ /gzhon nu khyod kyi rtsed grogs lta bu'i bu 'dra ba/ /bu mo de dag rnams dang lhan
cig rtsed mo gyis/ /khyod kyi pha dang ma yang mchi mas brnangs shing 'dug /skye bo 'di la sdug bsngal snying rje med dam ci/ /'dus byas yid byung dor ba'i longs spyod don mi
gnyer| |yon tan bsags pa srid pa'i skyon mthong des smras pa/ /'khor ba'i dra bar chud pa'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas/ /thar pa don gnyer pha la smras pa yab gson cig /
lha cig sus kyang bdag la mi dga' bgyis ma mchis/ /bdag ni de ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan mos ma lags/ /nyon mongs gang dag ngan 'gro'i g.yang sar lhung byed pa//
sdug pa thams cad dgra dang mtshungs te rjes mi srung / /mi mkhas bus pa skye bo bud med de dag dga'/ /bdud kyi zhags pa yon tan 'ching ba g.yang sa che/ /rtag tu 'phags
ba'i skye bos de dag de ltar smad/ /sems dmyal ngan 'gro mya ngan rtsa ba ci phyir bstan/ /bud med 'di dag pags pa'i gzugs kyis dga' ba tsam/ /bdag ni rus rgyus
'khrul 'khor mi gtsang don mi gnyer/ /khrag dang gcin dang mi gtsang ba dang dri ma 'dzag /gsal bar dur khrod 'dra la ji ltar dga' bar bgyi||
glu dang gar dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra gzung mi bgyi/ /dga' ba rmi lam 'dra ba mi mkhas rmongs par bgyid/ /kun tu rtog pa sred gyur mi mkhas 'di brlag gi /ci phyir byis
pa'i skye bo lta bur nyon mongs khol/ /shing lcug 'di dag thams cad dgun gyi dus byung na/ /dgon dung shing ltar 'gyur te dga' bar 'gyur ma lags/ /mi rtag 'di yis
dpa' rnams thams cad bshig gyur te/ /srog g.yor gyur kyang gti mug gis ni bag med gyur/ /sems kyi rgya mtsho lta bur tshim par byed mi nus/ /srid par rab tu 'phel
la dga' bas phyir zhing 'dod/ /'dod rgyus phan tshun gsod pa'i 'gro ba bltas nas su/ /'dir ni ji ltar lhun po rlung gis mi bskyod bzhin/ /rgyal po khyod dang pha dang lhan
cig skyes pa dang / /gnyen gyi skye bo chung ma ngan song bdag skyabs min/ /bdag cag thams cad rtswa rtse'i zil pa 'dra ba ste/ sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar ma gyur bag
yod mdzod/ /mi dbang dar la bab pa mi rtag cir mi rung / /srog kyang ri yi chu ltar myur 'gro cir mi rung / /'dus byas 'di zad glog sprin 'dra ste cir mi rung / /rgyal po mkhas la
srid gsum 'dod la chags pa ngan/ /lha rnams kyis ni bdag la bag yod 'gyur gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' yul la chags pa min zhes bskul/ /'jig rten phan pa'i snying
brtse sangs rgyas 'dir 'gyur bgyi/ /rgyal po bag med spyod la byang chub yod ma lags/ /rgyal po gang zhig 'dod pas g.yen spyo sems 'khol ba/ /de ni bsod nams chud za
dga' zhing mtho ris ldog /'tshe ba shin tu rgyags pa nam yang spyad mi bgyi/ /skon par bcug pa'i bya ltar ji ltar dbugs phyin 'gyur/ /khams rnams sbrul dang 'dra zhing phung
po gshed ma 'dra/ /zag dang bcas pa'i sems ni don med grong stong mtshungs/ /rgyal po 'di ni dug sdong me tog rgyas 'dra lus/ /chu bo rnams kyis bdas na bdag 'dir ji
ltar dga'/ /rab tu gsal nas 'bar ba nam mkha' lta bu dang / 'gro ba ngan zhugs 'gro ba 'di la bdag bltas nas/ /rgyal po de ring 'dir ni de dag dgrol ba dang / /gnyid
log sad par bgyi dang nad pa gso ba dang / /zug rngu rtsad nas gdon dang lam log bzlog pa'i phyir/ /bdag gis zhi ba'i chos kyi gru ni rab tu sbyar/ /stong chen du ni bcings pa
rnam grol rab bsgrags nas/ /legs par bshad pas ring nas dbul ba tshim par bgyi/ /ngan 'gro'i lam du lhung ba dag kyang gdon par bgyi/ /long ba mig sbyin sred pa'i
'khri shing bskam par bgyi/ /rnam grol mchog phyir shes rab 'od zer mar me byas/ /de yis srid gsum gar la blta bar 'drar mthong 'gyur//
byams dang snying brtses snying rje pha rol phyin pa'i sprin/ /sems can bde 'brug lha mthong glog gi phreng ba dang / /byang chub yan lag bde bsil char rgyun 'dra ba yis/ /'gro
ba yun ring dus nas gdungs pa bsil bar bgyi/ /rgyal po bdag ni de dran gyur nas 'dir mchis te/ /bdag ni 'dus byas 'dod pa kun la smon ma mchis/ /byang chub don
gnyer sems can ched du 'dir spyad bgyi/ gcig tu nges te bdag ni srid la dga' ma mchis/ /rgyal po 'di na shes bzhin su zhig dgra khrod gnas/ /blo dang ldan pa su
zhig 'jigs bcas lam du 'gro/ /mi dang ldan pa su zhig 'di na g.yang sar ltung / /byang chub lam shes nas ni su zhig bag med 'gyur/ /'gro ba thams cad rgyun
'gro dag ni rgyun zlog pa/ /rgyal po tshig tsam gyis ni byang chub thob mi nus/ /lhun po'i rtse nas rgya mtsho'i nang du mchong spro yi/ /bdag 'dir 'dod pa rnams kyis
yid dga' de lta min/ /rgyal po dam pa rang gnyer thabs cig myur du bzhud/ /yul 'khor dga' ba thams cad 'jig rten kun la stsol/ /gang bdag bsam pa
ji bzhin blangs nas mchi bar 'gyur/ /yab bdag bag med rgyal srid bye ba 'tshal ma lags/ /bud med tshogs kyi nang du gnas pas byang chub dang / /grub bde zhi ba bla med
gnas ni thob mi nus/ /dgon par dgyes pas rgyal bas byang chub brnyes pas na/ /bdag ni ri dang nags khrod mchis te gnas par bgyi/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal
bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer khang bzang gi nang na 'dug bzhin du yid byung ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis bud med de dag dang lhan cig 'chag cing de spyod lam/
gsum gyis gnas so/ /gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'greng ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa ste/ rmugs pa dang / gnyid yongs su spangs so/ /khang pa'i steng du song ste sa brgyad
la gnas nas de nam gyi gung la bab pa'i dus kyi tshe gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod cing bar snang la 'gro ba dang / chos dang / dge
'dun gyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod cing 'gro ba thos so/ /thos nas kyang yul 'khor skyong / rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas mchi ma zag
cing skyo ba skyes te thal mo sbyar nas lha rnams la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ lha rnams sdug bsngal bdag la thugs rje bskyed nas ni/ /gal te skyo mi mdzad na cung zhig zhu bar
bgyi| |su yi yon tan brjod cing bar snang 'di las bzhud/ /tshig de thos nas bdag 'dir yid ni bde bar gyur/ /yul 'khor skyong / /de nas lha de
dag gis rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod kyis sangs rgyas thos par ma gyur tam/ /don grub blo zhes bya ste skyabs
med rnams kyi skyabs/ /de bzhin spyod mkhas bsod nams shes rab yon tan mchog /de yi dge 'dun khrag khrig stong bcu bsam gtan pa/ /bsod nams 'od zer gyis
smras pa/ bdag ni rgyal ba lta 'tshal de yi gzugs ci 'dra/ /de yi kha dog ci 'dra thams cad bka' stsol cig /ji ltar spyad na sems can kun mgon gcig gyur pa/ /byang chub
spyod pa ci 'dra bdag ni yongs su 'dri/ /de nas lha de dag gis rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ de yi gtsug tor ri yi rtse la
gser mdzes bzhin/ /dbu skra 'jam zhing mdzes la g.yas su 'khyil pa ste/ /de yi mdzod spu mkha' la nyi ltar lham me ba/ /nor bu shel ltar rnam par dag cing g.yas
su 'khyil/ /spyan dag bung ba'i tshogs dang ut+pal sngon po 'dra/ /mi dbang seng+ge'i 'gram pa rang byung bim pa'i sgros/ /sems can lhan cig 'od zer bye ba mtha' yas 'gyed//
stong gsum rgyas par 'gengs shing ngan 'gro rnams kyang skem/ /de yi tshems ni rab dkar kha ba dngul ltar dag /bzhi bcu mnyam zhing thags bzang rmad byung legs par grub//
rgyal ba dam pa mchog de'i tshems kyi mche ba bzhi/ /de yi ljags ni rab yangs rang gi zhal gdong khebs/ /rgyal ba de yi gsung ni ri mchog 'dra ba'i don/ /shin tu tshim
byed 'brel cing gya gyu med pa ste/ /tshangs dbyangs shin tu snyan pa sil snyan stong 'dra ba/ /yid gnyis 'joms pa 'dod pa rnams ni tshim byed pa/ /rgyal ba'i gsung ni lha yi sgra
skad tshim byed pa/ /yon tan sna tshogs tshang ba byang chub yan lag mthun/ /chos kyi phreng pa yid 'ong brgya stong rab brgyus pa/ /sil snyan dga' ba bsgrags pa lha klu nyams dga'
ba| |mi ci ka la ping+ka khu byug ngur pa dang / /rma bya ngang pa sgra snyan ku na la yi sgra/ /tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs mi ci dbyangs kyi yan lag 'dra/ /ma 'khrul sdig med don rnams thams
cad rtogs byed pa/ /rmad byung shel ltar 'jam zhing mkhas pa'i yid 'ong ba/ /skul ba 'dul bar 'gyur ba spyod pa dgar 'gyur ba/ /gzhan gyi spyod dang mthun pa zhus na
tshim byed pa/ /chos kyi dbang phyug de yi gsung gi yon tan 'di/ /ston pa'i mgul mdzes dung dang 'dra zhing dpung mgo zlum/ /dbyug pa lta bur phyag ring de yi bdun
yang mtho/ /phyag mdzes sna tshogs sor mo rnams ni ring zhing zlum/ /rgyal ba de yi sku ni btso ma gser gyi mdog /ba spu g.yas su 'khyil cing
gyen du re re skyes/ /lte ba mtha' dag zab cing gsang sbubs rta yi 'dra/ /rang byung e na ya yi byin pa glang po'i sna 'dra'i brla/ /zhabs mthil mdzes par bris pa bkra shis
'khor lo'i mtshan/ /glang po'i dbang po'i 'gros thabs seng+ge'i rtsal gyi stobs/ /khyu mchog 'gying pa'i stabs can dbang po'i mchod stong rgyas/ /mkha' las me tog
char 'bab me tog gdugs su gyur/ /gshegs pa'i rjes 'gro 'di dag de yi rmad byung chos/ /rgyal ba rnyed dang ma rnyed bde dang sdug bsngal dang / /grags dang ma grags
de bzhin bstod dang smad pa yis/ /pad+ma chus ltar thams cad du yang gos pa med/ /mi yi seng+ge de 'dra mtshungs pa'i sems can med/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal bu
gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa thos shing / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dga'
ste| dga' ba dang / bde ba skyes par gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ci
'dra ba dang / de'i dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / des mngon sum du byas pa'i chos ci 'dra ba dang / de'i slob ma phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / ji ltar 'khor ba
ya nga ba dang phrad pa dang / byas pa mi gzo ba dang / ji ltar 'khor ba na byis pa so so'i skye bo dag byas pa mi gzo ba dang / ji ltar 'jig tshogs la lta ba ya nga ba dang / ji ltar khyim gyi
gnas nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa dag nyes pa mang ba dang / ji ltar mkhas pa rnams kyis bag med pa smod pa dang / ji ltar ma rig pa'i mun nag rmongs pa dang /
ji ltar 'du byed rnams rtogs par dka' ba dang / ji ltar sems gdul bar dka' ba dang / ji ltar ming dang gzugs zab pa dang / ji ltar skye mched drug dbugs 'byin pa med
pa dang / ji ltar reg pa yongs su ma shes te sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa dang / ji ltar tshor ba nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar sred pa'i 'ching ba dam pa dang / ji ltar nye bar
len pa las 'byung bar dka' ba dang / ji ltar srid pa'i sred pa 'phags pa ma yin pa dang / ji ltar srid pa yod na skye ba rgyun gcad dka' ba dang / ji ltar rga ba rnam par 'gyur
bar byed pa dang / ji ltar nad kyis rnam par 'jig par byed pa dang / ji ltar 'chi ba rjes su mi srung ba dang / ji ltar 'jug pa ro bro ba chung ba dang / ji ltar srid pa mngon par 'grub
pa nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa nyams dga' ba ltar 'di mi nus te/ 'dod pa'i khol po nyon mongs pa'i
rmongs pa/ sems tha ba can bag med pa la dga' ba/ byis pa'i nang na 'dug pa/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'khor ba la chags pa'i sems
dang ldan pa/ skye bo ma rungs pa'i nang na 'dug pa ni/ bde 'gro'i lam yang rnam par spyad par mi nus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
par sangs rgyas par lta ga la 'gyur snyam mo/ /de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag sgo nas byung na ni/ nye du'i tshogs kyi bar chad byas su 'ong gi /bdag khang steng 'di
nas thur du mchong ngo / /snyam mo/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de ga la ba de
logs su phyogs te/ khang pa de nas mchongs nas tshig 'di skad du gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs she na/ de bzhin gshegs
pa de bdag la dgongs su gsol zhes kyang smras so/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub
blos phyag g.yas pa brkyangs te/ 'od phyung nas 'od des rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la reg go /'od de las kyang pad+ma 'dab ma brgya stong yod pa shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam
byung bar gyur to/ /pad+ma de las kyang 'od zer brgya stong byung ste snang ba chen por gyur nas snang ba des rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer khyab par gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong /
de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer pad+ma de la 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
don grub blo de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas de
bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo des 'od de brtul ba dang / gzhon nu de sdong bu bcad pa sgyel ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du babs te/ de bzhin gshegs
pa de la lan brgya stong du phyag 'tshal lo/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo
la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ /bdag ni ring nas na ste ring nas ldongs/ /chegs chen sman pa'i rgyal po khyod rnyed do/ /ji ltar bde gshegs bstan la gnas nas ni/ /bdag
gis thob 'gyur mgon po bstan du gsol/ /'dren pa bdag gis bag mchis thos pa ni/ /mtshan mo bar snang lha las thos lags te/ /thos
nas skyo ste bdag ni 'dir mchis na/ /mi rnams bag mchis 'gyur ba ji lta bu/ /lam mnyam pa la de ring ston gyur cig /ldongs par gyur pa'i mig tu deng gyur cig /dad pa'i
'byung gnas gso mdzad thugs rje ldan/ /g.yang sa chen po 'di las bdag phyung zhing / /dbul por gyur pa bdag ni bsdu bar mdzod/ /mgon po bcings pa bdag ni deng grol
mdzod| |som nyi bcas pa'i yid gnyis gcad du gsol/ /byang chub lam la spyod pa bdag lung ston/ /chus khyer bdag la 'gram ni bstan du gsol/ /mun pa bdag la sgron
ma mdzad du gsol/ /rmar gyur bdag la rma med mdzad du gsol/ /sman pa'i rgyal po bdag gi zug rngu phyung / /khyod kyis ngan 'gro dag las bdag thar mdzod/ /srid par dmigs pa 'dzin
pa gcad du gsol/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i lam gyi lam chen gyis/ /mya ngan chu chen pha rol bsgral du gsol/ /srog ni zad pa'i chos can tshe yang thung / /dge ba bar chad mang po 'byung
ba ste| |bsod nams rnam smin ring por mi thogs 'grub/ /bdag gis dal ba gdod rnyed gcig nges gsungs/ /byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bag mchis 'gyur/ /ji ltar byang chub
spyod pa mchog spyad na/ /'gro ba srid pa'i 'ching las thar 'gyur ba/ /'jig rten mgon po de dag bdag lung ston/ yul 'khor skyong / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blos rgyal
bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya cher yang dag par bstan no/ /rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis
de thos nas rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob bo/ /mngon par shes pa lnga yang thob ste/ de nam mkha' la gnas nas me tog rnams mngon par sprul te/ de bzhin gshegs
pa de la gtor/ mngon par gtor to/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal po gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer bar snang de las babs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa don grub blo de la tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod pa/ mtshan mchog ldan pa dri med zla ba'i zhal/ /gser mdog 'dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdul bral khyod
'dra srid pa gsum ma mchis/ /mnyam med mkhyen chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba'i dbu skra 'jam mdzes snum zhing bzang / /khyod kyi gtsug tor 'di ni ri rgyal bzhin/ /
gtsug tor mi mthong khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis/ /thub pa khyod ni smin mtshams mdzod spu mdzes/ /kun da zla ba kha ba dung ltar dkar/ /thugs rje gang gis 'gro ba 'di
gzigs pa/ /spyan mchog bzang po ut+pal sngon po 'dra/ /rgyal ba dri med spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ljags yangs srab la zangs kyi
mdog 'dra ba/ /de yis rang gi zhal gyi gdong yang khebs/ /chos gsung bas ni 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid/ /'jam snum gsung ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshems
bzang shin tu brtan pa rdo rje dang / /bcu dang sum cu snyoms shing thags bzang ba/ /'dzum pa mdzad nas 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid/ /bden gtam snyan pa khyod la phyag 'tshal
lo| |rgyal ba khyod kyi gzugs dang mtshungs ma mchis/ /'od kyis zhing brgya dag kyang snang bar bgyid/ /'jig rten na ni tshangs dbang skyong de dag /bcom ldan khyod kyi 'od kyis
zil du rlag /e na'i byin pa mnyam med bcom ldan 'das/ /glang po'i rgyal po rma bya seng+ge'i stabs/ /bcom ldan gnya' shing gang du gzigs shing gshegs/ /sa dang
ri dang dam pa g.yo bar mdzad/ /bcom ldan khyod sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa ste/ /khyod kyi pags pa 'jam zhing gser mdog 'dra/ /'gro ba gzugs 'di blta bas ngoms
mi 'gyur/ /khyod ni mtshungs pa ma mchis gzugs dang ldan/ /khyod sngon bskal pa brgyar ni dka' thub spyad/ /khyod gtong dul dang sbyin pa kun la dgyes/ /sems can
kun la thugs rje byams thugs ldan/ /mchog tu thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod ni sbyin dang tshul khrims rtag tu dgyes/ /khyod ni bzod dang brtson 'grus dgyes rab brtan/ /
khyod ni bsam gtan shes rab 'od gzi mnga'/ /mtshungs med ye shes mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod ni smra ba ngan pa'i tshogs can 'joms/ /khyod ni seng+ge lta bur 'khor du sgrog /khyod ni
sman pa'i rgyal po dri gsum sel/ /mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub pa sku gsung thugs ni rnam par dag /pad+ma chu ltar srid pa gsum mi gos/ /khyod ni tshangs
dbyangs ka la ping+ka'i skad/ /srid gsum pha rol gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyis 'gro 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang / /gar la lta dang rmi lam 'dra ba dang / /bdag med sems can med
cing srog 'gro med/ /chos rnams smig rgyu chu zla 'dra bar mkhyen/ /stong pa zhi ba skye ba med pa'i tshul/ /mi shes pas ni 'gro ba 'khyams gyur to/ /thugs rje thabs tshul rigs pa
brgya dag gis/ /de dag rnams ni 'dzud par mdzad pa lags/ /'dod chags la sogs nad mang brgya dag gis/ /skrag par gyur pa'i 'gro la rtag gzigs te/ /bder gshegs
sems can brgya dag yongs 'grel cing / /bla med sman pa lta bur rnam par rgyu/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi dang mya ngan non/ /sdug dang bral dang smre sngags 'don pa brgyas/ /rtag tu na ba'i sdug
bsngal gzigs pas ni/ /thub pa thugs rjes yongs su 'grel cing rgyu/ /dud 'gro yid dwags dmyal ba'i 'gro rnams su/ /'gro kun shing rta'i
'phang lo bzhin du 'khor/ /glen pa dmigs bu ma mchis mgon ma mchis/ /de la lam gyi dam pa ston par mdzad/ /gtso bo mtshungs pa med pas gang bstan pa/ /
'phags lam de nyid gang dag sngon chad kyi/ /chos kyi dbang phyug 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ /rgyal ba de dag rnams kyis rab tu gsungs/ /'jam zhing mnyen la yid du 'ong
ba'i mchog /tshangs las lhag par mchog tu dga' bgyid pa/ /dri za mi ci lha yi bu mo mchog /sgra de zil gyis mnan nas gsungs pa mdzad/ /bden dang drang ba mi zad thabs
tshul gyis/ /yongs sbyangs yon tan mtha' yas ldan pa'i gsung / /de thos sems can khrag khrig phrag brgya dag /theg pa gsum gyis zhi bar mchi bar bgyid/ /khyod
la mchod pas lha yi bde ba ni/ /rnam pa mang dang de bzhin mi yi thob/ /mi yi bdag po 'gro la phan bgyid pa/ /phyug cing nor che 'byor pa chen por 'gyur/ /mtshungs
med khyod la dad pa bskyed pa ni/ /gling bzhi'i bdag po 'khor los bsgyur ba mchog /'gro la dge ba bcu po kun byed pa/ /rin chen rab bzang bdun ldan thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal
ba khyod la mchod pa bgyis pas ni/ /tshangs pa brgya byin 'jig rten bdag po dang / /yongs su dga' ldan lha yi bdag po dang / /gzhan 'phrul ba dang 'thab bral rab dgar 'gyur//
'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnam mang sel mdzad pa/ /mnyam med khyod la mchod dang mthong ba dang / /thos pa'ang de ltar 'bras bu mchis lags te/ /gnas mchog rga shi med pa
'thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan lam la mkhas shing lam mkhyen pa/ /'jig rten 'di ni ngan pa'i lam las bzlog /bcom ldan 'gro ba dag ni 'phags pa'i lam/ /
bde ba zhi ba rdul dang bral la 'god/ /bsod nams gter khyod bsod nams don gnyer ba'i/ /bsod nams bgyid pa rtag tu mi bas te/ /byang chub dam pa ma thob bar du
ni| |bskal pa bye ba mang po bas mi 'gyur/ /gzhan 'phrul 'dra ba rtag tu dga' bgyid pa/ /yongs su dag cing mdzes pa thob par 'gyur/ /dam pa'i zhing du lus dang ngag yid
kyis| |sems can dag ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba mchod pa'i mi yis 'di la sogs/ /yon tan rnam pa du ma thob par 'gyur/ /mtho ris thar pa mi yi bde ba
dang / /'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gter thob 'gyur/ /khyod kyi brjod dang grags pa rgya chen po/ /phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing mang brgyar yang mchis/ /rgyal ba khyod kyi bsngags
pa'i phreng ba ni/ /bde bar gshegs rnams 'khor du rtag par sgrog /rims nad bral zhing 'gro ba thar mdzad pa/ /mthong na dga' ba thugs rje
mchog ldan pa/ /bcom ldan dbang po zhi ba zhi bgyid pa/ /mi mchog dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis rgyal ba khyod kyi gsung thos nas/ /mngon par
shes pa lnga thob mkha' la gnas/ /dpa' bo bde gshegs mtshungs par bdag gyur te/ /dri med chos ni 'gro la rnam par 'byed/ /lha dang mi dang klus mchod bde
bar gshegs/ /yon tan kun gyi mthar phyin deng bstod pas/ /bsod nams rgya chen gang bsgrubs gyur pa des/ /'gro ba sangs rgyas go 'phang thob par shog /yul 'khor
skyong / de nas mtshan mo de'i nam nangs pa dang / rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis gzhon nu'i bud med kyi khor du ba'i sgra thos so/ /thos nas kyang myur ba myur bar rings pa'i
gzugs kyis grong khyer dga' mchog ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod ci'i phyir ngu / de dag gis smras pa/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams
kyi 'od zer mi gda' ba'i slad du'o/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gzhon nu'i phyir shing bcad pa bsgyel ba ltar sa la 'gyel te langs nas ngu
zhing grong khyer der lan stong du yongs su btsal lo/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas grong khyer de na grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa des rgyal po 'od zer ldan la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir shar phyogs logs su song ngo / /
yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gzhon nu btsal ba'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig
tu shar gyi phyogs cha ga la ba der song ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs
su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/ srid gsum khyod mtshungs ma mchis lhag pa ga la mchis/ /sems can dam pa lha dbang lha min rgyal pos bkur/ /skye bo khyod kyi
gzugs la blta bas ngoms mi 'gyur/ /yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba khyod sku sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rab dag /lhun po rin chen mchog
gis spras ltar yongs su dag /rgyal ba sdug cing 'jam pa gser gyi kha dog 'dra/ /blta sdug gzugs mnga' thub pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal
lo| |bskal pa bye brgya bsam gyis mi khyab brtul zhugs spyad/ /bskal pa bye ba brgya mang sangs rgyas bsti stang mdzad/ /sngon chad mchod sbyin brgya phrag bsam gyis
mi khyab mdzad/ /des na khyod sku bzang zhing shin tu mdzes pa lags/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang / /bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan thabs
kyis khyod gzugs sbyangs/ /khyod kyi spyan sngar brgya byin tshangs 'od gsal ma lags/ /chu shel nor bu glog gi 'od kyang mdzes ma lags/ /'gro ba'i don du yid du mchi
ba'i gzugs kyang ston/ /chu zla 'dra zhing sgyu ma 'dra bar gda' ba lags/ /rang gi phyogs rnams kun tu rgyal ba'i sku yang gda'/ /bder gshegs rnams kyi sku yi tshad ni
gda' ma lags/ /khyod ni dga' ldan 'ga' zhig na yang bzhugs par gda'/ /'chi 'pho mdzad cing rab dga' glang por gyur nas ni/ /dpa' bo yum gyi lhums su
gshegs par gda' bar mdzad/ /thub chen nam mkha' lta bur thams cad rjes su zhugs/ /bcom ldan phyogs 'gar bltams par ston pa'ang mdzad pa ste/ /sa
dga' dag tu gom pa bdun por gda' ba mdzad/ /nga ni lha mir bcas 'gro nang gtso shin tu lta/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal mtsho las gdon zhes gsung yang phyung / /thub khyod chos
gang la yang the tshom mi mnga' yang / /yi ge shes pa slob ltar 'jig rten dag na gda'/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin spyod yul zhi ba brnyes gyur kyang / /kha cig tu ni bud med
nang na zhugs par gda'/ /yab dang yum dang sras dang bud med rnams kyang btang / /gnyen rnams mya ngan non te rnam par brgyal zhing ngu / /sems can dam pa bye ba brgya
yis yongs bskor nas/ /nags gnas gnas gcig pu nas 'byung bar gda' ba'ang mdzad/ /khyod ni bdud bzhi pham par mdzad nas yun ring yang / /zhing na bdud
'dul ba yang gda' ba ston pa mdzad/ /sngon chad 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab bskor gyur kyang / /khyod ni thugs rjes 'khor lo bskor bar gda' ba mdzad/ /rtag tu rtag lta
'du shes ldan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas/ /mya ngan 'da' zhes 'khor gyi nang du tshig tu gsungs/ /rtag tu 'khor bar dga' ba'i 'gro ba gzigs nas ni/ /khyod ni zhi ba bsil
gyur mya ngan 'das pa gsung / /khyod kyi bsod nams ye shes shes rab thabs mtshungs med/ /thub pa khyod sku 'od kyis zhing mang rgyas par 'gengs/ /phyogs rnams dag na 'dren pa
khyod kyi bsngags pa gsung / /kun tu spyod yul thub pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos nyid ma lus brnyes par gyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems
can kun gyi bgyi ba sgyu ma ltar gda' yang / /thub pa khyod ni gang du bzhud pa'am byon ma lags/ /sgyu ma'i chos tshul gnas la mngon par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba'i don du
gang gis byang chub mchog thob pa/ /lam mchog mi yi dpa' bo khyod kyis legs gsungs pa/ /bdag gis chos nyid 'di ni myur du sangs rgyas nas/ /mi dpa' 'gro ba'i don
du chos nyid bshad par bgyi/ /mi yi dpa' bo thub pa kun mkhyen rims bral ba/ /srid gsum mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag pa ga la zhig /bdag gis 'dir bstod
bsod nams mtha' yas gang bsgrubs des/ /'jig rten byang chub bla med zhi mchog thob par shog /yul 'khor skyong / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub
blo des rgyal po 'od zer ldan de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas ci nas thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur
ba de ltar chos bstan to/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de la
'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gi grong khyer du gdugs tshod gsol bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu
gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la thugs brtse bar dgongs te cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo / /yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer
gyis pha ma de gnyis dang / grogs po de dag dang / bud med de dag la smras pa/ khyed cag thams cad rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig /ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan
te ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la dbul du rung bar gyis shig /de dag gis sgra skad gcig tu rjes su yi rang ngo / /yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal po gzhon nu
bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo/ /ro bro ba bkod pa lnga brgya pa'i zhal zas kyang de
bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la gsol to/ /dge slong de dag thams cad kyi phyir rin po che sna bdun gyis g.yogs pa'i gtsug lag khang
nor bu'i 'chags bshams pa/ steng du rin po che'i dra bas bla re bres pa/ g.yas g.yon du me tog gi shing ljon pa legs par yongs su grub par byas pa/ me tog
pad+ma dkar po'i rdzing gis mdzes par byas pa/ ras bcos bu mu gnyis dri ma med pa brgya stong bting ba'i mal bshams pa/ dge slong re re la gos
kha na ma tho ba med pa gang spyin pa de/ phyi de nyin mi sbyin gyi/ nyin gcig bzhin gos gzhan dang / gzhan sbyin par 'gyur bar byas so/ /de lo bye ba phrag gsum gyi bar
du rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur/ bdag la dga' ba ma byas/ sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i phyir gzhan yid la ma byas so/ /bar skabs der 'dod pa
la rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par ma gyur/ rgyal srid la sred par ma gyur te/ lus
dang srog la yang mi lta na/ dngos po gzhan la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bar skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gsungs pa de thams cad kun tu bzung ste/ de
bzhin gshegs pa la lan gnyis su ma zhus so/ /bar skabs der khrus ma byas/ mar dang 'bru mar gyis lus la ma bskus/ rkang pa ma bkrus/ ngal ba'i 'du shes
ma bskyed do/ /zan za ba dang / bshang gci byed pa ma gtogs par nam yang 'dug par ma gyur to/ /gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das
pa de'i tshe tsan+dan dmar po'i zhugs la bzhen pa byas so/ /gang du de bzhin gshegs pa de zhugs la bzhen pa'i sa phyogs de nyid du 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad pa'i me tog thams
cad dang / phreng ba thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / rol mo'i sgra thams cad kyis lo brgya stong du ring bsrel la mchod pa byas par gyur ba nas rgyu rkyen thams cad bsags
te phyis mchod rten bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du byas so/ /mchod rten de dag la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rin po che'i dra bas g.yogs so/ /mu tig gi dra ba'i bla re dag
bres so| |mchod rten re re la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs lnga brgya lnga brgya phul lo/ /mchod rten de dag thams cad la yang sil snyan brgya stong phul lo/ /'dzam bu'i
gling khor yug tu me tog gi shing ljon pa bskrun to/ /mchod rten re re la yang mar me'i rdza bo brgya stong las mar me bus so/ /mar me'i rdza bo re re nas kyang spos kyi 'bru mar
drug cu rtsa bzhi pa stong gi mar me bus so/ /spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa thams cad kyis kyang mchod pa byas so/ /tshul de lta bus lo bye ba'i bar du mchod pa byas te/
phyis rab tu byung ngo / /de rab tu byung nas kyang chos gos gsum par gyur cing rtag tu bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang / rtag tu tsog bu pa ste/ nam yang glos ma phab bo/ /nam yang
rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to/ /de zang zing med pa'i sems kyis lo bye ba phrag bzhi'i bar du chos kyi sbyin pa byin te/ de gzhan la
tha na legs so/ /zhes bya ba tsam la yang re bar ma gyur na/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de chos nyan pa'am chos bshad pas kyang ngal bar ma gyur to/ /
de la lha rnams kyang bsnyen bkur byed do/ /yul 'khor gyi mi thams cad dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang / nang mi thams cad dang / grogs po thams cad kyang de'i rjes
su bslab ste rab tu byung ngo / /yul 'khor skyong / de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi rjes su slob pa'i
yul gyi mi thams cad rab tu byung gi /bdag cag gis de la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byas na/ dkon mchog gsum la rim gro byas par 'gyur ro/ /snyam mo/ de
bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos lo bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du gnas te/ dge slong bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis
thams cad yongs su bzung ngo / /tshul 'di lta bus sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi la rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod pa byas so/ /yul 'khor skyong /
de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod de ltar dogs shing the tshom za'am yid gnyis su gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi
blta'o| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya bar gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong / de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal
bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod de ltar dogs shing the tshom za'am yid gnyis su gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o//
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya bar gyur to/ /grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs
par gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong / de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
rgyas par 'dod pas lhag pa'i bsam pas bsgrubs pa dang / sdug pa dang mi sdug pa yongs su spangs pa dang / bag yod pa'i spyod pas rgyal bu bsod nams kyi 'od
zer de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o/ /ngas bya dka' ba mngon par 'du bya ba de lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /de lta bas na/ de dag mi
brtson pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa lhur len pa dang / shes kyi khe la chags pa dang / nga rgyal gyis bcom pa dang /
'dod pa'i rgyus nyon mongs shing sha thang pa dang / 'dod pa'i rgyus bstan pa las ring du gyur pa dang / rab tu byung ba don med pa dang / dge sbyong sun par byed pa dang / byang
chub sems dpa' dmu rgod dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems mi drang ba dang / ltas lta ba dang / khas 'che ba nor ba dang / rang gi dam bcas pa las nyams pa dang /
gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i ched kyi sman dang / yo byad kyi mtshan ma la chags pa dang / ngo tsha mi shes pa dang / khrel med pa dang / cho ga nyams pa dang /
dam pa'i chos ma yin pa la 'jug pa dang / spyod yul dang bral ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul las ring du gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang bral ba dang /
rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang bral bar gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong / de lta bas na/ rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos 'di thos nas sdig pa'i bshes gnyen rigs pa med pa
rnyed pa don du gnyer ba dang mi bsten par shes par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba'i spyod
pa dpag med na/ snying ni thob dang shes kyi khe la song / /byang chub yon tan brgyas khebs por nas ni/ /de dag thob phyir gzhan gyi khyim la dga'/ /khwa 'dra sdang ba khrel dang mos blo
bral| |shes kyi khe phyir bdud kyi dbang du song / /nyon mongs rag lus srid pa'i 'gro bar gzhol/ /bdag 'dir yon tan ldan zhes de skad smra/ /lus ni dgon na dran pa grong
khyer du| |thob phyir de dag rnam par rtog pas spyod/ /gnam dang sa ltar thar las ring ba ste/ /de 'dra de dag sprul ltar ring du spang / /de dag sangs rgyas chos dang ji bzhin
du| |dge 'dun yon tan brgyas gang dga' ma yin/ /mtho ris bor nas ngan pa'i lam du song / /sdug pas phongs nas srid pa'i 'gro bar 'khyams/ /nga yi spyod pa nye
bar bstan pa 'di thos nas/ /yang dag lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgrub pas 'di la sbyor/ /bskal pa bye ba mang pos rnyed dka' dal rnyed kyi/ /de ltar ji skad bstan pa'i chos
nyid ston pa 'dir brtson gyis/ /gang zhig theg mchog byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod/ /de yis rgyal po de yi yon tan dran par bya/ /bsam ste yang dag ji bzhin
tshul bzhin gnas par bya/ /de ltas bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub chags med 'grub/ /yon tan 'di dag rtogs pas 'phags pa'i rigs la brten/ /rang gis
'dir ni kun tu shes pa bskyed par bya/ /bstan pa yon tan snying po 'di 'dra ma spangs shig /byis pa lta bur 'gro ba lngar ni 'khyams sa re/ /
'dir ni ri dang dgon pa phug tu gnas par bya/ /der gnas nas ni bdag mi snyems shing gzhan mi smad/ /sngon chad sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya mnyes ma byas/ /rjes su
dran nas rtag par rgyun du bdag la spyos/ /lus dang srog la sred pa ma chags spang bar bya/ /gus pa drag po bskyed nas chos la brtson par bgyi/ /nga yis mdo 'dir
sgrub pa bshad pa 'dir gnas na/ /de dag rnams kyis phyi nas byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ /gang dag rgyal ba'i theg pa 'di la dga' brtson pa/ /thos nas phyir zhing yid ni
'jug par bya ba'i rigs/ /de lta bas na bstan la mos pa bskyed par bya/ /rnam par rgyu ba'i tshe na phyis 'gyod gyur ta re/ /yul 'khor skyong / byang chub sems dpa'
gang zhig pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la spyod la/ yang gang zhig bdag 'di la bslab bo/ /bdag sdom pa 'di la gnas par bya'o/ /snyam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nan
tan gyis bsgrubs na/ bsod nams kyi phung po de bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i gan na brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye
ba brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sngon sems ma
bskyed pa'i lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye rgu khrag khrig phrag sum cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /dge slong bdun stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das la tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ de
skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /yul 'khor skyong / de lta bas na/ khyod kyis chos kyi
rnam grangs 'di dam bcas pa don yod pa rnam par dag ba zhes bya bar zungs shig /skyes bu dam pa rnam par rol pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par nges pa zhes
bya bar yang zungs shig /don yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong
dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya
ste| 'dus pa bco brgyad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / mu ni warma dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes
sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ //
